sentence: Whether or not parents should let children makes mistakes and correct them by themselves is an oftened debated topic.
While many people confirm that children should be avoided being exposed to the environment filled with challenge and risks,I do not believe that this is the case.
I definitely believe children need to learn something from their past experience,being punished and then correct mistakes deliberately.
Firstly,children have a deep impression on what they have gone through.
The area of thoughts in childrens' mind is somewhere parents cannot get involved in.
So how to make a reinforcement on what they have learned?
According to Edward.L.Skinner and other behaviorists,all the animals ,included human beings, can learn from trial-and-error learning.
When a person makes mistakes while handling a difficult task, he will less likely to make the same mistakes.
There are many experiments that gave us the same result.
It is absolutely clear that the result is replicable.
I once failed to pass my math exam.
As a result of this, I worked harder on the skills of dealing with math problem.
Finally, I didn't make the same fault.
Last but not the least,parents are necessary to provide children with more chances of broading the horizon.

Opinions vary from person to person.

At this time , young people mostly no longer rely on their parents to make decisions for them.
In my opinion, the two reasons of the change is the change of laws and the change of people views.
Firstly,in the past , all the law said that young people belong to their family and parents should make descisions for them.

The change of laws helps young people make their own decisions.

The phenominum of giving school-age children money has been discussed widely, some people think it's a good idea, others think it's inappropriate.
From my point of view, offering mooney to school-age children has some disadvantages such as children wil misunderstand why do they study and they will be unpopular in class.
First, children will misunderstand why do they study if parents give them money for high grade.
They will gradually study for money.
Actually what parents should do is seting up a right model of value so that their children will know they study for themselves.
As a result, children will realize they are studying for their future.
For instance, my friend Mike told me his parents always bought him his favorate toys when he got a good grade in high school.
When he graduated from high school, he found out he learned nothing because what he did in high school was persuing the high score.
He ignored the knowledge itself so he started to worry about his future.
As a result, he has no job now.
he was fired by many companies because he was not good even one thing.
Furthermore, children will be unpopular in class if their parents give them money.
Children will develop a bad habbit if their parents are insisting to give them money for high grade.
No matter what they do, they consider about the profit first.
such kind of people won't be popular in a group.
Here is an example of mine, when I studied in middle school, my grade was good and my parents liked to give me money when I got good grade.
Later I became very mean and unpopular.
The reason was when other kids asked me to help them, I always tell them do not ask me for help unless giving me a candy.
Then other kids didn't asked for help anymore.
Nobody even talked with me.
I feel lonely in class.
One day I write letters to every single child in class.
In the letter, I said I will give you a candy if you ask me for help.
Everything was changed.
I became more friendly and popular.
To sum up, although giving money to children who get high grade in school has benifit like motivating studetns for pursuing better grade, I still think it is not a good idea.
With the development of science and technology, people have more methods to kill time, and they have lots of ways to make friends.
But more and more people like to ask their friends, are you happy today.

In my perspective, I think although the world is changing quickly, but the happiness of human is deceasing.

In addition, they have to take care of their children, they have to bring their children to the greatest school in that city, and give them sufficient nutrition.
Plus, the adults need to take care of parents.
If their parents are ill, they should spend money to treat parents and spare time to take care of parents.
For example, there are lots of young couple are depressed and have no vigorous to work, because they think they cannot earn enough money for their child and parents.
And they are too busy to accompany with their family.
In contrast, in the past, people did not need to pay the high expense of the house and did not to select the most suitable for their children.
Admittedly, recent people have more devices to kill time, such as laptops and mobile phones.
But they still feel unhappy because they have more problems have to be solve.
But i the past, everything was pure and simple.

Everyone will make mistakes in the daily life.
But how to point out others' mistakes in an appropriate way can be still a controversial topic.
Some people will interrupt and correct the errors right away without thinking because they believe that they may forget what the errors are with time goes by, while others may choose to keep slient.
As for me, I do reckon that we should wait until the meeting is over and then talk to the meeting leader.
On the one hand,  interrupting others who are speaking is not polite.
On the other hand, keeping slient will show that you do not care about what the meeting is going on.
Both, in other words, will make a bad impression to others who attend to the meeting.
For example, as far as I remember, I once took part in a math modeling contest in a group last year.
We had a discussion about solving math problems during that time.
In that discussion in which every group member should come up with their our plan, I was interrupted by one of my classmate due to a slip of tongue.
Because of that, I ad a bad impression of him altough I did not show my unsatisfaction.
Meanwhile, an other group member who did not say anything about others' idea rendered that group leader annoyed as a result of his indifferent attitude.

Secondly, pointing out the mistakes after the meeting can assist speaker to improve himself better because you have more time to explain your reasons why he or she is wrong and analysis the problem thoroughly.
My brother's experience can be a good example.
When he was in primary school, he was the monitor of his class, who should organize the class meeting in every Friday.
In one of that regular meeting, he used a very rude words to criticize one of his classmate when his head teacher standed back of the classroon.
But his teacher did not interrupt him until the meeting was over.
He, then, talked to my brother about how to treat others in a more polite way and why we should do that, which spent nearly an hour.
At first, my brother did not realize his errors.
But thanks to the teacher's analysis, it really made my brother behavior in a better manner.
In a nutshell, due to more time to explain and analysis your reason and not being so impolite and indifferent, I hold the idea that we should wait until the meeting is over and then show your ideas.

As some children become more and more hardworking, some part of them will get good grades and their parents will give them money for the award of their high grades which is a way of rewarding about their hardworking and encouraging them to do even better at the next time.
I don't think it is a good idea.
First of all, there can be a lot of ways of rewarding the children such as taking them to a trip or some place they want to  go to or buying some toys or books they like.

Giving the shcool-age children is not a proper way of rewarding because most of the children at that age don't have a perception about the money so they will spend it immediately to buy what they like instead of just use a pat of it and save the remains.
For example, if a child gets  a good grades at school and their parents reward him some money for his grade.
Since he is just a little boy and he just wants to use the money to but the things he like.
It doesn't matter for him to use money at his age, but it will promote him to develop the idea that once you get some money, you use it instead of allocate and manage his money rationally.
In addition, giving children money will make them think that studying and getting high grade is for the money but not for themselves.
In this way, they will not study independently and actively because their purpose about the studying is getting money instead of getting to know more knowledge and become a keen leaner.
If their parents will no longer give them money, they will be less motivated and lack motivation of studying.

Moreover, children don't have a idea about the things  they bought either are good or bad for them, they just buy the things which they think it is interesting and attractive which will lead them to buy something harmful to them like alcohol or cigarette or even drugs, thees things will affect their whole life once they touch them.
admittedly, the money does has the function which and stimulate the children to study but this method also has many disadvantages.
In conclusion, I don't think that the idea about giving money to the school-age children for rewarding is a good idea.
Nowadays, it is ture that the economy development is significant in the whole world.

First, protecting the wild animals is a significant way to improve the knowledge people gain.

Second,protectting wild areas is a insurance to the health of civilians.

The research was done by the Beijing university has shown that there are eighty percents of Chinese urban areas, the people live in the urban enviorment are easier to get sick ,such as, get a cold,than the people eho live in the countryside which is close to the nature.

Based on the two reasons, expanding the knowledge of civilians and protectting the health pf civilians both shown the meaning of protect wild animals and awild areas are also benefial for our socialty

Currently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate-people should pursue ambitious dreams or realistic goals.
Opinions vary from individual to individual.
Some people hold the view that we should always persist in big target.
Nevertheless, I am firmly convinced that it is a better option for us to concentrate on realistic goals.
My view can be elaborated as follows.
First of all, realistic goals are more likely to be achieved.

To be more specific, realistic goals are drawn up by people based on their current situations, as a result of which, plan makers are pretty aware of what measures should be taken to realize the goals.
Besides, since people take their own capability into consideration when making those plans, they have relevant knowledge and abilitities to obtain they want.
In contrary, ambitious dreams are so distant from current circumstances that we might be at a loss of what we are supposed to do and finally end up with failure.
For example, my cousin once wanted to win Nobel Price when he was in junior school.
Despite his strong willingness to reach the dream, he lacked professonal knowledge and relevant scientific research experience so that he was totally at a loss about what to do.
Later on, he decided to focus on the coming high school entrance examination and prepared for it step by step and finally entered a key school.
Secondly, realistic goals are more fittable to the need of our society.
To further illustrate my point, our society is developing at an alarming speed due to the progress of science and technology.
How to be successful in one field?
bracing eager of challeng or not to imitate others.
Undoubtedly, all of these are highly important characteristics for people to be successful.
Therefore, I keep in tune with the fact that successful people always try new things and take risks.
It is known to all that lots of successful people want to finish some impossible tasks and challenges; therefore, trying to overcome new things and risks is necessary for them.

Additional, he invests billions dollors on immigrant plants to Mars which is a plant with familar condition as earth.
This project is inspired by his dream to reduce the loard of earth.
All of these work he do are unbelievebal tasks for people.
Musk can go a long way like this owing to the fact that  he is willing to take risks and try newthings in order to create a better world.
Having a glimpse into this society, almost all successful people have passion to do work that others even can not imagin.
Therefore, successful people are willing to try new things and take risks.
Aside from this, successful people never follow others blindly and they always try to observe, which enable them never fail to find more new opportunities.
Chinese famous entreprenear, Ma Yun successfully create a huge internet empire.
Nowadays, by using this internet system, people can do everything including eating and shopping in home.
This huge success are supposed to contributed by his indepence.
When almost all bussiness man invested on housing, Ma Yun claims that internet is the future of world.
This way, he followed his heard even people that time totally ignored his new ideal.
He never give up and finally this new ideal seted up a enoumous business empire.
After that, he never stop peace and he still to try some newthings including machine.
To sum up, successful people always try new things because they love challegin
Children always need some rewards when they get a high grade in school.
Faced with such problem, parents often come up with some ideas to meet the children's satisfaction.
Some parents offer their children money to encourage them work harder, and other peoplr think it is not a wise idea.
As for me, I vote for that giving money is not great and even do harm to children's development.
First, children always don't have ability to use this money effectively or in right ways.
So if parents let children to manage their money by their own, they can't develop a right consumption mind.

For instance, if a couple of parents give their child money for a good performance in school, this child may spend this money so quickly to buy something they don't need at all because they don't know how difficult earning a life is.
Maybe they will foster a bad habit that they will never make a budget for their daily lives in the future.
We can see that there are many young people who can't save any money at all.
They are not awared of that they should save some money to face the emergency that may happen in the future.
Second, children may use this money to buy something that can do harm to their growth.
Having such a large income, maybe they will buy some books about violence or sexy.
They also can buy some video games or some books not related to class and spend a lot of time on it.
This will waste much energy of them to study hard.
And grades will dro
Finally, there are also some better ideas to urge children to work harder for parents.
For instance, parents can spend much more time to accompany their children, like chat with them or have trip.
This give a chance for parents to know their children better,such as what they are thinking and what they want.
Further more, children can perceive the love from their parents and get motivation to study harder, not only for themselves but also for their parents.
I do think this is the most needed by children instead of money at present.
Many parents don't have enough time to accompany their children, and this way can't be replaced with the money.
Put it into a nutshell, we can easily find offering children money for high grade is not a wise idea.
It may cause some bad influence on the growth of children.
What's more, we also have a better idea to give them rewards.
Firstly, having many new friends means that it is easier to find solutions.
Compared to small groups of people, more people means more helps, and more helps means more possibility to find solutions in studies, works, and daily life.
Less unsolved trouble is definitly pleasing for most people.
Secondly, being able to make new friends is one kind of social skills, which is important in the workplace.
One would get to know new people when he start his working career, and making friends with new co-workers are important
I admit that maintaining friendships with a small group of friends is truely difficult to achieve.
Some people think highly of maintaining friendships with ten or fewer friends for many years.

And they hold the opinion that a group of close friends can be the harbour when people are in troubles, because some private troubles can only be told to few friends who have been getting a long with them for a long time.
They also say that sharing problems would make them release stress in daily activities.
However those kind of people who maintain friendships to make themselves feel better would border their friends.
I think offerring school-age children money for each high grade(MARK) they get is a good idea.
Here is my opinion.
First,I think it the money that parents give means a praise and it can help to develop children's interests of studying which can make them pay more attentiong to their schoolwork.
Second,by this,they will knwo money is not easy to earn and studying hard and get good grades is a way to earn money.
Last,by getting money,children will sense that making efforts will recieve gains.
They will realize that NO PAINS NO GAINS.
However,eyery coin has two sides.
Offerring school-age children money for each high grade(MARK) they get also has disadvantages.
They may misundertand that they study hard just for the praise and the mong from thir parents.
Atually they are studying hard for their future life.
In addition,they may spend their whole days studying for money no matter it is weekdays or weekends.

They will lose the ability of communicating to other people or forget to join social activities All in all,I think the advantages of offerring school-age children money for each high grade(MARK) they get are more than the disadvantages.
So I still think parents can offer their school-age children money for each high grade(MARK) they get.
But they are supposed to remember to let their children the main pourpose of studying so that they will not misunderstand it and lead to some bad influnces.
Parents should try to fing a proper way to encourage children to study hard and get good grades.
Nowadays, people have more and more options to choose to relax and amuse themselves:some choose to do some reading or watch movies while the other are more willing to do some physical exercise.
When asked about which way is better, different people have different answers.
As far as I am concerned, the former option is better.
Reading a book or watching a movie can always helps me escape from the pressure.
First of all, the books or the movies are always available.
As the popularization of cell phones and computers, we can search the name of books or movies that we want and then just enjoy them.
We can also do it whenever we would like to do so.
The technology is so developed that the movies and the books can be shared to everybody as long as you pay a little fee to download.
The books and movies don't need to pay extra efferts, you just need to sit down and enjoy the peaceful feeling brought by  them.
Compared with doing physical exercise, these options above are far more convinient and safe to all of us.

I still remember the first time when I read Japenese novel called 'Yuki kuni', the magnificant valley described in this novel is so peaceful that more than one time, I have dreamed of visiting there someday in the future.
The physical exercise never give me such experience like that, on the contrary, the exercise is painful to me for I often get hurt during exercise.

Although some people think doing physical exercise is a more healthy way to live on, the books and movies also refresh and relax our minds and keep our mental world safe and sound to defeat any challege in the future.
Should let children learn to manage their own money when they are little in order to raise their sense of financial responsibilities?
This question always confuses parents those day.
In my piont of view, however, the youger the children learn to manage their own money, the more financially responsible they will be when they grow up.
Many parents  may ask what if children waste their money when they are managing their own money without the supervision of parents?
I have to point out that, to self-disciplined children, parents don't have to worry about their management for money at all.

Even to those naughty ones, thay may waste some bills at first, as time goes by and the limitation for the quantity of money, they will realize that the only way to get what they want at most they must have a logical plan on their purchasing.
And that will help children develop the ability on spending money logically.
In addition, we all have experience for saving money of breakfast or studying tools just for getting our fancy stuff.
And just recalling back what will you do toward the stuff which you buy it on your saving money?
Of course to take it more precious than what your parents gave you.
In the same way, let children manage their own money will not only make them clear about what they want and use stuff preciously, but also raise the habitats of saving money.

What's more, as the children's dreaming objects may cost too much to buy it from their primitive money, this circumstance will force them to step out of their comfortable zone and think of ways to raise money on their own.
The most common way was doing part-time job, and that's what my frien Bob did.
Bob was just born in a renowned family, and he used to never take notice ot the value of each dollar.
But everything changed when he was forced to do part-time job to cereive more money for buying his favorite airplane model withou support fro his parents.
Standing in front of the service table with almost the same motion, accepting the complaints from customers tamely, and so on.
All these tough experience suddenly lets him recognize how valuable each dollar is and how hard to receive even one dollar from someone else.
Therefore, managment on money for children could let them understand the value of money.

Nowdays, many parents may confuse about how to let their children know money in a correct way, or some may just avoid their chidren from being acessible to money to eliminate the possible mistakes during the process of teaching their kids about money.

However, in my point of view, I think it is very necessary for parents to correctly and appropriately teach their chirden about the advantages and the damages of money,and offering school -age children money as award for high marks is a good start.
Firstly,it serves as a great oppotunites to cultivate children's ability to manage their own money in a reasonable way.
They know it is not easy to get the money, so they will cherish the power they get to purchase the thins they want.
Maybe they would cry and beg for every toys they want before letting themselves take control of the coins, for they don't know the money is very limited.

After conducting this methods, children will start to learn to make some simple plans about how to spend their money in the most satisfying way, and stop buying things that they are not so fond of actually.
What's more,getting money for only high mark will get chidren aware of how uneasy it is to earn money.
Therefore, they may get more understand how much pressure their parents suffer, and feel more appreciated about what parents have done for them.
Behind a high mark stands out a lot of hard working, a large number of exercis at the mercy of playing and entertainment.
It is just like the process that how our parents support the families by working day after day.
When turely experience the process of earning money, children will know their parents better and thinke about do something for their parents in return.

Although some parents might hold the opinion that money is atempting, and many people who aquire a lot of money may  take advantage of it to do something bad, it is not the reason for them to prevent their children from getting acess to money.
Even if they do so, children will still find other ways to approach money owing to their curiosity.
So why not choosing a more correct and controllable way to get children exposed to money?
In mordern times, it is unstopptable for children to get access to money in an early age.
The best thing that parents can do is to find an appropriate way for their children, and offering mondy for their high marks is a great way!

Obviously, advertising is a great oppotunity for the child to enrich their life experience.

First of all, to be more optimistic in failure helps people to keep working hard, and gives us the possiblity to reverse the result.
Many people look for success all their lives, however, when failure comes instead, they may lose all their hope, and will not be able to continue working hard.

He even become more successful after overcoming the difficulties.
Moreover, to be more optimisitic in fiailure helps people to stay calm and keep our mind healthy.
The pressure opposed on people nowadays becomes greater and greater.

Stay optimistic can help us to overcome many difficulties and have a healthy mind.
For example, many young peple commit suscide because they don't meet their own expection and they can not bare the great pressure.
If they can keep optimistic, there will still be chance for them to success.

Nowadays, in the cut-throat society, an increasing number of people want to have a better performance on the workplace.
Thus, they have the problem that how to do better in the workplace or how to perform better at school.
Many people suggests that people shouldn't do different things, because if they do too much different kinds of things, they do very few things well.
I, however, disagree with this idea.
First and foremost, from my point of view, when it comes to study.
everything actually are linked toghter.
Every subjects has potential relation to other kind of subjects.
For example, the math and the physics.
Some people may think that they are irrelavent.
However, form my point of view, they have remarkbly obeivous relation.
If you want to calculate the volume of a bottle, there are two ways.
The first way is to use differenciation in math and the second way is to use some complex methods to work that out.
And those complex methods need strong knowledge base about the math.
You may need to know how to use the GDC.
Thus, i think every subjects are linked together.
The learing of one subject can facilitate the study of another subject.
Moreover, if you study many subjects, you won't get bored with study because you can always find alternative things to focuse on.
Thus, we can concentrate on the subject we are learing.
In conclud, the learing of different subjects can boosts our efficiency.
Take me as an example, when i was in high school, i have eight courses to learn, and at that time i surprisingly found that i won't get bored while i'm studying.
Because i can easily find ways to refresh my mind and keep productive.
Once i learning literature for 1 hour, i found that i was a little bit tired.
And i chose to change the subject to math.
After i started to do math homework, i found that i wasn't exhausted anymore.
I found a new thing to focuse on.
As a result, i can keep a high efficiency of study though that day.
In a nutshell.

As is always the case, how youngsters are making dicisions is so much concerned that it has aroused a wide discussion.
People varing in different personalities as well as backgrounds tend to look at the same matter in diversified perspectives.

Some maintain the present young-generation is better decision-maker compared to the past, while others believe the past youngsters bear more responsibility and make wiser decisions than today's young people.
I reckon that the past young generation are better at making dicisions from the following aspects.
On the one hand, the young generation in the past tend to be more responsible and durable for their choices.
Resonsibility and persistence always lead to success in life.
Not everyone makes the right option but the thing how we learned from our choices is to keep it until it becomes success.
No matter today's youngsters or the past young people, they will face to the challenge of making choices in their life.
It is unpredictable before they act until they persist it and accomplish it, will they know if the choice is right or not.
So many young people nowadays are making decisions without much consideration.
When they fail it, they easily and quickly change to another option, because today's society provide them with so many opportunities to fail, and to remake their decisions.
They can turn to their relatives for help and restart their study or careers in a very short time.
On the other hand, young people in the past mostly were poor and cannot bear the high tuition of education.
Thus they had various choices to do others things.

In contrast, present youngsters have to adopt the nine-years compulsory education, which means they have no choice but to study during these years, which has become a convention and almost every youngster in China now has to obey this rule until they graduate, when they can choose to do what they like.
The society nowadays actually set a lot of hidden rules so that the youngsters today raely have their own choice to choose what to do in the first decades of their lives.
In conclusion, even they all have the rights to make their choices, the youngsters in the past have more responsibility and they are allowed to make decision about their lives earlier.
I think it is a good idea to offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in the school.

Finally, the last advantage of offering the school-age children money for each high grade in the school, it may tells those young children how difficult to get the money and how important of hard-working.
After this, that may be a really good condition to let the young children really know their parents pressure and let the children to know more deeply about how money comes from.
That is also a benifit for giving money after the perfect marks.
In conclution, parents offering money can let the children know about how to manage and use the own money, how hard to get for the money and stop young children spend money too much at the same time.

It may not just only improve children's one axcpet instead of let them know other things at the while which brings a lot of benifits.
During my high school periods, a lot of students complained that homework were too much to be finished, which caused almost no assignments can be done with a high quality.
Indeed, we will be busy if there are so many different things need to be done in a short time.
It is impossible that they can be finished well.
On the one hand, time is limited.
The more thing we need to do, the less time each of them can be allocated.
As all we know, every success requires plenty of hours to accumulate.
It is almost impossable to finish something well in a short time.
For example, my sister, when she was a high school students, there are so many homework of nine subjects need to be done everyday.
She came home from school at 6 PM everyday,
On the other hand, handling multiple things at the same time will not only make us busy but also make us distracted.
There is no doubt that none of things can be done well if we do not concentrate on them.
For example, when I was a high school student, there are so many different subjects' homework need to be done everyday.

During the time I did my meth homework, I can not help myself thinking about other subjects' homework such English and physical exercises, because there are so many assignments left behind but it is almost the time I have to go to bed.
So that I can't concentrate on the meth homework, let alone review and preview.
As a result, none of my homework can be done well which caused me got a bad grade in exam.
All in all, it is very unscientific to arrange lots of affairs together, because we would be too busy to finish them well.
In this case, in order to avoid the interference of handling mutiple things, I suggest that we are supposed to concentrated on only one thing each single time , if we want it to be done well.

There is a phenomenon that some parents will give their school-age children who get a good mark in there academic exams some amount of money as an award, and thus, people's opinions about this are diversified from side to side.
In my own perspective of view, this can have both merits and demerits.
In the process of education, tools of stimulations are necessary.
No matter the praising word from their teachers' mouth, or the outstanding feelings between their companions, can both prompt the children's study.
But for some parents, there use monetary tools as a gift to encourage their kid to do better in the future exams.
In nowadays society, everybody need to know how to distribute their own fortunes.
A reasonable usage of money can bring more benifits and life experiences for people, especially those promising kids who are possible to become much more briliant in the coming future.
On the other hand, nobody can understand the children better than themselves do.
They can get something they want most, and hence the small amount of money will bring unbelievable effects on their study.
However, though, there are indeed some potential risks by offering the young kid with some money which is probably out of their control.
As is known to all, children are both immature physically and mentally.
They can be easily attracted by something which can possibly do harm to them.
With the freedom to dominate some money, they will get further access to the staffs coveredly.
So their parents play a significant role in ruling their behaviors and imposed the correct values on them.
As a conclusion, monetary inspiraion do possess its own advantages, but the underlying negative effects can never be ignored.
Parents are supposed to pay more attention on teaching their children to make use of the treasure properly.
Only in this way can they become much more subserviant to their country and society in the coming future.

Universities in many countries have long had group works or relative disscusion as a kind of education form.
Although all of us can not deny the significance of group work, wether or not this kind of study has much more efficient is still in heated discussion.
As far as i am concerned, working together can not exist without working alone, and the types of works determine the efficiency of the two forms of study.
First of all, group work is a good opportunity to make students cultivate the ability to distribute tasks to all members in a project gruop or in a company in the future.
Since information become much more complex than it was in the past, any big project can not be done by only a single person in practical.
therefore, it is a wisdom for a group leader to arrange different parts of the work to all members according to each one's ability.
Getting familier with the gruop work is in urge need in any university to make sure the students can do well in the mordern society.
Secondly, the types of work determine which one is better.
There are homeworks that must be done by yourself if you want to get practised.

For example, when the teacher asks the class to write a summary on the topics carried in a book, it is good to have a discussion on how to analysis the ariticles beforre everyone get started, but finally every students write their own and get motified by the teacher is a more efficient way to improve writing skills.
Moreover, some group work need a lot of working alone previously to make sure the time of getting together is not wasted.
Working together needs every member to say their own idea, which obviously need one study hard about a problem in advance.
To conclude, working together can not exist without working alone, and the types of works determine the efficiency of the two forms of study.

There are a lot of controversies on the better way to relax.

Everyone has a dream including me, and I would like to be a scientist when I grow up.
But things change a lot when I grow up and thus dreams changes too.
There is a heated debate has been aroused among people whether people should follow their dreams even if the dreams are ambitious or   focus ob achieving realistic goals.
From my perspective,  I hold the view that people should concentrate on reaching realistic goals.
Here and some reasons and examples supported my viewpoint.
First, it is universally ackownledged that making realistic goals can remind us and encourage us.
Since we are focus on achieving pratical aims, we should make lots of short-term goals.
So people actually know what they need to do right now and seeing those short-term goals give us motivation to reach a bigger goal.
In contrast, if one just talk his dream every day and do not focus on pratical aims he should do now he would definitely never achieve his dream.
For instance, my cousin, who is a high school student, want to go to the best university in Wuhan.
I had a talk to him emphasizing that he should set a series of short-term goal like getting a good grade in math, reading books everyday and praticing writing everyday.
He accepted my suggestions and after three years he did attend to the best university, saying that he was inspired by his short-term goals everyday when he want to take a break.
Second, achieving every single goals can bring us a sense of accomplishment and easily to achieve bigger goals.
It is known to all that when we reach a goal even it is so tiny we would get a sense of accomplishment.
And this sense of accomplishment can bring us positive attitude towards our big goal, giving us great impetus to achieve next goal.
Therefore we could approach our big goal more quickly.
However, if someone do not set some realistic goals for himself he would not know what he had achieve, showing a pessimistic attitude towards his big dream because it always seems so far to reach.
For instance, my sisiter love music and want to be a composer.
But she kept praticing even forget eating without a clear goal.
So she finally give up the music.
To put it into a netshull, I firmly believe that people should concentrate on reaching realistic goals.
Because not only it can remind us but also it can bring us a sense of accomplishment.

Adittedly, watching moive s and reading books is a good way to relaxe.
When people fall inyo the book and movies, they forget their own sadness and stress and be relaxed.
But not only could people have fun dering reading or waching, but also peopel could learn some knowledge.

And some people's organ could also be "happy" so that they work more efficiently.
And exercising makes people sweat to get rid of toxic matters.
All of this could make people free from diseases.
However, for reading and watching, people may get some eyes illness.

Having a glimpse into my life, almost large ingredient of my life is relative to my friends; therefore, friends undoubtely play a highly important role in people's life.
Which ability is more important for happiness?
To maintain friendships with a small group of people or to make more new friends easily.
For me, there is no better way to become more happy than making more new friends in daily life.

In the first place, it is know to all that people will enter the different condition in different life stage; therefore, we have to learn the ability to make more new firends in a new condition without our old friends.

When I was a fresh man in the university, I almost had no friend because my old friends went to the different university; furthermore, I fund that it is impossible to play the basketball and have a fun time playing PS4 with themusually owing to the fact that there were long distances between us and all of us were highly busy.

This time, I find that I had to make more new friends in order to make more happy moments in my university life such as playing computer games and I feel the important of the ability to make more new friends.
Similarly, when I undergraduated and got my job, I fund that my friends in the university spread all over the world.
Therefore, in our life, we have to enter a myriad of new condition without our old friends.
This way, the ability to make more new friends play a priority in our life.
Secondly, the ability to make more new friends can expand our outlook.
For instance, when I studied in primary school, my old friends both come from same city with me; therefore, we had the same tradition can likely experience.
In fact, I always felt boring playing with these old friends all the time since we always did same thing such as playing computer games.

However, when I made more new international friends including Germanies and America when I study abroad, Germany friends always took me to drink their traditional beer and America firends always tought me how to play tennis.
All of these things were new for me that time and they were really enrich my time.
To be honest, when I learn the ability how to make more new friends, I never fail to escape from my daily grind because of the happiness and fresh air brought by these new friends.

Finally, when you achieve the goal on work with new friends who have the same dream with you, you will fell highly satisfied and happy; therefore, the ability to make more new friends is more important.
For instance, when I participated in electronic forum, my ability to make more new friends enabled me to learn more people who had same dream, seting up a comuper company, like me.
Later, we gathered togather and overcomed sumless difficulties.
When I earned my first million dollars with my new friends who had same dreams with me, I never feeled hopeful and happy like this.
To sum up, it is more important to equip us the ability to make more new friends for happienes

Last but not least,this method has another advantage that children may also grow the habbit of managing their money which is a very significant skill for later life.

However,in the mean time,I think parents should also help and teach how to use it correctly.

With the great development of the society, the world is become more easily for young people to lead the future.
However, the situation is opposite in the past.
Because of the fast variation of the society, young people are more likely to accept the difference of the world.
So they can adapt the life more quickly than the old people.
To begin with, it is obvious that technology is most important technic in current era.
Young people can pay great attention on the new device or technical stuff when old people are still confusing the bad or good consequances that the new technology might cause.
For instance, the cellphone in 21 century does a great benefit for the humanbeings.
Many old people who are older than 50 can only do the simple function of the cellphone such as calling up and sending message.
In contrast, young people at the age of 20 can use the cellphone to send email, surfing the internet, photographing.
So the young people can adapt the new technology, which can help the future world more convenience.
Moreover, this variation also can be indicated in the marriage.
In the old time, the boy or girl need to follow their parents' decisions, they will help their kids to choose the mate, which the parents think is suitable for the kids.
Nowadays young people can choose the people they like to marry.
So young people can decide the people who will live with them in the rest life.
Finally, young people have much more influence on the important decisions that would determine the future life.
We can classfly it by the example of education.
Young people can select the field that they would like to pursue in.
However, they used to follow the parents' order despite they have their own selection.
From what we have discussed above, we can draw the conclusion that young people nowadays have more influence on their own future life.
Parents become less willing to disturb their kids' like, and allow them to dicide themselves.
Nowadays, student's education is increasingly valued by their parents.
Some people think it is wrong to give money to school children when they get good grades, while others think it makes sense for children.
I think parents should offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
First, parents give money to children so that when they get good grades in school, their children will think that their efforts are recognized.
This is a way for parents to encourage their children to get their support and encouragement when they get good grades.
Parents use material rewards to enhance their children's learning interest and competitiveness, which I think is very useful for children.
Second, the idea that parents reward their children with material rewards for ding well in exams can make them rich and hard to come by.
Children's concept of money is very vague and can onle rely on their parents' cognition to know the importance of money.
Parents need to establish the right values, and at the same time let their children understand that there is no money if they do not do well in the exam.
On the contrary, if they do well in the exam, they will be rewarded with money.

One of the most obvious ways by which one can ensure a decent standard of living and arelatively properous life is obtaning a kind of job that is going to be providing enough income and be stable suffeciently at the same time.
In my viewm in the past, it was much more convinient to identify what type of occupation would yield a desirable future than is the case today.
I feel this way for two main reasons which I will explore in the following article.
To begin with, back then this intence competition in the job market did not exist.
To be more specific, nowadays there is an over supply of over qualified applicants for many job openings.
As a result, getting a highpaying job in one's field of interest has become increasingly challenging.
My uncle's experience is a good example of this.
After graduation feom a moderate university, he sought to work in a local newspaper as a reporter.
Having no prior experience as a professional reporter he was amazed how many offers he received from even some prestigious publications.
The reason for such a warm reception was.
Of course, lack of people who applied for such as position.
Consequently, these news organizations would employ young inexperienced journalists and even proposed courses to train them.
My uncle was able to transform into a proficient writer, earning him a worthy carrer.
Secondly, because of the massive rise in population and resulting soar in demands for almost every possible goods and services.
Companies have expanded their production capabilities while hiring more workers.
However, many of this vast entitles do not pay a high salary.
Thus finding a job can not  guarantee a relaxing life.
For instance, my cousin who is currently studying abroad had to get a part-time job in order to affoed his personal expenses.
Not having a work permit he was forced to get employed in a fast food restaurant for a while.
According to him the conditions there were terrible.
Mny wirkers including legally hired ones had to work extended hours whithout any benefits or extra pay.

Furthermore, owing to the fact that there were hundreds of individuals waiting in line for a vacancy there , most of the employees were paid the minimum wage, which was not anywhere near enough to provide for a sigle person's expense in a month.
In sum, I hold the view that in this day and age, it is difficult to predict what kind of profession will result in a bright future for one.
Not only is extremly challenging to procure a job that gets you enough money, but als getting many of the available jobs will not bring a successful life.

With the rapid development of our society, it is universally acknowledged that the world is become smaller and smaller, the access of obtaining knowledge become simpler and simpler.
A heated topic has been aroused among people that whether  it is as vital as for the elderly to study or learn new things as it is for younger people or not.
From my prespective, I hold the view that it is certainly as vital as for the elderly to study as it is for younger people.
Here are my reasons which support my views.
First, it is conducive for the elderly to learn new things because they can enjoy a better life.
If the erderly people know more about the new world, the new technology, they can find numerous interesting things thus they can live a more happy life.
Reverly, most of our seniors are conventional and would not like to accept new thing.
Therefore they just sigh for the rapid changes rather than adpot those changes and become unhappy in the rest of their life.
I remember I have an uncle who do not like to accept new things recall its expericence all day around.
And I think he is always unhappy, because when you are stay with him you do not have a common topic to chat.
He know less about the world, like he do not how to use smart phone, do not understand the TV show and regard all this new things as boring things.
He just stay at his home and smokes all day around.
Second, it is beneficial for the elderly to learn new things because they can be more kind and friendly to us.
If a old person learn a lot of things about our young people, he or she may become popular among young people and be regard as a very kind and friendly person.
Reverly, We know that a lot of old people seem to reject to understand what the young man do.
And they are considered to be sophicaited and no one like them.
For example, I remeber a old teacher who love to learn new things about young man and he is so popular among students and students all think he is a good and kind teacher.
In a nuI hold the view that it is certainly as vital as for the elderly to study as it is for younger people.
It is getting increasingly more common that parents tend to give children change  money when they behaved marvelously in tests.
In terms of peolpe of distinguishing personal experiences and background, they would consider differently with this issue.
Those who attach significence to children's effort at school and the intellengent growth may speak highly of what these parents did.
However and undoubtedly, I hold the opinion that this quick-and-dirty tactics might have passitive influence.
Above all, the meaning of sending children to school  is absolutely not getting remarkable grades, but to learn to getting along well with affairs and other people.
By giving money, the parents unconciously educate their children with profit.

Child would realize that it is only getting better grades what he/she ought to do, but not also having fun with friends, exercising his/her own capacity of dealing with group activities, or planting the hobbies.
Nevertheless, these are all vital skills that the children should learn when they have to be involved in the society well.
Besides, this behavior reflects there are not enough trust between parents and children, while using the way of money exchanging for grades means their lack of communication.
This behavior is considerable in some way, however, in that after all the parents hope the better future of the children.
Thus, examining all these pros and cons, I would always hope that stoping this would have longer and better influence for children.

Since the younger generation has always been the focus of the socity, it is essential to have a discussion on who has greater influence on them.
Is it their teachers or their friends that affects them much more?
The perspectives toward this question vary from background and life experience.
Those who hold the oppinion that teachers have bigger impact on students believe that teachers are the most significant parts of a person's education.
However, others claim their friends are greater influential factors in students' lives for their companions are always treated as the closest ones not matter in their study or daily lives.
I tend to agree with the latter from the following aspects.
Firstly, teachers are most educational while friends are most influential in students' lives.
Friends are the listeners and paticipants for a very long period of a student.
An old saying goes like "your friend is just like another you", which means you have influenced each other greatly so that when we see a person, we can easily imagine what his friend tend to be like.
Friends are not only classmates or your roommates who just come to your life naturally for the selection of a friend always takes much consideration and time.
You must be willing to learn and get suggestions from your friends.
However, teachers are always educational, though there is no doubt that they have great impact on our lives.
For those who dislike teachers' ways of education, they still have friends to turn to.
Secondly, teacher is an occupation term which indicates certain job in the socity.
When it refers to teachers, you may think about your favorite teacher in high school or the funny thing happened in your school life.
When it comes to the words friends.
What wiil you think about?
It will remind you who accompanies you to have meals together, who go shopping with you, who you turned to when you are sad.
Thus, firends are those who almost participate in every part of our lives, while teachers are just a piece of part in our eduations.
We admit that teachers are important parts in our lives, for they educate and give us guidance in our life.
But friends seem to play a greater part in our study and daily lives.
In the mordern society, parents are very impressive when their children get a good grade in school.
So parents might provide some reward to encourage their children to study harder.
One common reward is money, parent might offer their kids money when they get a good grade.
In my opinion, this approach is absurd.
First, as a student, money should not be considered as a very significant thing.

Secondly, offer the thing that their children need is a responsibility of parents.
If their children are not good at study, parents still have to provide the necessaties their children need.

Sometimes they might spend those money in some harmful field such as video games and gambling and so on.

So parent should lead their children to the right sense of money and teach them how to manage money.

In the university, many assignments are done in group.
So whether working in group can help students work more efficiently or not has always been a controversial topic among students and teachers.
Some people think work in group reduces their efficience and is unfair for them.
However, from my perspective, work in group can save a lot of time.
Above all, working in group reduces the work needed to be done for each person.
Admittedly, working in group adds additional events, including group meeting and dividing of work, and sometimes these can be annoying.
However, apart form that, students only need to work on a part of the program instead of the whole program, and they can still get to know the other part of the program easily from their teammate.
This reduces the pressure opposed to each students and still reachs the same learning effects.
For example, students are asked to do a presentaion in Engish.
If they work in group, they can divide their preparation into collecting information, working on ppt and presenting on the stage.
In this way, they can save much time in the preparation comparing with working alone.
Moreover, working in group let students receive ideas from different perspectives, so they can work more efficiently.
Working in group needs every team members cooperates with each other.
During the cooperation and communication, students can know the others better and learn from them.
For some difficulit problem, a group of people can exchange their ideas and solve it much more efficiently than working alone.
A case in point is that, in my Quantum Physics class, students are divided into several learning group.
I am lucky to be in a group with great atmosphere that everyone communicate a lot, so whenever I have some problems in study, I can talk with my teammates and the problem will be solved in a minute.

To sum up, working in group fits for the students nowadays, sicne they don't have enough time to work alone all the time, and they will definately work in group in the future, so this also help them better adapt  to the socieyu

I do not think parents offering their school aged children money for their success in school is a  good idea.
I disagree it in many ways.
Above all, students should not be encouraged to study by being given money.
This is the worst choice of giving any rewards!
This will give the students who are going to attend futher education a false signal : I do all this for money.
This is not good for both the society nor for themselves!
For the society, this way of thinking means a part of the new generation working for not their dreams or the good for their country, but for money.

This may lead to many problems: difficult[no matter physical or mental] jobs will lack the people that are interested in it, so many subjects like microbiology and manufactering will be abandoned for no one will study or work on it.
This will lead to the decreace of the develop of the human technology, which is not a good thing.
As for person, it will make people lose heart.
They will find themselves lost because they do not know why they are here or what they should do, they only care about money after all , so they will easily find themselves inside a mist.
As we all can see, using money to encourage childrren is useles , and will only lead to more problems.
Reasearch shows that money encourgement does no good.

There was a research that gives us samples of using money to encourage people and the using  true hearts to encourage them instead: A large number of people is divided into 3 groups, each will sacrifice one week of their vacation to make more money for the company and for themselves.
Group one gets 20% increace on their sallery;group two gets an extra pizza every meal with a bottle of cola; and group three gets the bossâ€˜s praise.
In the first 2 days , all of them reacted the same, all fully motivaded.
But by day 3,group one lost interest and became the worst behaving group.
Group 2 lost heart and went on vacation 2 days later.
Only group 3 got it till day 7.
From all above, we can see that money can do nothing but decrease peoples interest.
Money is indeed useful, but it can not do everything.
When it comes to encouragement, stick to praises for the deep of your heart.
Giving money will only give you the opposite.

Under the heavy pressure,many people need something to relax themselves.
When it comes to this statement that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than relax by doing physical exercise,I can't agree it.
In some ways ,they are both helpful for us.
It's obvious that both methods can free us,and the main difference between them is one of them is mental while the other is physical.
In my opinion,we need both them to help us diminish our worrisome.
First of all,We are face to mental and physical trouble from the society,which I can't emphasize too much.
Secondly,everyone is individual.
Nobody is brave to bet that anybody likes watching a movie or reading a book.
Different people need different ways to relax them,we can't  define which one is better.
The more suitable and efficient for you, the better way you use.
Lastly,in mordern society,most people have to sit in chairs for a long time,not only for students,but also for office man.
Therefore,we'd better do physical exercise to relax our muscle while relax our soul.
On the other hand,as computers developing fast,people need some excuses to reflee themselves from electrical world.
For this point of view,reading a book to relax is a wonderful choice.
In our daily life,relaxing activities is necessary which help us work and study more effectively.
Whatever we do,mentally or physically,only if we get the best effect,we find the best way.
But,don't lost any oppotunity to have a rich and fulfilling life,watching a movie, reading a book or just doing some simple physical exercise are good for your health and your soul.

Schools, nowadays, prefer to shape students into well-rounded people, so they implement lots of plans to force students take specific courses.
There is a common conception that it is beneficial for students to take various kinds of courses like history, no matter what subjects they major in.
However, the opponents hold a belief that it is useless to fulfill the compulsory courses which are irrevalent to them.
From my perspective, the latter idea is more reasonable.
Primarily, it is a waste of time for students to attend the classes that will never be utilized in the future.
Since the courses students take in the university are more likely to help the students seek for employment and retain more predominances than people who do not own the professional knowledge.
For example, as a student who wants to become a computer engineer, he has to attend classes about science and engineering, not the arts or history.
If he spends part of the time on the history, it means that he will have less time to master in the knowledge he really needs to use as a computer engineer.
Instead, he will have to memorize the name of historical heros or the dates of historical events, which are totally boring.
Also, since he may be not familiar with such subjects, he will fail these classes and has to regain the credits, which is time-consuming and a waste of money as well.
Thus, it is meaningless for a student to attend the classes which are not their fields of study and acquire the knowledge of them.
Furthermore, forcing students to take courses they are not interested in may lead to students rebel psychology.
If the policy that all the students have to take the history courses is carried out, it means that students who do not like history or even dislike to study history are compeled to take it.
That is really a foolish decision to coerce students to do the things they do not like, leading to a negative result.

For example, some students will be weary of studying, since the history is just like a book without words for them, and more severely, they will lose the good status of studying and fail all his courses, resulting in the order to quit school, which ruins a student.
Thus, it is unworthwhile to implement such plan,

To sum up, not only does the policy to require all student to take history courses will be a waste of time for student who have to spend more time on the work of their majors and future careers, but also will lead to a bad effects that few students are pleased to study.

I hold the idea that awarding school-age children money for getting high grade in school is a good idea.
However, parents still need to tell their children the correct way to respond to this.
Because money is a double-edge sword,children should be taught to deal with it.
For instance, when I was a sixteen-year-old student in high school, I got 145 points in the math mid-term examination.
And my parents were so proud of this that they gave me two thousand yuan on hearing the news.
After getting the money,I suddenly had lots of thoughts of purchasing the things I love online.
But it was then that my parents told me something that formed my view of money and I would never forget.
'Money should be not used to satisfy your desire at present, because you do not know what you really want and what counts at this age.'
My mother said.
I did not understand the real meaning of the setence at that time.
But I still kept the until I was 19 years old when I came to realize the fact that knowledge comes the first in my life ,which made me buy plenty of books I would love to read.
Now I am twenty.
Aftering reading all the books I bought that day online, I really appreciated my mother's words when she offered money when I was still a high school student.
If there was no those words, I would have bought my own PSP and probably be addicted to games already.
From my own experience, it is not the amount of money parents award school-age children for high grade but what they tell and how they teach their children to cope with money that counts.
If parents provide their children with a correct way to look at money, it will be a perfect idea to offer the children money for high mark to encourage them.

Some parents give their children more time to do whatever they want, while other parents make their children to spend more time on doing homework or participating in organized activities related to school or sports.
From my perspective, making the children to spend more time on doing homework or participating in organized activities can benefit children more.
Because children can learn what they should learn without doing whatever they want.
First, children have no idea what they should do as students.
When they are infants, they can do everything freely, and from playing instinctly, they know what the world looks like.
But when they grow up and become to the teenager, playing freely cannot teach them anything, but the children don't know that.

Spending time on doing homework or participating in the activities means that the students spend time on what teachers and parents think that they should learn, for which the students can learn what they have to know exactly.
Take me for instance, when I was about ten years old, I was interested in computer, so I really like to play the computer games and thought that this is what we called " learning computer".
But my parents stopped me playing it.
They bought me some books about programming, and pushed me to finish the mission that my computer teacher provided to me.
I didn't want to do this at the begining because it was really boring.
But when I have grown up, now I have to say that at that time, what I should learn was the programming, not the games.
Second, although children cannot have much time to do what they want, they still can choose what they want to do.
In fact, children can tell the parents what they like and how they feel when learn some lessons.
Then the parents have the ability to help them learn what the like or what they are talented in.
And children will also enjoy what they are doing now and work harder.
For example, my parents asked me to participate in a computer lesson because I had tould them that I was really interested in the computer and I wanted to learn how to creat a game.
So I could still do what I want to learn and study really hard.

It is true that the students cannot be really motivate if they cannot do what they want, but they can do what they like if they talk to their parents about their interest, and they will also be happy.
So in my opinion, spending more time on doing what the parents and teachers tell them to do can benefit the children more.

Today, many parents offer their children money related to children's grade they get in school.
Some people think it is a good way to encourage children to work hard, while other people may not think so.
In my opinion, I think it is not very good for children it their parents do that.
In fact, I want to tell these parents that don't take this way to encourage your children.
First, the purpose of working hard and get good grades is not to get more money.
Why do we need to study?
We need to get knowledge and develop good study ways, which can improve ourselves.
If parents give how much money depends on children's grades, children will have a not  right idea that I study because I want more money, which is harmful to children's development.
My father did that when I was young, however, if I want to buy more junk food, I will work hard for some time and when I don't have any things to buy, I didn't care about my study.
When I grown up, I realized that it is bad for my long-time study and development.
Second, it may influence children's living standards.
When they are in school, children need enough food and sleep to grow up.
If they don't get a good grade, their parents will give them less money.
In fact, children know that is punishment for their low marks and they will not ask their parents for more money.
But that will influence thier living quality and they may get sick because of that.
So this is not a good chioce for parents.
Third,parents offer more money when children get higher grades and offer less money when they get lower grades, it is not helpful for their children to have a good attitude towards spending money.
When my father gave me different number of money, I had no idea that I should spend how much each month.
It is no doubt that children need to be encouraged when they get good grades or do some other good jod, but don't take this way because it do harm to children.
It will make children  don't know how and when to spend their money.

It's universally acknowledged that food is an essential part of our daily life for that our everyday energy all derives from them.
And the types of food have been more and more various now, which leads to a hit discussion that whether people will spend less time cooking in the future.
Some claim that people spend less time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years than they do today.
As for me, I can't agree more with it.
Reasons are elaborated as follows.
First, more and more tasks make people less time to cook by themselves.
As we all know, the competition of today's society gets more and more fierce, which forces everyone to exert themselves to deal with different duties and learn new skills.
In this case, people almost have no time to enjoy a well-prepared meal, let alone cook a meal with many steps, like washing, cutting,boiling and etc.
Take my sister as an example, she is a eminent staff in Alibaba.
Everyday she spends about 15 hours on coping with her own work and trying her best to get promotion.
Hence, she never has time to cook and she just book take-out food for her meals.
Second, fast food is more and more prevalent, which causes that people just wants to eat them for saving of time.
Nowadays, fast food reaturant like KFC, Macdonald is open everywhere around us.
So it's convenient for people to go in to buy food quickly and go out with eating it in several minutes.

I really enjoy fast food not only for its good taste but also because that everyday after my maths class, I have to rush to anouther in a short time, which is a little far away, so I have no time to cook and just buy some food in the KFC next to my domitory.
To put it in a nutshell,  it's definite that people will spend less time cooking and preparing foods intwenty years than they do today due to busier work time and more fast food supply.

In modern society, people work five days and get two days rest.
Why do not people work for seven days for a long time and have a relative extensive vacation?
Obviously, some people may be fond of this life style since they can use vacation to do some time-consuming things.
When asked whether it is more comfortable to have a work where people work three days a week for long hours than to have a job there five days a week for shorter hours.
Each individuals have their own answers.
In my opinion, I disagree with this idea.
First, working for a long time in one day will diminish people's efficiency.
In other word, people will spend longer time on the task after six hours working than on the same thing after two hours working.
As a result, even though the totall number of working time are equal in these two style, we will get fewer thing done in a vocation that people work just three days.
For instance, in last summer vacation, I enjoyed the whole vacation playing and going trip.
As a result, I spent nearly fifteen hours a day in doing homework in the last few days.
By contrast, my friend Tom dedicated two hours to homework everday.
Needless to say, I was punished for the low quality of my assignment.
Second, there is every likelihood for us to forget the previous work after a long time rest.
Inevitably, after not doing one thing, we may find it different to proceed it again.
The same is to work.
If we have a long vacation, it will be hard for us to go back to work.
For example, last week my father got five days rest after just two days work and he went trip with my mother.
Nevertheless, when he came back to the office, he felt uncomfortable since he had forgotten the previous task and he even did not know how to commence his work.
Admittedly, most people enjoy long vacation and just want to work for fewer days even they need to work for a long time everyday.
Nonetheless, we cannot neglect its drawbacks, what we need to is working and studying instead of playing.
Therefore, finding a good method to promote our working efficiency and trying to enjoy our work are of paramount importance.
To sum up, having a occupation where we work five days a week for shorter hours can boost our working efficiency; in addition, we can restart our work easily.
As a result, there is every evidence to disagree that working three day a week for a long hours is not enjoyable than working five days a week for a short time.
Some poeple think that students are more influenced by their teachers than by their friends.
I tend to diagree with this statement for several reasons.
First, the things that students are deprived from teachers may just be knowledge.
Teachers are responsible for teaching us knowledge.
In that case, many teachers are just spread their knowledge to their children and they will not teach students philosophy about how to be a good person.
For example, the classes of my math teacher are full of math knowledge, however, he never talked about how we can get through the difficulties when we are studying math.
His class is tedious, and we cannnot learn anything but some fomulas in math and methods of solving math problems.
Therefore, we did not get any influence from him.
Second, students spend lots of time with their friends.
It is apparent that people will be influenced if they are with some people for a long time.
Students always play games, have meals, gossip with their friends.
Under this circumstance, the behaviors or thoughts of friends will definitely affect you.
For example, if your friend always like to wear casual clothes like jeans, sneaker, and T-shirt, you would probably change your dressing style to wear those informal clothes.
This is a natural behavior, and it cannot be preventted.
On the contrary, teachers just give you classes, and students barely spend time talking or being with their teachers after class.
In that case, it is hard for students to get more influence by their teachers.
Third, students and teachers have generation gaps, which may make students do not want to listen to their teachers.
Some students always think that what the teachers said is useless in this current society so they will not get impact by it.

For example, one of students in my class think that teachers are exaggerating the importance of getting into a colledge because he thinks that people in the past are not like today that citizens really have good skills will finally succeed even without a degree.
In that case, he will not get influenced by the teacher.
While later his friends told him that how hard it is for the brother of his friends to get a good job without a college diploma, he is convince by him.
Consequently, students are more likely to be influenced by their friends becaue there is no generation gaps between them so students are willing to liten to.
To sum up, I disagree that students are more influnced by their teachers than by their friends.
This is because some teachers only teach students knowledge, students spend lots of time with their friends, and there is no generation gap between students and their friends.

Are you addicted to using techinology at present?
Compared with the past, which kind of life do you like?

From my perpective, techonology, including smart phone, computer, kindle and so on, really stifles children's creativity by occupying all their time and no spare time for them to enjoy the natural environment, which is the best place to create some new ideas.

Before the advent of techonological era, children are more likely to play on the grass and some other outside places, which make them more curious about the world and think deeply about what they see.
Newton is the best example to illustrate this statement.
As a little boy, he liked to play under the tree andpiant lonely.
Once fortunately, an apple dropped down just on his head, which made him think about why an apple will suddenly fall without some power and how to explain this phenomenon.
Hence, the theory of Earth gravitation had been brought out by Newton, which cause immensely influence on the area of physics until  today.
If Newton is present is today's society, he may stay at home to explore his technology products rather than play outside, the theory will not be found in such early time.
Thus, technology will make children become preoccupied with the games, simple and do not need to think in their mind, in the smartphones.
More seriously, more technology even make children more dependent on the advanced function but never try to create by themselves.
In nowadays, children are creative really, but they are less creative than the children in the past.
To take myself, a little gril, as an example.

All of my time is filled with video games, tv show and opera programma, which is funny and I always think to make some new games in the future so that I can play my own game all day lone and do not need to pay some money.
I indeed want to create some games, but my purpose is just to let myself play games cheaper and easily, which will not contribute to our society's development.
Thus, the creative minds in nowadays are more complex and benifit-oriented, but in the past is opposite.

From my perspective,I tend to side with the statement for the energy of one single person is limited.

Details is something that we cannot ingore whatever we do, but it can only achieve by working slowly and make every piece of work run correctly.
