Learning from experience of ancestors is the basic skill of human.
We save ample time to process when we learn the rule of Newton instead of try thoudsand of times to find that rules again.
Parents should follow that routine to teach children and let them learn more effeciently.
To sum up, the parents should help children learn skills and knowledges instead of let them to make mistakes, because it is more effective and hmartless.
Do you think today's life become more and more comfortable than before with the development of high technology and some convenient inventions?
Compared with your grandparents childhood, which kind of life do you think is easier?
From my perspective, I really agree with the statement with some specific reasons.
More and more convenient inventions help people save a bunch of time and people can finish many things by using our smartphone only.
Take Ma Yun, a famous Chinese businessman who is busy everyday, as an instance to support my point of view.
He needs to copy with thouthands of contracts every day which should be regared really carefully.
But there is a problem is that he need to buy food for a long time because of the extreme long line of every restaurant.
For people many years ago, they can only try to buy food in advance personally to save time.

On the contrary, Ma Yun is fortunately to enjoy the convenience of nowadays new invention--take out food which means we only need to book food online and wait the specific people send food to our hand.
This new invention becomes more and more popular in China because this can really help those busy men save time.
In addition, we can eat anything we want by booking food online without need to waste time and drive far away for only a specific kind of food.
From this, we can know that because of the new invention in nowadays, people's life become more and more convenient than before.
Our need can easily be satisfied by today's new inventions including taking out food, public sharing bicycles, intellect robborts and so on.

Although population in today's society become larger and going out become a really complex and time-consuming thing than before, our needs also change a lot, which means people at before may only want to go out and travel easil,s o they can become really happy, but today's people are going to pursue their mild enjoyment.
Take myself, a high schooll students as an example to illustrate my own perspective.
My grandfather says that they used to live in the vilige and it is difficult for them to have a glimpse of ourward world.
However, today's life become more convenirnt because of large amount of nes transportations.
At this time, I will not go to complain about the traffic jam in the crowded rode and what I will want is to have some mental rest.
Thus, large population is nowadays is not a big deal because more and more people focus their attention on the mental world rather than the physical world any more.
Thus, today's life not only become convenient and easier, but also become more enjoyble and relaxed.
In summary, life today is much easier in terms of the new inventions and new chase.
People's mind changes a lot, so their feelings to this world also alters a lot.
So why can't we say that today's life is easier and more comfortable?

As the world is becoming more and more diversified, the content of Movies and television are becoming more and more diversified as well.
Whenever asked about wether movies and TV have more negative effects than positive effects on young people, people always exhibit an air of uncertainty.
However, I don't think movies and TV have more negative effects on young people.
To begin with, young people can be educated more knowledge by TV now.
Nowadays, there are more and more positive and interesting programs on TV that draws young people's attention.
And while watching those programs, young people can learn a lot of knowledge as well as broaden their horizons.
For example, there is a program called Super Brain in China where people have to solve a lot of puzzles including the knowledge of mathmatics, physics, architecture and so on.
I always watch this program on Friday night after I came home from school.
It is amazing that I have learned a lot of knowledge that I can not know in class.
So TV can also influence young people in a positive way now.
Then, movies and television can educate young people to do good things.
Everyone can notice that there are more and more public service advertising in movies or on TV now.
It is not difficult to find that those advertises are filmed in a good way, so they are interestin enough to draw young people's attetion.
And by watching those advertises, young people will know both what is right to do and what is wrong to do.
In this way, young children can still be able to learn something useful like the moral code and ways to save themselves.
Last but not the least, although young people may see something bad in the movies or on television, they have the ability to recognize and ignore those things.
Nowadays, people pay more attention to education that before, so children are better educated that they are able to recognize bad things and not to learn from those things.
For example, although my brother watch TV series that the character may smoke cigarattes, but he never tries to do the same thing because he knows that is not cool.
So I think young people have the ability to not to learn from bad things on TV or in the movies.
To conclude, I don't agree that TV or movies may have more negative effects on young people.
As the development of education, there is a problem occuring-should parents let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes?
This is a nice problem.
In the past, parents always didn't let their children make mistakes, which might not let them hurted.
However, as the saying goes: "Failure is the mother of success.", and which one is right?
Facts prove that by learning from failure can people succeed more easily.
Let me take an example-Thomas Edison, the father of light, succeeded in inventing bulb after fail to do it 999 times, using more than 1600 heat-resistance materials and 6000 vegetable fibres.

Faced with the problems and difficulties, Edison didn't give up but summarized all kinds of the failures, which were most important experience in his experiment helping him improve the capability of bulb and finally succeed.
For him, failure is the mother of success.
Without these valuable experience, he couldn't have done this.
Nevertheless, every coin has two sides.
Is every mistake or failure good to people?
Can everyone benefit from failures and mistakes?

For example, parents will never let their children be on the center of the crossroad when the signal lamp is red, will never let their children jump from a high building, will never let their children put their delicate hands in the fire.
They will be impressive at these disasters and pain, not making the same mistakes, as well as being destroyed by them at the same time.
Though certainly you can learn from your own mistakes, which makes you more intelligent and more experience, but it must be under the premise of mistakes' not hurting you seriously.
So, don't believe one-sided words.
Seek the limit of the boundary and keep in mind that particular case is particular analysis.

While some people prefer to go to a cinema after work to take a rest, others choose to jog along the road instead.
They both believe that their own way to relax is better.
However, I prefer the latter one.
I disagree that it is better to relax emotionally than realx physically.
Physical exercise can provide people with truly relax while emotional work will let them feel less comfortable.
Nowadays, people will have a lot of pressure from a whole day's work.
They may feel tired and sleepy.
At this time, if they watch a movie, they will get annoyed by the noisy music or awaken by the scaring stories.
It is not helpful for them to go to sleep later.
In the same theory, if they read a book, they may feel uncomfortable at their sleepy eyes and they will not be so focused on the book any more.
So realxing by watching a movie or reading a book is not suggested.
However, doing some physical exercise will make people energetic to deal with the next period of work.
It will also help to keep fit.
Thus, I advise that people should relax by doing exercise rather than by watching a movie or reading a book.
Besides, realxing physically is a human being's natural action.
We all know that the most comfotble period of time of a human being is childhood.
For children, they can not understand what a movie is talking about or what a book is saying.
All they can enjoy for a whole day is to play games and to chase each other endlessly.
It is like that in human nature, the best way to relax is based on physical movement but emotional promotion.
For an adult, we should also follow this natural rule to realx physically after a tiring day's mental work.
Judging from the reasons provided above, I think it is better to relax by doing physical exercise than realx by watching a movie or reading a book.

Recently there is a heated discussion regarding which type of friends is better for people to make with.
Attitudes towards this issue vary from individuals to individuals.
There is a common conception that it is worth to make friends with intelligent people.
However, from my perspective, I strongly believe that people should be contact with humor people.
My view will be explained by analyzing the following reasons.
One reason why I am in favor of the point is that humor people enable people to deal with problems in an easy way.
This is largely due to the fact that humor people can help people to get out of nagetive areas and treat issues with positive attitudes.
Taking myself for example, when I was in middle school, I was so upset because I still fell my math exams even I spent plenty of time on math courses.
Fortunately, my best friend Jane dicovered my unusual emotions.
She always told me some jokes which were happened around us.
After jokes, she would teach me some solutions to deal with my math problems according to her experiences.
I found that I was willing to accept her suggestions because her jokes relaxed my nervous feelings.
As a result, I achieved a decend academic record in next math exam.
As the example shows, humor people allow people to accept their opinions and find an easy way to solve the problems.
Another reason used to support my opinion is that humor people can lead people to positive emotions when they are confront with troubles.
This is because humor people always smile at you, and their positive emotions will effect you to be positive as they are.
Campared with serious people who always remind people what the mistakes they have, humor people do not tell people the problems directly, they will use some ways people can accept by their jokes.
In additions, people are more willing to make friends with these humor people, because people feel comfortable to stay with them.
Admittedly, people need to make friends with intelligent people.
This group of individuals can bring knowledge which people do not understand to abroden people's horizons.
However, if people can not accept these knowledge, they will ignore those friends.
Hence, it is not useful for people.
On the opposite, humor people always have ways to make people feel happy and accept their ideas.
To sum up, people should make friends with humor people.
Not only do humor people make problems to be solved easily  but also they can lead tpeople to positive emotions.

Many families have children now and the education on this children must be well concerned.
Some people think that parents should prevent their children from making mistakes, while others argue that it would be useful if children have the chance to experience the process of making mistakes.
As for me, I do prefer the latter one and there are several reasons I want to name.
First of all, it is no doubt that we cannot avoid making mistakes in the childhood.
In comparison to the adults, children are the new members of this world, and the childhood is the period for them to explore the whole world and various new things.
In this process, the children have no experiences before so that they are bound to make mistakes when encountering a new situation.
However, even adults are making a great variety of mistakes in their daily life.
If we are unable to overcome mistake-making by ourselves, how can we desire it to take place on the children?
Because none of us is a sage, everyone could make mistakes.
We must be open-minded toward making mistakes.
Moreover, children can learn a lot from their mistakes.
Once a child makes a mistake, there have to be something that he confuses about or have a wrong understanding on.
These are what we need to make clear for the children.
We can aid them in establishing their own values as well as help them distinguish right things from the wrong ones.
It is significant for the children to make their way towards success through mistake-solving.
For instance, Jack Ma is now the richest people in China, who has found Alibaba group.
However, when he was a young boy, he failed the entrance exam for the university for three times.
Even after he founded Alibaba, the business was disappointing and could not make any profits at all.
But Jack Ma performed a surprising ability of persistence.
He not only continued his study and finally succeeded to enter the university, but also got the chance to transfer to the United States, where he found his niche in the internet market.
His persistence lasted throughout his business and make hime become a successful businessman.
In conclusion, making mistakes is inevitable for everyone, besides the children.
We should make a full use of the process when we are dealing with the mistakes with the children, instead of simply prohibiting them from making mistakes.

The children is pure when they were burn so make sure the children turn out healthy mentally and physically, that is the most important think, it's better that you kids didn't become a pioneer at science field than become a psychopath.
Many people would say that relax by doing physical exercise because it can relax people's body.
I agree that in some case doing sports are good for health.
After all, when I was doing my homework for a long time,  I would walk for a while then I will felt better.
However, in my opinion,relax by watching a movie or reading a book is better.
Firstly,relax by watching a movie or reading a book can relax our mind.
After a lot of work, we may feel stress out.
At that time, the most tired part of our body is our mind.
At this time we can watch a movie to relax.
Last time, I have a big project for my history class which need to be finished in one day.
I focusd on that project for very long time.
Finally I finished.
I felt lots of stress.
I started to watch a movie that it was comedy.
It made my laugh.
During the time I was watching the movie I felt relax.
Then I forgot all the bad thing.
Watching movie is a good way to relax.
Secondly, when we are watching a movie or reading a book we can learn somethings from it.
Books are full of knownedges.
After so much thought, we felt tired.
For example, when I finished my math homework, I felt tired.
It was really hard.
After that  I read a book.
It talked about math in a interesting way.
I like that book.
I found that I can sovled my math problem in another way.
And it was easier, then I change the way to do it.
I have learned a lot from the book.
And also make me relaxed.

To sum up, wherease there is an argument for relax by doing phsical exercise, namely good for health,relaxing our mind, coupled with learning some new thing from the movie or the book, make a strong case for relax by watching a movie or reading a book.
As the world has changed tremendously in the past fifty years, a discussion on if the advice provided by our grandparents can be useful has provoked widely attention in society.
Some people believes that some advice can be still useful, while others think that advice can be outdated.
In my opinionm, I prefer the former one.
Firstly, some wisdom don't get antiquated when the time flies.

That's why we still have some history class to observe what the historical figures did when they faced some specific problems and absorbs the experience to apply that knowledge into practice in mordern life.
For example, my grandfather always tell me to be humble which keep in my heart.
When I worked in the security company as an internship, I always talked gentlely to others and when someone asked me some question, I always answered that question elaborately and patiently.
Eventually, that humble behaviour left a great impression on the manager.
So I got the return offer easily.
Secondly, the advice given by the grandparents are always the lesson they have experienced.
Since you may live in the same country and live with the same culture with your grandparents, this suggestion can be especially helpful to you.
For instance my grandmother has told me that I should keep a good relationship with someone I value.
So I practice the interpersonal skill from the primary school, which help me extend my social network efficiently.
Whenever I have some problems, I always share with my friends.
they are also willing to give me some helpful advice.

Nowadays,many parents will give their school-age children pocket money based on their behaviors in exams.
However,I don't agree with this condition.
First of all, conect school marks with pocket money may make children be an utilitarian, and they may study just for more money rather than gaining knowledge and improving themselves.
Secondly, these children may set up their aims of earning more money so that they may not know what to do after they graduate.
As an result, they will loose the chance to develop their interest of future career and finally cannot adapt the fierce society competition.
There is an example of my cousin Mike,when he was a school-age child, his parents promised to give him more money if he could get higher scores in the exams.
So that Mike started to learn very hard and he thought learning knowledge is just for more pocket money.
After he graduated, he did not know what he can do in the society, he soon failed to compete with his peers and cannot adapt himself to the society.

Thirdly, giving more money when getting more scores in exams may let children use all of their spare time to prepare for the exams, thus they may have no time to play or do some sport, so it may do harm to their mental and physical health.

All in all,I don't think associate learning knowledge with pocket money is good to school-age children's growth, and it will eventually let the children be an utilitarian, feel hard to win the society competition and be unhealthy.

It is universally acknowleged that with the rapid development of the technology, the overall society has become more and more properous.
However, we can never deny the fact that technology establishes a huge barrier between people's daily communication.
Thus, people today usually casts doubt on their collegues or friends, let alone the struggling strangers.
The reasons in details are stated in the followings.
First of all, it is common that people receive the fake information or phone calls that ask for help.
Such kind of deceiving is so common that people nowadays no longer have the willingness to help the strangers.
For example, one of my roomates got to the subway some day, a stranger approached her and ask her for some money to call a taxi.
Out of courtesy, she helped the stranger as well as she could and gave the stranger enough money for him to go home.
To her surprise, although the stranger have promised to return the money, she never received the money.
From the story above, we can tell that when the trust between people generally fade, we will never willing to help the stuggling strangers anymore.
From another aspect, an increasing number of people, especially the elders, plot an "accident" to get a large amount of money illegally.
Recently, a news has been reported that a teenager helped a struggling old man to walk properly.
Normally, this teenager should be praised for his behavior, nevertheless, he was tricked and had to pay almost a million for the old man's treatment.

From what has discussed above, it is obvious that we can draw the conclusion that people today are more reluctant to help the struggling strangers, not only because the disappering trust, but also for the vile people who want to break the world as well.

As the study style has beacome a definitely personal choice, it has been on highly debatble this days.
Which type of leaning style is more effective.
Some people assert that working alone can help them to concentrate and can complete the task more quickly.
However, in my opion I dont't think this is the best choice, study alone can't really help us learn more knowledge,  the reasons are as follows.
First of all, working together can be benifit for information collecting and can reduce the wasting time in  searching information.

As working in a group can directly helps to work on different task project, we can seperate the task to the study group and before the deadline organizing a disscusion to collect all the knowledge that are needed.
For instance, in my history class, the teacher asked us to prepare for the time line for the Foundation of Community.
This would be a tons of work, no one can do this job precisely and quickly, therefore we made this homework in group.
All we need to do is to focus on our own task, so we all tried our best.
Then we communicate with others and exchange the ideas, we all get a great job in the end.
In this way, working together can sometimes save time and be more effective.
Moreover, Only we communicate with others we can find our own problems.
If we study alone and don't share our ideas, we can never know what is our true problems.

Like my cousin, when he was in his math class, he did his homework for A plus, all his result is correct, but when he talk to others about the method that he used in one problem, he found out all he analys were wrong even though he got the correct answer.
Since, it is really significant for us to work together to communicate and exchange our opinion to look for our problems that we can't find by ourselves.
According to what I have concerned, working alone might not only get us away from distraction and make us pay attetion on the task we are doing at.
but also stimulate us to work independently.
whereas only we share our ideas and communicate with others we can effectively find out our problems and enjoy the time when we share our opinions.

Nowadays, people almostly spend their all time on work.
A excellent attribution of tasks plays an important role in people's work life.
Some people think that workers will more satisfied when they do same tasks all the day.
However, I stronly disagree with this point.
Getting different tasks is the best choice for workers.
All of these two events have their own benefits.
Worker just do same tasks can help them improving concentration maybe.
Take my brother as an instance.
My brother, Tom, he is major in computer science and he work in a big company when he graduate.
H just whrites online application all the day.
I usully ask him if he feel boring but he told me sometimes we can achieve our goal when we specialize on one things.
At finnal, he achieves their goal that he create his own games.
However, I still suppot my opinion that workers prefer doing different works in their workday.
Firstly, attributing time for different tasks can improve my time-management ability.
To be specifical.
When I work in a computer company, I just write documents per day.
Due to the point that my work is always, I never do plan on my workload.
When I switch to another apartment.
I not only should write documents, but also I need to organize the company meetings.

Then, at the begining of one day, I list all the things I need to do and its time due to the tasks are highly sophisticated and I should to avoid forgetting its, which improves my ability to attribute time.
I am confident that I can achieve my goal at future.
Secondly, coping with different tasks can improve worker's efficiency.
People will fee highly boring if they just do similar work.
Therefor, they should to do some changes in the work tasks.
For instance, befor the final examination.
I should to prepare for the exam.
When I spend one-day time to study mathemetics, I find that my efficiency is very low due to the point that my brain is tired for one aspect knowledge.
Then I study six subject at one time, my brain is very fresh and my efficiency is improved.
To summerize, doing different works not only can improve worker's efficiency but also can improve people's time management ability.

First of all, safety is the prerequisite of a enjoyable travel.
This is to say, if people cannot keep safety when they go somewhere, they would not choose to visit there.
Therefore, if a resort want to attract tourists, they must keep their tourists safe at first.
So the authority should improve the safety by hiring more police.

On the contrary, when a tourista travel to a place equiped with unsufficient police, he cannot have a good time since he will be worried about his security: he dare not go out at night for fear that he would be robbed.
For instance, a news said that a girl travelling in Lijiang was beaten by the natives and she could not get help from the police at once because of the insufficient police.
And the event spreaded on the Internet quickly, people knew that we could not travel to Lijiang because maybe we would have the same experience.
Eventually, less people travelled to the city.
Besides, a good appearance of the old buildings and streets is a significant factor to attract tourists.
People travel to see the beartiful senary, take pictuers, experience the history of the cite.

In this case, a good appearance of old buildings and streets will leave them a deep impression, and plus, they will have a better experience of the trip because they do not need to walk on the harsh road.
By contrast, if the government do not improve the old buildings and streets, the tourists will think the conditions are dirty and they would not want to go there.
For example, there is a famous road in Wuhan, but its conditions are not well.

In my opinion, doing physical exercise is a much better way to relax than watching a movie or reading a book.
As far as I am concerned, physical exercise outweighs the other method to relax in two aspects.
First and foremost, it releases the physical tension and reduces stress in our bodies.
This is a result that can not be drawn from reading or watching a movie.
Instead, reading or watching movies in slumber positions may cause further tension physically.
Doing exercises may sounds a tiring process, but the after-effect of this tough process advocates for the best experience of total relaxation of the body.
Because of the exercises, falling asleep would be easy and quick, so that the stress will be reduced more properly.
As the frequently mentioned statement goes, doing exercise brings one a healthy body and a clear mind.
Hence the second aspect is that doing physical exercise relax the mind and make the psycological pressure level decline.
The reason for this is that when doing exercise, the muscle memory instead of the mindful memory is activated.
Therefore the brain could take a break during the whole process and let the body do all the work.
Many people have experienced moments that their mind went blank and peaceful during physical exercises.
Looking from another angle, exercising may also cause the mind to soar through the territory of daydreams, which often leads to a relaxed but creative state of the mind.
However, at the same time, reading or watching movies when one is in need to relax could only burden the mind further with new information.
In a word, physical exercise helps

The difference of these methods is staying inside of the door or staying outside of the door.

Reading and Watching movie could be my hobbies, but they won't be my first choice or better choice for relax.
Exercise in some way can't help me to relasx physically, but it is really good at relax your mind.

When you are reading books or watching movie, you are still getting information from outside, a funny book or movie may make you laugh but your brain are still working, but I am a student, my brain is working all school days, the only thing I  need to rest is my brain.
For exercise, it can help stay away from learing more and more information and  empty my mind.
In another hand, after school, I really need to wake up my body, because my body won't get enough workout and it is bad for my body health if I didn't workout enough.

There is no doubt that parents' accompany plays a vital role in children's education.
As some parents do not have lots of time to spend with their children, how that valuable time should be used is now controversial.
Some of people think it is best to spend that time playing games or sports with children while others belive that the best use of it is to do things together about schoolwork.
In my opinion, I agree with the former attitude for several reasons.
First of all, using the time to play physical games with children is beneficial for their body.
As we know, sports can indeed help children build strong body and with parents accompany it will be safer because parents can prevent them from hurting themselves.
As for me, when I was 6 years old, my father spent many time on his work and only had a little time a week to stay with me.
What he likes the most is to play badminton with me, which made me physical condition better than before.
Because of this, I was hardly sicked.
Second, exercising with children together is a practical method for parents to teach pass on some charaters to their children.
It is widly acknowleged that sports can teach children many things like the to persist.
For instance.
In my childhood, my father sometimes joint some activities like marathon.
During this activity, though it was hard to persist running the whole competition, he encouraged me to finish part of the length like 2km.
During the activity, I really felt hard to persist, but with his inspiration, I finally complete my appointment, by which I indeed leanrt the importance of persisting.
In my future life, I met sevral problems and everytime this experience would occur in my mind, which give me spirit to keep on fighting.
On the other hand, in my opinion, doing things related to schoolwork may be not a good choice as it is necessary for parents to encourage children to something by themselves.
Schoolwork was provided to let the childre review what they have learnt in the school or train them to solve some particular problems independently.
With parents' help, the schoolwork will be meaningless.
Thus, there is no need for parents to accompany with their children.
All in all, For all these reasons, I believe that exercising or playing games with children will be the best way for parents to spend their valuable time.

Some people think that children can gain more benefits when they choose jobs that are very different from their parents because they can get more skills in this way.
As for me, I strongly believe that it is better for children to select career that are similar to their parents for following reasons:
First of all, taking work that are similar to their parents can avoid going atray.
Their parents must have many experience in this certain work , so they now waht exactly the downsides and the upsides of this work.
In this way, they can effectively lead the best path for their children and prevent bad things from happening.
For example, as a teacher, one has to speak a lot and is likely to have diseases that ha something to do with throat.
If your parent is a teacher, and you take teacher as your profession, because your parent is experienced and know this can happen in all likelihood, they can do some preprotection.
However, if your parents are not teachers and you are a teacher you cannot know what everything happens until you finally get a disease of throat.
But at that time, it is too late!
As a result, it shows the benefits of choosing jobs that are similar to their parents' job.
Secondly, choosing work that are similar to their parents is a very good way to improve one's ability.

In my opinion,it is not a good idea to give money to children as rewards for getting high grades.
Fist of all, high grades are not the only important thing that students and parents should pay attention to.
There are some other qualities like sociality and creativity that may play more significant role in people's lives.
The action of giving money when children get high grades may lead them to regard the grades as the most important thing.
And this may have bad influences on children's further development.
Moreover, students are not studing for their parents but for their own future potential.
When they are given money after getting high scores, they may miss that point.
They will probablly think they are fighting for other people except themselves.
This may give much more pressure to them.
And this kind of presuure in some cases may even prevent students from active hard work.
Students may lose the most encouraging goal-their brighter futue.
And they may don't want to spend much time in study.
Lastly, some students want to do something harmful like drinking alchol or having cigerattes due to curiosity.
In that case, once they get too much money and the lack of parents' control, they are likely to get on a mislead to bad behaviors.
All in all, I think parents should not offer their children money as their high grades rewards.
They should let students know what matters and who they are studying for.
In my perspective, it's a good idea that parents offer their children money for high grade they get in scool.
Actually, this money act as a praise to their academic performance in the past.
It will motivate their children to study hard and stick to their dream.
When their children get the money, they must be excited and will have a stronger will to be more diligent.
Owning to this, parents must be willing to pay for this.
It benefits both the parents and their children.
However, every coin has its two sides.
What I want to point out is that the origin purpose to study is not for money.
Study is to get more knowledge that can change the way we think, we act and we live.
It could also cultivate our taste.
Actually, it is not supposed to do anything with money.
So, parents should point this out to their chidren, or the money will finally act as a misleading.
The amount of the money should also be proper.
Suppose that a students cheating in an exam just to get the money, what would their parents thing of it?
What negative effect will have on his future life?
Apparently, every parents expect their children to be excellent.
But the way of how to educate their children will always remain to be a question.
Different people will have different opinions.
Anyway, it's to make our education better and more efficient and make everyone live a happy life in the end.
With the development of technology and society , more and more technological inventions are changing our daily life.
For example, the bike that we share for each other have been devised to change our life.
Those inventions have a great influence on our life , including advantages and disadvantages,especially bike sharing .
I will talk about this invention.
First, i think the bike sharing have any great effect on our life.
As we all know, the students who are in the colleges that are much bigger than other cities'  colleges need to walk a long time to go to the class room.
So, they all need something to reduce the time that spend on the road .
The best way is to ride a bike in the campus.
The bike sharing has solved this problem , they can use the Mobike to go to the classroon  in  a low cost instead of buy a bike .
This invention also help people who need to walk so long to company.
Second, there are some disadvantages in this thing.
Because of many bike stay along  the street , it will rise the traffic jam on the mian road in Wuhan.
What's worse , there are many crash ocurred in the campus because there are too many students use the bike in the same time.
Additionly, we may cost much time to find a bike when we need it instaed of move right now .
It would not ensure us to arrival on time.
For example , i am usually late for class, because i always cost so much time to find a bike, but finally i did not find a bike to use .
But i can arrive on time when i walk to classroom the the beginning.
Admittedly, this invention actually have a bad influence on our society, but i think it's postive aspect will more importance for our life.
It will let us make more contribution to our environment  by this environmental friendly ways to trave.
Beside, I think it can save our money that we may need to spend on traffic.
Last , the technology will change our life , but the most important thing is the way how we use this technology.
If we can oder our action when we use the bike, I think  we can benefit from this more than before.
As many people believe that it is not a wise decision to give abundant money to children as a reward of their good grades,I'm also strongly against doing so.
I think it has many bad effects on those children who are too young to manage their money.
Firstly,yoo much extra money given by parents may spoil the children.
The children are too young to recognize things correctly, and unfortunately money is just one of them.
They won't cherish money because it is too easy to get it--they just need to perform well in an exam.
In result, they will not understand how hard it is for yheir parents to earn money.
Secondly, it can corrupt their hearts and goals.
Imagine how awful it would be if kids study hard just to get awarding money but not for accumulate knowledge.
Also, it would be horrible to parents if their children cheat in exams in order to get an A in exchange for money.
In addition,if children use the extra money to buy improper things, like games and expensive clothes, they will become disattracted and go away from their correct life.
If they use the money to buy drugs or alchoholic drinks, things just get worse.
One of my old classmates enjoyed the "policy" and got extra money as reward, he used it to buy games and soon slided into the abyss of addiction.
In all, when it comes to extra money for children for good grades, my answer will be undoubtedly ''NO''.
I hope all the parents are wise enough to avoid the problems which could be caused by extra money for children.
With the development of science and technology, our lives change quickly and they are far from what they used to be.
For children, such changes is apparent and it is hard to avoid.
Children may touch PC or mobile phone when they are very young.
Also, plenty of various games attract them from reality.
Someone even claim that technology will made children less  creative than they were in the past.
I totally disagree with this idea.
As far as I am concerned, there are various application can be used to spur their crative thinking owing to the development of technology.
Futhermore, technology made gaining knowledge easier which is the base of creative thinking.
To begin with, there are more efficient ways can be used to galvanize childrens' creativity because of the deep study in human brain and its application via technology.
By learning more about human brain, it turn gradually clear that brain can be exercied more intelligent.
According to the study recently, the creativity even can be enhanced by some simple games, which are made up of some tricks or puzzles.
This is what we have never imagined before.
The development of technology made such fantasy to reality.

Without improved technology, we can only make use of orginal way to cultivate children's creativity, such as asking them to painting or designing, which turn out to be very inefficient and not suitable for every kid.
Moreover, technology make knowledge more accessible than before, which is exactly the fundation of creativity.
With the development of internet, we can gain information through our computers or mobile phone everytime and everywhere.
In the past, we can only convey knowledge one by one, generation by generation.
With the development of equipment, we can do relevent live experiment more convenient, while in the past, we can only imagine the real effect rather than observe the phenomenon by ourselves.
Observing the scientific phenomenon when they are young make boring knowledge more vivid and easy to obtain.
All of these knowledge build solid foundation for them to become more creative.

To sum, technology made children much more creative than they were in the past, by not only bringing more ways to help them motivate creativity, but also providing knowledge more convenient and vivid.
In my opinion, I agree with the idea that celebrities influence younger people more than older people.
Several reasons can be found to prove this claim.
First of all, younger people such as children or students are in their formative years which their values and the ability of  thinking independently are still developing.
In this period of time, people are susceptible to any incident or event ,including            the influence of celebrities.

For example, when a young child is watching at an advertisement on TV, it is likely that he will be attracted by the appearence and voice of a famous person in that advertisement instead of the product.

But for adults, they focus more on the quality and reality of the products introduced in that advertisement because they are mature enough to know that it is the product that is important in an advertisement, not the person who suggests it.
Moreover, for older people, their living habits are already developed and fixed, because they have been getting used to them for a long time and their living conditions are often consistent.
But for young people, it is the same reason, that they are still growing, that can make their habits and living conditions vary, which gives the space for celebrities' influence.

For an instance, an adult will not exercise because a famous athlete suggests him to do so, since his daily schedule is filled with what he already used to do, wherese a child always has a much more flexible arrangement for his time and habits, he can chose to do exercises at any time he is willing.
Finally, since the development of younger people needs a variety of models like their parents and teachers, celebrities become a new option for them to learn from.
At the same time, these celebrities can also see this as an oppurtunity to increase their fame, and attend the TV shows or cartoons which young people like to veiw.
To sum up, this can be seen as a motivation that celebrities want to attract young people, and  the reason why young people become the targets of famous people.

In conclusion, the lack of independent thinking, the relatively free living conditions and arrangements, and as a way celebrities can improve their fame, are the reasons why young people receive more influence from celebrities than older people.

As the competition among students becomes fierce, it's more important for students to get good grades.
So a hot discussion regarding whether it is a good idea for parents to offer money for their child's high mark has arouse the interests among the general public.
In my opinion, i think it's  a good method for parents to do and there are three reasons to support my view.
At first, offering children money for each high grade saves a lot of time.
Because, parents always be busy and don't have time to teach children for their studies.
It is a time-saving idea for parents to take part in the process of kids' study and have sense of the results of their kids' studies.
So parents can have more time to work, prepare the food in each meal, even relax for their health.
Sencondly, students can be encouraged by money to study harder and get good grades.
Because if students get money to buy what they want and know the benefit brought by money, they will try harder to get good grades to get the money.
For instance, when i was a student in high school, my parents will give me the money as a reward for the high mark.
I always studied very hard even if others went to play, because i know that i study for myself and i have the aim to encourage me to study better.
As a result, i always got scholarship every year in my high school and go to a good college.
So i think this method is a efficient way to encourage students to study.
Lastly, this idea conforms to the social life.
Because when they grow up to work, they will get year-end bonus or other reward if they work hard.
They will also work efficiently to get better reward as their student life if they see the reward as their aim rather than working without aim.
And students can also adapte the social life in advance, it will help them in their future life.

The statement of letting the kids make mistakes and learn from it in the same time is reasonable.
Firstly, making mistakes can let the kids have more accumulation of life experience.
For instance, when I fall over some obsatcles, my mother wouldn't lift me up, she just watch me standing up by myself.
If I'm crying, my mother would tell me to be brave, and be more careful next time.
I could hardly understand her meaning at firat but then i get to know it.
Now, I seldom fall over, and I remember my mother's words all the time, avoiding falling down for the second time.
Secondly, making mistakes can let the children become a more successful person.
Maybe in the aspect of studying or other.
For example, I  often made mistakes in doing tests, which were caused by my carelessness most of the time.
I often forgot to write my name when I was in Grade 1 and Grade 2.
So it's normal for me to have no scores for some certain subjects.
Also I often make some basic problems in math.
I always make calculating mistakes, and it cost me a lost.
But it didn't appear since Grade 3, because I had learned from my previous mistakes.
Since then, I start to remember write my name and didn't make mistakes on calculating.
Thirdly, making mistakes can let the kid be more mentally mature.
The kids making more mistakes have better mental health than the kids who nerver make mistakes.
For example, it is know that the students with good grades are often worried by mental disease.
If they failed in some tasks and they are blamed by their parents, some extreme behaviors may happened to them.
But for the students who often make mistakes, they would have a light heart towards every mistakes they had make, and have an active mind to correct it, avoiding to happen the next time.
So it is dispensable for the parents to let their kids making mistakes and help them to learn from teh.

Currently, a controversial topic has aroused heated debate among people: is it true that remaining happy and optimistic when you fail is more important than success.
Some claim that success is more important because it can bring us a great sense of achievement.
However, contrary to their view comes my perspective that keeping in good mood when confronted with failure is more important.
My point is well elaborated as follows.
To begin with, only when you deal with failure in optimistic can you do better in continue difficulties.
To be specific, with the good mood, it is easier for people to chear up and analyze the reason why they fail bravely in spite of how bad the result is.
In this way, chances are that they learn a lot form the failure and avoid the mistake in future.
However, if people only care about the result, they might find it easy to got lost once they fail.
Under this circumstance, they will be afriad to try and do worse in future because the fear of failure.
For example, my little sister is learning skiing now.
Everytime when she fails to ground, no matter how painful, she just laughes happily and try again.
Therefore, she is more and more adept to it.
In addition, remaining good mood when people fail is conducive to people's metal health.
As we all know, metal health is bound closely with people's condition.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people whether should the people focus on achieving realistic goals rather than dreams.
Some people claim that people should focus on achieving realistic goals rather than dreams.
However I would stand on their opposite side and I believe that people should follow their heart to achieve their dream rather than focus on the real life.
And my reasons can be seen as follows:
First of all, I think following dream could encourage people and give them success.
As we all know, in the world, many famous are dreamer.
They usually have a big dream, and then they focus on their dream and study hard and work hard.
When they face something difficult, their dream will encourage them to overcome it rather than give up.
For example, when I was a high school student, I had a dream that become a scientist.
So I study hard to achieve it.
Although high school ilfe was so boring, I still enjoyed study, because my dream encourage me.
And my classmat usually gave up and then slept because they do not have a dream, because they just focued on the real life.
Finally I got the offer of a good university, and my classmate failed in the finally test.
What's more, the dream can give people a target leading them.
As we all know, if some one run in the circle track, they will stay at a same spot finally.
So we need a direction in our life leading us to go on ranther than run in the circle track.
For example, when I was young, I wanted to be a scientist, so I collected so much information with science.
And then I had an exact aim and track.
Then I followed this track.
Finally, I enter into a good university.
My friend donot have any dream and just focus on the real life.
So he is still puzzle with life, and he do not know what should he do.
In a nutshell, following dream could encourage people and give them success and  the dream can give people a target leading them.
So I think we should follow our dream ranther than just focuing on real life.
With social development, having a decent job is a dream for everyone.
To get quick promotion and get better salary, people always want to study hard in school to accumlate plenty of academic knowledge.
At the same time, they ignore talking with other people because they spend much time in studying.
However, as far as I am concerned, the ability to relate well to people is more important than studying hard in school for success in a future job.
Firstly, getting along well with your coworkers can get effeciency in work.
As we all know, we will face various problems in working in business, like hiring people or financial problems.
Whatever difficulties we face, if we relate well to people, we can find the keys to solve the problems quickiy, because everyone have different angle about the same question.
With these benefits, we can save tons of time and efforts.
With these time, we can do other business affairs to improve ourselves.
While having higher knowledge and not talking with people, you may have to spend much time on difficulties, which is negative for your job.
Secondly, if you communicate well with your fellows, you will become more responsible.
Having seminars in business is a good oppotunity for you to find your own fault.
During this section, people will tell you what you should do better, like watching tables much seriosly.
Therefore, you will correct your own weakness and get a sence of responsibilities to have a better impression in colleagues.
Futhermore, you may want to help someone out as much as you can in the company, which enable you to get quick promotion and improve yourself.
Studying hard in school can not teach you how to be responsible in a job.
Thirdly, you can expand your social network and build up friendly relationship while relating well to people.
There are plenty of people in the business who are into different fields.
During the period of time of communicating with each other, you can find someone who are like the same things, such as reading Harry Porter or playing volleyball.
Making friends in a company become more availiable if you want to chat with each other.
Meanwhile, you can share your own desperate feelings and problems with intimate colleagues, which is a good way of relieving.
Having higher knowledge and not talking with each other will make you depression when facing problems and you will not know how to proceed relationship with people.
In conclusion, it is good for you to have ability to relate well to people for success in a future job rathar than studing hard in school.

As far as i'm concerned, i don't think it is a good idea to offer the children with money every time they get high marks.

Here are some reasons, first of al, this strategy is indeed a very efficient way to help the children improve their grades in a short period, however, it will lead to the result that the children are not going to deal with the homeworks or exams seriously and patiently unless they are given the awards.

There actually exist an example, my best friend used to be very hardworking, and his aim was to reach the top of our class,the only reason was that his father promised to buy him a new telephone if he got the highest marks, but soon after he got the phone, he could't concentrate on study anymore, he even could't finished his homeworks on time,which led to his failure in the college entrance exam.
It really sounds unbelivable, but it did happened.
Let's return to our main topic, the second reason is that the so called "reward" strategy can even give the children an erro sense of value, which will cause troubles in their futures.

Here comes an example, an officer called a new employee to tried his best to negotiate with another manager of a big company, the employee only talked about the money in the neogotiation, which resulted in the failure of the talk.
So we can conlude that if children grow up with this kind of teaching methonds, he will deal with everything in a conception of money.
So, in my opinons, this kind of teaching method is totally wrong, which will lead to unchangeable sense of wrong value in the whloe life of the children.
Based on what i've said, i think iis wise to find another way to teach children.
It's not proper to give money to the school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.

If every time the child is given money when the behave well,  the child may be mislead to this concept that attending school and geting high mark is a kind of trade, and the child regard this as a way to get money.
So the child will focus on the money he will get rather than the knowldge he has learn in the school.
This would be very harmfull.
The school is a place where the child gets educated, rather than a place where the child make their money by behave well.
Maybe, to some extend, the money will encourage the child to behave well and aim at geting high mark, this would be harmfull in the long wrong.
It's won't help to improve the chid's knowledge storing.

A better way for the parents to encourage the child to study well is telling the child the improtance of study well, and geting the child feel the benefit of the knowledge, and making the child be atrracted by the knowledge.
Then the child would behave well in the school and seek for high grade by themself, rather than by the stimulation of geting money form their parents.
Money simulation would be harmfull to the health of the child's mental health.
The money may make the child money-leaded.
They may aim at money whatever they do in their everyday life, and the regard the money as the only goal of their life, while ignore the importance of the phycological relationship.
As far as they become money-leaded, they will not treasure the friendship, won't treasure the lover-relationship.
Everything they do is for money, this is very terrible.
So I don't thik it's a good idea for the parents to offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
I think this is not a good ideal,becouse the children well spend more money for play without study.
The parents should offer  the children the nessery money  for calss and buy some books ,or buy something to eat,so that the children will pay attion on thier study.
If the parents wish their children can learn knowledge and be sucess,they must be learn to how to teach thier children.
Is the history courses necessary for our learning?
Does the extra course influence our normal life?
As a common university student, from my perspective, the history courses are not significant for our learning if we major in other courses.
Since the history course slow down our learning efficiency and it is unuseful for our cource and credit .
On the one hand, the history course render our learning efficiency slowly.
To be more convincible, if we do not major in history, the histroy course will distract us from our major course.
For instance, we cost a large amount of time in history learning, we recite the point in the book, discuss some famous history evidences like the World War II.
It will wastes extremly long time for the learning in our major likes the time costs in mathematic calculation and chemistry experiment.
As a consequnce, we will have less time to do in our major, the history course will decrease our learning efficiency in our major course.
Meanwhile, the history course will give press to our after-school break time.
If we learn history after school, we will have less time to sleep or have a break.
Then we will feel sleeply and unaminate.
As a result, it decrease the learning efficiency in our major learning.
On the other hand, the history course is unuseful for our course and credit.
To be specific, do the extra history course can not earn more credit and learning history have not any effect on your course in final exam or month exam.

When it comes to the issue about how to relax oneself when you feel tired,people's opinion differs from person to person.
Some people prefer doing exercise when they are buried in working chores for a long time,while others may choose to watch a movie or have a quick flip through a book when they feel exhausted.
As far as I am concerned,both of the two methods are to be emphasized.
In my opinion,doing physical exercise is no less important than watching a movie or reading a book.

Primarily,working out after a long period of struggling can make people refreshed,and then people could come back to their work or study with a fresher thought and a clearer mind,which could definitly improve their working or learning efficiency.
Take me as an example,I have had a hard time struggling for my En Furthermore,some sorts of physical exercises are really helpful to a person's mental and physical health.
Taking a yoga courses can help people release their stress and also can give woman a slimmer figure,which makes them more charming.
Swimming can improve the function of a person's lung and heart.
Running can provide people with strong muscles and even can extend people's longevity.
The significance of movies and books should also be mentioned.
If a person is too exhausted to working out,it will be better choice for them to stay at home and just read a novel or watching a classic movie.
Suppose you have been buried in a series of grueling work and stayed up late for a whole week,it could be a impossible task for you to take exercise.
Under this circumstance,have a glimpse of a interesting story or just watching a romantic film would provide you a better sense of relaxing.
In conclusion,there should be no prejudice against either of these two basic ways to relax onself.
As long as our society continues to progress , the importance of a healthy body will be on the rise.
Both woring out and watching movie or reading books are critical to a person's overall health amd each deserves our ever-lasting attention.

In this day and age, what people concern is only around themselves.
In other words, they do not awake their consciousness   of what happened around the globe for they might think there is no connection between them and people involved in the events.
However, I do not think it is good.
My opinion wll be amplified by the benefits that knowing about the events around the globe can bring about.
First and formost, one can learn form the mistakes made by other people.
Provided that someone makes a severe mistake and it is broadcast in the television or some electronic devises, other people may thus be aware of the mistake and try to learn from it in his life.
For instance, one of my friends once read about a piece of news, which talked about a person who made a serious mistake and would be sent to prison soon.
However, she did not think that occurence as a severe thing, so she investigated it and searched much information concerning it.
However, since she is not a lawyer and were not quite acquainted with law before, she did not feel so disappointed.
Even so, she learned a lot from it and also knew how to defend.
As the example reveals, knowing about the events can bring about other benefits.
In addition, when one is doing his essay, he can cite the events extracted from the news.
This is mainly because people will always use some specific details to support his idea, and knowing more events means he has more citation which can be used in his essay.
A typical illustration of this can be seen in my sister's experience.
Once she was completing her assignments and could not find any supporting detail to comfirm her opinion.
Then came her father and told her to relax herself for a while.
Therefore, she started to watch the television.
And just then, she found the event happening at the other edge of the world could be cited in her homework.
She was so excited that she made up her mind that she must watch the news at least ten minutes per day to broaden her horizons.
As the instance demonstrates, people can find citation through knowing about the news.

In conclusion, I strongly believe that knowing about the events is of great significance, even if it will not affect our life in that people can not only learn from those mistakes mentioned in the events, but also find the proper citation from the events.

Currently, a controversial topic has arouse a heated debate among people: is it better for colleagues or classmates to communicate in person than through email in order to do a project.
Some claim that communicating in person is much better because people can speak face to face.
However, i hold an oppsite view that using emails to finish a project can be better.
My point is elaborated as follow.
First, using emails to communicate can be more efficient to finish the project.
This is because by using emails to communicate people can have more time to collect information about the project, which would contribute to a all-round consideration.
If classmates or colleagues only communicate in person, they have to quickly make reaction to what others' saying, which is too hurry to come up with a conclusion.
For instance, my classmate Li, who used emails to communicate with his teammates,  finishing their work very efficienly on perparing a debating competition.
They had enough time to search the database and thought the question in a deep and wide consideration.
However, my team, who were the opposite with them, communicated in person.
My teammates always quickly drew a conclusion, whcih was confirmed  unreliable on the competition.
So, i think it is much more efficient to use the emails to finish a project.
Second, it will encourage colleagues of classmates who are shy to enter the team and share their initial thinking.
It is believed that many teams have some teammates who are so  shy that they rarely share their oppinios with others face to face.

By using emails to communicate, the shy person can have a chance to output their thinking and this is beneficial for doing a project because failure is always coming from with the suitation that some people follows others without their own thinking, teamwork continuing.
My brother John, who is really shy to talk to others, when doing his experiment with his teammates, he had some wonderful ideas in solving a problem.
However, because he was scared of talking to others, he didn't show the ideas to others whcih contributed the project slowly finished.
Now, his leader in this team has using emails to communicate, and John can easily show his ideas to others.
So, it is beneficial for dong a project to give shy people a chance to speak.
In summary, from what has benn discussed above, we can safely draw a conclusion that it is better to communicate through emails than in person in order to do a project.

In China, it is very common for parents to reward their school-age children money if they performed well in their examination.
However, as for me, I don't agree with that and I believe that it is not a good idea to reward and encouage the children.
First of all, it is not for money that the children go to school, but for the knowledges and their interests.
In other words, the purpose of the children's studies is to explore the unknownness.
Therefore, if the children get high grade in school, they already have their reward, that is the master of the knowledges.
The parents should lead their children to develop their interets of the study rather than money.
The other reason that I am favor the idea to offer the school-age children money for their high grade is that money is not an effective motivation.
For example, if the children failed to perform well in school, they won't be able to have money from their parents.
Without money, they may loose the interests of study and quit their life.
Thirdly, offering money for high grade may failed and the reason is that the fulfillment of the children is limitless.
In other words, they may glad to receive money from the parents, but they may expected much more money when they grow up.
However, when the parents are not able to provide them , it will cause a lot of problems.

Finally, the reason that I am not agree with the idea that to offer children money for their each high grade is that I was born in a poor family and the reality is that my parents are not able to do that.
And I know that not only me, but also a lot of students' parents either able to do that.
Therefore, the reward of money will hurt their self-dignity and intigue their heart of envy.
For those reasons, I appose the idea to offer school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.

In the conclusion, although parents may be busy and do not have enough time to accompany with their children, they can just consume a little time to play games with children.
Not only it can reduce children's pressure, but also it can develop a strong logic and give some inspiration to them.
I believe that is worthy.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether teachers should be paid at least as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.
As far as I am concerned, teachers should be given at least equal remuneration as doctors, lawyers or business leaders.
To begin with, paying high salary to teachers can keep our society stable.
To illustrate, teachers have the duty to cultivate next generation of our world.
Whatever you do, you always need a teacher to teach you at the first time.
Moreover, becoming a doctors also need teachers thus it is ridiculous that teachers have lower salary than doctors.
However, if teachers are paid low salary which is lower than doctors or lawyers, people are willing to be doctors or lawyers rather than be teachers.
Thus, no one will teach our next generation and doctors, lawyers and business leaders will also disappear.
Then our society will lag behind.
To be followed, paying high salary to teachers can improve the world.
To be more specific, high salary can inspire teachers to improve their work.
Thus, students can get high quality education which will make them become elite.
More and more elite promote the progress of our world.
Nevertheless, if teachers only paid little money, they would not have motivation to give the students high quality education.
Consequenty, all the oocution of our world will lag behind.

With the accelerating development of our society, the public and government have more strict standard for university students.
Some people contend that university students should not only learn about their major's knowleage, but also other courses.
Many people of them think history courses are necessary for university students.
Because  nowadays more and more young people do not know about history.
But I strongly believe that the history courses seem to be a burden for university students.
Firstly, university students have few time and energy to study a course out of their major courses.
To be specific, today's university students spend a lot of time in their major courses, especially the engineers.
With the development of technology, some engineer courses become harder and harder.
The students face the most complex problems ever before.
So they spend much more time in their major courses than several years before.
In that situation, the extra history courses would certainly take negative effects to the students.
Some students even spend their rest time to struggle for their history credits, that might cause some body diseases.
Moreover, if the students do not spent their rest time, their reduce their study time for major courses, that might hurt their professional abilities which are important after graduation.
On top of that, university students gain few benifits from the history courses.
In other words, the university students who do not  major in history do not spent enough time to have a comprehensive impression of history.
That leads misunderstand of some historical truth, students are likely to have a false attitude towards to some events.
In China, their are many young energetic people who only read few history textbooks are extremely negative towards Japanese.
The negative attitude leads them to do some unreasonable riots, such as destroying the Japanese made cars in the streets.
That caused big decreases.
Universally it is quite a average phenomenon that parents are accustomed to preparing everything for their children especially when they are in rebellous age or too young to handle things.
Furthermore, for numerous Chinese parents, children are what they live for,no wonder they woould rather expense every penny to get a promising future for their children.
However,from my perspective,it is too indulging for kids if parents do not let children make mistakes.
There is a saying that failure is the mother of success.
People will only learn from their miastakes not in success,needless to say children.
In the process of growing up,it is time for them to study and  learn from failure or mistakes.
If parents take that crucial part out of the process,they will enjoy less lesson of what are supposed to shown for them.

What is more, it is also impossible for parents to loo after their children for their entire life,which means they wil make mistakes sooner or later,and then you will not be able to protect him from hurt.

Therefore, what parents ought to do when children make mistakes is encouraging them and cheering them up,so as to help them gain more meaningful experience,instead of stop them from making mistakes which will only lead to temporary warmth.
Of course,you should not comprehend it for being cruel to children ,cause it is not simply superfical love ,it is deeper and greater care and attachment in the long run.
Besides,it is acknowledged that eagle moms throw their very own kids in the hill just to force them to learn to fly.
It is of course ,for good purpose,that they do such things.
Equally, men parents,should let their children make mistakes and help them correct before too late.
There is no doubt that communities play a vital role in people's daily lives.
However, nowadyas whether young people spend enough time to helping the communities or not is controversial.
In my opinion, I think young people today indeed do not give enough help to the communities.
First of all, young people nowadays do not have enough free time to help others.

As the stress of young people is becoming higher and higher, no matter those students in schools or those people at work both have too much things to do, as a result, it will be tough for them to find sufficient free time to help their communities.
For instance, when I was studied in the university, I had so much things to deal with every day that I even did not  have any free time to do other things.

I had to pay much attention to my courses and it was also necessary for me to participate in many activities organized by the sports club and also sometimes I would join in some competitions like debate which needed a lot of preparation.
By all of these, it was really hard for me to find enough time to help my communities as many times they came to asking for my help what I could say is suggesting them to look for others' help.
Second, now more young people is more apathy and more likely to enjoy their life alone rather than spending time on helping others.

With the development of the technology, now it is possible for a person to only use high-tech devices like mobile phones or computers to live alone without others' company which make people more unconcerned than before.
To illustrate, my cousin used to study with me in the same university.
He was very apathy that he could just sat their with playing his mobile phone for a whole day.
It was not necessary for him to get on with others or give help when others need.
When we all participated in an activity needing team work, he refused to join in and did not give any help to us group because of the lack of team spirit.
Thus, nowadays many times young people are not used to helping others, that is why they do not spend enough time giving help to their communities.
All in all, for all these reasons, I indeed believe that young people now do not spend enough time helping the communities.
Recentlyï¼Œthere is a discussion about helping the strangers.
And most people are more likely to help the strangers who are struggling.
As for me,I agree with them and I will also help the strugging people.
In China,helping others is a traditional virtue,espcially when they are in problems.

In our childhood,we have heard a large number of stories about it,which is that a warmheated man helped a poor man ,and after many years,the poor man became  rich and he had still remembered who had helped him.
