Recently, a controversial topic has roused a heated debate: whether young people today are more likely to invest their time and efforts in improving the world than young people in the past?
As far as I am concerned, young people today are more willing to try their best to improve the world.
To begin with, young people today have the demand to improve the world.
To be more specific, getting attention from world is a great satisfication for young people today since they are watching the world all the time through internet.
What's more, young people today can use internet to find the information they need and know which can help them improve the world.
In this case, young people tend to participate in things that change world in order to get more attention.
On the contrary, in the past, young people cannot know what is happening in the world and they did not know how to change the world.
So they were not aware of that they can improve the world.
Consequently, they were more likely to invest their time on their daily life.
For example, most of the young people nowadys have did some volunteer which also improve the society in some ways.
However, in the past, less people did volunteer.
To be followed, young people have time to improve the world.
To illustrate, young people today do not need to worry about how to make living since the society progress.
They can find a job to make living easily and then they have more free tiem than before.
In order to make a good use of this time, they are more willing to invest it to improve the world.
However, in the past, people always need to consider how to earn more monery to support their family.
They often need to work all days and did not have any time to invest.
Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether your job has more influence on your happiness than social life does?
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some people claim that your job has less effect on you happiness than social life does.
However, I would stand on their opposite side and I believe that your happiess are more influenced by your job rather than social life.
My viewpoints can be elaborated as follows.
Firstly, your job can bring money to you and these money can make you happy.
As we all know, the salary of our job are our motivation of working.
If we can get lots of money every month, we could save these money and do any we want.
However, if we are always worried about problem that whether our money is enough to survive, we would feel very stressed out and unhappy.
For example, I was a music teacher in a high school two years ago and I could recieve six thousands RMB every month.
I saved all of my salary and went to Chongqing where is a beautiful place.
I took many photos and ate many delicious food.
I felt very happy.
Secondly, your job is nearly one-third of a day, and if you feel unhappy when you work, your one-third day would be unhappy.
When people graduate from school, all of us need to work every day  and our job become very essential part of our whole day and life.
If we work very hard and we get reward, we would feel a sense of accomplishment because our efforts recieve feedback.
Thus, our overall mood would be lifted.
For example, my sister graduated last year and she went to a advertising company.
She often complained to me that she felt very upset and unhappy, because she dislike her job and her boss always criticed her.
To put it in a nutshell, I firmly think your happiness are more effected by you job.
This is not only it can bring money to you and meet your needs, but also it can influence you one-third day and whole life.
With the social process, there are a large variety of may of working to enable job hunters to choose.
Some prefer to work at their own house instead of the workplace offered by their company; some would like to spend three days per week on work though it takes above ten hours to work everyday.
As far as I am concerned, it is advisble to engage in five days a week because I just spend about eight hours on work.
To begin with, working shorter hours everyday help people maintain health.
Since it is not uncommonly known that long period of working would lead a sedentary lifestyle.
This means people would pay less attention to physical activity.
Last week, I heard a news about a writer died because of working for long time.
Because she had no time to participate in exercise, she already suffered from chronic diseases.
This event tells us if people can spend time strengthening their legs and arms or making aerobic activities rather than sitting in front of computer screen, they would keep fit.
Therefore, for the sake of physical healthy, people should choose a job for working shorter time.
what is more, people working five days for shorter time could enjoy their colorful daily life.

If people have to go to work at once after waking up and go back home when they finish their work, they would not have time hang out the department store with their friends or do the household chore every day.
In other word, they are more likely to feel boring owning to lack of entertain.
This point is illustrated by a example of my friend, Lily.
She very sick of her last job where she work three day a week for eleven hours.
She quited because she had no time to care for her baby.

The purpose of study is not for money but for knowledge itself, and there is no doubt that knowledge is vital for us for the future.
Therefore, if parents give their children the feeling that they study for money, when they don't have the "money" motivation one day, they will not want to study anymore.
Take the most of Chinese parents as an example.
They often offer their children material awards for getting good grades, and it did make a lot of improvment.
However, when their kids go to the college, they suddenly loss the motivation to study, and they get low grades in college even they fail the exams.
These days, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debated among people: whether people will spend less time cooking and preparing food in twenty years than they do today.
From my perspective, people will spend more time on the food preparing and cooking.
My point will be elaborated as follows.
Firstly, the scientific diet need people to select foof carefully.

People will pay more attention on the scientfic living especially the scientific food, so they will spend plenty of time designing a diet and make sure that every food have advantages to human instead of bad influence.
Also the process of cooking need enough time to guarantee that all the bacteria is killed.
On the contrary, todays'people  often just buy the food material and then cook them without the scientific matching and required time to make the food done completely.
consequently, this would have a bad influence on the people today.

For example, with the develop of technology, a research conducted by Harvard un iversity shows that people can use the nutrition detector to monitor the vitamin in the food to create the most healthy food in their home.
So with the fashion to make scientific food, people in twenty years would spend more time one food.
Secondly, people would have more spare time in twenty years, whcih would guarantee that they have enough time spending on the food preparation and cooking.
In the future, people would have more spare time because the advanced technology would take a great amount of works.
With the robots and the computer to control most of the jobs, people do not have the stress to deal with the work.

Consequently, people would develop the cooking as a hobby so they would spend as much as  possible because they enjoy the cooking process and the cooking process would give them happiness and relaxation.
For example,  people in twenty years would come back home at a early time or even they only need to deal with the stuffs at home, receiving some emails.
So they can spend plenty of time preparing the food and cooking to enjoy the relaxing environment.
On the contrary, you can imagine that people today would only buy some quick food or deal with the cooking quickly with so much stress.
All in all, people in twenty years would spend more time on cooking.
Awarding school-age children can stimulate them to study harder and let them taste the sweetness of their success.
But it depends on the form that parents choose.
Because some unexpective results may came along when the tendency of study is twisted.
Take this brief evidence into consideration, I have to say that I'm against the opnion that parents offer their scholl-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
And here states some reasons down below.
Interest comes first.
Stimulation can make a difference in a short period of time, but as the road suspends in our children's  life, what takes the indesipensable place is interest.
So instead of showing them money to push them to work hard, which unfortunely is a lifestyle of a grown-up who has lost his curiosty in life, we should fuel their interest in gaining knowledge.
Take my deskmate as an example, his parents read books when he was little.
However, his parents always ceased to read during the exciting pattern in order to raise up his curiosty for more.
Now he's in good grade, forced to study by nobody but himself.
When a child strongly intend to learn something, this child's future can be bright as the balcony.
Never let a child grow into a man who lusts for fortune.
What my mom used to convince me is that when a man lost his essential characters, he lost it all.
When money becomes the only reason that a kid learns some stuff, how much fun does he miss?
A businessman I used to know comes to my mind.
He only cares about money, when it is beyond the topic of money and profit, he just doesn't care at all.
What he told me is that his parents tried to stick the thought that money wins into his brain.
There's so much entertainment in the world, don't blind your children's eyes by money!
So thos are my thoughts I'd like to share.
Study should be pure.
Let your kids understand this.
Have you ever selected sciences in university just want to escape the history class?
Nowasays, there are increasing students think the history class is boring and do not want to choose the history class, so they try to select a distant field which could cut these classes.
However, I think it is really important for students to study history, no matter what their field of study is.
The history can be classified as the history of culture, the history of ecnomic and the history of policy.
And these are all really necessary to ourself and our life.
Firstly, the history of culture is significent to learn.
The university students are the descendents of their country, so it is their obligation to inherit the culture, and remember the traditions of their countries.
In addition, learning the history of the ecnomic of the world is useful for the univerisity students.
After graduating the university, these students need to seek jobs.
So they can have a proper orientation about their jobs after learning the tendacy of the ecnomy.
Finally, knowing the history of the policy is fundamental as an excellent citizens.
The country and the world are like our homes, we have obligation to know what happened in the past.
Therefore, do not feel disguised toward history class.

Thus, the decisions young people need to make is simpler in the past than today.
So today's people need more help from parents to come out with a good decision.
Overall, due to the condition in our society and wealthness of our lives, I think the people in the past make more independent decisions.
Can the strain of the work renders us boring and tired?
Is the high stress work good for our health?
As a common employee of my company, I prefer to have the spare time about several hours everyday.
Because from my perspective, the spare time in everyday is good for our health.
At the same time, the fewer working time in everyday enhance our working efficiency.
So I would like to choose the lifestyle that working five days a week for shorter hours.
On the one hand, the shorter times work enhance the quality of our body.
To be more convincible, if we just work 4-5 hours a day, we will have large quantity of time to do some sports and arrange some appointments and so on.
These leisures not only are good for our health, but also enhance our passion of the life.
There is no better illustration to prove this idea than the instance of myself.
In our company, some part of employees only work three days in a week.
However, they need to do a 9-hours-work everyday, so they are extremely tired and looks weak.
As a result, in the later two days leisure, they can only spend most part of time to sleep.
They not only can not spend their spare time to travel or anything, but also do not do any sports, so they have worse condition to face their work.
But for me, I spend 3-4 hours to do some sports in my leisure everyday.
I not only strengthen my muscle and legs, but also do not feel tired in my work time.
On the other hand, the shorter times work enhance our working efficiency.
To be more specific, if we work 8-10 hours a day, we will feel extraodinarily tired and the efficieny will be very low in the latter 3-4 hours.
However, consider myself for instance, I work 5 hours a day, I can spare no effort to do my assignment everyday.
This is the condition that our leaderships want to see.
What should we do when somebody said something wrong in a meeting?
Should we correct them or should we let it go?
If we want to correct the mistake the person said, when should we correct the mistake?
In my opinion, I will choose to correct their mistake after the person who made the mistake have done the speech.

By doing this, the people who made the mistake will realize their problem and correct this mistake in the future, also this person will feel a sense of respect since we did not poinrt out their problem infront of others which will causes the person to feel bad.
Firstly, if we pint out the mistake the person made after all others are gone, they will feel that we have the respect toward them.
Interrupting others is very rude, and since the person who is speaking is our leader or teacher, so we need to respect them .
For example, once when I was taking a math class last years when I was a high school student in America, my teacher made a mistake when calculating a formation and i realized that.
I told him the mistake after everybody else were gone and he was really appreciated and he corrected this mistake in the next class.
After that, he always decribed me as respectful and smart.
So, people should point out the mistake a teacher or a leader made privately to let them both realize the mistake and feel a sense of respect.
Furthermore, interrupting the teacher or the leader to tell they were wrong or just leave the mistake like this are not good choices.

By interrupting them, they will feel we are intend to embaress them or we do not have a respect to them but if we do not point out their mistake, they might be continous to make the mistake and they will mislead many people.

For example, my friend in a Chinese class last year pointed out a mistake made by their teacher during class by interrupting their teacher, after that, his teacher kept treated he really bad, when he was in high school, there another teacher in his class made a mistake and he just left the mistake like that, later on his teacher was kept making the smae mistake over and over agian.
Therefore, we  better not not either interrupt to point out the mistake or say nothing.

There is no denying that these rewards can encourage students to study harder and get higher grades.
But it will make them form an idea that ifas long as they complete anything well, they should be paid with wnderful award, which is harmful and unrealistic.

When I was staying at home in summer holiday, my younger sister, who was reading in primary school, came to my home everyday to get help for her study and she asked me if I can  teach her friend chemistry as a private teahcer.
Thinking that I have enough time, I agreed.
Her friend told me that if she can gain high score in exams, her father will give her money to buy anything she want.
One day, I was lucky to be invited by the girl's parents to have dinner with them.
In the restunant, the girl asked her father to buy ice cream for her although she was still having a cold.
Of course her father disagree.

Even a small quiz in class could be her example and a "good reason" to buy herself an ice cream.

As the development of the Internet, we can know the events that are happening around the world easily.
However, whether it is meaningful to know these international events is debatable.
Some people hold a point that it is useless to us, while others think that we should know these events to expand our vision.
However, I strongly believe that this behavior is really important considering the various topics it afford us and the increase it causes in our school work.
Firstly, we can have more affairs to talk with friends.
When we read the reports about those events, we know what are happening all over the world and in this way, we can have some very useful topics to communicate with others.
For example, when we don't have anything to talk with our friends, we can ask their perspectives toward one news, then we can continue our conversation and get rid of many embarrasment.
Secondly, it can improve our grades.
When we get these worldwide information, we have  have at least the basic knowledge of the national relationships.
Then we can find it easier to learn the subjects like history and politics.
Then, we can understand what the teacher taught in class entirely.
Also, we can recite these knowledge easier than usual.
As a result, we are able to spend more time on other subjects and certainly do better in our school work.
For exaple, when I start read these news, I find my history and politics grades increased.
All in all, knowing about events happening around the world is really beneficial.
Let's start checking these news now!
Nobody can avoid the fate of making mistakes, but the problem is whether parents should allow their kids making mistakes and learn from their own errors.
My perspective is yes.
Most importantly, when they teenagers make some errors when they are young, they will be less likely react them when they get older.
It's easy for kids to learn but it's difficult for kids make their ways without making mistakes.
Failure is the mother of success.
Failure will gives them deep impression, so when the next time they meet the same preblem, mistakes will teach children how to avoid making mistakes successfully.
For instance, if a kid pour a cup of water on floor for first time, he may just stand there and watching,but if next time if he do the same, he will pick up a tissue to clean the flloor.
Making mistakes is not terrible, if know the solusion to fix it, it will become one's fortune.
The second reason is that making errors helps people communicate with others.
When a person first meet a mistake, he or she may don't know how to solve it, they are more likely seek for help.
During the time seeking for help, they will learn how to communicate with elder or experinced people and learn how to behave themselves.
It's beneficial for them not only in their future career but also in their future life.
Because the skills of communicating are important in our career and in our daily life.
Last but not least, most families in china have only one child, the kids are mostly over spoiled.
Most of them cannot accept failure in their life, some even choose suicide when they meet obstacles.
Making mistakes is a good chance for the kids.
That will help them become more resilient, more brave and have a stronger mind.
It's not easy to face own mistakes, but allow children make mistakes is helping them to be a better person.
In conclusion, there are many disagreements about allowing kids make errors, but I still side with the opinion that it  has a long-term effect on children.
Maybe some people just see the negative influece caused by allowing kids make errors, but the advantage may emerge many years later.
The long-term harvest will surprise parents if they allow their children to make mistakes not overwhelmed by the protection of their parents.

Although there will be precious outcomes in the end when we persitst on doing the same thing, we will get bored and it takes too long and is too difficult for a person to make the ends meet, which means to get to the top will cost too much.
Thus, it is significant to get ourselves involved in various works a day.
Doing different types of tasks allows us to get more inspirations.
If a person keeps on doing the same thing, it will narrow his  horizon and it will become difficult for one to make a progress.

I finished one task after another.
I realized that I did not make any progress according to the final score.

Then, I changed my strategy, I just did one part of an excercise in the morning and do some other tasks like watching a movie or a recorded concert on the computer in the afternoon.
I finally made a progress in the exam.
Moreover, various kinds of work may make us doing our work more efficiently.
A lot of works done at the same time can improve our ablitilies in deaing with all kinds of tasks at one time.
Our work will be more proficient and pleasing to our boss.
So we have a promotion in our job and a good develop
As a result, I prefer to do different tasks during a day.

At present, a controverial topic has aroused a heated debate among the students:is it more important to remain happy and optimistic when you fail than succeed?
Answers vary from one to another.
Some people claim that success is of critical importance.
However, contrary to their views comes my own perspective that keeping positive when we encounter failure is the most important.
My viewpoint is based on the following reasons.
First, remaining optimistic is conducive to adjustment to people's mood and atitude, which could help them quickly go through the failure.
To be more specific, when people fail to do something, keeping a positive mind will inspire them to light up their enthusiasm again and then restart to chase the goal.
However, it people couldn't get over this obstacle but were immersed in the failure in a persimistic mood, how could they look ahead and move on?
In this case, it will be too hard for them to be successful in the future.
For example, my uncle suffered a huge financial loss approximately about one billion dollars in his Internet company.
But he didn't choose to hault or escape.
Instead, he handled all these issues with a positive mind since he still believed his business could revive again.
And finally, by his calm style of dealing with business, one of his company's products made a hit.
Second, keeping positive is also of great benefit to health especially when people are much more stressful such as encountering the failure.

Specifically, when people suffer the failure, they always feel hurt or stressful for they are more likely to think they waste a second precious opportunity to succeed and fear that they could not get over the difficulty any more and then something bad will happen to their body such as headache, insomnia and even some cardiovasculars like heart diseases, However, if they choose to face the failure with a more optimistic way, the chance they are caught with diseases will be much less.
For example, my dad once suffer a setback in his job: he was fired by his boss.
He thought he could not support his family again and his self-esteem hurt as well.
During those days, he felt sick all the time and headache.
In this case, how could he resume to his business again?
it's impossible!
In conclusion, keeping positive and happy when we fail is of great importance for out future development.

Although nobody likes mistakes, no one is perfect and everyone makes mistake in his or her life.
Therefore, I greatly support that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
First of all, mistakes and errors can be the greatest lessons from which children can learn from.
For example, my daughter always forgets to put her homework in her schoolbag in the morning for my parents often help her.
One day, my parents were not at home and I did not do that for her.
Of course, she failed to remember to put her homework in her schoolbag and she was criticized by her teacher in calss.
When she got home.
she complained that I did not remind her of taking her homework.
I told her it was her own fault and it was her own responsibility to put the important things in her schoolbag.
She was criticized by teacher that day, but she learned a lesson.
Since then,, she always checks the important things she needs at school before she leaves home.
While making mistakes is a fact of life, parents's responses to mistakes made by their children really counts.
If the children just want to try their own thoughts but they fail, you have to encourage him or her, otherwise, children may become unwilling to try new things.
When I was young, I wanted to know whether someone lived in the radio because I could hear the voice.
So I disassembled the radio into parts.
My parents got mad and they did not allow me to take any electrical equipment apart.
Since then, I felt inconfident in some scientific courses especially when we had to do some experiments with hands.
Allowing children make mistakes will protect their creativity.
After all, parents can not protect their kids forever.
We have to allow children make mistakes to help them to become responsible and creative people.
Of course, we have to set certain boundaries for them___no addiction to drugs, no breaking the law and so on.

Also they may spend therir money unwisely.

While some people have argued that instructor's opinion in different topics like political and social ones have to be concealed due to its aftermaths, others believe that it can benefit students in a number of ways.
To the best of my knowledge, the former view outweigh the latter one based on the following concerns.
There is a little room for doubt that the main function of any teaching institutions is to provide information in assigned courses.
In fact, teachers should concentrate on imparting those information accounts which have been known as school learning curruculum.
Hence, teacher's remarking about others subjects not only can be confusing but also it consumes student their valuable amout of time.

In fact, student less ability to realize deep connotation related to presidential election, as an example, might bored them, in turn, their time can be allocated to educational issue or interesting one.
Moreover, students, especially at younger age, are vulunerable while getting informed from different occurrences in their surrounding area.
In most occasions, they might harbor biased perception  toward a specific issue in politics or society and consequently, act impulsively bassed on their teacher's opinion.

Considering a situation, when a teacher declares his idea in politics openly, students harbor different positions toward teacher's m9indsets without any consideration but based on their relationship with their teachers.
Hence, controversial statements might mislead students and impairt teaching process thoroughtly.
On the other hand, there has been some occasions which freedom in teacher's speaking have its own redeeming features.
First, student's intervention in other materials convey democratic concept.
In fact, freedom dicussion might help them to realize that how to deal with adverse political or social setting .
In addition , it has played a pivotal role in broading their horizeon and as a result, both their mental ability and intellectual skill can be flourished.
Last but not least, student's self confidence will certainly boost if they experience a real situation with the onset of both positve and negative thoughts.
From what has been discussed, the demerits of teacher's opinion disclosure might adversely affect student's learning procss.
As it was mentioned, not only is it time-consuming and confusing but also might mislead them.
However, some free discussion can benefit students mental abilities.

Recently, because of several news cases, a classical debate topic has been brought up again: "Are People today more willing to help the struggling strangers?"

While some individuals consider this statement to be true, I strongly disagree with this statement because people today are more drawn to their own stuff, they are afraid to help others and they tend to work on their own rather than asking for help.
To begin with, people today are more drawn to their own work rather than helping others.
For instance, in the old times, human beings like to live in a big house contaning three or even four generations.

This provides them abundant space to communicate and share their problems with each other, which lead to some family member's caring personality so that they will be glad to help the struggling strangers.
In contrast, people today tend to live in small apartment rooms that only allow no more than 5 people to live in.
As time goes by, people will only care about their stuff and things related to their family rather than some random stranger's issue.
On the other hand, people today are afraid to help strangers because of the possible dangers.

We have seen too many cases in news or even in our real life that a caring, kind teenager tries to help an elderly who is laying in the middle of the road, but in the end situation turns out that the teenager becomes the one who pushes the elderly to the ground.
Moreover, the teenager has to pay hundreds and thousands of fee because of the "sin" he has done.
How can anyone dare to help strangers after seeing cases like this!
Last but not least, More people tend to work on their own rather than asking for help.
As we all know, the modern world is a highly competetant world.
In order to survive, we need to use all our potentials and show no mercy to others.
In this world, hardly do anyone want to share their knowledges with others as it may end as a benefit to others but a bad thing to themselves.
This lead to more and more people work by their own rather than working in groups, which again contribute to people's indifference in modern society.
In conclusion, my opinion about people's indifference today is correct as people today focuses on their own work, they feel unsafe when helping others and they are in favor of working by themselves.
Nevertheless, I hope this situation can be alleviated in near future so the world can become a better place.
People nowadays, whether western or eastern, are increasingly concerned about their own success in the futhre.
However, when it comes to set a goal, public have their different perspective about whether people should follow their ambition or focus on achieving small plans.
Even though many elder people might insist that having a big dream might be more promising.
I am convinced of exactly the opposite that focusing on fulfilling realistic goals is clearly more reasonable than have only a big dream.
First and foremost, focusing on achiecing small plans would make people behave more corrcetly in the way to success.
This is primarily because having many short-term plans means having more deadlines which would make people work harder.
Under the pressure of due days, people would not have time to entertainment and would stick to achieve their own relistic goals.
It is, therefore, clear that people would behave more corrcetly and reasonablely in the progress to success.
On the contrary, if people have only a ambition, they would not have the stress from deadline because the achievement of that big dream is too far away.
Consequently, people might think they still have enough time to finish it in the future and put themselves in the entertainment.
For instance, when I was a freshman in university, I had a ambition to get full GPA in the first term.
However, because I had not any specific plans about how to study for that goal, I thought I could finish my study tasks in the future.
Therefore, I spent most of my term in attending social activites and having entertainment.
At the end of that term, I spent only two weeks in studying all the subjects before final week and I got my worst grades in the whole period of college which is far away from full GPA.
Furthermore, focusing on fulfilling realistic goals would make people more confident which is helpfull in future success.
This is partly pecause achieving large amount of small goals would let people feel the sense of achievement which is important in final dream.
Owing to that, people would firmly believe they can achieve their ambition and become more confident during this process.
In contrast, if people have only a big dream, they would not achieve many goals during the process and would not feel the sense of achievement as well.
Accordingly, they might be even less confident because the final dream is too far which could bocome a obstacle in future success.

Not surprisingly, I am a qualified English teacher and lead an enjoyable and satisfactory life.
Furthermore, parents are more mature and experienced and they can give us constructive and suggestive advice when it comes to choosing careers.
For example, when I graduated from Wuhan University and attended the career fairs, hoping to find a good job, I was really anxious and depressed because I was turned down by numerous companies.
Therefore, I turned to my father for some useful suggestions.
My father told me that do not find job blindly and I have to make some plans in order to stand out in the numerous interviewees.
He helped me clarify the confusing conditions and led me to be an English teacher finally.
Because my father was an experienced math teacher and he knew how to leave a good impression when I attended the interviews.
Thanks to my father, I got the offer ultimately.
What's more, when we choose the similar jobs to our parents', we can conquer the difficulties and obstacles in our careers easily.
It is no doubt that our parents will give us effective and efficient instructions if we do not know the professional problems and questions in our work.
To illustate, if your father is a banker, he will definitely help you a lot in your financial career and tell you the necessary skills in coping with the financial problems.
And a carpenter's son may well know how to make a good piece of furniture out of a piece of wood.
In a nutshell, I strongly recommend children to choose jobs that are similar to their parents' jobs for the above reasons.
Children tend to imitate their parents, our parents are more experienced and we are inclined to conquer difficulties in the familiar field.

With the importance of the high grade for students, some parents started to award their children money because of their high marks.
Some people argue that this is a good idea, while others stand at the opposite side.
Personally, I think the idea is reasonable.
First of all, offering children money for their high marks could help them to discover their interests of studying.

At first children may started to study hard for the money,but during the procedure of making efforts, they may get the confidence from their progress of the grades or the phrase from their teachers and parents.
Keeping this situation for a long time, they may get the interests from their exploring of each subjects.
As a result, they may find their most favorite major or subjects.
In addition, offering money to children could also help them to form a good habit weather in working or studying.
During the process of recieving money, children may get to understand the sense of working for reward.
They will have the motivation to study because of the benefit they get after having a good result.

As a consequence, they will have a habit of studying or working very hard, therefore, it is beneficial because they will form a good habit after they see the absoluter reward because of their hardworking.
Admittedly, some may argue that giving them money for their grades may let them to get some illegal goods or do some wrong things.
Anyway, this problem could be solved by helping them to manage their own money.
Namely, parents could restrict the products they want to buy and have a plan of how much money they could spend for each day, As a result, the problem could be solved.
Therefore, I am still convinced that offering children money is beneficialto them,

The distance to the people we care about is always an important element for the connection between us.
There is a heat discussion about whether being far away has a positive effect or not.
On the other hand, being far away can leave more space for the person you care which can show your respect for him or her.
On the other hand, being far away may has some disadvantageous.
Firstly, if you spend more time having long distance between the one you care about, the friendship may die down gradually.
It is easy to know that if you do not stay with him often, you can not get to know what happened on him recently and what kind of state of mind he is.
Because the person who near him can know the what things he is going through and can has a face to face conversation more often, but you can not.
In that way, he definitely will have more new friends and there will be also less talks with you.
Gradually, once less contact, less communication, the less the topics you can share, as a result, this one you care about just was your friend.
Moreover, this may cause misunderstandings.
Except friends, we also care about our family.
The long distance between you and your parents will really damage your relationship.
To illustrate, there was a period that i did not talk to my dad and always stayed away from him because i did not know what i can say to him for i was so afraid of him.
We kept this state for two months.
And one evening, my mother talked to me that my dad was very confused why i did not even talk to him and he though of thousands of possibilities.
After that, i knew i should tell him what i felt for him.
He was in a big relief when i finally had a conversation with him.
And we are very good now.
He always supports me and help me solve my problems.
I am very glad that i did not stay away from my father because i can feel his warmth when i stay with him.
In the end, we should always stay close to the person we care about for it can strengthen our relationships.
Personally speaking,if my friend wants to get help in study,I would definitely advise him to ask tutor for a favour.
And my reasons are as follows.
To begin with, a tutor is clearly much more professional than me in the teaching field.
Though I am good at study, I just know how to get information from outside ,rather than output them.
However, tutors are different and are skilled in teaching.

For example, toward to the same mathematical question, a tutor can not only tell students the solution to this question,but also the expansion of this question, so that students can figure out the similar question when they meet them next time.
But when it comes to me, I may even have difficulty in working the question.
Second of all, finding a tutor for help means improvement in communication.
Since my friend has to speak with a stranger, he needs to learn how to express his doubts distinctly.
Taking the famous Chinese scientist Qian Xueseng for a instance.
When he was in his childhood, he learned things so quickly that he had so much doubts that can not  solved by himself.
However, since he was only burried in studying, he did not know how to turn to others.
Fortunately, his father brought him a teacher soon.
And thanks to that, he could not only question freely,but also got the opportunity to communicate with others.
And it laid the foundation for his later significant remarks at an academic conference as well.
Had Qian's father not brought him a teacher, he would not have had the skills in talking academically.
Last but not least, helping my friends may result in decline in my own grade.
Because I have to use the limited time both to study and teach, I won't have the same time as before to do papers and review.
And the old saying said that "learining is like rowing against the current",so it may put me on the line of not being the best series.
All in all, the above three are my reasons for employing an adviser.

It is a generally accepted fact that a good education is the cornerstone toward children's future achievement.
However, as the advance of cell phone, online games, and social networking Web site, educating children become increasingly harsh nowadays.
In the first place, there are lots of distraction including computer games undermine the children's occupation on study.
For instance, my little brother is a big fan of computer games, which makes my parents and his teacher highly confused.
He always thinks about the imagine of computer games and how to play the games well in the classes and even when he go to the bed.
Endulging in computer games makes him always have a bad grade and have a bad eyesight.
Eventhough my parents and teachers have been tried a myriad of means including removing the internet in the home, all of these ways not go a long way.
This phenomenon was impossible in the past resulting ino the fact that people that time can have not computer this kind of thing, which enable them study efficiently with a succinct emotion.
Therefore, which the computer become increasingly common in the society, educating children become a harder tast for people.
In the second place, using internet on cell phone and social networking Web site will expand children's outlood, which enable children have their own opinion.
Therefore, it is more difficult to teach children than the past.

In the past when there was no internet, children only know some daily events and basic knowledge; therefore, they will just consider these kinds of things and teachers can just teach some knowledge to the children.
However, when cell phone and social networking Web site come into our life, children can learn more different, modern ideals.
Therefore, they will have their own political perspection and thoughts of news.

This time, to be the educator of children, we need obtain more versatile expertise including the current political knowledge and social knowledge, which equipe us ability to solve the children's questions.
Therefore, it is challenging for educators nowadays.

Eventhough some people think that celll phone, online games and social networking Web site can reduce the difficulty to educate children resulting into the fact that they can use these device to do lots of recreatino without the help of educators.
Nevertheless, I totally disagree with this point.
It is known to all that increasing number of bad people use internet and social Web site to anounce negative information and decieve children.
Therefore, these information period bring more danger for the children.
Therefore, educators have more tasks to teach children how to protect themselves.
To sum up, it is more challending to educate chidren nowadays than the past.
I agree about this idea.

Have you ever draw in the computer by using many fantastic functions?
Have you been spirited by a model of the future airplane in the technology museum?
The answer must be Yes.
My sister and me always draw by using computer and we can built three-dimention pictures.
And once we have seen a plane model in the technology museum.
We are attracted by it and built our own model when we went back home.
Therby, I think technology help children to be more creative than before.
There are two more specific reasons why I think in this way.
Initially, I think the advanced function such as three-dimention can help us create more cubic objects that is difficult for us to draw by hands.
For instance, my sister and I use the three-dimention function in computer; we draw a flower in different facets and color it with thousands of colors to make it more realistic.
We try every funtion to built and color the diverse flowers that we create.
Many weeks later, our parents think that our pictures become more and more realistic and extraordinary.
However, in the past, we can just drew pictures on the paper and create the characters in one facet and color it with twenty four colors.
It seems not novel or beautiful.
Moreover, I think the cutting-edge models in technology museum can provide more details that  spirite us to built our own entique model.
For example, after watched the advaced airplane model on the green.
We went back and imagined our own planes.
We make the arms of the palne birds-like and add the mouth on it.
Though the plane is not practical, but we have meditate and add own ideas.
That technological model make us more creative.

Even though the technological machine such as computer do make many people dulged in playing games and make them awakward, I still think if parents make schedules for their children and control them more, we can avoide that situation.
Taking account of all the factors mentioned above, we may safely arrive the conclusion that technology can make children more creative.

According to a famous german book, The Theory of War, the leadership is a gift which determines one's position.
The writer of this book is the millitary teacher of the king of Germany in the 17th century, and he spent most his life on the battlefield.
So I agree with this statement that leadership comes from one's talent rather than the effort.
On the one hand, the kids can display their leadership when they are very young.
It is the talented leadership that drives a kid to command otehrs to finish a task naturally in a teamwork job.
And it is very common that some children in a group have a quiet strong tendency to lead the whole group and serve as a leader in the cooperation even when they are still in the school.
And I will ultinize a story as an example.
When the chairman Mao in China was a adolescent in middle school, he organized his classmates to defend the Japanese army's attack to their school successfully.
During the battle, the soldiers of Mao were not equipped with any guns or other weapons.
And what they did iwas just taking advantage of the local distrubing of the buildings to trap and mislead the Japaneses under the lead of Mao.
So it can be firmly beliueved that the young can display their natural leadership at the early time.
On the other hand, the adult cannot learn any essential lead skills if he or she is not a gifted one.
The talented leadership will help an adult to get an good occupation as a leader while the adult withou talent will feel afraid when he or she is faced with the public.
There is not doubt that people can learn some skills about leadership by taking leadership courses in the career school.
Nevertheless, the student cannot be a good leader after finishing the classes if he or she does not have any gift.
Especially the student is extremely shy.

With the improvement of people's living standard, the topic of tourism has aroused a heated debate.
When it comes to how to develop tourism, the opinions differ from person to person.
Some claim that hiring more police to guarantee the safety of the city should be taken precedence.
However, contrary to their view comes my perspective that it is the improvement of the appearance of old facilities that is the attraction to tourists.
My point can be well elaborated as follows.
To begin with, only when a city has a marked building can its scenic spots be more likely to make a deep impression on tourists.
To elaborate, the apperance of building and streets is usally regarded as the culture and feature of a country.
If there are so many landmark buildings, the govenment can make it easier for tourists to be involved in the special dail life of the local people.
However, Without a beatiful and well-designed architecture, people might find it difficult to figure out the culture and custom of a country.
Therefore, chances are that tourists could not be immersed in a wonderful envirnment and not to mention a perfect tourist experience.
For example, in our country, there are many old relics being renew with symbol of religion, power and good wishes, which attracts a million people came from other country to admare our culture.
Had not our government built plenty of beautiful building, our country could have not attracted so many tourists.
Second, it is the tiny and well-arranged street that make it pissible for people to go around the city more convinent.
To illustrate, with the tiny street, the government can not only bring the tourists a good envirnment but also make to easier to walk trough one scenior to another.
Nowadays,  as the development of society, kids have much more desire for varies of goods or serivce.
In addition, some parent believed in the offering money for higher grade of their children, is a good way in motive their children of study harder.
However, it is not a very appropriate method in my assessment.
Admittedly, giving money to children do offered them a considerable purchased force to buy whatever they want, which imposed a great motive on children of getting better grade.
however, they do get their good grade, do they actually gain the education they should receive?
Apparently not.
Because when parents say the they are offering money for thier better academic behaviour, they also invisiblely transfered the children's attention from being a better person to gaining more money.

It is a misleading of children's moral view, and it is not beneficial to their future since if they only care about money, instead of remaining the character of simpethetic or considerate or loving, they will become horrible and lack of responsibility, due to the only thing in their eyes is money.

Take the topic in a simpler perspective, what children sre demanding is not always pleasing, for example, if a child wants to buy video game, or even crazy, ciggerette, as they want to experience the sense of smoking they are curioused to, it is horrible, too when having these result.

These examples indicstied that what children want is not always healthy, so it should be considered becareful and give enough education to children of waht they are going to buy in a objective perspective.
At last, I disagree with this view because it can not last very long.
When children already received what they want from the previous reward, they may lack of motive for the next coming exam, incidentally, everything will came back to normal.
In conclusion, I do not think that the idea of giving money to students to stimulate their grade is a good idea and we should think of alternative ideas of encouraging them.
As the world comes into the Internet era,people's demand on the access to the web is getting higher.
As a result,some people may hold the opinion that projects that aims to improve the Internet have priority than those which  improve public transportation in governments' budget.
However,to give my own point,programs that encourage the development of public transportation deserve more financial support.
To begin with,a better net of transportation will undoubtly accelerate the development in the country.
A mature system of transportation such as rail roads and airlines is the foundation of economy.
For example,in the southwestern part of China,the local economy depend heavily on the agricultural products like tea.
However,the development in those area was limited before because of the lack of transportation.
Recently,a series of public roads and rails including the high speed rails has been constructed there.
As a result,more people are able to purchase the products from there witch in turns encourage the increasement of productivity in the southwestern area in China.
Moreover,the transprotation is the bridge of cultural communication.
To illustrate this point,I would like to compare the situation in the past in China with that in the modern.
Several decades ago,communication between provinces even cities was stuck because of the unconvenience caused by poor transportation.
It took people in southern area several days to get to the north by trains.

It is universally acknowledged that any successful team is bound to have a very excellent leader.
Nowadays when it comes to the issue of leadership, different people always hold different opinions.
As for some of them ,they deem that leadership often comes from one's own birth and it is natural.
However, there are also some voices that think the leadership can also be nurtured through a series of efforts.
To be honest, I partly agree with the statement that leadership comes naturally.
The gene may play a role in it, however, that ought not to be the total factor.
During my university life, I took part in the Student Union in my department when I was a freshman.
At that time, I made the acquaintance of a boy called Wei.
He was the same age as me and we got along well with each other.
Actually, he was a shy boy and not very active during every meeting and activities at the beginning.
Later I asked him the reason why he chose to participate in the Student Union with his silent character.
He explained to me that He wanted to make changes about it and would like to spare no effeorts to become more outgoing.
I admired his action and thought it was very inspiring.
Then things became different since that time.
It can be easily seen that he was always the first person to volunteer to do some heavy work in our team in the next period of time.
In addition, he became more courageous during every meeting and often gave his own illustration towards some hard questions.
At first we were all not accustomed to his change.
Nevertheless, we gradually understood him and always try to encourage him.
As a result, he was totally different at the end of semester and was elected to be our team leader in the next term.

According to the example of my friend Wei, I really think that the nurturing after one's birth is also vital and some people have the ability to learn and succeed in becoming a leader although he is not very gifted at the beginning stage.
On the other hand, there is no doubt that those talented people who are doomed to be a leader do exist.
But from my perspective, these people only make up small percentages in our society.
Well goes an old saying, "no pains, no gains."
I am in favor of the view that most things can be achieved through our hard work.
If some people want to beome a leader, he should also pay efforts to accomplish that.
In conclusion, I deem that leadership partly comes naturally and partly derives from our diligence.
Many concern about the education of the younger generation, and there is an certain concern about how to motivate children to keep study and get a good gradem.
Some people may argues that parents should not give their children money as a reward for that would give chilren a bad hint that money is all that matters and then make them money-oriented.

However, I am not with this idea and I contend it's a good way to make them dive into their study, motivating them to try their best in the study and the exams and teaching them how to use money properly.
First, in this way, children have the reason to focus on  their study and keep trying to get a good grades.

There is no denying that todays there are so many interesting things, like all kinds of computer games and TV shows, at least in children's mind, that will distract them from learning and lead to bad grades.
But what if they can get money after they get a goo grade in the exam?
Wondering about all the sweat candies they can get using these money, they just want to get down to study right now!
It's the things they are thirsty for and could be bought with money that motivate them to study.
Second, rewarding them with money can teach them how to manage their own money at the same time, which is a vital ability during their whole life.

To illustrate, my parents always gave me a small mount of money whenever I got good grades in exams, but with money I got each time, I could not buy anything I actually want, like a pair of Nike basketball shoes or some nice T-shirt.
Learning from my mother that I could buy these if I deposited the money I got, I did as she said and finally I bought the awesome shoes.
So tricky a way it is to teach children how to use their money, giving them little money each time.

With the development of the need for the well-educated, it's exactly what's in parents mind to make their children get good grades, enter into the best university and get a promising job latter in their life.
Giving money maybe is not a perfect way to reward children but it can motivate children and teach them to form a good habit of using money.
I think it worths it.

With the development in society, people have a geat amount of need in both public transportation and internet access to bring more convenience for their lives.
So whenever asked whether it is more important for governments to spend money to improve internet access than to improve public transportation, people usually exhibit an air of uncertainty.
However, I wholeheartedly agree that it is more important to spend money to improve public transportation.
First of all, I think public tranportation is a symbol of both the city and the country.
The development of transportation partly reveal whether the nation is wealthy and well-developed.
When people travel in another country, they will absolutely take several types of public transportation in the country, and this will give them the first impression of the country.
Take my British friend's experience as an example.
My friend saul came to Wuhan last summer, and when he arrived in Wuhan, he take the subway right away without waiting for the buses.
And the days after, he traveled almost everywhere in Wuhan by subway.
And the most excellent thing he said was that we have sharing bicycles almost everywhere so that he can go anywhere he likes without traffic jams.
He said that travel in China is very convenience and developed, and he loves China very much.
So I think public transportation do can reveal how the nation is developed.
Then, it's more important to spend money on public transportation because if most people go outside by public transportation, it can do good to our environment.
Nowadays, the global warming is a great issue.
So I think if every person choose to go outside by public transportation, it can decrese the emission of carbon dioxide, which may lead to global warming.
However, people will be willing to travel by public tranportation only when the public tranportation is very convenience, comfortable and cheap.
So government should spend more money to develop the public tranportation in order to save the earth.
Last but not the least, I admit that it is also important to deveop the internet access.
With the development of the accessment of internet, people may have more fun when they surfing the internet.
However, one disadvantage is that when internet access is way too developed, people will not be willing to go outside to feel the nature.
Because they can have a lot of fun just stay inside.
And this is absolutely not healthy for both of their mental and phisical health.
But with the development of the public tranportation, people can go to a lot of interesting places more easily.
And this is great, isn't it?
So, as far as I am concerned, it is more important to spend more money on public tranportation than internet access, not only for individuals but also for the earth.

One thing that all parents concern about is the grade their children get in the school.
In order to improve children's grade, parents figure out several solutions.
Among these solutions, awarding children who get high grade with money seems to be very effective.
However, as far as I am concerned, this is not a good solution.
Firstly, the money reward will give children a wrong attitude toward studying.
Children cannot figure out their true feelings within since they are not fully mature, so they are very easy to influence by their parents.
If the parents award the children when they get high grade, they are supposed to encourage children to do better in the future.
However, children cannot distinguish between the hapiness they gain from the high grade and the one they gain from the award.
They may think their happiness and satisfaction come from the money, and will think that the money is want they want.
If children have the idea that they study becuase of the money, it will not be beneficial for them to pursue big success.
Moreover, this method may induce children to do some bad behavior in order to get high grade.
Sometimes, the children are so eager to have the money, so they may cheat to obtain them.
To illustrate, my cousin is in high school.
His father once told him that if my cousin could get a  certain grade, he would buy him a new phone.
My cousin was so fond of the phone, but he now that he couldn't make it.
To solve this problem, he cheated in the exam, which was discovered by teacher later.
If his father had not garanteed the reward, my cousin have not done this.
It is true that the money can do some good thing to the children.
Some children who do not like studying may begin to study because of the award.
However, it is not the effective method to encourage them to love study, and it may lead to bad behaviors.
Taking into account all the fact above, I disagree with the idea that the children should be rewarded because of their high grade.
To stimulate students' studying interest, parents should find other effective sollutions.

Ok ,now I'd like to talk about whether parents should give their children extra money for their good grades.
First, I'd like to say there are many kind of things can change people's  emotions that can offer  power to go forward.
Such as preassure,hope,scary,and self-control ability.
Of crouse, money can play the same kind of role.
When people have something they want in mind, there is reason for them to work hard to earn this.
So I think if we want to improve our chiildren's behavior in school, it may be a efficient way to reward then moey.
But, we know that every coin has to sides, so what do they lose in this kind of process?
First, the children now know that as long as they get good grades they will get something they want.
So these students know have specific dream that they are willing to work hard for.
But is this what they want?
What about there turly dream?
Aren't there anything that is more important to them to go for?
So I think in some degree, giving them money is to make them be blind.
Who give them they way to go is their parents not themselves.
So, they may lose many wonderful things in their way of life.
Second, the reason that they work hard is that the emotion caused by money give them the power.
If this process repeat many many times, I think their is a tendency for them to come to the emotion  money has brought.
Some emotion comes from thoughts.
Without various emotions, they life maybe less interesting,  and their thoughts may be restricted in some aspects.
So I think if we keep on treat our children in this way, we will lose more than what we gain.
At last, I want to repeat what I have said.
Much power comes from our emotion.
So, I think first we should think about what kind of man we really want our children to be.
All those kind of ways to push them on have advantages and disadvantages.
But I think we shouldn't deny any kind of way, just try each of them, and then let the fact to help us to make the choices.
I believe this will give us a better answer.
I still remember last semester when I finished a computer science project alone and the mixture of a sense of satisfactory and accomplishment I got from it.
I'm convinced that many people will be familiar with this feeling.

So when it comes the question that which methods can let the students learn more effectively when they handle their assignment, I think working alone is a better one because students can learn every aspect of the knowledge and have a better understanding of them.
Firstly, working alone can make the students understand the whole content of the knowledge.
It's common sense that when you work in a group, you don't need to do all the work, what you are required to finish is just part of it.
This condition can also occur when teachers ask students to finish their assignment together.
However, contrary to working together, working alone means you have to do all the work that is related to the project.
Consequently, you can go through all the knowledge and learn to use them to solve the problem, which will result in learning all aspects of the knowledge.
Moreover, you can have a comprehensive understanding of the knowlege and digest them competely when you finish the assignment alone.
Being confronted with problems in the course of dealing with the assignment is common.
When you work in a group, the group member may tell you what's wrong with your work or help you get out of it.
Even though the result is that the problem is solved, because you don't know the theory in it, you learn nothing.
On the other hand, you are supposed to finish the problem on your own when you work alone.
For example, when you are dealing with a math problem.
You use all the theories, examples and methods you have learnt to try to work it out.
When you finish the problem eventually, your math ability increased a lot.
Lastly, even though some people may argue that working together can let the student working on difficult problems or projects of a larger scale, which cann't be done when students work alone.
However, what we are talking now is how to let students learn effectively rather that how to let students work on a bigger project.

In such a state-of-the-art of the education age, people become more likely to pay attention to the education or some academic issues.
Nowadays, there is a issue that what will you do if the teacher or the meeting leader says something oncorrect in your opinion has appeared.
And this problem provoks a highly debate among people.
Some hold that we should interrupt the teacher immediately and correct the teacher's idea on class.
However, as for me, we should wait until the class or meeting is over and people are gone, and then talk to the teacher or meeting leader.
And my reasons are given below.
First and foremost, we should await because we should consider about the feeling of the professors.

Take one of  my relative's experience as an example, my cousin, who just entered the college last year, and in one of his tutor's lecture, which he just potinted out the mistake that contradicted his idea of the tutor on class.
And after that lecture, his tutor's attitude to him became icy because he just made the tutor lose face on class.
Maybe this is the real human nature in our lives.
Thus, we should wait until the class over to discuss these kinds of problems with the professor instead of arguing with the professor rudely.
Plus, we should keep our thinking until the class comes to end because the time is limited and it will interrupt the whole thinking of the tutor.
At most of the time, the time in every single class is limited and precious.

It is not tough for us to guess what will happen if we just argue with the professor on class instead of allowing the professor persue the cadence of the whole class--students will be influenced and interrupted, too.
And this kind of behavior will have some interference in professor's thinking, whcih would cause the class's quality.
Hence, we'd better to keep calm when we find contradictions because we need to concider others.
To summrize, although it is really hard for us to keep calm or keep silent when we find some opinions which just contradicts our idea, we need to concern others' feeling in the situation.

Whether older people need to learn new things is always a heated debate topic in the society.
Some people think older people don't need to learn, however, in my opinion, it is still important for older people to keep learning.
My points can be elaborated as fellow.
First of all, to keep learning helps older people to live a happier life.
Learning can bring changes to their life.
The knowledge is not important anymore, and what matters is getting into new environment and meeting new people.
The new things keep older people away from loneliness, so they can live a full life as before.
Onthe contrast, some people have been tired of learning, thus they think when they retire, they don't need to learn anymore so they can relax.
But when they really retire, their life become so dull that they cannot bare it and they turn to learning new things.
For example, many older people go to adult college.
They don't really need the degree, but they feel full and happy in the school.
Even though their memory is not as good as before, it doesn't affect their study at all.
They can discuss with their classmates, and enjoy the process of learning.
Moreover, to keep learning helps older people to keep a clear mind.
Older people usually suffer from bad memory, and it become the excuse for them to stop learning.
However, when they stop learning, they find their memory decrease even faster.
Because of the structure of brain, we need to use it frequently to keep it active.
To sum up, older people still need to learn.

Currently ,a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate-whether the government is supposed to hire more police to ensure safety or improve the appearance by improving the old buildings and streets.
Opinions vary from individual to individual.
Some people disagree with the proposal.
Nevertheless, I hold a favorable view to this idea.
My view can be elaborated as follows.
First of all, the public tend to be in favor of those places of interest with good safety conditions.
To be more specific, all people take safety as a priority, and all of their activities are done on the basis of a safe environment.
If the government is capable of hiring more police to lower the criming rate, the public will have a better sense of safety, as a consequence of which, they will be more willing to visit this place.
In contrast, how can the government have a wish that more visitors will come there even if the tourists's own safety can not be guaranteed?

A research conducted by Harvard University is a good case in point, in which scientists investigated the number of visitors abroad coming to America for travelling after the 9.11 terrorist attack, aiming to find out the connection between safety of a place and its popularity.
It turned out that the number of visitors abroad declined nealy one of two comparing to before.
Furthermore, good appearances of the old buildings and streets are much more attractive for tourists.
To further illustrate my point, pursuing beauty is a character of every one of us.
All of us have a preference to beautiful things because they are a good feast for ou eyes.
So it is no doubt that people will go to those beautiful places to appreciate the beauty of the old buildings and streets.
In contrast, people will have a negetive emotion when visiting worn-out buildings.
For example, my family once made a schedule to travel during winter.
After discussion, we made a decision to go to Hainan Province because there are lots of beautiful places of interest like beaches, seas and so on.

Actually, the trees dotted with flowers, the sunlight playing on the surface of the sea, the grand buildigns kept us so spellbound that we could hardly tear our eyes away from those charming sceneries.
It is crystally clear that improving the old buildings and streets is a wise alternative.
In conclusion, in order to attract visitors, the government should hire more police to guarantee safety and improve old buildings and streets.
This is not only because that the public put the safety at the first place, but also people tend to be in favor of grand and wonderful buildings and streets.

The increase in development of technique in brings about a tend towards individuals' daily life that becomes more busy and hatsle because people are supposed to accomplish a number of assignments in order to rise their livng standards.
So under these circumstance, everyone are busy with doing so many different things, will it decrease their working efficieny and enable them to do very  few things well.
Take the high debate into considerartion, many people agree with the statement because there are tight time for them to finish too much work, which leads them to work in a hurry.
However, I strongly disagree with the viewpoint, and my reasons are as follows.
First of all, accomplishing many various work is beneficial for individuals to nourish some skills.
And these capacities can also help them in other feilds, which means that their abilities can bring about some unexpected consequences.
For instance, my father worked as a cheif at a restaurant called Happy Dinner.
In his daily life, he was busy with cooking some decilious food for guests.
But in some days, these is no waitress offering service for these guests, so my father had to play host to them.
After these experience, it can successfully help my father to shape his personality because he became more enthusiatic and positive.
Therefore, he was promoted due to his good charater, and he will make full use of these merits in his wokring life.

On top of that, it is extremely valuable for people to contact with diverse fields by doing many different things, and it dose npt surprise us to discover that people will socialize with many numerous people with different background.
Therefore, it is a  favourable opportunity for them to communicate with eath other and learn some great experience form other during the working time.
Admittedly, it is true that if people are busy doing so many different things, they will be disturbed and will meet a lot of problems and challenges during woking.
So finally, they must do really few things well.
However, if people can have the chance to finish many work and go through some challenges, they will be more persistent, which can help them succeed eventually.
To put all into a nutshel, I have a profound conviction that people are busy doing many things will help more to succeed instead of do few thing well

However, the attitude, which is important for human to understand others efficiently, can not be seen when people watch the screen.

Second, to communicate in person benefits the cooperation because it can build up the relationship between the members.

Thus the cooperation would become more efficiently.

We spent the whole week to discuss but we finished nothing.

Nowadays, job has become a hot issue in our society because so many college students cannot find jobs.
Some people hold a view that college students should select jobs which are much same as their parents' jobs.
However,other people think that college students should select jobs totally different from their parents ' jobs.

In my opinion, I totally agree with the idea that it is much better for college students to select jobs that are much same as their parents' jobs than to select jobs different from their parents' job.
My reasons are as following:
Firstly, it is much easier for college students to participate in their parents' company.
As we know, it is more difficult for colleges students to find out a job under strong competition.
If college students choose jobs which are similar to their parents' jobs,they cannot worry about their jobs any more.
For instance, my  classmate of high school, Xiaohong, chooses a job in medical field,which is similar to their parents' jobs.
Now, she has already joined in a famous hospital in which her parents work.
She lives in a happy life with high salary.
On the contrary,my another classmate of high school,Xiaoming,selects a job different from their parents ' jobs,he does not find out a job until now.
Secondly,it is much convenient for college students who participate in their parents' company to get higher position.
Nowadays relationship in our society is very important.
If college students participate in their parents' company,they can attract more attention from leaders than other peers.
Naturally, he can get a quick promotion.
For instance, my collegues,working in the same company with her parents.
She got much attention from our leaders and have a more rapid promotion than us.
Thirdly,college students who join in their parents' company can get more knowledge than other peers.
If college students work in the same company with his parents,it means that he can obtain more care such as learning more knowledge than other collegues.
For example, my sister's collegue work in the same company with their parents, more experienced people who have good relationship with his parents are willing to teach extra knowlege for him.
For my sister, other experienced people are not willing to help her.
In conclusion, it is much better for college students to select jobs that are much same as their parents' jobs than to select jobs different from their parents' job.

If their children want money, the only way they can earn money is to get a good grade in school.
They can use the money do whatever they like.
So that it is another motivition for them to study hard in school.

Although there are a lot of different kinds of exams in school and it contains important and not so important exams, it means that if their children get good grade in every test, they should give them a plenty of money.
However, if the students indeed do that, it reflacts their children's condition in school so that they work hard every day.
