The key is not that how much money they give but their children work hard in school.
How to effectively motivate students in studies has always been a difficult problem for both teachers and parents.
Some people suggest that offering money to school-age children for good grade can do the job.
However, from my perspective, I strongly disagree with this idea.
Firstly, it can give the young people the wrong idea that hardworking is just for money.
There is no denying that good grades in school can further beneifit people financially after they start to work.
But studying is definitely more than just money.
scientists work hard because they want to discover the secrets of universe.
Policemen work hard because they want to protect people from evil.
They will not think about money when they are doing their jobs.
If they do, the whole world will be in a total chaos.
Secondly, students may fail to focus on long-term goal when their works are not rewarded in real lives.
Study is the kind of thing that requires long-time effors with little feedbacks.
In an actual job position, one person may do a lot of things without other noticing him.
When this kind of situation is happening, people tend to wonder why they are doing so many seemingly meaningless works.
People can easily lose their long term goals in the process of working and then fail in their career.
So children should be taught to focus on long-term goals even though there is no feedbacks at all in the process.
Lastly, interest should the best teacher for children.
Take myself as an example, when I was learning tennis at school-age, I could practice 5 hours a day because I love it.
But when I was learning English, I barely can sit in front of desk for 1 hour even though I was offered money .
So to motivate students in studies, to stimulate children's interest should be the most consideration in teaching.
In summary, giving money to students in exchange of high grade is totally bad idea because it is not an effective way, it turns children in to money-oriented and it may make children focus

As the school-age children are often taking more and more exams at school, the question whether to offer children some money for high grades they get in school is a highy debated one.
On the one hand, some people think that giving money is adverse to children because they may spend money on some books or toys which may become a distraction.
On the other hand, others contend that the money offered to the children may serve as an encouragement.
In my opinion, it is a good idea to offer some money to children if they get good grades.
Above all, as an old saying goes: interest is the best teacher.
It is knowen to all that children hate examinations, and they may get bored with school if they experience a lot of exam paper.
However, if the parents can give the childre some money for award, the children may become more interested in study.
For example, when I was younger, my mother just did the same thing.
If I can get on to the top 3 of the class, I will be given 100 yuan.
I was glad about it and studied very hard.
Finally, I achieved this goal and receive money from my mother.
As you can see, this idea is good because the money can act as a kind of motivation, which can encourage children to go further.
Moreover, giving money to the children in young age can help them develope a good habit of using their own money.
In this way, the children can gradually understand that every coin of money is hard to gain, just like the fact that the high grade is also hard to get.
The young children can cherish their own properties and make a good use of their money.
Admittedly, the money given to the children may become a sort of disatraction.
The children may use it to buy some comic books or toys, which they may read or play with in the class.
However, what if the children use the money to buy some textbook or they donate the money to the charities?
It is sure a good opprtunity to cultivate the children's positive view of the world.
In conclusion,  the wise parents can use the money to educate the children and to creat a brighter future for them.
The money not only bring the children happiness and encouragement, but also gives them a good view of the world.
So I think it is a good idea to offer children some money if they get good grades.

In my opinion, it would be better of children to develop the decision making ability.

For example, when I was young, I would always depend on my parents to make a dicision for me, becuase I thought the choise they made would be the "best choise".
So I slowly depends on my parents instead of taking care of my own business.
In fact, letting other make decision for you would not benefit you becuase you are closing your mind.
At last you will find it is very hard to make a decision for youself.
Second, making your own decision can motivate children's self confidence.
For instence,once they made a decision and got a good result at the end, with out doubt they will feel proud of themselves and have a sence of self-accomplishment.
I made my own decision in my life at the age of eight of the first time.
I was wondering about what should I do with the money my parents gave me.
They told me to manage the amount of money and use them wisely.
I thought of a long time, finally decided to buy a birthday gift of my grandmother.
Although some people argued taht children are not mature to make their own decisions,it is still a very essential  experiense they have in their life.
No one will always make the right decision, children can learn form they dicision.
All in all, it is very improtant forr children to have the ability to make their own decisions.
Should parents offer their children in school money for each high grade they get?
I'll say yes and no, it really depends, and here's why.
Yes it could be a really good reward for children getting good grades.
It could be a really encouraging thing for children to work even harder.
Another huge benefit in ty opinion, is that this might help building up a sense of doing a real job for the children - you work harder, you get paid more.

I can still remember how hard I was studying before the tests every time since my mom would usually promise me to offer some money if I get a considerably good grades in unit tests back in my middle school days.
However, there are some potential disadvantages of paying money for good grades.

This might make kids studying just for the sake of money, instead of studying actually for getting more knowledge and preparing for their future - to put it simple, this may create a wrong value of study for them, especially when parents give their kids too much money.
In this case, kids might find a way to get around with it - they might do cheating around during the tests, copying others work just for getting good grades instead of actually study harder.
I saw quite a few classmate doing that at school before, and this is absolutely wrong, they're not only fooling their parents but also fooling themselves.
Which lead to the conclusion, rewarding for high grades could be good or bad, it really depends.
But in my opinion it's a good way to push children to study harder, but, again, it really needs further guidance from parents side.

Children really shouldn't study just for the sake of physical rewards, parents should guide them to see the real spritual joy and meaning to their future of academic studies, offering money for good grades is just a little "side boost".
Educatioan as a hotly-discussed topic, there are many methods to help children improve themselves, as far as I am concerned, I disagree that parents reward their children get high mark.

Paents all hope their children can have a good grades, thus some parents may think give money to children could inspire them study, because when you have a gift that you want to get, you must try you best to get it.
But as we all know, it is vital to find children's creation and invention in their studies.
These two ability are important to their future's life, if one person were eqipped with two ability, he will find there are something more value than grades.
For instance, my brother whose study is well but his parents never give her any rewards, his parents always told him, you must find yourself in study process, don't pay a lot of attention on results.
I think it is yourself not other external things could help you success.
If you give money for each high mark, some students may have a immaturity opinion, they will focous more on their results, and in order to achieve their aims they might do something dangerous.
As good parents, we must cultivate chilren's good view to things, since parent's have a significant influence to their children.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a debate among people: whether people should follow their dreams even if the dreams are ambitious.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some claim that people should focus on achieving realistc dreams.
Nevertheless, contrary to their views comes to my perspective, it is following ambitious dreams that is more worth doing, especially when the following reasons are mentioned.
To begin with, following ambitious dreams can make us make more progress in our studying.
It is largely due to the fact that our ambitious dreams will be a guideline, which can give us scores of motivations.
In this case, we may have more energies.
Consequently, we can make more progress than others.
By contrast, had we did not had an ambitious dream to guide us, we would lost our ways.
Thus, studying cannot attract our interests.
How could we make more progress if we concentrate our attentions on studying?
For example, my friend Jack is a creative people.
He wants to be an expert in English.
Thus this goal always encourage him to step forward.
In this case, he ues all of his time to study English, like reciting, singing English songs and watching English movies.
Consequently, he get a huge progress and was admitted by an English language school.
On top of that, following ambitous dreams can make the country would be more strong.
The primary reason for this is that, if the teenagers both pursue their dreams, they would work for it and become specialists in their area, thus the country would be more strong.
For example, In USA, their children always follow thier heats, and most of them clearly know what they need to do.
Thus, they work for it, and thier ambitious dreams guide them to be experts in their areas.
Therefore, USA has diverse of experts, and their country becom strong.
To put into a nutshell, I reckon that we should follow our ambitious dreams.
Nowadays, a considerable number of people, holding the idea that people today are not as helpful as in the past, claim that people today are more selfish and only care about themselves.
However, I don't agree with their opinion.
From my perspective, people in our modern society are more willing to help others who are in trouble, and I will demonstrate the two reasons in the following contents.
There is no doubt that some people today are kind of selfish.
They only care about those things which they can benefit from, and, as a result, never cast a glance at people who are helpless.
In fact, it is the revealing of those people's actions that bring us the impression that people today are selfish.
However, the quantities of people who are willing to help others are by no means less than in the past.
Firstly, the main reason to support my opinion is that more people nowadays have the ability to help others.
As we know, people all over the world are becoming wealthier as the development of scientific and technological progress, and most of us don't need to struggle for live.

The expense of helping others become less a problem to us, so whem we find someone else around us is in trouble, we are mostly willing to give him a hand, while in the past, helping others might means having no money for food for a few days.
Another factor to support my opinion is that we have more chances to help other today.

As the development of television and Internet and many other media, we can easily know the news such as somewhere occurs an earthquake or other disasters and many people there are in the shortage of food to eat and tents to live.
As most of us are willing to show our sympathy, we would like to donate some money or some clothes for them.
For example, when we heard that an really shocking earthquake destroyed to areas in Sichuan, China several years ago, most people in my class choose to donate our pocket money for them.
However, in the past, without advanced Internet and Television technique, it may have been after several months before we finally heard the news, and we even don't have the chance to help others.

In a nutshell, what we have mentioned above, when taken together, are in favor of the point that people today are more willing to help strangers who are in struggle not only for the reason that we are more wealthy, but also

Recently, a controversial topic has triggered a heated debate among people: whether people would spend less time cooking and preparing foods in 20 years than they do today.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some claims that people would spend more time doing this.

Nevertheless, contrary to their opinions comes to my perspective, it is less time that would be spent by people to cook and prepare foods in 20 years, especially when the following reasons are mentioned.
To begin with, there would be more high technology cooking tools in 20 years, which would resulting people spend less time.
It is largely due to the fact that  in 20 years, there would be more high techology artificial tools.
Because of the convinient tools, it can largely shorten the cooking time.
Thus, people will spend less time.
By contrast, how could the time be saved if we only have the primitive cooking tools?
For example, when I was 10, I lived in the rural region with my grandparents, which only have the primitive cooking tools.
When we cooking meals, we would set fire and add the wood fuel to the fire.
It is very inconvinient.
On top of that, the public transportation would be developed better than now, which can also decrease the cooking and preparing time.
The primary reasons for this is that if we have a more convinient transportation, we can have more vehicle options.
In this case,we can choose a more swift vehicle to buy my vegetables.
Thus, we can save our preparing time.
On the contrary, if we have a not advanced transportation,  we could probably involed in a traffic jam.
How could we save our time if we waste too much time on the road?
For example, In my hometown, we have subways and swift buses and taxi.
Thus I can choose one of them to buy my food vegetables.
But what if am I in a countryside?
I can only choose to walk to prepare or ride my bike.
To put into a nutshell, I maintain that people will spend less time cooking and preparing foods in 20 years.
I do not think it's a good idea to reward children money for their high grades.
Because it's esay to corrusp their ideas on money, and may envoke their harvings for money.
What's worse, they may think their goals of study are money making rather than accumulating knowledge and ability growing.
That will change their meaning of study.
On the one hand, giving money to children for their good grades can totally affect their opinions towards money.
They will ignore how difficult their parents earn money,and waste money aimlessly----for that they can "earn" money easily just by getting good grades.
One of my friends once told me that his parents gave him money to reward him for his good drades,and he bought lots of useless games, which was very bad to his study.
Soon he became less superior.
Besides, many classmates thought it was unfair that they didn't get extra money for the marks, and asked for that as well.
That was a disaster to all of our parents.
On the other hand,  children who receive huge amount of money don't have the ability to manage it well, and they will ask for more money, which is a terrible result.
Another classmate of mine also enjoyed this policy waste money on clothes,  make-ups and other meaningless things.
Once she ran out of her money, she would ask her parents for more extra money.
Hearing her promising another number one, her happy parents willingly gave her more money, which was soon sent to shopowner's hand.
What's more, this behavior creats a misleading idea----children think that they are making money by studying.
I am not against the Nobel Science Prize winners, but I have to claim that the aim of study is not money making, absolutely.
Now those children above mostly think their aim of studying is making money.
They forget why they entered a school, as well as why they are having a class.
The initial goal of their parents is to encourage their study, isn't it?
To som up, it's not a good idea.
In our contemporary era, where the intensity of competition has risen to dramatical proportion, there has emerged a number of big enterprises that have a huge influences on the society in many ways.
People are curious of how have such big enterprises started from zero and grown to what they are now.
The answer to the question is the people who founded those enterprises.
What they have in common is that they all have great leadership.
I disagree with the statement that leadership comes naturally:one cannot learn to be a leader for the following reasons.
Firstly, the majority of great leaders of great companies start from scratch, and in their early life they experienced difficult times and they manged to get through them.
It is the experience of early time suffering that makes them mature,which gives rise to their later success.

I do not believe that those leaders were born with leadership and my opinion is justified by the fact that not until in the middle or late age did some of  those leaders become successful, such as Larry Ellison, the founder of Oracles and Jeff Bezos, the founder of Amazon, both of whom started their own business from their middle age.
Secondly, nowadays, there are a lot of leadership programs that aim to discover young talents and equip them with various leadership trainings for future use.
If those selected young talents were born with leadership,what is the point of launching such programs ?
why not just hire them ?

Moreover, During  leadership training process, young talents are often assigned tasks to complete and may be asked later to perform presentation to analyze what they have achieved through the given task and what improvements they should make in order to do a better job.
All of these things prove that leadership has to be trained.
To sum up, leadership is cultivated by combing practices with some theories.
Only by having plentiful experiences and  ups and downs can one truely realize what leadership really is.
Hence, it is fair to claim that leadership does not come naturally.
I don't think it's a good idea for parents to give money to their school-age children for each high grade they get in school, and here I'd like to present my opinions.

Firstlly, this behavior looks more like a trade between parents and children, which will make the child think he or she is studying for their parents, not themselves, it will make the child short-sees and will mix the true meaning of study.
Next, I don't think most children know how to use the money correctly.
They may use the money to do something bad, which can not be controlled by parents and may also be harmful to the children.
Knowing how to spend money is much more important than just having money.
Last but not the least, money is something too cold, it won't show any heat of parents to the child.
If the parents really want to award the children, I think instead of giving money, they can try some other things like a family trip, a visit to his or her dream university and so on.
These are something more meaningful which can also be a treasure memory.

I still remember I once got a good grade when I was a little girl, my parents took me to the local university, and I had a talk with the students there, which made me had a more specific plan of the future, and encouraged me a lot.
I can never forget the smilling face I had that day.
Above to all the reasons I have presented, I consistently believe that offerring money to school-age children for each high grade they get in school is not an appropriate behavior.
Children do need award for their excellent performance in school, but how to award is really a difficult thing that need parents to think carefully.
In my opinion,this is a good idea that parent give their school-age children money as presents for their high grade.
First,we should give them something when they get high grade with thier effort.
It is important to teach them that the gain of everything requires effort and if you spend time on something,you can really get a lot from what you do.
To give them some money represents that we encourage them to work hard and we like them to do it.
Second,there is no doubt that we should teach our kids how to use money early.
We will give them money to let them control without our command,so why not we teach them to control money earlier.
If we give them the money,they will know the power of money when they are young.
It is known that kids should learn to manage their money from childhood and then they would not waste money to do something bad.
We can give them some guidance to help them use the money they get,but we should not make decision for them,they should learn to make desition by themselves instead.
We can not forget that this is ou Finally,I want tosay that we can give them some money but we can not give them a lot of money.
They are school-age children without the ability to have too much money.
And we can not only give them money to praise their high grade.
We should always communicate with them and help them to know what they did is perfect and what they did should be improved.
Having a glimpse on whole socity, job is highly important for everyonw because it is essential part in our life.
What ability can help us reach our achievement on job?
The ability to adapt to new work environments or high degree of excellent knowledge for the job?
For me, I am keep tune that these two abilities have value on our future career's success.
In the first place, the ability to communicate with employees can help us obtain more opportunities.
For instance, my mother is a layer who has strong knowledge background on law.
However, she almostly could not get any case in the past because she was too shy to communicate with others, which made nobody know her and no one know her ability.
Gradually, my mom frequently attented her company's party and talk with her co-worker about some current popular law events, which leted this a new group embrace her.
Gradually, her boss learns her abiliy on law and introduce lots of cases to my mom.
According to my mom's ability to communicate with her co-workers and finally became a successful lawyer.
I learn that embracing professional knowledge is far not enough and the ability to adayp to new work environments have same priority as excellent knowledge for the job.
Secondly, the ability to adapt new job pattern is same important as high degree of excellent knowledge for the job.
For, example.
I work in a computer company after I graduate.
However, I can not adapt this work condition although I have excellent knowlegde on computer science since this company requests us work in high efficiency without any erros.
In this way, I always can not finish my work tasks because I have not been requested like this when I studied in university despit I have good knowledge for the job.
Furthermore, I find that some co-workers who knowledge for the job is weak but have high efficiency to work can get higher salary than me.
Therefore, I find that I need to adapt this higher work pattern and do not make mistakes rather than get stronger knowledge for this job if I want to make my future achievement.
To sum up, the abilites to adapt to new work environments such as commuinicating with others and adapting work strence are same imporant as high degree of excellent knowledge for the job.
In recent ten years in China, from our media, we always can see the news on the website title which includes the word "Peng Ci".
"Peng Ci" is a fresh word created by our web.
It means that some strangers are pretending to have trouble and if some kind people to help them, they put all the wrong things on that person and ask for money.
After having seen these kind of news, people are becoming less likely to help the struggling person because they don't want to be in trouble.
Therefore, in my opinion, I disagree that people today are more willing to help the strangers in a help need.
The reasons are following;
Firstly, it is the trust between the helper and the trouble stranger.
The people who wants to help do not believe the strangers any more.
When they are in face of some one in trouble, the first thing they are  considering is whether the people is in fraud.
Then, they will be more likely to choose a protect way, which is,  ignoring it and quickly going away.
Secondly, the moral of people seems to decrease compare with the past.
People becomes more intelligent  but less friendly.
Thirdly, it is rules of our society.

They just do it.
Therefore, as a highly educated student, what we need to do is following thier feets and believe our kindness.
All in all, love can spread from every corner in the world by our kind behaviors.

With the society development, social competition become more and more fierce.
many people want to be like others who are succeed.

Whatever you work in a company or study in the university, friends always are essential ingredients in our life because they may bring us happiness, acadamic help or phycological help.
Which kind of friends are more important for us?
Friends who can make us happy or friends who can give us help?
In my opinion, I definetly keep tune that we are supposed to make friends who can give us help.
In the first place, friends who can give us academic help enable us have a good grade in university, which pave the cornerstone for our future success.
For instance, I always failed in chemistry in the high school because no one of my friends could give me help on this subject.
However, when I attented in the university, my best friend, Daniel who was a genius on chemistry always studies with me.
This way, when I could not understand some chemical reaction or laboratories , I could directly asked help from Daniel.
Then, he might send me his note book or explain the process for me.
Based on Danel's help, I figured out all problems in chemistry.
Finally, I got grade A in the final exam and got a massive scharlorship in mastery.
Therefore, making friends who can provide help to me never fail to create more opportunities for me in the future.
In the second place, to make friends who can communicate with us can help us escape from the daily grind.
I can use my brother',James, experience studying in America to illustrate this opinion.
When James studied in the university, he always felt nervous and could not sleep in the night because of the massive workload and frequent exams.
Luckly, later he met his best friend Jane.
Following, they always communicated with each other.
Jane sometimes talked some happy experience about travelling all of world and usually went to the movie theater with James.
Gradually, James felt happy and forget the negative events in life.
Jane's help solve my brother's phycological problems and help him embrace a happy life in the university.
Thus, it is highly important to make friends who can give you help.
However, some people claims that it is more important to make friends who can play with us and bring us happiness.
I totally disagree with this point owing to the fact these friends will only distract us from studying.
For instance, when I studies in high school, I always can not finish my homework because all of my friends were big fan of computer games and we always played computer all the time.
In this condition, although I felt happy, I got a bad grade on all subject.
Thus, in order to recover the enthusim for study, I never played with them.
After that, I falled in love with study again.

To sum up, it is highly important for us to make friends who can give you help on academic and physiology because we can get a good grade and physical healthy instead to make friends who can only have fun with us.

During the class or the meeting, if your teacher or leather help you correct your mistake, what should you do?
Will you choose to interrupt the class or the meeting and correct your mistake in advance?
Will you talk to your teacher or leader after the class or the meetingï¼Ÿ
Or will you say nothing?

As a student like, I will chhose to waiting util all the students are gone and then ask for my teacher patiently, because this is a kind of respct to my classmates and teacher and I can get help from my teacher slowly in order to get more information.
Asking teacher after class in a way to respect our teachers and classmates.
If we correct our mistake right away, we will disturb our class.
Thus, not only the teacher's mind will be interrupted, but also have a giant influnce on our classmates' mind.
For example, one year ago.
I have experience a same circumstance.
But I did a really unwise choic.
I actually interuptted the class and debated with my teacher.
I thought I did not have fault, but my teacher thought I had a mistake.
So the whole class stopped continuing.
After this thing, I felt really guilty.
I didi not respect my teacher and even damaged the whole class.
So the first choic is really incorrect.
But, if we say noning, we will be regarded that we are indifferent to our teacher and do not willing to listen to our teache's advice.
It may cause a kind of misunderstaning and also not a respectful behavior to our teache.
Also, I can have more time disccuss with my teacher after the class.
If we do this on the class, we will only have a few minutes.
So do that after class is better.
Take myself as an exmple.
When I meet some difficult during the class I will take thoes questions in my mind or write on the paper.
And then I will ask the teacher when thay have some spare to help.
Therefore, I will have a deep discussion with my teacher.
And the effect is really obviouse.
My all questions will be solved, and I can also get some additional information.
And my scores are increased apparently in a few months.
So I will choose the middle one.
After all, waiting until the class is over , and then talk to the teacher is better.
Because it is considered as a repect to our teacher and we will get more information.
And we will not cause some misunderstanding.

Teachers are always seen as the indispensible part in the society and they are regarded as the influential people who dedicate their lives to the education.
It seems that they should always been respected and appreciated, however, nowadays some people point out that teachers are no more that valued compared to the past.
I hold the same opinion.
To begin with, students no more appreciate the teacher's value that much for teachers are no more the only source from which students can get the information and knowledge.
In the past, without internet and higher educated parents, teachers are the main source for the students to get educated.
People's eagering to gain the knowledge made the teacher most valuable people in the society and help them gain a high social status.
Nevertheless, things change over years.

With the development of the society, students have more choices to gain the knowledge, they realize they can surf the internet for some specific and professional ideas or ask their highly educated parents for help.
Students' not relying on teachers make the teachers less important, thus leading to they are less likely to be appreciated and valued.
In addition, students now are more independant and comfident than before, making the moral regulations seems less important.
In the past, students were always taught by their parents to respect their teachers.
In their minds, it's more like a moral virtue,so they even regarded teachers as the authority, thinking everything they said were right.
But nowadays, the society become more open and there is less moral restriction between teachers and students.
Stuedents are allowed to discuss in the class, ask question right in class, and even point the mistakes of the teachers.
Some of the students even have a reverse mind, they deliberately disagree with teachers in class.
Without moral restrictions, teachers are no more a singal of authority, and of course they are not been valued like before anymore.
To sum up, the importance of the teachers differs as the time changes.
Although we have to admit that teachers still play an important role in the society, but it's obvious that they no more play a indispensible and necessary part as before.

The public casts strong interests on personal working experiences, along with work has become a common topic in modern society.

The increasing concerns over what sort of work people are busied with in their working time has brought about a heated discussion on their working preference to variety of tasks or the similar works in their workday.
Some hold the opinion that the former makes more sense, for the reason that it can refresh the worker's mind, and provide them with more opportunities to learn in their position.
However, in my opinion, similar tasks make expertise and gurantee the high effeicency of work.
The reasons are illustrated below.
Firstly, expertise always concentrates on one specific filed no matter it refers to study or work.

If you want to make yourself outstanding in your position, the only way to prove yourself is to make contribution and devotion to it, rather than show how proficeiency you are at printing and speaking if you are an editor, or how excellent you are at making excel, word or powerpoint if you are a salesman.
A variety of work will destroy the growing time for the worker in this position, in another word, it is a waste of time for expertise.
Secondly, high effieciency is essential for a company to promote and develop.
There is no doubt that the more a person concentrates on his business, the higher the efficency will be.
On the contrary, a person with a variety of tasks can hardly focuses on his work, he will be disturbed now and then if he has to handle different type of tasks in workday.
And ultimately, he finishes all things in hand with no gurantee on high quality and high effeciency.
Clear define on the duties of defferent position is necessary, and that is also the reason for workers to choose their occupation carefully, that this the way for them to accomplish their value.

I have to admit various tasks can also cultivate a person's muti-task ability, but it is hard for the work to grow and promote in a company, because they cannot concentrate on their own work, which means they donot have enough time to learn what they want.

In summary, employees are pleased to do similar tasks all day long for this is how they make themselves expertises in their filed and how they can realize their self-value in the society, even though a variety of tasks can help them refreshed from all-day similar task.

At present, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among the students: is the ability to maintain friendship with a small number of people more important than the ability to have new friends easily.
Answers vary from one to another.
Some people claim that the ability to make new friends is of great importance.
However, contrary to their views comes my own perspective that the ability to maintain friendship is more critical and this ability can definitely decides our happiness.
My point of view is based on the following reasons.
At first, those persons with whom people choose to maintain friendship must be someone important to people, which can definitely decide people's mood and temper.

To be more specific, the reason why we always choose to have a long-term relationship with a paticular group of people is that  we see them important for they have a good understanding of what we like and dislike.
Since both sides know each other better, people can get along easily and enjoyably.
For example, Amy is my classmate of high school.
Unlike other classmates who don't contact me any more after graduation, Amy has still kept touch with me after college since we all totally knew each other.
I like strawberries while Amy likes mangos.

We know the advantages and disadvantages of both sides so there is always harmonious atmosphere among us. ,On the other hand,when it comes to making new friends, it's hard to have such nice experience since people don't have a good understanding.
Admittedly, the ability of making friends  easily is important as well for it could enlarge our social network and then broaden our horizon.
However, this ability cannot bring longlasting happiness to people because all of these new friends are just casual acquaintances.
People don't have a deep understanding with them, which means that they don't share common interest and hobby.
It's difficult to generate pleasure between each other.
In conclusion, the ability to maintain friendship with a small group of people seems to be more important than that of making new friends.
With the development of society, people always argue whether the young people should make their life well planned and well organized.
Some people might say we only live for once, so just enjoy the life we have and do not think too much.
Others might say young people must gain the ability to make a plan and organize his or her life.
As far as I am concerned, I agree with the latter.
First, young people should make a plan for their study.
As a young student, Learning to organize his or her study objects is essential because that is the most efficient way to improve their academic performance.
For instance, my cousin is resourceful, however, he is lazy and does not plan for his study.
There is one time he needs to prepare his final tests, but he merely plays the videos games and let the time goes by.
He at the end fails in that test.
He regrets for what his behavior and the next final test he makes his review plan and follow his plan, he gradually won the first place.
Second, young people should have the ability to organize in order to show the leadership impact to gain more oppotunity.
Without the oeganization, the people will not be gathered like the sandstone in the beach.
And if you have the ability to organize  scores of people you might have more chances to succeed.
For instance, my mom once was only a normal student in her class.
One day his teacher had to chose a monitor in her class.
And a lot of people decided to run the election.
The assignment the techer gave was to decorate the whole class.

Every body except my mom chose to decorate by themselves, and my mom, she chose to have dozens of people to clean the class first, and have the rest of the people to paint the blackboard and  put some decoration on every person's desks.
The teacher saw what my mom did, and in the end she chose my mom to be the monitor.
The ability of organization will kame you unique among the ordinary people and will let you have more chances to succeed.
I admit some people might say it is also good to live right now and enjoy the life we have.
However.
I would like to say the good life you have is only temporary if you do not prepare for the rainning day.
The preparation is the prerequisite for good life.
So the ability of plan and organization is critcal for the young.
To conclude, the young people must learn to plan and organize.
There are a large number of people who are content not to know what is happening in the world around them .

But since we live in the mordern age of globalization ,and the fact that we are so intensely connected with each one makes it imperative  that people should grasp events even if they are not related with their daily life.
Given the fact that the entire world's economy is connected,events in another parts of the world can affect those in other parts of the planet.
So many many people's financial condition are connected to events that are happening in other places .
One obvious example is the price of the oil .
Since much of it comes from the Middle East,people need to pay attention to what is happening in that turbulent territory.
If  the price of gas rises there,the prices of many more goods will also increase.
Keeping an eye on world events  ensures thata person will be prepared for such changes.
People also needs to be on the lookout for negative factors like the spreading of diseases globally.
Because of the higher incidence of travel ,people need to be aware of what illnesses are spreading throughout the world.
For instance,the SARS virus spread the to all parts of the world and kiiled thousands of people before it was vanished.
People must know about these kinds of events so that they can avoid travelling and being affected with these virus.
Finally,more and more people are moving to different areas around the world today,which requires them to keep informed abot what is going on many places.
They need to know about the security leve of the the places where they might be moving   or their friends and family are living.
For my aunt's instance,she moved to Europe recently,so now i keep track of the news to make sure everything is fine in her new home.
With families and friends spread out all over the world,events in other places can affect many people.
In summary,it is  crucial that people keep infomed of the events because they can exert an influence to people's finances ,health,and even their safety.
We are truly living  in a global community,so we cannot afford to be isolated from one another.
Some parents might argue that since they have experienced much things, knowing right from wrong, they should tell their kids what they should do to prevent them from making mistakes.
However, if we view their point from a different perspective, we can find that they oversimplified the real situations.
Therefore in my opinion, I am in complete aggreement over the idea that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
First of all, it's impossible to protect kids from making mistakes completely.
For one thing, children are curious about the colorful world in which we live and they are eager to explore it themselves.
When something draws their attention too much, they are likely to search for it without parents' permission.
In this situation, they may find out something exciting or make a mistake.
Also, it's too hard for children to remember everything parents told them.
On the contrary, if they make their own mistakes, usually they will not forget them and not likely to do what they did again.
Secondly, parents' experiences may not be still right as time goes by.
When parents were still teenagers decades ago, what they saw was not the same as what we learn today.
Something that were considered right may not be the correct choice any more.
Moreover, even if there are certain things we still hold on to, we cannot be in the exactly same situation with our parents.
I know a guy whose father was good at playing tennis but didn't turn professional because he wanted to go to college, and that's a decision made his father regretful for a lifetime.
When it was his turn to make his own choice, his father strongly suggested him to be a professional player.
However, even though he also played tennis, he wasn't so good at it.
He didn't listen to his father and went to college.
Not only did he did really well in college, but he is really happy he made the right choice.
After all, experience may not always tell you the right thing to do.
In summary, so eagerly may some parents want to protect their children from mistakes, it's not possible.

Children may not always listen to them; children may forget what their parents told them; children may do something ahead of their parents' permission; and parents' experience may not help their children.
So I think parents should just let children make their own mistakes and let them learn fro
Some people argue as if parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
In my opinion, I do agree with this.
From my point of view, not only children, every people will make mistakes in their life, only if we know why we made those mistakes and learn how to motify them, we can be better than before.
Some people might argue that parents should tell children everything and help them avoid making mistake.
Still, I have two reasons to support my opinion in the following passage.
To begin with, parents can't live with us forever, we have to find the way to make less mistakes.

I remember when I was a kid, my mom told me that the first time you make a mistake, it is normal, the second time you make the same mistake, you have to ask yourself why you did it again, but the third time you make this mistake again, you'd better be careful.
This warning let me know that, making mistakes is a very usual thing, we can learn from it and don't make it again next time, also  we can avoid making this kind of mistakes after.
However, if our parents told us this kind of things is wrong, we may not remember it well and probably make this kind of mistake next time.
Furthermore, mistakes are like challenges in our life, the more risks we overcomes, the stronger we will be.
I believe that this is a common theory that almost everybaody ca understand.
Mistakes are like risks, when we dare of it, we choose to stop challenge it, then we will never progress and keep what we like in the rest of our life.
But when we try to find how to overcome those problems by ourselves, without anyone's help, we will learn more about our disadvantages and that we still need to improve.
This will help children grow quicker and stronger, also more meaningful.
In the contemporary society, leaders such as managers, generals and presidents play pivotal roles in the stability and prosperity of institutes that they are responsible of.
Most individuals, since they are youngsters, hope to be in the glory of leaderships.
Parents and teachers are also encouraging children and students to become a leader.
Someone believes that the ability to become a leader cannot be acquired and they come naturally.
However, through learning and practicing, everyone is capable of becoming a leader.
First things first, leadership requires various fields of knowledge.

In order to become a qualified leader, not only does a person need to master the professional skills in the field he is managing, but also he requires the ability of interpersonal communication and cooperation.
Those skills can only be acquired by learning from parents and academic institutions.
A example of my friend Wesley well exemplifies my opinion.
When Wesley was in his adolescence, he was already the leader of the musical band of high school.
Since he was four years old, he had already started to learn various musical instruments such as piano, violin and drums.
Besides his maturity in musical skills, he also learned how to deliver his opinions and has won first prize of the national speech contest for high school students.
All those acquired skills made him possible to become the leadership of the band.
In addition, a robust leadership also demands continuous learning.
Since the society never ceases to become more advanced, one needs to keep learning to keep pace with the modern world.

If a leader is proud of his power and never learn new things, he will be unable to notice the changes of the society and finally be substituted by the people who uninterruptedly acquired new knowledges.
For example, one of my friend Johnson is the leader of a financial company, Yellow River Securities.
Even he has become the leader of the data analytics department, he keeps learning new data mining techniques and amendment of the security laws.
"If I don't learn new things, others will replace me." said Johnson.
Therefore, it is essential for leaders to keep acquiring new things.

I do not agree that the opinions of celebrities are more important to younger than they are to older.
Inversely,I think different people can get various useful share of celebrities.
Firstly,older people themselves still listen to celebrities.
As we may think,older people always find little interests in their lives,but they still spend much time watching TV and reading newspaper.
If asked,the older people will talk about the recent news they heard in the reports and what the actors said in the TV series they liked.
It means that older people are still obtaining information from celebrities via different ways,so the opinions from them are also important to older people.
That can also explain why many TV talk shows still use older reporters who are more convincing to older people.
Secondly,the information itself has significant influence on older people,too.
As mentioned below,older people obtain information from newspaper and TV reports and series every day,they likewise inform their own opinions in the process like most younger people do.
In another words,there is no much difference for younger people and older people when understanding and digest information.
If the celebrities care little about how their words will effect older people,like saying that "seize the opportunities or you will be old",that may have negative influences on older people.
Thirdly,it is also important for older celebrities to represent and speak for older people.
For many older people,they prefer listening to some older idols of them because they can learn from them about how old people can improve lives and be a positive model to younger people.
Older people still need advices of orientation of lives like younger people,therefore they believe in some famous people and choose to support their opinions.
Younger people mighy not think those word are useful,but older people will find them meaningful.
In a word,we can not ignore the importance of opinions of celebrities on older people,as we getting older,we will have different needs of convincing opinions from those when we are young.
I partly agree with the statement.
The first of all,it's more memorable for everyone including the kids if we experience something terrible which results from the mistakes we've made in the flesh.
It's much more effective and vivid than just hearing from the parents.
Besides,the mistakes are necessary in children's lives.
Lives without mistakes are not complete,they may get really puzzled when they grow up,making many serious mistakes.
They will probably be overconfident,too.
Also.
making mistakes plays an important role in children's personality buiding.
Only in this way can children realize they are not the center of the world.
Having made some mistakes,children will probably be more humble and willing to learn from and listen to others,especially their parents and other people with abundant life experience.
However,it doesn't mean that parents should let children do anything without giving them advice before.
Children are lack of the ability to understanding the world,they are in need of wise suggestions.
The cost will be too high if parents let children gain life experience completely by themselves,which may result in many bad situation.
To conclude,I think parents should keep balance.
On one hand,let children make mistakes sometimes,on the other hand,give them enough suggestions to avoid unnessary mistakes.
Nowadays yooung people have less connection with their communities since we can usually find the young people hanging out and having fun instead of taking care of the elders in communities.

Whether it is more important for governments to spend money to improve Internet access than to improve public transportation?
As a saying goes " different strokes fro different folks".
Some people may consider that improving public transportation is more necessary since it is inextricately related to our daily life.
However, I have a different standpoint.
Firstly, some people in rurals desire to acquire Internet more than convenient transportation.
On the Internet, people can know the outside world, and they can receive similar education as urban people.
Many students in rural cannot afford the tuition fee to study in urban area even though they have convenient tranportation to arrive at urban area.
Their parents need to put in great effort to offer a chance to their kids to go to school.
However, when those people have easier access to the Internet, they can connect to the computer of excellent school.
So it is conveinent for them to receive education.
In addition, people in urban areas also need easier access than public transportation.
Since increasing people are hectic nowadays, they need to connect to the Internet almost every seconds for their work or study.
Even though the public transportation is not so convenient, like people may face every day traffic jams.
They can utilize the time in the public transportation to read books or work.
However, if there are few Internet access, people may have nothing to do sometimes, but they always cannot finish their work in working hours.
Granted, improving public transportation is directly influence our life, since we need trafic transportation to go to our destination every day.
However, more and more people nowadays prefer to go to school or their companies by car.
Since people nowadays have wealthier life than people in the past,  they can afford the car.
Moreover, people can stop their car wherever they want, so even though governments invest money to improve public transportation, many people could not feel it.
However, it is now the Internet age that almost everybody can enjoy the ameliorate of Internet access.
Therefore, it is more important for government to spend money to improve Internet access than to improve public transportation.

Recently, an interesting question has aroused among public: teachers should be paid at least as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.
Some people think teachers' salaries should be lower than other occupations.
However, I claim that teachers should be paid at least the same.
Primarily, teachers are allocated at the one of most improtant position, education.
Their job is to cultivate elites for different fields in society so that country is developed rapidly by them.
This is a very hard job because teachers should be the elites in teaching so they have to learn how to teach at first and they should also be professional in their teaching area.
For example, my phsics professor is a famous scientist who publish a book and so that he can be the phsics professor and he also cultivates a lots of good graduate students.
Additionally, teachers put very large efforts in every student so their efforts should be paid.
In order to cultivate students into best students, teachers are supposed to pay a large amount of attention into every students they teached.
Therefore, their big efforts should have the same return.

For example, my math teacher is a hard-working woman, she tried to increase our math grades to the first so she sacrifices her lunch break time to help those students who are poor in math and their grades increase apprently.
Granted, some people state that it's easier to be a teacher than be a lawyer or doctor.
Nonetheless, some teacher like film production professor, they have to be the on-the-job director which means they have to work as well as teach.
They need not only the license of teacher but also the work license and they should be fine to manage their time on whether teaching or working.
In conclusion, according to the importance of teacher's job and efforts they put into their responsibility, teachers should be paid at least the same as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.

There is no denying that we have been overwhelmed by all knids of tasks everyday, including those from work, family and even hobbies.
Consequently, it is not uncommon to see numerous people are still talking on phones talking about official affairs on their way or busy typing on laptops in subway.
Can they handle everything smoothly and successfully?
The answer is obscured.
In my view, even though our life have been stuffed with various things, it is still possible to perform some specific ones quite well.
The first reason is that most of adults have beared in mind that the most important things deserve the most energy and attention.
It means that faced with multifarious tasks, we are still supposed to focus on those which is crucial at the present.
For instance, when I was a high student, my hobbies involved playing piano, watch Japanese cartoons, and cylcling with friends on weekends.
Despite the fact that my schedule was always filled with diverse activities, I was still sure that my first priority was study in order to get the admission of my dream school.
And fortunately, the outcome was as expected since I knew what counts most in my life.
Furthermore, pursuing different things does not necessarily interfere with our main task.
Instead, we can achieve a relaxing mood or reach an energetic condition in order to concentrate on things we are most supposed to do well with higher efficiency.
My father is a vivid illustrations, whose major is civil engineer and works at a construction company.
At the same time, he still runs a small motel near a hot spring.
His colleagues even doubted whether he can cope with two careers smoothly.

However, my father once told me that when he stepped into the hot spring, his tiredness and pressure got in his company had all gone, watching his satisfactory customers and enjoying the gradifying warm water.
Last but not least, different trails are extremely essential to find our genuine interests.
Especially for teenagers at my age, it is quite difficult for us to decide which occupation we should take in our later life.
As for me, the most effective way is to try as much as part-time jobs as possible.

By working as a wraiter in a Chinese restaurant, a private math tutor of a middle student, a temporary clerk in a hostle, and a voluntary guide for our campus,  it came to me that the most apporiate job for me is to become a teacher since I enjoyed most as a tutor.
In other words, the purpose of having different employment is to find my true love.
In conclusion, people can still do what they want well even though they have to handle different task at the same time.
With the development of the quality of people's life, more kinds of working schedules are created.
Some peole choose to work five days for shorter hours so that they can have spare time everyday.
Neverthless, I prefer to work only three days for long time.
The reason is that I can have lots of time to explore my hobbies and also ensure the quality of my work.
The main reason why I prefer to work for long time is that there is more time left.
In this case, I can have more time to do things that I am interested in such as watching movies and going shopping,and also have a long break.
For example, my cousin Linda works for three days a week but she probably stay up late everynight in order to finish her assignment.
And after that she has four days to relax.
Linda loves travelling so she will take a small trip to some surrounding towns to explore other costoms.
This is pretty awsome because she not only makes her work down but also travels to other places.
If she selects to work five days a week for shorter time, she will not have enough time to travel.
Another reason is that, working for a long time can make sure the quality of finished work.
Some people prefer to finish their assignment for a long time and only work a part of it everyday.
But every time we begin to work, we need time to review what we have down yesterday and come up with how to continue today.
It is kind of wasting time and cannot finish the work with high quality.
However, working for a long time is harmful for our health.
But in the other hand, we have more time to release our pressure and relaxing.
Since we can get up late for more days, stay in bed and watch videos for a long time and also go shopping for a whole day.
In my point of view, we can have enough rest if we choose to work three days for a long time.
All in all, working three days for long hours is more enjoyable than working five days for short time.
We can have more time to relax and also finish the work with high quality.

From my perspective, and combined with my own childhood , I agree the statement above very much and my reasons are following below.
Growing children have little life experience and know little about principles of life.
Therefore, during the time children grow up, mistakes are unavoidable for sure.
No parents can prevrnt their child from making small mistakes or big mistakes.
Also, blaming children for their firsrt-made mistakes is meaningless.
And that is the reason parents should let their children make mistakes.
But on the opposite, parents should not let the mistakes pass through very easily and rapidly.
Mistakes are valuable, even for adults.
Parents should catch the chance of their children's mistakes and let children learn from it.
Children learn principles and experience from two ways.
One is that parents and other adults teach them or tell them.
This kind of method is rather fast but less effective.
Children only know what you tell them but may not apply them in their real life or not understand how they should do when facing a problem.
In brief, this method is less efficient.
Another way is to catch children's mistakes and lead them to learning from their own mistakes.
In this case, they will tell right from wrong and do the correct thing the next time they face a same situation.
That is because they know the principles from their own expriences and they are clear about the results of their own mistakes that will obviously help them avoid mistakes.

It might be difficult for some parents to allowed their children to make mistakes, because most of parents want to try their best to protect their childrenfrom everything that might be hurt them.

However, in my opinion, in some conditions, no matter how much parents want to protect their childern and help them far from mistakes, it is better for parents to let the kids go and just watching them how to make the mistakes and solve their problems.
First of all, troubles and mistakes can be the best lesson for a children's growth.
Chidren will learn a lot about how to solve the problem and not make the same mistake next time.

If they make some mistakes by themselves, this experience will remains in their brains and leaving a lasting impression, so they will make better decision at the next time and avoid making the same mistakes.
For instance, one day when I was at the middle school, I forget to bring my homework to school, which needed to be handled at that day.
I should have asked my mother to bring it to school for me, but she refused and ask me to remember not forget to bring my homework next time.
I was criticized by my teacher, but it impressed me alot and I'll never forget to take the homework next time.
Secondly, it might be the best way for children to try what they want without thinking of the risks and the mistakes that might be caused.
If the children never make some mistakes, they will also never try anything new.
For which mistakes will offer us the oppotunity to get in touch with the chances and experiences.
For example, my cousin wanted to learn how to play the skateboard when he was 11.
Although many of his friend's parents thought this sports was dangerous and easy to get hurt.
His parents agreed with him and let him try anything if he was interested in.
Then he practiced a lot and win the first prize in the national competitions.
If his parents were afraid of making mistakes, he will never gain that achievement.
Admittely, it is reasonable for parents to afraid children making mistakes and tried to protect them as much as possible.
It will be better for childern's development to let them try a lot and learn from their own mistakes.
What's more, parents can't protect kids forever, after all they have to go their way by themselves.

There is no doubt that everyone will make mistakes.
The most important thing for us is know how to correct mistakes in the right way.
So the question comes out: How can children know the right way?
In my opinion, the best way for children to know the way is learning from their own parents.
When children make mistakes, parents should help their children know the useful experience from mistakes.
For me, I don't agree with the statement.
And my reason is divided into three parts.
The first part is that children have no ability to learn from mistakes by their own.
For example, a few children do some bad things when they are young.
Unfortunately, in their mind, these things are not dangerous and harmful to the society.
Children are weak in distinguish what is right or false.
They will learn nothing from mistakes.
In this way, making such kind of miastakes is so dangerous that they will continue to make the same mistakes in the future.
The second part is that making too many mistakes can't be forgiven by parents.
Every time children make mistakes, parents allow them to make mistakes for several times.
One mistake can only happen once.
I think parents should be strict with their kids because knowing how to deal with one kind of mistake in advance is useful for the future career for children.
The last part is that mistakes includes two kinds- legal and illegal.
Parents' attitude toward two kinds of mistakes must be different.
When children make illegal mistakes, children should be punished in order to let them the serious effect for mistakes.
Every children is not allowed to break the law.
On the other hand, if it is a normal mistake, leting them learn from their own mistakes is okay.
In a word, distinguishing the kind of mistakes is really important.
And it is needed by parents.
To begin with, this type of "Reward System" has become a trend for decades, especially in many asian families.
The logic behind this trend illustrated that the greatest effort you put on, the satisfied return you could get.
From parent's side, offer school aged child money is a good way to teach them "no pain, no gain", you can get the reward only if you study hard.
This tells them study can make thier life better which means more pocket money in this casel.
Secondly, this method will assist child to build their perspective of value, to set up thier short term goals.
Thus, this could be a rerally positive strategy to help children grow up.
From Children's side, when they realize the high mark equals to money, they will be encouraged to study harder in order to get the reward.
In purpose of getting the money, the only thing they could do is study more and invest more time on review the knowledge they've learnt before the exam.
Once they got the money, they benefited from the hard work, they become better off than other same age child, they will know it was all worth it.
However, parents should cordinate thier child in order to help them to avoid cheating or illegal competing.
In my opinion, this reward method is a good way to encourage child, because only hard work pays off!

Parenting style, an issue everyone thinks about, has been attached great importance to and even trigger a heated discussion about the manner about parents educating their children.

On the contrary is my perspective that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes due to its beneits for both parents and children.

To begin with, when letting their children make errors and learn form them, people will be satisfactory with children's growth, which cannot be observes in the caring parenting style.
What is more, only this manner can promote and improve the intimate relationship between with parents and their children.

Children's personality, will be cltivated in the process, as illustrated in the passage.
Parents' satifactory and their relationship with their chilren, will be fully achieved as exemplified in the instance.
In conclusion, it is a good way for parents to let children make mistakes and learn from their own mistakes because its benefits bring to them.

Imagine what would you do when you encouter with a sophisticated problem in your homework assignment?
Would you choose to ask other students for answers or to spare no effort to cope with the difficulty on your own?
It is not uncommon that high school students are prone to cheat in homework.
As far as I am concerned, the most effective way to reduce the phenomenon of cheating is to increase punishment to the students.
On the one hand, punishment could serve as a reminder for students not to cheat on their assignments, otherwise they will afford high price.
It is because students should be educated to behave well in accomplishing their tasks.
Under no circunstance should they cheat in homework assignments.
If they violate rules, they have no choice but to receive punishment.
Consequently, high school students will recognize that it is their wrong behaviors that result in the high price that they have to pay.
In this sense, the punishment will remind them of well behavior in doing their homework.
This point can be confirmed by the example of myself.
I used to copy my classmate's math homework because I did not know how to apply calculus to solve the advanced mathematical problem.
But my mother realized that I did not do this assignment by myself.
Not surprisingly she required me to wash the dished for a whole week.
Since then I have never cheated in finishing homework because the punishment reminds me of the wrong behavior.
On the other hand, increasing penalty is the most practical way to educate students in doing assignments by their own.
It is because punishment could be put into practice whenever students copy other students' answers.
That is to say all the things teachers have to do is to announce the students about the rules and then reinforce the rules.
Nothing else is needed.
My sister is an English teach in a high school.
In order to prevent students from cheating in the homework, she makes rule about copying answers in homework and asks students to assign their names on a flyer.
Those who cheat in doing homework will be punished according to the rules she have made.
Admittedly, I do not deny that other two ways are not effective in leading students to behave well in accomplishing their homework.
However, either asking helps from parents or requiring teachers to create innovative assignments has the best results as the first measure do.
For instance, seldom do parents have time to supervise their children doing homework because they are engaged in endless works.
What is more, some tasks are naturally unreasonable for teachers to create them to be difficult to cheat on because making choices between four answers is a type of question.

To put it in a nutshell, the most effective way to reduce the phenomenon of cheating is to increase punishment, for it is not only the most practical solution, but it also serves as a reminder for students to behave well in finishing their homework.
With the development of modern society, an issue about how to cultivate leadership has been heatedly discussed.
Are people born to master the ablility to lead others?
Or can they learn to be a leader?
Though I cannot deny that someone are born to be extraordinary, I am stronly in favor of the opinion that people can learn to be a leader.
My general point of view is that leadership derive from famlily education.
It is common in the history that the offsprings of a king tend  to know how to lead his people.
This is not because they have the innate ability from their parents.
In fact, they are always told by their parents how to organize their schedule and how to bring the country to summit of thriving.
In another words, leadership is passed  by experience and words instead of blood.
For example, my uncle is a  well-know businessman welcomed by his employees.
His son John has been educated by my uncle since John was born.
My uncle told him how to treat people in gentle ways and how to keep balance between making profit and keeping workers pleasure.
Predictably, John learned fast and he made his own company in his 20th.
John's experience is proof enough of the opinion that leadership mostly comes from family education.
An equal essential factor is that leadership can also be obtained from social experience.
Ma Huaten cannot be a better example.
He was not from a wealthy family.
On the contrary, he was too ordinary when he was a child.
However, after years of fighting, he quickly knew how to be a leader.
Perhaps from other successful elite, or perhaps from the society itself, he mastered all the ability to lead others.
It is not a short process.
On the contrary, it needs years of social experience to learn the secrets inside.
Finally, he succeeded by creating his own company-Tencent, which is a company worldly famous in a variety of fields.
Admittedly,  there are someone who are born to be smarter than others.
However, one cannot be a leader if he has not received any education or if he has no social experience because a perfect leader does not have the single quality that deserves encomium.
In another words, one can be a  innate genious but a good leader is never born to be.
Judging from all the evidence above, we can confidently arrive at the conclusion that leadership never comes naturally.

When he studied in school, he thought haveing class and doing assignments everyday ar really boring, and thus he hated learning and wasted the precious time in school.

This action changed Mayun's life tremendously and he not only incresed his study effiency, but also preserve those money to do what ever he inerested in.

As the internet and computer system developed in the modern day, more and more people, including children can use computer in home, school, or public place.
However some people think that it could be a disadvntage because that children might spend too much time on it playing computer game, that children should be restricted to play them.
In my opinion, I do not agree with the statement, since computer gomes is not always a waste of time, and do brings benefit to children.
Adimittedly, computer games have bad effect on children since they may addicted to it and cause them to be unhealthy.

That is reasoned as if a child is addicted on the game, he would shift his focus on study towards playing computer games, and if he spend to much time on computer, he will have problem on eyes due to blue light, and he will also has back and neck strain because he does not move his body to relax.
Moreover, it could cause mental problems such as afriad of social activity, since he spend too much time alone to play computer and forgets about how to make friend or communicate in real life.
However, this is an example when things grow too serious, and we still can fix this bad habit by teaching them about the importance of self-discipline, but forbid them to play computer is no need.
Computer game is a convenience method to relax them from the heavy pressure of study.

Since children nowadays have much more school works than the previous generation, the do not have much time to play out side, so computer game is an ideal choice owing to its convenience and flexible of time of playing, children can stop to play them immediately and can start to play for another time.
After the gaming time, they will be refill with enthusiasim to start to work on their additional work.
Also, playing some varieties of computer game can improve their intelligence.
As the gaming market is developing,some game that require strategy, the use of knowledge and logic appear.

By playing these gamesm children can strengthen their ability of applying knowledge and logic skills to solve problem, and boarden their horrizon from reminding them of the brand new approachs and use different tasks to inspire them.
Eventually, their minds will be improved.
In conclusion, computer game can bring benefit to children by relaxing them and improving their minds, and children should be allowed to play them.
