In the recent days, students are getting more and more group works.
These works are meant to improve their collaboration and sense of obligation.
But now there is a question lying in front of us.
Do the group works actually increase the effectiveness of the projects?
As far as I am concerned, I disagree the point that the group works will help to increase the effectiveness of the students than individual projects.
First, the increasing number of people will bring more discoordinance.
As all we know, every individual has their own different points of views.
And have every one who has active thoughts to coordinance is more likely to be a impossible tasks.
And when this situation happens, it requires lots of time to deal with even there is no solution to the disorder if no one will negotiate with each other.
For instance, my sister once was in a group works.
The teacher assigned a projects that each groups need to build a model for a car.
After all the joys her groups had, and when they needed to decide which material they become not harmonious.
Some said the car needed to be coated with the gilted silver, some said the car had to be marine blue.
After a long time, they could not negotiate and every one was stubborn.
She said if the project was assigned alone, she should have done it a long time ago.
Second, the situation might become weired that there will be one leader to guide the whole project.
As a research conducted by the MIT, the proportion of the group work turns into a single man guided group works will be higher than 56.8 percent.
It means that it will be more likely it will be one person to judge the whole project and lead the team.
If the project succeed, then the whole group succeed.
But, there is more likely to be a failure, then the whole team will take the price by the misleading of the leader person.
Third, if the project was assigned to be done by onlt one person, the person can prevent from the clamor and be high efficient.
As some people, they intend to enjoy the soleness of their own and wishes the absence of anyone who can potantially annoy them.

It actually has some scientific evidence that if one person will left alone, the hormone and pheromone level will decrease and let to the outcome of the reduce of the hippocampus which will reduce the stress from the outside stimulus and make people more concentrate.
People will be more high efficient and persistant.
To conclude, I disagree that students can learn more effectively than they are alone on projects.
Nowadays, people are paying an increasing amount of attention to the topic of teamwork.
In some schools, teachers would like to assign projects on which students must work together while other schools ask students to work along.
The attitudes toward this issue may vary from individual to individual.
A typical view is that students who are asked to work in group  always learn more effectively than students that work alone.
In my point of view, I totally disagree with this statement.
My view will be explained by analyzing the following reasons.
First of all, student working If students are working together, there may be a serious disagreement between them.
To get a unified view and solution of the assignment, they have to spend significant amount of time and effort on things that have nothing to do with the projects.
secondly, students in the same group may disturb each other by chating or the noise which is made by group numbers.
Admittedly, working togther can produce a variety of ideas, it may also disappoint some students because not everyone's idea can be used in one assignment.
In such a diversified cosiety, there are many selection for people to choose as a job.
Different people holds different views.
Some people prefer to have plenty of different types of works to do on workdays, another group of people are enjoying do a single works all day long.
In my opinion, taking different types of works can enrich our daily life.
My points of views will be explained by the following reasons.
To begin with, it is a common conception that different types of works require different skills.
Taking part in a new work will help us to learn a new technique or skills.
In my experiences, I learned pharmaceutical engineering in my college and gain some knowledge of pharmacy.
Although I have not chose a job which is relevant with my colloge degree, it really helps me in the later job.
I went to a medical company to run business about management, and the job acquires a lot of knowledge including accounting, statistics and even pharmcy.
Thus, I need to learn many new knowledge of different field, which fulfilled my daily life.
Moreover, participating different tasks in certain feild may meet many different people.
Finally, it is ture that people can improve the work effciency when they concentrate on one certain tasks.
Howeverm if a person works long enough on a some work, they would feel bored and baldness.
In many industry plant, many workers perform a single action for all day long.
Such as the porter, they need to carry the heavy bricks from the downstair to upstair for the whole day.
The problem has become a noramal topic in the world from long long ago.

In my perspective, such kind of action can never be a good idea if parents want their children to study well and obtain honour for themselves.
My explainations are as followed.
First of all, the action of giving money directly as award is too material and it may influence the original goal and motivation for the kids to study.
What we need to let kids konw is that they study and go through tests only for knowledge and their future developement rather than money or other material stuffs.
As one of my classmates in my middle school, he was born in a rich family and his father always gave him money when he behaved well in the examinations.
However, after some time, the company of his father was infulenced by some policy and his family wasn't as rich as before.
Therefore, his father decided to stop giving his son money as reward for good grades.
Unfortunately, the grade of my classmate began to fall since then because from his standingpoint, the sole motivation of studying had been deprived.
If we let our kids get touched with money or something else which is material, they will fail to recognize the real meanig of their life and the influence can last for lifelong time.

Last but not least, in view of the youth of these kids, it means that they don't have mature attitudes they should have to envolve into the society, including the right way to regulate the property they have.
If we give extra money apart from their daily expense, they don't know how to get the most use out of it and exert it for the most wealthy thing.

In the situation which is not so bad, like me before, I might use the money given by my parents for my good grades to surf the online shops and buy some cool clothes or some intersting things which are as a amatter of fact a kind of waste to my family at all.
However, if our immature kids make friends with someone bad, they may use their extra money for something really harmful or terrible.
All in all, I against giving kids money for their grades, as it's difficult for most of the parents to educate thier kids to form a healthy way to cope with money.
What parents should do is to lead their kids in a clever way and let their children realize the real significance of studying and examing tehmselves.
As is known to us all, we Chinese people have a saying that goes," If you meet sommone in trouble on your way, you should stand out and help him a hand."
From my opinion, Iwould like to offer my help to the strruggling strangers if possible.
First of all,  we would face the same situation, given that no one comes to care if we are in trouble, this world would become cold and cruel.
It is of human's social character that helping others means helping ourselves, so did ancient people claim.
If you send someone a rose, the smell remains on your fingers.
Well, I do not want to lie on the floor and helplessly ask for help but nobody cares me like I was abandoned by the world.
In addition, if we do the struggling strangers a favor, we would gain a sense of accomplishment, which could lead us to practice more like this to acquire more such sense.
Given that we help a person, and the person says thanks to us, what a great feeling!
And the person would give others a hand in the future for not wanting others to feel as painful as himself.
It is a possitive circle of social relatioship.
However, many people who aim at cheating our sympathy and kindness pretend to ask for help, and they might make us the one who "hurt" them and force us to pay them.
In other word, we would be hut in our heart if we meet or hear such news which would convey really bad ideas to the public.
Though some bad guys stiil exist, if we make ourselves not to show our sympathy or not to offer our help, we will get frustrated or feel sorry if the strangers truly need help.
To judge those cheaters is the mission of the society, but choosing to offer help is the mission og ourselves.
I totally agree to help struggling strangers in the field we  can offer our help, and I truly hope all people could povide their own share of help to make the whole world a beeter place!

There are many kinds of events in our daily lives.
And some of them are essential such as cooking, which is the source of the food.
However, some people believe that humans would spend less time on cooking in the next two decades.
In my opinion, I think this idea is unconvincing.
On the contrary, people will spend more time on cooking and the preparation for food in the future, this is because people will pay more attention to the healthy life style in the futrue.
Also, people will have more time for cooking in the futrue.
First, people are bound to pay more attention on the healthy life style in the next two decades.
This is because with the life condition becoming more and more better, there were no difficulties for most of  humans' survival.
Thus they will start to consider about how to live better and live long.
So they will pay more attention on the access to healthier life style.
As a result, they might spend more time on cooking rather than just having something to eat roughly.

Taking my grandma for example, when she was a little kid, the surrounding was unfavorable and there were the famine, people were eager to get something to eat even regardless whether it could be eaten, no one would think about how to eat healthier.

But nowadays, after suffering such a tough age, she is more cherish about today's life and always thinks how to live better, thus she spends several hours on cooking everyday in order to make the food more healthier and live longer.
Second, people will be released from the stress of complex laborate, it is not necessary for people to   sit in the office day and night.
And the machines will deal with it instead.
After having more spare time, people will spend more time on the events of their own daily life, thus more and more people will spend more time on cooking.
Taking my uncle for example, he used to work in the factory as the editor to write the code for the machines.
But with the technology developed, machines can set about working automatically nowadays, and people just need to sit at home to inspect them.
Now, my uncle gets up late everyday morning and prepares the breakfast carfully for his family.
In conculsion, people will no longer be limited by the conditions in the real life with time going by, so they will spend more time on cooking in the next two decades
Nowadays, people perfer to make thieir journey with a group and led by a tour guide.
Undoubtedly, this could be the best way for our tour.
The tour guide is able to help travellers to order the right dish when they cannot speak native langauge.
Also, guide can tell is to go to the Britian Museum instead of other boring places when we are travelling in England.
Then, guide can make a tour schedule which most fit the travellers time.
All of these are brought by the guide.
First, tour guide can speak native language, which will play a significant role in our journey.

Some investigations shows that almost ninety percent of travellers choose to tour with a guide, and more than a half of them thinks guide's ability to speak native language is the most important since the travel group can make travellers have no probelm when they want to express their needs.
For example, when you need to buy some products when you travel abroad, such as perfume, tissue at forth.
How can you even buy it if you are not capable in saying them in the right expression.
That's where the guide show their importance.
Secondly, guide can show me some more intersting place especially in some places I have never been.
For example, I have went to England with some of my friends.
In the forth day of the trip, I told the guide I preferred to go somewhere I liked rather than following the group, then the guide agreed, which made me very regretful.
I went to a town which is unknown to most people, and all I could do was just wandering around and seeing the passengers, which is boring.
Since then, I decided to follow the guide every time I went out with group since the guide was more familiar with the places we went than us, which could provide much better experience.
Last, some people may argue that the travelling with a group can limit our time and through other travelling ways the time management is better.
Take one of my journeys for instance, I still travelled with my friends.
Without the guide nearby, we could hardly manage our time properly, because we could sleep till ten am or elven am, which would make the plan for the morning useless.
Because our laziness, the trip will become a very boring one if the guide is not nearby
People today in China are willing to help the struggling strangers, but they fear to do so.
Most people in China are willing to let the aged people sit on the bus, metro, and train.
However, some fear to help in more serious situation because of the lack of trust between people in China.
In China, the society promotes kindness between people.
such as standing up to let the old, pergnant, or ingured people sit down.
There is specialized seats for those passangers with special needs on most of the public transportations such as bus, metro, and train.
There is also volunteers that is willing to spend their time in helping out strangers.
People are willing to follow to those rules and leave those seats for the people who need them.
However, in more serious situations, people are less likely to help because of the lack of trust between people that is built up by cruel lies.
In the past, there has been multiple situations of old man or women lying on the ground with a broken bone waiting for help.
However, when someone comes over and help them up, the old man or women goes to court accusing the person who helped them up to be the one who knocked them down.
This is especially common in places without a camera or witnesses.
This action of decieving those who are nice caused a lack of trust between people in China.
Many people in China have been deceived, their kindness to strangers are used by those who doesn't really need help.
Most people today in China are willing to help the struggling strangers, but most of them fear to be deceived.

Though the actions of most teenagers in China, we can observe that teenagers in China have courage to treat strangers with respect and kindness, but their respect and kindness is used by those who deceives them and make profits from it.
In my opinion, young people should have the ability to plan and organize.
First of all, knowing how to plan and organize can help young people ignore distractions and do things efficiently.
A plan clearly states what to do at a time, so people can hardly think of doing something else at a time.
It helps one get things under his control.
Take my cousin as an example.
She is a person who really good at organize her time.
During holidays, she always makes lists of what she wants to do and what she has to do.
Then she breaks the lists apart to plans of what to do everyday.
When the holidays are over, she aleays finds herself doing a lot of things that she planned before.
Further more, having the ability to plan let young people have a clear direction of their lives.
Young people usually have a lot of expectations of their futures.
Learning how to plan and organize helps them get to know what they really want or need in the future.
When young people get to know what they really want or need, they have strong motives to accomplish their plans.
Relative research shows comparing to those who have no plans, people who have clear plans and targets of their future get better lives years later.
Even when they facing some problems that might influence their plans, those who have a clear direction can quickly adapt to their situations.
In con, young people should have the ability to plan and organize.

Thus, with so much merit, why not having a trip in groups led by a guide?

Will you have a better appetite when you can eat various kinds food eveyday rather than the same dishes every time?
The answer is very clearly.
People will get tired of one tast of food when they keep eating one thing.
Therefore, the same reason can be used for the works.
Workers will more likely prefer different types of tasks instead of similar tasks.
To begin with, different tasks are just like the ingredients of dishes.
If workers do the same thing every day for a long time, they will easily get tired and frustrated.
They may be distracted by other things in the twinkle of eyes.
Therefore, it is not good for workers to concentrate on the taskes, meanwhile, the working effient will decline dramatically.
On the second stage, learning new things is such a significant part in our life.
Different types of tasks not only can they let people keep being energetic, but also can make staff become prolific.
For example, if Steven the inventor of Apple company didn't study the art of characteritics, then the figure of the words in Iphones will not be as elegent as now.
Therefore, to have many different types of tasks will let these workers learn more skills, which can help them to act more efficiently and flexiblely when they meet a tough problem.
Last but not least, different types of jobs means meeting different types of people.
Thus, it is a superb way to color workers lives.
For instance, when these workers do different jobs, they can communicate with different persons, and absorb various attidudes which can open their minds.
Furtheremore, what is more important is that they can make some new friends.
Unlike to work the similar tasks all day long, the friends circle is very small, and the contents of communications are very limited.
To sum up, many different types of tasks will fill much new blood into workers' lives, which can make them become more positive, energetic, and effient.

As people's life getting better and economy goes well, no effort is spared to improve the quality of education of children.
As money is a sensitive topic among parents, there is a heat debate on whether parents should offer their school-age children with money for each good grade they get in the school.
Although give money to children may have some potantial risk, the benefits of giving money to children as award can be expected to exceed the disadvantage.
First of all, giving money to students can motivates students to study even harder.
One of the principles of economy suggests that: people respond to incentives.

As we can imagine, if the child got a good grade in one of the exam and got pocket money for this grade, he or she would just considered good grade equals award, which would motivate them to study harder and get more good grades for more awards.
Besides, giving money to students as award can cultivate their sense of achivement.
The money parents give to students plays a role as award which exaggerate the joy students get from good grades.
Therefore, the students will cherish this great sense of achivement and pursue this feeling once again.
As we known, the sense of achivement can help us strive for excellence and achive high, which will bring a lot of benefits for the students in the future.
Last but not least, giving money to students as award can develop their understanding of money and help them to arrange their money and spend them wisely.
The money students get from their good grades is a kind of award they "earn" which are different from the normal pocket money they get.
Therefore, students are more likely to value their award-money and arrange them with caution can care, which cultivate their ability to arrange money independently.
Through arrange their own money, students may also undersand their parents' attitude about spending money.

From what has been discussed above, we may safely came to the conclusion that offering school-age children with money for each high grade they get in the exam is a good method to help children grow up, for it can not only motivates students to study harder and gain the sense of achivement but also cultivates their understanding of money and arrange their money wisely.

With the rapid development of society, education has been playing a significant part.
The question with regard to how to educate the children appropriately is worth considering deeply.
From my point of view, it is of great importance for children to makr mistakes and learn from them.

No matter how serious the mistakes are, parents should put more stress on learning from the mistakes instead of focusing on the mistakes themselves, just as an old saying goes, failure is the mother of success.
First of all, through the process of making the mistakes and learning from them, children can behave better, which in turn helps them to grow in a better way.
As is known to all, children always don't know how to behave appropriately from the beginning.
In this situaion, after the children have made the mistakes, like behaving inappropriately in public, they may learn from others' reaction that this kind of behavior is annoying and thus stopping it.

On the other hand, if the parents merely tell the children what is right and what is wrong, the children probably may not understand the reasons for the right or wrong behaviors, therefore this kind of education is not successful.
From another perspective, it is the method of learning from their own mistakes that contribute to children's future success.
This can be achieved due to the fact that children can recognize their own strengthens and weaknesses through this process.
For instance, in a mathematics class, the childern may make a large number of mistakes at first.

Under this circumstance, he might be frustrated about himself, without the correct guidance from their parents, it is highly probable that the children might not be interested in the mathematics class from then on.
On the contrast, if their parents communicate with the children patiently and guide them to learn from the mistakes, the children may recognize their own problems and solve them calmly.
Similarly, it exert great influence on children's future career and thus contribute their future success.
It can be safely concluded that it is a not only appropriate but also beneficial method for the parents to let children make mistakes and learn from them accordingly.
As has been mentioned above, it can contribute to children's growth and success as well.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether increasing the price of gasoline and electricity is the most effective way for government to encourage energy conservation?
As far as I am concerned, this is not the most effective way to encourage energy conserveation.
My point can be elaborate as follows.
To begin with, promoting public energy conservation awareness is more effeive for government than increasing the price of gasoline and electricity.
To be more specific, people will realize the importance of saving energy if government promoting public awareness of energy conservation.
Then people will know they need to cut down the use of gasoline and electricity.

However, if government just increase the price of gasoline and electricity, people will just camplain about that and use the gasoline and electricity as usual since they do not know why the government increase the price.
Thus, government just increase people's living cost but do nothing with energy conservation.
For example, in my country, government make some books and TV programs to promote public awareness of saving energy.
After people read or watched these, they cut down their use of electricity and gasoline on purpose.
To be followed, increasing the price of gasoline and electricity is unfair and it just work for the poor people.
To illustrate, poor people use less gasoline and electricity than those rich people since they do not have much money.
If government increases the price of gasoline and electriciy, poor people will live in an akward condition because they cannot afford the cost of gasoline and electricity.
On the other had, rich people just use the gasoline and electricity as usual since they have money and they do not care about the price.
In conclusion, poor people just use basic energy and rich people waste a lot of energy.
However, increasing the price just reduce poor people use energy but do nothing with rich people.
So increasing the price is not effective.

Recently, a controversial topic has arouse a heated debate between students:whether students should follow an ambitious dream or just achieve realistic goals.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some hold the opinion that we should chase the dreams even if they are ambitous.
Contrary to the point is my perspective that people should focus on realistic goals.
My point can be elabrated as follows.
First, focusing on achieving realistic goals will give you more motivation and sense of achievement.
There is no doubt that the realistice goals are something which we can achieve by working hard for several days.
So every week people can gain a lot of sense of achievement for they have finished something.
This kind of motivation will let people become agreesive and then they will be more possible to succeed.
Contrary to this, if people want to follow their ambitious dream, they need a tight plan last even a year or more.
And this means people can only feel the sense of achievement every year which will let people lose the motivation to achieve their goals.
For example, my classmate Jason wants to get good grade this semester.
He did not set a goal just like getting GPA 3.8.
In fact, he just finished his homework carfully everyday.
He always told me that he was happy every time he finished his tasks.

This is because the realistic goals always have a short period.
So you can decide the things you need to do everyday even every hour.
This will help people be strict to themselves and help them build an important charactoristic, autonomic.
When you want to follow a ambitious dream, you can just plan want to do as some single steps which will do no benifits for people to achieve their goals.
My cousin Tony studying at Wuhan No.1 High School has trouble in studying English.
He has set a goal that he wants to remember 600 words a month.
So he knows that he needs to remember 20 words a day.
He sets an hour every day to do this and finally finish his tasks.

Nowadays, leadership is an imortant factor in achieving success gradually becomes one of the most popular topics not only among the students but lso in various companies empolyees.
Some people argue that leadership comes naturally while others hold that one can learn to be a leader.
In fact, leadership is a general concept.
It canbe classified in two notions: leading skills and charisma.
leading skills cna be learned bit charisma comes naturally.
First of all, leading skills refers to serval specific techniques which canbe mastered after systematic training.
These techniques include the decomposition of big goals, the use of incentive mechanism, proper distribution of work, tips on balancing the interest of various parties and so on.
Experts in management field have already work out mature theories or principles in these aspects.
With adequate practice, it is not difficult to use them skillfully.
Futhermore, even if without systematic theories, leading skills canbe improved through the accmulation of practical experience.
A man whose major has experienced to be an organizer inhis club.
How to make the whole team collaborate efficiently fulfill the goal in a firm somtimes is common with the same thing in a school.
In contrast, a person with no relevent experience will find it harder to lead such a team first.
But he will make it at last after enough practice.
Nevertheless, differently from specific leading skills, charisma in most cases can't be acquired through special training.
This kind of glamour refers to the attraction which can cast positive impact on his subordinates.

Such kind of attrective power comes from thre leader's nature dispositon which is to some extent hard to change during one's life and rich social experience which is impossible to get by merely aborbing indirect experience.
In general, charisma comes naturally and only a few of us has this kind of spritual attraction who make great contributions in human's history.
But for ordinary people like us, some useful leaing techniques is enough for us.
We have easy access to these specific methods thanks to theinformation era.
knowledge spreads widely on the internet.
What's better, a large sum of them charge nothing.
Therefore, it is not diffcult for us to become a qialified team leader.
To be honest, the techology is being more and more advanced.
In this case, some people may wonder if techonology is making children less creative than before.
But I have some questions for these people.
Have you ever seen the children who are interested in the new techonolgy work hard to develop their own creative products?
Have you ever seen the technology are providing children more methods to be more creative?
First, the children are interacting with techonology earlier than they were in the past, so some children raise the interests about the technology.
As a result, the children have chance to develop their own creative products.
Take the Steve Jobs for an example, he created the most creative company in the world, Apple.
When he was small, he was attracted by the mavelous technology, he thought this was so charming that he fell  in love with this.
Then, he wanted to developed his own product.
At last, he used a bug of the telephone company to create a system in which you can call others for free.
Although this may be bad for the company, but you cannot deny the creative factor in it.
When growing up, he also took this spirit to Apple.
So we can draw this conlusion that the techonology can boast children's creative abilities in some ways.
Secondary, as the development of the techonology, children have more and more methids to have a touch with the ways which they can be more creative.
For example, recently, the Stanford University held an online class which can increase people's creativity.
A lot of persons chose to show the video in the class to their children.
After taking the online class, the creativity of the children has increased almost 80 perscent, which was indicated by a agency.
The children can even imagine some grateful ideas which were never thought about by the scientists.
And the scientists may use these ideas to refine nowadays technology.
In this way, we can tell the truth that techonology is a very useful way for the children to boast their own creativity.
Last, some people argued that the product of the techonology may do harm to the creativity of children, such as the cartoon video, which is just wasting children's time.
In my opinion, watching cartoon video is just a good way to help children develop their creativity.
For example, there are always many physicial phenomeon in the cartoon video.
And when children see this phenomeon in the video.
They may think about other situations where the phenomeon can be perfectly used to help things be more convienent.
So watching cartoon video can still be a good way to develop children's creativity.
When talks about working, most people's reaction would be quite indifferent.
What I got from my friends or coworkers around me is that working is just a thing that I need to do everyday which is rather dull.
Few of them would show that they are excited to start the new day of working.

Well, for this situation, I believe that workers would be more satisfied and energetic when they have many different types of tasks to do during the workday than when they do similar tasks all day long like most of my friends do.
First, with different types of task, one will be motivated by the tasks and feel adventurous to start the day.
For instance, an accounter in a company, all he needs to do is to record the finance issues in and out of the company.
One of my friend is right in this position.
She said at first, she just need to do the caculating stuff at the begining of the month and then she is kind of doing nothing at the rest of the month which makes her feel really boring.

However, after she got the task that she needs to conclude the companies financial situation and analysis the datas and finally make a representation to the whole  company staff, she became nervous first, but soon, she started to focus her mind on searching the parts that can help improve the datas.
She told me that she was much more satisfied than before.
What's more, many different types of tasks can help improve one's ability to do a job and vice versa it will enhance one's self-confidence.

Take myself for example, as a tutor, I need not only help the students' academic development, but also to help them with some sort of daily issues like not willing to study or feel depressed about the trouble that they are facing and so on.
Through helping them dealing with every possible issues, I feel really content in my heart.
Since I am not just their tutor, I am their friend in some degree.
This cannot be fullfilled just teaching them something.
In conclusion, different types of tasks can help workers feel freshing everyday and give them something to looking forward to which a is win-win situation.
The company can get more things done and the worker can feel more satistifed and efficient.
So, why not do it?
With the developing of our society, we become more and more busier in dealing with our own things.
Hardly do we spend time in involving in affairs that are irrevelant to us.
It is obvious that people today aren't more willing to help the struggling strangers.
To begin with, people pay more attention to themselves so that they don't notice others.
For example, when I was in high scholl, I was occupied with too many classes.
From Monday to Friday, I had to take English classes.
On weekends, I needed to play the violine.
Though once a time , I read a message that a little baby was affected with serious desiease, but my mind was full of academic stuff and fianl papers.
Therefore, I did not care about this news too much and I forgot quickly.
In fact, many people meet the same situation as me, tht are less willing to help the strangers who are in need, because they have many  important things to consider about.
Additionally, it is commonly believed that people are scaed to help other because of the real events, they become indifferent and cold bloody.
Several years ago, a yong man helped an old lady who fell down, but the woman claimed that it was this young man who pushed her down and required him to pay money to her.
This news was certainly shocked a lot of people so that they didn't know whether it was true to give a hand to the struggling strangers.
Under this circumstance, a mount of people become less willing to help the truggling trangers.
The last but not the least, by observing our current society, we are surrouded with materials and vanity, people don't want to use their own money to help others.
In contrast, if they have enough money, they can not only invest to projects but also buy luxuries instead of donating to people in need.
Actually, this is really a common phenomenon nowdays.
In conclusion, taking account of the arguments above, I definitely disagree with the statement that people today are more willing to help the struggling strangers.

With the accelerating development of our society, more and more people start to concern about their life quality, but some people discover a disappointing truth that people now are less satisfied with their life.

Although someone contends that people have more materials than people in the past, I strongly believe that people are less happy and satisfied because they have much more pressure and they are more anxious with their life.
Firstly, the gap among people becomes larger and larger.
To be specific, now rich people are much more richer than the poor people, the difference among their status are extremely huge, that makes many people loss confidence.

In the past, people all lived in low life quality, in the same village, all the villagers were of the same status, the only hope of them was to feed themselves and their families, so they would be satisfied with their life if they got enough food.

But now, people lives in the same city can be seperated to many different status, some people maintain enormous properties but some people only have their singular house, the poor people could hardly construct their confidence and happiness.
Moreover, their are more competitions than past.
In other words, their are much more population than before, but the resource in society and the earth do not increase.
Thus people have more competition pressure than before.
The technology and science have developed further more than before, so the jobs need the staff to be more skills, people should learn more to suit their job.
So they spend more time and energy in learning, that makes them anxious.

On top of that, even someone is enough capable for a job, but he still should compete with a lot of competitors who are in the similar condition, that situation makes people more nervious and less satisfied with their life.

As the development of Interent, there are more and more information that we can get by using the internet.
But is more information means a better life?
I do not think so.
So much information in Interent can also cause many problem.
At first, the information may not fit the readers.
In traditional media, there are different information provides to different kinds of people.
A child will not get the information of  sex or violenec from the programs for children in TV, right.
But it is totally different in the Internet.
Everyone can get the information in the Interent no matter if the information is good for him.
For example, I went to school by bus last week.
I hread two little boys who sat behind me talking about the meaning of a dirty word.
And one boy said that he learn that from the Internet.
I am sure their family will not feel good if they know their children learn dirty words from Internet.
And the parents even can not stop this kind of things happened, because they can not hide all the bad information in Internet.
So some people will learn something bad according to the information in the Internet.
On the other hand, there also a lot of information is not correct in the Interent.
Everyone can write down what they think is right in the Internet, and the Internet itself will not distingulish if the information is actully correct.
So people may be misleaded by the incorrect information in the Internet.
For instance, many people said the earthquake in Japen will made the salts in China harmful to people in 2008.
It was totally incorrect, but many people believed it is ture.
So many people bought a lots of salts in the super makets and stored a huge amount of salts in their houses.
That made the price of salt highly increase.
Many people could not buy salt at that time.
So the incorrect information will surly  make many serious problems.
Although there many valuable information in the Internet, but it is hard to find them, beacuse the amount of infomation is too huge.
I have spent a whole afternoon to seach the answer of a simple question.
There are too many information are provided in the Internet.
So people must spend a lot of time to distingulish which is what they really want.
It is not so convinent to get useful informations in the Internet.
So much information in Interent do cause many problem.
I hope these problems will solve.

Since the parents are treating the education more and more significant, they are likely to choose a method which could encourage their children to be more interested in study, and receiving high marks.
BUt this phenomenon has aroused wide social conroversy that whether this initiatives will make the children believe money is the only reason for a good study or not.
However, I content that rewarding some money for their good grades is a good idea, telling them the effort will pay off.
To start with, giving the children some pocket money as a reward will stimulate children to study harder.
When children get feed back of their hard work, the study will no longer be a forcing choice to make.
We cannot object the barriers the children might g=face in their study
Yet the enviromental develop so fast, children are taking more and more important role in the future.
They would become happy and get more energy when they receive some feedback, so I think it's a good idea for some parents want to offer their children with money because of their grades in school.
At first, children who take money as their gifts when they have a great effort in school may easier to successed.
When children have the money, they are drived to study harder to get more money, so both the children and the parents gets bonus in their side.
For example, my friend Mary used to hate the study, because she thought study is boring and she couldn't get any benifit from it.
Her parents were worried about her, so they decide to give her some money when she get high mark.
Now Mary becomes one of the top students in her class.
Besides,children can do more things when they have enough money.
They can maintain their desire to better things, and make great efforts to attain it.
Most of the children don't have the finance indepentant, so it's a good oppotunity for them to use money freely, such as buy gifts to their parents.
To illustrate, my cousin have a little money and could'n t buy the dress for her mother, so she asked her parents to give money when she get good grades.
Both of them are happy.
Though some people may think it's hamful to the student when they get to much money, maybe they would use some unfair ways to have high mark, such as cheat in the exam.
But I still think offer the children money for their high mark has the more advantages than disadvantages.
For children, it's easier to get succeed and can help them to do more things.
So I think it's wise for the parents to give their children money as the bonus.

Nowadays,the phenomenon that parents offer their school-age children money for the high marks they get in exams is common.
The parents want to motivate their children to study better through this way.
I don't quite agree this idea.
In my opinin,this method may work at first .
But when children grow up ,bouns strategy  doesn't appeal children as it used to.
Because when children grow up , it becomes harder and harder to satisfied their needs.
Money can't work all the , time.
On the one hand, children asks for more money , which you can't afford.
On the other way ,it leads to a bad habit of children.
I think, most importantly, parents should help children to form good habits.
Children should know that they study for theirselves,not for money their parents give.
Besides,in university, it is important for students to self-conmtrol, they should know the targets ,dreams they want to achieve.
So giving money to children is bad for their growth.
What's more ,I think,with time going by, children rely their parents more.
If one child get used to the money he get by their parents ,all he do is want to gain his parents'prize .
Relying on parents is not good for independent growth.
I think we children should know what we want and why we do this .
If you are blurred with your road,then how can you succeed?
Offering money for their good marks seems good in a short time .
But the damages it brings to children's independence   are long-term.
Once a person lose motivation to study .
He can never study well.
So I think offering money for their high marks is not a good action.
If you want your children to have a long-term benefits,you should let your children study by their own motivation.
protecting wild animals,one issue the government will encounter in some time,is of vital significance.
this is because wild animals will have a decisive impact on the well development of future generation.
some people believe that it is not the government's role to protect the wild animals while others hold the opinion that to protect the wildness is important.
personally,it is better for the government to protect the wild animals.
there are several reasons supporting my position.
on the one hand,protecting wild animals is to protect huiman themselves.
generally speaking,with the rapid development of our society,the population of mankind is increasing dramastically and the living space is expanding broader and broader.
if such behavior is not stopped,it is possible that our population will continue growing,which means human need more food and resources,thus leading to the fewer living habitats for wild animals.
then the people amy fight against each other for their own survival.
it is no wonder nowadays some countries are trying to control the bitth rate and appeal to people for fewer baby borning.
on the contrary,if the government take measures to control the growth rate of human population,there will be less competition between huamn and wildness .
thus the method not only protects the wildness,but also shield future generations.
on the other hand,future generation can see more living wild species,which  can contributes to their care for the nature.
typically,young chuldren are all excited and happy when they go to the zoos to see animals.
various animals such as the elephant,monkeys lions and giraffes will make the children aware that all the animals are cute,so they are willing to make friends with them.
there is no denying that people won't hurt their friends.
thus watching those living animals have a great influence on their development of careness for the nature.
it is really important to protect the wild animals.
for instance,I used to see animals with my mother,each time I went there,the monkeys would always smile at me,which made me feel refershed and exciting.
So when I see people hurting animals I will get really angry and stop such behaviors.
consequently,protecting the wildness is beneficial for future generations' loveness,without which they will get stuck when they deal with others future.

form what has been disdussed above,I fully reinforce my standpoint  that it is vital for the government to protect the wildeness,not only will it protect the future generation,but also will it benefits the care for nature of them.
The world we are living in becomes quite stressful recently.
Working people are wondering how they can feel better sense of satisfication -trying as many types of work a day or just focusing on one task.
Well, actually I think the two opinions are rather compatible than conflicting.
First of all, people can definitely choose a specific field to dive into and spend their time on it, so as to perfect the work they are doing or produce the product of world-class.
Taking Japanese artists as an example, they are painters, cookers, statuers, all walks of life.
However, they can transfom their work into a piece of art, making the product they make to be respected and the service they offer to be awarded.
They are just masterpieces.
It is the spirit in this nation that makes people enjoy doing one thing at a time, which illustrates doing similar tasks can have its own advantage.
Simultaneously, people fond of doing different types of tasks also have their reasons.
Among these resons, the most significant one is that it won't make them bored.
You can try as many as new things in a day, and if you are tired of one work, just stop to do another one.
For instance, when I work in the office, if I had to check with one form for a whole day, I would choose spare it in several certain periods of time, like this afternoon or tommorw moring.
This not only gives me many intervals to do others, but also it release the pressure on my minds, letting myself have more passions for better work.
In conclusion, I think both of the opinions make sense, and it is people's choice to decide which type is their preference.
Furthermore, they can even be integrated, with the different types and similar types being adopted in a week alternatively.
In the daily life, many parents may roar to their children even hit them when they make mistakes.
They think it can prevent their children to make mistakes.
However, some people think parents should allow their children to make mistakes, because  they may learn from their wrong way.
I think we should let them go when they make mistakes, there is a proverb that a fall into the pit, a gain in your wit.

Letting the children make mistakes does not mean letting them make same mistakes again, parents should let the children awaring the why they make mistake and how to avoid it teh next time by themselves.

On the contary, if parents tell them do not make mistakes, it can not let them realize what they are do is wrong, but just following their parents said, so they will make some same types of mistakes as well.
For example, my friends David broke some plates while he was playing with his friends in his home.
When his parents went home seeing these, they did not say anything like tell David do not make mistakes.
At dinnertime, David found that his parents did not prepare any food for him!
He was angry, and asked his parents.
His parents just told him, the plate is not enough, the food is nowhere to fill.
Soon David knew his errancy, he does not play with friends in the kitchen anymore, because he knew that plate broken, no food for him by himself.

Meanwhlie, the process to correct the mistakes can also inspired children, like Edison, if his parents told him do not make mistakes, he could not learn from the mistakes and after conduct 99 experiments, learn from the latter mistake over and over again, he would not produce the bulb,and we would use fire to light right now,
Therefore, wise parents may allow their children to make mistakes, believing them will learn from mistakes and avoiding doing mistakes the next time.
Obviously our world has changed a lot and we gradually grow up.
It is not common that some people think that what our grandparents say is useless.
However, I disagree with such idea.
I think the advice that our grandparents give us can also play a vital role in our life even the world has developed fastly.
My reason can be seen as following.
First, our grandparents are experienced and they have lots of tips about life.

As we know, we need to try several times before we really understand something and our grandparents have experienced lots of things thus, they have adequent knowledge about life, which will not change with time.
For example, when I was young, I lived with my grandparents because my parents were busy working.
I always fought with my classmates so my teacher blame me.
When I came home, my grandma told me when we were mad at others, we mad at ourselves actually.
Because it would just make us feel unhappy.
Since then, I learned to be tolerant, surprisely, I became more and more popular in the school.
In addition, whatever our grandparents say, they care about us and want us to be better and it can encourage us.
For the most time, we need advice because we meet some trouble or lose confident.
I think all of our grandparents want us to be better, thus the advice they offer us was actually a good encouragement for us, it can help us solve the problem too.
Take my friend Tom for example.
He was afraid of speaking in front of lots of people but he needed to give a speech.
Luckly his grandpa teached him that he could just imagine audiences as cabbage when he stand on the stage.
I do not know if it was useful but the result was that he make it perfectly.
Admittedly, there were some advice given by our grandparents were not suitable today, Nevertheless, we can also gets benefits from part of their advice instead of the whole.
For example, our grandparents suggest us to learn more knowledge form newspaper, however we have no interest in reading newspaper.
On the contrary, we can get knowledge from internet which we like best.
It does not matter where we get knowledge because we listen to our grandparents' word and learn a lot.
To sum up, we should be modest and respectful to our grandparents.
There have experienced lots of thing that we can not imagine, so they have many characters that we do not have.
The advice given by them is the symbol of their love and it can give us confidence.
I believe it will be useful all the time.

In order to learn from the past, some school required all the studens to take history class no matter what their field of study is.
Is it really nessecery for all the students to learn history?
I don't think so.
I believe that although history is really useful, we shouldn't force our students to learn it.
First, studying history can't benifit all the students in all the fields.
For example, I am students in the physic fields, but I don't think that history can do anything with my major subject.
I didn't take any history classes in my school and I don't regret on my choice.
Instead I use all my time to learn something in my field.
It is neccessary for a student to study one thing at one time so that he can get to the top of his studies.
Learning history can waste his time and energy.
Second, some students don't like history so that they can't focus on this subject.
Although many people told me that history sometimes are really funny, this can't change my attitude towards this subject, boring and tiring.
To be honest, I am totally not interested in history.
Imagine that if you force a student who is just dislike history to take lessons, that is terrible.
We shouldn't require all the students to take classes that they don't like.
Third, learning history needs a lot of time.
It looks like this reason makes no sense, but this is true.
If we want to learn history well, we have to use a lot of time to memorize.
As for me, this point is a credit one because like most students I am bad at memorizing.

Currently, it is a common practice that parents tend to offer their school-age children some money as a way of encouraging them to get high grades.

Some people hold the view that it is good for their children because they will have better academic performance; others, though, are skeptical, arguing that it is of no benefit for children by doing so.
From  my perspective, I am firmly convinced that there are more disadvantages because it can mislead children and it may cause bad consequence.
First of all, awarding chirdren by giving money may put false ideas into children's minds.
As we all know, we go to school to gain knowleadge for ourseves instead of pursuing money from parents, and offering money will not give children such ideas.
To name a few, my brother's parents used to give him a large sum of money when he did well in school.
It seems to work in the beginning, however, as time went by, my brother developed a bad habit in the end.
He would not study untill his parents give him money so it is no doubt that he failed his exam in the end.
It is obvious that offering children money have bad influence.
Secondly, offering children money may not help them in their school work, and what makes matter worse,it may lead to bad results in the end.
When receiving money from parents after hard work for a time, children are easily addicted to using their money randamly.
For example, when my brother had money, he is more willing to use the money to relax himself rather than continue to studying hard.
With time going by, he gradually fall behind others at school.
So he would not get money, which inturn lead to his unwillingness to study.
There is no denying that he had no alternative but to fail many exams.
It is apparent that offering children money is not a good idea.
In conclusion, I am not in favor of the idea of giving chirdren money when they get high grade at school.
By doing so, parents will put incorrect ideas into children's minds and it may result in bad consequences in the end.

At present, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among students: whether it is as important for the elderly to learn new things as it is for young people.
Answers vary from one to another.
Some people claim that it's unnecessary for old people to learn new things since their learning ability is not as well as  that of young people.
However, contrary to their views comes my own perspective that old people are required to learn new things as well.
My viewpoint is based on the following reasons.
First, learning new things can perfect old people's work and study ability.

To be more specific,old people also need to work and with the quick development of technology, the working way of people have varied a lot by using kinds of high-tech such as various Internet technique.
Thus, having a  understanding of some innovative technology could enlarge old people's horizon.
In this way, the working ability of the old peoplecould be promoted.

However, if old people didn't want to accept some new technique, they might be ruled out for their working ability and efficiency is much lower than those who have a good command of innovative techiques.
For example, my uncle who is over 60 years old still works in a bank.
After the widespread of computer system of keeping accounts in the bank, my uncle had to learn how to use office softwares to handle his daily issues.
After several years' practice, he is as skillful as his younger colleague and he always tells me a joke that he is still young.
Second, studying new things could also help the elder have a closer connection with younger people.
Specifically, it is widely acknowledged that young people can quickly accept and learn new things such as some newly invented words.
If older people refuse to use and learn these new things, chances are that there will exists deeper and larger gaps between the younger and the older.
Young people might not want to speak with old people for they think the old are out of date.
Under this circumstance, old people should learn some new things and catch up with new trends in order not to be left banind by the younger.
For example, my dad always asks me about some new trends of the Internet.
Sometimes I even get fed up with his constant questions.
And after a while, I learn that he just wants to have more common interest and topics with me.
Thanks to my dad' s persistent learning , there is always harmonious atmosphere beween us.

In conclusion, it is as critical for the old to study new things as it is for younger people for learning new things can not only perfert their own learing ability but also stimulate the elderly to have closer relationship with the young people.
Nowadays, more and more people realize the importance of young people and pay attention to them.
Most of the people are appealing the school and parents to develop children's independence.
Some people think that nowdays, young people still have to make decisions rely on their parents, just like the past.
However, I think young people now  are more independent and really have the ability to make decisions by themselves.
Firstly, in the advanced society, young people can get much more information than before.
For one thing, they have more choices.
Through the internet and the computer, they can easily get to know what they like and what they want., and make their own decisions.
For example, my mother used to told me stories about her childhood.
My mother lived in  a small country when she was a child.
Every time she want to buy a new clothes, she had to describe what kind of clothes she like to her parents.
And then, after her parents have the chance to the city, they would based on my mother's describition and made the the decision to buy which clothes.
But now because of the internet, I just need to enter the online shop and I will see almost all kinds of clothes.
I can decide which one to buy only by myself.
I don't need to rely on parents like past.
Secondly, more and more people are not worried by the enconmical problems now.
Young people also don't need to consider too much for their parents.
There are enough money for them to do things they want.
For example, my father's parents are farmers.
Everyday my father had to depend on my grandparents to decide what food he can eat today.
Because my grandparents grew oranges, so my father can only eat oranges everyday as his breakfast.
He can't depend on himself to make decision, because he had no money.
But now it is totally different.
I can enjoy almost all kinds of food as my breakfast, such as noodels, rice, dumplings and so on.
It is because I have the enough money to support me to do that.
Thirdly, for people who in the past, these people's thoughts are much more old.
They were under their parents' mangement everyday.
They didn't dare to make their own decision.
For example, my uncle was afraid of my grandpa when he was young.
So he used to have a chance to play guitar, but because my grandpa's disagreement, he gave up the chance.
But I can do it now and my parents support me now.
We have a new mind now.
Because people now have much more money, much more information and much more free thoughts.
I think young people now are more depend on themselves to make decisions.

It's known to all that our world is no longer outdated, there are many advanced technologies such as the Internet, the maglev train applied in daily life.
Views went differ when it comes to the problem that is it important for governments to spend money to improve Internet access than to improve public transportation?
In my opinion, I think they are both worth spending money.
On the one had, the Internet makes mordern life more convenient.
Since more and more bussinessmen have the online shop, people can buy things without stepping outside.
This area is worthy of government investment, becuse poeple can observed the unlimited financial potential apparently.

For example, Jack Ma's e-commerce cooperation lead China's economy to increase, my consin is now working an individual bussiness, she sell her clothes through the internet and earn more than the job she used to do.
So if the government could spend money improve the internet, more people will benefit from it.
On the other hand, transportations make it easier for people to travel to the place they wanted.

Through the railway, many poor farmers can not only afford their children to get better educated but also earn their life by the tourism because the transportation is widespead and acts as a bridge that bring the world closer.

Conclusively, the improvement on Internet and transportation are both equally important for government.

The types of works are always concerned by workers.
And there is a heat discussion about which way can make workers more delighted: Doing different tasks or doing similar tasks during a day.
On the one hand, doing the same tasks may help people take more time on one particular problem and have more chanes to solve it.
On the other hand, doing different tasks has its benefits for workers as well.
From my perspective, i would prefer the later one and there are some reasons below.
Firstly, it can equip us with more skills.
If you do similar tasks all day, you can only take advantages on one particular skill, you do not have other different skills to do more things.
However, various skills are always useful if you are changed to another job or position and you may start to do a whole new thing.
Therefore, your old skill does not practical that much.
In addition, you must spend your energy and time on learning new skiils while you can already equipped with them when you are trying to do various tasks.
You will be regretted at that time, then why not do as different tasks as you can now?
Moreover, it helps me save my time and leads to a high quality result.
Different things to do always can refresh your mind for you do not to have to bury yourself in same tasks.
Thus everytime you get refreshed you can get yourself into a better mood to do the task well.
For example, once i had a lot of homeworks, but i only had one day to finish it.
I started to do maths during the first hour, and in the second hour i nearly wanted to fall asleep for i has already do the maths for an hour.
So i changed to Physics, also changed to another thing method to clean my mind.
As a result, i fiished my homework in the just three houres which really is at high efficiency.
In the end, it can inspire people's passion about the job they are doing.
If i do same tasks everyday i must feel tedious to do it dor i can not discover any interesting things from it.

On the contrary, if i have a lot of different things to do, i must feel energetic because i contact different things and learn differet skilles like i said, maybe i can get to know more interesting people.
Under that circumstance, i definitely will feel satisfied with my workd and be proud of myself for i can achieve a lot and feel happinese form it.
I will love my job and do my work harder and put more passion into it.
And in my opnion, this is suppose to be the healthy way of how we work.
In conclusion, doing various tasks is better for us.
Nowdays, there is a phenomenon that some parents give economical reward to their kids when their kids get a high mark.
People have diffrent opinions over the idea.
I think this idea has its advantages and disadvantages, but the advantages overweigh the disadvantsges.
As for disadvantages, this may give their children extra pressure of study.
To compete with the other ones is already a burden on their shoulder, and now here is another one, to earn extra money.
Children may get more stressed with their study, and may do harm to their mental health.
As for advantages, this way give the children another motivation to learn things well, so they will put much more efforts into doing this.
On this condition, their starting point is not to learn more knowledge, but they can accomplish the basic purpose of education, which is gaining knowledge.
What's more.
Now is an intellectual generation, knowledege is money, ability is a measurement of the future.
The idea sounds material, which is also the truth in today's world.
Hence, I believe it shape their idea about money realisticly and let them see the adult's world a little bit more.
So on the whole, I think the advantages much overweigh the disadvantages, which means it is a good idea on a certain level.
Then here comes to the problem of how to apply the idea better.
I think the parents should set specific rules to their kids and limit the money they should receive.
Each time shouldn't be too much and the amount should be under strict order.
I believe in this way, the kids will be more displined and to alleviate the disadvantages of the problem--kid's over stress.
To sum up, in my view, as long as under control, to offer some material benefits to acknowlege children's work is accesible, which is an positive idea.
With the development of society, life pace has become so fast that people have less and less time to company their family members.
In order to spend the precious time meaningfully with children, parents have to decide what kind of activities is the best for them to enjoy with their children.
From my perspective, spending time to do things that are related to schoolwork is a better way for parents to conduct.
First of all, every child may confront with all kinds of problems in their study.
However, most of the kids lack experiences and methods to deal with them, making it vital for parents to help and instruct them to solve the problems.
For instance, when I was in elementary school, my math was so poor that I regarded it a torture to finish my daily math homework and assignments.
Although my mother was usually busy at work, she still decided to spend two hours every day with me to review my math textbook and finish excercises assigned by my math teacher.
My math grade gradually became better under her careful instruction, at the same time I felt really comforted due to her gentle and patient attitude.
Furthermore, it is neccesary for parents to care about their children's study in case that kids may get lazy and escape from studying.
For example, my cousin was addicted to playing computer games when he was a middle school student.
His parents were indifferent about his grades and allowed him to spend all of his time on computer games, sometimes even played together with him.
Therefore, my cousin wasn't admitted by any high school and had to start work early.
Without any practical knowledge learned from school, he couldn't get a payful job, which made his life really harsh.
Last but not least, doing things about schoolwork with children also benefits the parents, since they can learn some knowledge through this process.
As the science and technologies develop quickly recently, only with endless study of latest knowledge can people win the fierce competition in work.
For example, ten years ago, people didn't believe that young children could felt empathy about others, and they only reacted to things that happened directly to them.
However, we know that young kids have complex emotions and can feel empathey about others.

If parents who work as kindergarten teachers can do some psychology schoolwork with their children together, they will have the chance to know about this correction and adjust themselves in their work, which may improve their work efficiency.
In a word, spending time doing things related to schoolwork is beneficial to both children and parents.
The significance of education should be under no circumstances neglected.
Therefore, a great many of parents would like to engage in children's education.

Although some people think one cannot learn to be a leader, I think people can learn how to be a leader by severl ways.
Leadership always presents in three ways: aestheticlly,creativity, and persistently.

Steves' knowledge about aesthetic help the company out of trouble and we can learn from this story that aesthetic really helps in design.
But, can  aesthetic be learned ?
of course.
This the first reason why I think one can learn to be a leader
Secondly, the creativity is also a important part for leadership.
As we mentioned above, all the Apple product is a creativity.
Why people like Apple product?
because it is something we new, we never saw before, and it all credits to creativity.
Who to learn to creative, there are lot of ways.
when you at work, try to do things from more perspective, this also kind of creativity.
Last, persistently.
A leader can not leading without persistently.
When Apple face the worst financial crisis, did he gave up?
No, he did not.
He persist and then the new product comes out and save the day.
How do we learn persist?
try to do everything perfectly like punching your time card, tell yourself you'll not miss punch in even once for a month, if you accomplish it, that means you learn part of persistent.
With a raised awareness of the monumental effect of celebrities, almost everyone including every age of people is affected by the influence of celebrities.
Many reports show that many young people even old people are motivated or depressed by the opinion of celebrities.
However, as far as I am concerned, the importance of celebrities on younger people cannot be overemphasized.
In other words, it is more essential to younger people with the opinions of their celebrities.
Firstly, the young is mentally and physically unmature.
They tend to be affected by their idols such as famous entertainers and athletes.
Whenever a celebrity who they like have a new twitter, they cannot wait to see it.
One of my best friend Joe may serve as a good example.
He loves watching NBA, and he is fond of Lebron James, one of the greatest basketball players now.
Once James expresses his opinions in twitter or elsewhere, he attempts to read them and most of the time he agrees with them.
In other words, he is deeply affected by James.
But luckily, James always show a positive attitude so my friend is quite motivated by him.
It turns out to be a good impact on him.
But, as for older people, who are out-of-date and stubborn, are difficult to change their attitudes only by seeing the opinions of celebrities.
In most cases, they don't care about the politics but only little daily things.
Moreover, younger people have easier access to the celebrities.
They can know celebrities' activity only by clicking the button of smartphones or computer mouse.
Naturally, the opinions of celebrities can exert great influence on the young.
In the mean time, older people usually use the traditional way to obtain the information.
As a result, their pace to follow the speed is usually far behind.
What's more, they are unlikely to have a celebrity who they like in their heart owing to the different value standard.
All in all, it is opinions of celebrities that make a difference.
