Nowadays, with different working fileds developing, the topic about people's works is highly debated.

Taking the individual's satisfaction into consideration, many people assert that they will feel more satisfied when  they have various aspects of tasks to do during the workday due to interests and challenging.
However, a lot of individual contend that they prefer to woking with a similar tasks to do all day long.
From my perspective, I strongly believe the fromer's statement, and my reasons are as follows.
First of all, it is a favorable opportunity for workers to have many diverse types of tasks to do because they will be occupied with different working fileds and figure out their real interests.
To illustrate, take my brother Mike for example, who works in a hospital.
Last weekend, he told me that he had to finish many work such as call the patients' relatives, look after the patients and have some operations from these sick people, ect.
Busy as my brother was, he felt really satisfied due to he figure out which work is the suitable for him to do.
I can clearly remember that his favorite work is having conservations with the patients' relatives because he will fell happy to hear that the patients' good news.
So working with different tasks can help people to know which aspect is the most suitable for them, which is beneficial to their careers' prespect.
On top of that, if the person has many different types of tasks to do during the workday, they will enjoy the working and devotes to his carrer.
However, in view of do similar tasks all day long, he must will feel bored and exhausted, so he will give up to finish these tedious assignment eventually.
For instance, my mother worked at a restaurant several years ago, and she did the dished everyday.
How boring and bland the work was!
Finally, my mother made a decesion to change anthor interesting job.
To sum up, it is true that people will focus on and pay more attention on doing simialr tasks all day long, which will help them improve the effective.
Nevertheless, people can not repeat only a task all the day.
So I extremely contend that they will feel satistied
Although nobody like making mistakes, we all konw that no one is perfect and will make mistakes, especially for children.
It always seems difficult for parents to sit back and allow their child to make a mistake.
However, at some point, being a good parent  means to let go.
Therefore, I suggest that for parents it's better to allow their children to make mistakes and let them to learn from their own mistakes.
First of all, mistakes allow us to realize our drawbacks and disadvantages, thus we can improve ourselves.
Although some mistakes may dispoint you, it avoids you to do them same again.

When I was a kid I always forgot to bring my homework to school, and I will call my mom to bring me my homework but one day my mom said "I am sorry you forgot your homework, but that is your responsibility."
I fail to get my homework that time, but since then, I have never forgot it again.
What's more, when parents told their children what they shouldn't do may have a negative impact on these children.
Because everyone has it's own value system, and they are immature when they are young.
Usually some children are not willing to listen to their parents' suggestions and tend to do something oppsite way.
At this point, the parents may be disappointed.
Therefore, when parents allows their children to try, it may be good for their health.
It's true that some mistakes should be prevented such as being addicated to drugs, or steal some things because it may lead a crime road for children and may affect their future life.
However, for most conditions it's better for parents to let children go.
All in all, parents should allow their children to make mistakes from which they can learn significant lessons.
There are too many things to consider when choosing one of the various ways of education.
Different people have different opinions aboout how to teach their children to be knowlegeable.
As far as I am concerned, it is not appropriate for parents to provide their children with money for each high grade they get in school.
Firstly, this way may make children under too much pressure, which may make children make so many mistakes.
As we all know, children want to get money given by their parents to by what they desire for.
And when they know they can by this way  gain what they want, they will spare no effort to get good grades.
However, it will also make children so strained that they will make many mistakes when taking exams.
For example, my brother performed well in his high school and he did well in all the subjects, which indicates that he would be amitted into the best university in our own country.
Then his parents guaranteed that if he got good grades in the entrance exam, they will buy what he desired for.
Unfortunately, he was strained and did not reach his total potential in the entrance exam.
Finally, he did not perform well in the exam.
In conclusion, this way can't be used to teach school-age children because it will make them feel so stressed.
Secondly, this way may distort children's attitude of value and world.
As the saying goes, book is the ladder for human.
That we study hard is to make contribution for the society and make effort for our own country rather than earning much money.
Studying can make us skillful or knowlegeable instead of making us greedy.
For example, there are many malicious hackers  in our society, a famous hacker named Wang Dachui who is expert in the aspect of computer science.
He uses his knowledge to attack the company whose scale is smaller, and he compels the boss of company to give him money.
Occassionaliy, when he was a child, he was taught by his parents in this way.
Consequently, he is arrested by the police.
This story tells us that this way can not be used to teach children.

Juding from all the evidence offered, we may safely arrive at the conclusion that offering school-age children money for each high grade they get in school may make them strained and deform their attitudes.
Therefore, this way which may hurt the children is not correct.

Since the world itself has become more and more complex, the society and technology are developing at a high speed, the modern young generations regarded themselves as more independent and freeer individuals, and they are cble to make decisions about their lives, especially when they are compared to the young generations in the past.
So here raises a very interesting question: Are we better able to make decisions about our own lives than the.
young generations in the past?
Did the rely on thier parents too much?
However,  I do not think so.
Young people today have not gone through the hard life so they are not mature enough to make decisions about their lives.
The young in the past, let me raise the Chinese young generation who lived in the past for example, since they have gone through the WW2, they are much more mature than the young today.
They had to take care of a series of chores, some of them even had to look after their youger siblings.
Since they had dealt with alll this at a very young age, they know how to make decisions without their parents.
However, most of the young genrations have not gone through the hard period of time, they may not deal with their own things well.
Modern young generations are still dependent, they think themselves independent for they know well about how to use advanced techniques.
The yough today live in a world full of high technology, since they have come to the world, they grew up with high techniques and those techniques help to solve the problems in life.

Because most young people have a better understanding in the use of techniques, they think it as a symbol of grown up, which may make them think that they are already independent enough to make decisions whthout parents.
There were not so many high techniques decades ago!
So they think they are more independent than the young in the past.
My opinion is that, they are just good at using techniques, they have seen more high techniques than people in the past, but it doe not mean that they are  mature enough to make their own desicions.
The young today are confused by the surroungding world.
The world today are still complex, however, it looks beautiful and peaceful.
This gives the young a kind of misunderstand, they think they know the world well,but they have not seen the evil of the world yet.
They still need to be protected.
In fact, young people from all different periods of time need protection if they have not actually gone into the society.
For historical reasons,I think young people in the past have seen more evils in the world, so they are more independent in some ways.

In such an accelerate modern society, there is an increasing gang of people paying more attention to the working, everyone is busy in working.
And nowadays, there is an issue that people will do few things well if they are busy doing many differents tasks has provoked a highly debate.
Some hold that it would not matter anything if we do many different kinds of things.
But however, as for me, it has many obvious defects if we do a lot of diverse things.
First and foremost, we will be distributed if we do various things in a time.

For instance, you should know that, if you have two days to finish some tasks, and you want to finish them as fast as you can, so you will definitely devote all of your emotion and become busy doing all of them.
Then later, you find you just finish all of them in one day!
But finally, you still be criticized by your boss whereas you just made a lot of mistakes in those assignments.
That is because you are just in a busy time of doing many many things, so you will definitely have a consequence of defeat.
Secondly, being busy doing a lot of things also have some effects in our working efficiency.
For example, I have a friend, John, who is a good grade student in my class when I was in senior high school.
There was a weekend, he had numerous of assignments to do and in that weekend he was also required to hand in his extra English classes.
So there was not much time for him to finish those tasks.
In that circumstance, he was fairly anxious and he had to do his them in his additional English classes.
Finally he did nothing, because he just cannot concentrate himself on these homework, so it was an really an low efficiency way to do many tasks busily.
Finally, doing many thins busily also could cause us some health problems.
We can easily consider that what will happen to our bodies when we are in a high pressure and busy atmosphere for a long time.
Without thinking that we could gain some serious deseases if we always in busy time, and this will absolutely cause us do fairly few things well.

If you use that way, maybe children will think that he / she is learning for money.

If you someday say that they can't get money if they get good grades,some would lose the interest for learning, maybe exept his / her favorite class.

If he / she mentaly thinks like that, it will not matter whether you give money to him / her for getting good grades.
He / she will learn hard for it even if you do not give him money for good grades.
So it is up to you to decide whether to give your child money for good grades or not.
there will be advantages and disadvantages for everything.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: which is more improtant, success or remaining haap and optimistic when you fail?
Opinion vary from person to person.
Some people claim that success is very important.
However, I would stand on their opposite side and I believe that remaining optimistic and happy when you fail is more important.
My viewpoints can be elaborated as follows.
First of all, remaining a optimistic and happy when you fail can guide success eventually.
As we know, the mood and attitude towards anything is very vital because it can result a different outcome.
If you do anything with a negative attitude, you would fail at most of time.
However, if you are not afraid of failure or even you fail and you have a positive attitude, you would be easier to success or access to the success closely.
You would have a courage to overcome the failure and be easy to absorb the experience from it.
Success can be achieved sometimes, but a positive mind can bring success to you eventually.
For example, last year I took part in a piano contest and I made mistakes when I was performing.
I ignored the laugh from other people and didn't be  thought over the reason that I would make mistakes.
Then, I realized that the problem was that I was lack of the experience of performing.
I tried to perform at many concert and eventually I won the first prize on the national contest of piano.
Second, remaing happy and optimistic when you fail can shape your personality.
It is difficult for people to controll their mood when they are suffering from troubles, that's why there are so many phychologists today.
Success always bring a big fluctuation to people and people could not success every time.
If we can stay a optimistic attitude when we fail, we would foster an positive attitude to life.
For example, my consin failed in the final exam and he was very sad and upset.
He thought that he could not success even if he try his best.
My uncle was very worried about his mental health.
To put it in a nutshell, I firmly think it is more essential to keep happy and optimistic when you fail.
It not only can guide success eventually, but also can shape your personality.

With the development of our society, there is no doubt that the education system has been established extremely well, which means almost every people, whether teenagers or adults, all have opportunities to attend school.
However, how about the quality of our education and how many knowledge we can receive from the class?
This actually depend on our professors who stand on the rostrum.
Some citizens think that we should increase their salaries to make them focus more on their job.
In fact, i disagree with the opinion for the follopwing three reasons.
First of all, universities have already gave them enough salaries to sustain their even their family's life.

According to the social investigations, professors are belong to the high incoming circle, presidents or some department leaders even obtain higher salaries, which means they totally have no burden of their daily life.

Thus spending more money for them will restrict the development of other aspects, such as the dorm conditions, school environment, education facilities and so on which are significant and important too.
Thus, i suggest that universities would rather invest those aspects than increase professors' salaries.
Secondly, enhancing professors' salaries may make other faculties feel disappointed and unfair, for they devote themselves to students also but did not receive the payment they deserved.
We cannot igonore the fact that there is not only peofessors work hard in the university, but also other stuff work even harder than professors.
we should solve this issue by the direction of our investment.
Last but not the least, some professors really do not deserve those high payment, for they have never evet pay any attention to theit job.

Those so-called professors even find some graduated student to teach class, then they have enough time to do their own research, not for the development of university, but for their own fame or monetary benefits.
I have experienced such situations in my university.
There are some professors just find some movies for us to watch, then they leave and do their commercial businesses.
Sometimes they even call me and other students to help them but never no pay.
So, we should not encourage this kind of professors.
Judging from  what i have mentioned above, we really have no reason to spend more money on professors' salaries.
We actually should establish some discipline to regular thoese professors.

Recently, an interesting topic has aroused a heated debate: which factor influence us most when we decide to buy something, friends' and colleagues' recommendation, information from media or comment from salesman.
The answer varies from person to person.
From my perspective, I believe that the recommendation from our friends or colleagues maybe have more postive effect on us than other factors.
To begin with, the suggestions from our friends or colleagues maybe more reliable and useful than media and salesman when it comes to a mojor purchase.
To be specific, friends are the group who definatly never cheat us and they are more likely to help to solve our problems from their bottom of the heart.
In this case, when we ask advice from them, friends tend to tell us their own experience of facing the same problems.
According to their advice, we can make right decision.
To illustrate, when I faced to buy a new smart phone, I asked suggestion from my best friend who are interested in these advanced technology.
Then he recommended me to several  phones pationtly, such as HuaWei P9, IPhone 8,  based on my preference.
Eventually, when I got my new phone, I found it is really great and I like it so much.
Without my friends recommendations, I never make the right decision like this.

This is because the information can be from the product industry and they will spead some exaggerate message to lead people to buy them in order to make more profit.
Similarly, the salemen also want to make more money by over-pride their product and make some fake information about the product.
Therefore, the message from media and salesman is not as accurate as from our friends.
For example, last year my father wanted to buy a new TV and he went to a market.
At that time the saleman always prided their product and underestimated other brand of TV.
Thanks to the recommandation from his friends given him before, he found the saleman exggerate about the TV and he left that market.
To sum up, It is advisable to follow the recommendation that given

Teachers in modern school are more likely to assign projects which should be accomplished by a group of students.

If all of the groups have those kinds of student, The whole quality of the assignment will worse than the alone assignment.

In conslusion, Group study allows us to  be part of it, and we can do mission we specialize,lazy is not exist and we can also learn from eachother.
That's the reason why it is more effective than working alone.

To cope with problems, people always want to find the best solution, which, in my opinion, is the solution that is beneficial from a broad perspective.
As a result, the decision makers should calm down and plan very cautiously, allowing them to conclude the best solution.
First of all, a waterproof plan enable people to avoid mistakes that did not taken into account.
To be specific, when the leaders are planning,  they are prone to take into consideration as many perspectives as possible, allowing them to see the big picture of the problem.
In other words, they will assume every possible mistakes and outcomes the potential solutions would result in.
In consequence, they would make sure little, if any, mistakes would be caused by the solution.

On the contrary, if leaders come up with a solution out of creativity without serious check and consideration, the solution is likely to cause some outcomes that not only unable to address the existed problems bring about worse troubles.
Microsoft, the worldwide technology corporation that is well known for its seriousness, is a great point.
Ten years ago, Microsoft produced popular phones of high quality, which is the result of carefully planning and arrangement.

However, to compete with another phone company Apple, Jacob, the chief technology leader who in charge the produce of the Microsoft phone, designed a creative phone within two months, which was so aggrasive that it was produced without carefully consideration.
However, the phone ended up with low market behavior because it is uncomforable to use despite tis nice looking, and forced the company to quit from the profitable market.
Besides, planning carefully make the solution feasible to conduct.
To illustrate, planning ensure the process of making solutions transparents for everyone, instead of made by the chief leader.
people are able to participate in the procedure of the discussion of the solution and come up their own ideas.
Even if most of the ideas would not be added into the solution, but it makes the solution more solid as a combination of ideas of all the stuff.
To sum up, we should plan carelly.

As for the topic about the children's education, there arises a debatation whether parents should let children make mistakes or hold them on your hands.
Basicly I vote for the first opinion.
Several reasons strongly support my point of view.
Firstly, there is no such thing that is more essential than liberty even if we are talking about a kid.
Secondly, let children go may strengthen their sense of responsibility.
What's more, a mistake may be a greater teacher than anyone.
As for the liberty, I won't talk about how much effort has been devoted to and how long have people fighted for it.
If we are too patient to allow children do what they are willing to do, there would be a desperate influence on them that the freedom is not worthwhile to possess.
That would be a terrible consequence.
When they grow up and become an adult, they may not be equipped with a mind of liberty.
Secondly, the actions of setting children free will develop their own sense of responsibility, which is more important than prevention for just several small mistakes.
Imagine that you were a little kid going outside to buy a bag of suger with no guidence of parents.
You may miss the way, nevertheless, every footstep is taken by your feet and you will find the right path sooner or later.
That makes you prouded of yourself and you will eventually remember the way you go.
If you are still worry about the mistakes a children will make, there is an old saying that mistakes are the best teachers.
I am totally agree with the idea.
A parent may be able to protect a kid from the hurt for a while, but can he stay besides his kid for a whole life?
Indeed he can't.
Thus if he hold the kid tightly, the kid won't remember anything and he will make the same mistake anytime the parent is not nearby.
But if he lets his kid go, the kid will remember it even though he may get injured.
In conclusion, it is ridiculous that the parents don't let their children do anything they are willing to do.
The best way of education is to let go.

So teachers are very likely to stay up late to finish their work just like some doctors on the night duty.

In my opinion, give shcool-age children money for their high grade they get in school is not a good idea.
I agree that give some awards to encourage children is a good way, but the award should not present as money.
In the form of textbooks, nrovel, toys could be a good choise, but not the money.
Fistly, parents could not control the use of money.
They could not predict what children would do using these money.
For example, the children may use the money to buy expensive toys or hang out with firends.
But parents have no control of these money.
Secondly, use money as an award also encourage cheating.
In order to get the money award, children may use different measures to cheat in the exam in order to gain the money award.
This raise a bad atomsphere between classmates.
In this way, the children may become dishonest.
But when the award is replaced with some helpful toys or textbooks, it will lessen the posibility of cheat.
Finally, give children a specific award can help parents gain more control with the grow of their children.
If kids like instruments, parents could offer piano or guitar as their high grade awards.
Otherwise if children like science, parents could offer some scientific toys or science fiction books for them.
Using these stuff as an award is clearly a better choise.
All in all, I think give money to children is really not a good idea.
I prefer use specific awards instead.

Nowdays, the news that kind people help others in need titles a lot in the internet news, it seems that struggling people get more help form the society.

When we talk about the courses we take in the university, many students think the major course is enough for them and there is no need for them to take history courses and so on.
However, in my opinion, the history course is as important as math course.
And no matter what our field is, we have to take the history courses in order to better understand the development of things.
In the development of the nation and the country, it is important to review the history.
And we can  summarize the experience and mistakes so that we would not make it again.
As a university students, only by taking history classes can we know the country more directely and specificly.
After that, we are more willing to devote ourselves to the subject that can benefit our society so it can help our country become more stronger.
What's more, we can also benefit from a more powerful country.
Another reason is that we shoud learn history is that it can help us understand the essence of the things.
Take my own experience for example, I am an architecture student and I have to take many history course about art.
First of all, I just thought the course was boring and it had no use to my major.
But in the end of semester, I found that I perform bad in not only the history class but also the designing class.
It's sure that I didn't get high grade that semester, but i just wonder how can it be.
I spend my most of time on my designing class but it still made no difference on my grade.

So I turn the teacher for help, she looked my picture and diagram and give me the advice that i should learn from some architecture book about what is the good architect and get some information and inspiration from it.
It just make sense, so I begin to take the history class and found it is very helpful for my major.
So as you can see, there are many advantages to take a history courses.
The university should require students to take the class since the students may not aware of the importance of history by themselves.

In this diversified world, it is very normal that people have different opinions about something.
However, whenever people are asked what they should do when their teachers says something incorrect in their opinions, they usually exhibit an air of uncertainty.
Should people interrupt and correct the mistake immediately?
Should people say nothing?
Or should people wait until the end of the class or meeting when there are no people around, and then talk to the teacher or meeting leader?
In my opinion, the last choice may be the best choice.
To begin with, waiting until the end of the class or meeting when there are no people around, and then talk to the teacher or meeting leader can correct the mistake in a beneficial way.
If people do not tell the teacher or meeting learder the mistake, then they may not be aware of it.
So after the class or meeting, people can talk to them about the mistake, and this can give them some time to think about the mistake seriously and correct it next time.
And in the class and meeting, there are always a lot of people, which means time is very important.
By waiting until the end, they can save much time.
So I think this is a very beneficial way both for the teacher or meeting learder and the audience.
Then, interrupting and correcting the mistake right away may be awkward for all the people present.
There are always a lot of people in the class or the meeting.
The teachers or the meeting leaders are the symbol of authority.
If they are questioned in front of a crowd of people, not only them but also the audience may have a sense of awkward.
Moreover, it is known to all that it may not be easy to find and understand the mistake right away.
So it may take some time for the professors or team leaders to think about the mistake while the audience are sitting there doing nothing silently.
This is absolutely awkward.
In another situation, the professors or team leaders may choose to ignore the different opinion in order to save some time during the class.
This may also make the person who raise the question feel awkward.
Last but not the least, I think saying nothing is the least helpful solution.

Because if no one has the courage to point out the mistake, then the professors or the team leaders may not be aware of the mistake, which means they won't correct the mistakes and some people may learn the wrong thing.
Take my own experience as as an example, when I was in junior high school, my math teacher made a mistake during the class but no one mentioned it.
So many students get bad scores during the coming test.
So say nothing is not a good solution.

To conclude, if the teachers or team leaders made mistakes, I think waiting until the end of the class or meeting when there are no people around, and then talk to the teacher or meeting leader can correct the mistake is the best

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among the public: Should people follow their dreams even if the dreams are ambitious or focus on achieving realistic goals.
Opinions vary person to person.
Some people claim that concentrating on a realistic goals is a wise choice.
However, I would stand on their opposite side and I believe that people should follows their dreams even if the freams are ambitous.
First of all, setting an ambitous goal is conducive to developing one's potential which helps to master some subjects.
It is primarily because the people would try to do their best to close the dreams, which means that the people's potential will be exploited in the process of struggling.
In the end, the people will find they has became a master in some fields.
For instance, my uncle, as a businessman, always wanted to control the market of fruits in our city.
So he researched hard in economic and then he found he have a good command of math.
Further, the people who chases an ambitious dream may have a legendary life than the people who focus on realistic goals.
This is largely because the possibility of achieving the dream is not zero.
If they encouter some chances and seize them, they will catch their dream.
And when they finished their dream, they will own a legendary life not like the other people who have a common life.
For example, my father who is scientist in a unniversity and he had a program of genetically modified foods.
It was hard to make some breakthrough in this field.
But by a mistake, a fresh idea emergied and be applied into the experiment of program.
In the end, my father succeed and received a patent.
To put in a nut shellnut, I firmly support that the people should follow their dreams even if the dreams are ambitious.
This is because an ambitious goal not only can help people to master some subjects but also help people own a legendary life.

Above all, I don't think offering school-age children money for each high grade is a good idea.
Firstly, parents should give more and more money to a child.
When a child gets high grade in school for the first time, his parents give him a sum of money.
However, when he gets high grade for the second time, he will ask his parents for more money.
It's an endless affair, and parents cannot reject.
Secondly, children who gain money after getting high grade might have a money-oriented opinion.
Actually, the most important purpose to study is to achieve knowledge.
However, for these children, they have good chances to become people who do everthing for money only.
Now they study for money.
The only reason they are willing to study is that they can get money.
I think it's an abnormal value.
Offering children who get high grade in school money is bad to their development.
The last but not least, as school-age children, they don't have too much comprehension on money.
They might think that gaining money is so easy that they will not value the chance to get a job in the future.
They may not glad to do some works with high workload when they grow up, because they will compare these jobs to their experience in school lives.
Therefore they cannot accept such high-workload jobs.
To sum up, I think that offering school-age children money for each high grade they get in school is not a good idea.
There are a lot of useful methods to cultivate school-age children's learning enthusiasm.
Therefore, in my opinion, we should not be restricted to this way.
School-age children are experiencing a golden age in mental development, so it's necessary to pay attention to the surroudings which may affect them.

This helps them to gain a foothold in society.
Then things that parents give to their children can come from here .
This is the way to pave the way for children.

One major reason for their charisma is their abundant knowledge of what is going on around the world.
By introducing the appealing news and exchanging with their new friends about their opinions, a lifelong precious friendship will occur.
What's more, the history repeats itself.
What is happening in other places can be reality in our lives someday in the future.
For example.
Ma Yun, the most successful businessman in China, was inspired by the rising of computer and internet in western countries and realized how important internet would be.
With such convinction, he strived with a team and eventually created Taobao, a magic online shopping website in China and successfully transformed into a celebrity highly resepected by the world.
If we can foresee the trend behind the global news, we will equip the power to change our future.
Finally, informed by the global news, we are more likely to cherish our daily life.
The theme of the world is love and peace.
However, in many places, warfare and conflicts have become the routine.
Those who are suffering in the war have no enough food to eat, no safe place to hide and are facing the fear of death.
The pictures and news we see will teach us how happy we are when there are always safe shelters and delicious food.
I believe that no news is meaningless.
Everything happens for a reason.
As long as we can discover the hidden side, we can obtain a key to success, happy life and an interesting soul.

I agree with the statement that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
Many people may think the oppisite way because they regard it as parents' resbonsibility to protect their children from making mistakes.
In this way, children can grow faster and aviod to waste time on the wrong way.
However I think the different.
First, making a mistake and learning from it will be a good lesson for children to grow and form their own view of the world.
When making a mistake ourselves, the consequnce of the mistake can make the lesson more impressive.
Because we feel the pain ourselves, we can think about the problem more deeply, so the next time we face similar situation, we can response to it correctly.
It is more important to learn the way to solve similar situation, but not to avoid it.
For example, if a child is not getting well with his friend, parents should let the boy think it himself.
Maybe he has a qualler with his friends, but he will learn to solve it himself.
In this way, he will learn how to treat his friends.

When talking about the television advertising aimed at young children, some people may think that it is a good idea, while other people hold the belief that it should not be encouraged.
As for me, I assert that it will do harm to the young children physically and mentally.
Concerning the physical health of the young children, the television advertising definetely has a negative effect on it.
The advertising usually ignores the misguiding effect it may bring about to the young children.
The advertising would makes the children to get addicted to watching television, since they are too young to obtain the ability of self-control.
Nevertheless,Chilren aged two to five are unable to acquire a developed cognition, which means they tend to immitate the imagitive function described by the advertising.

For instance, I have read on newspaper that a little boy who got obssessed by the flying ability of the superman in the TV advertising, then he imitated the motions of the superman and jumped out of the window on 23 floor, leading to his death.
The second is about young children's mental health.
In order to sell more products and gain more profits, the advertising would use various methods to attract children's attention.
It always describes the commodity as a luxurious one, which may mislead the children to generate a thought that I must have one.
As an result, an atmosphere of competence in appearence may spread among the children.
This could do harm to the children's mental health and aid in growing incorrect value.

In conclusion, young children should not be the audience of television advertising, since they are too young to distinguish right from wrong and are not able to control themselves in an effective way.

Everything seems to become more complex due to the rapid development of the society.
For young people, there are large quantities of abilities to learn due to their social position.

Among the abilities the ability to plan and organize is the essential, which is supported by most people.

In brief, I affirm that it is essential for young people to have the ability to plan and organize.

It is more about time, money and administration.
If a young person acquire the ability, he will find himself more relaxed when dealing with troublesome problems.

Besides, many new friends will make us spend less time on our own things.
First, we have experienced more things with the previous friends, so they know us well.
My own experience will never fail to explain this.
When I entered my university first, I made a wealth of new friends because I think the frienship is very important in my life.
But every time I have hard time in facing a task in class or contest in my department, I will still call my previous friends, because they know more about me and they can make me happy.
They can tell us how to refresh myself since I usually asked them when having exams or contest in high school and they can also comfort me as they always did.
But the new friends in the university, they will take less care of my condition or even did not pay any attention on it since they did not know how to help me and enhance my confidence.

Second, as we grow older, the friendship between us and previous friends will become more and moer pure.

They were just friends and their friendship wa pure and no impurities.
Last, admittedly, making new friends provided us more opportunities to know new people, but in fact we have less time to spend surely on friendship, which will make us unhapppy.
For example, we need to always meet and talk with differnet people to make some new friends, but then can not we truly spend some time with our friends to build and streghten the friendship.
Then this kind of friendship can not last long.
So why do not we jst spend more time with our previous friends and have the true friendship with them and enjoyed the happiness the friendship offer to us.

Recently, lots of people in the society support the utility of working with others and function as a group.
Thus, many teachers assign projects that ask students to work with their peers for learning effectiveness.
Many people believe it's a brilliant idea, but personally, I don't think working together is actually that great.
Students should work on the projects alone so that they can study in the most effective way.
To begin with, students work on the projects alone can  learn what they are really interested in to study.
In the group projects, the topic should be agreed by most of the members.
Therefore, in many cases, some students cannot choose what they really want to learn to study on and their study effectiveness is reduced by this reason.
Conversely, if all students can work on what they are really curious about as their individual group topic, their study effectiveness would be maximized.
For instance, I was in a chemistry projectr with other two classmates.

They wanted to do an experiment about burning sugars while I am pretty curious about burning different sorts of metals and plus I already knew what will happen if sugars are burnt, so in this group project I didn't learn anything new at all but wasted lot of time.
Secondly, students that work with others on the projects might rely on the group members instead of learning hard.
Free rides heppen all the times in the group projects.
Some students don't actually study very much or do contribution to the projects as much as they can.
In this situation, their learning effectiveness is really limited due to sharing responsibility with others.
Assume that everybody works alone for themselves, everyone is responsible for their own project and they will put much efforts on it therefore their learning effecitveness is maximized.

To put into a nutshell, students should work on the projects alone for their learning effectiveness because they can focus on what they are really insterested to do and can only rely on themselves instead of seeking others help.

The is a growing tendency for big companies to get their employees involved in different kinds of tasks, opinions on which are divided.
I beleive workers are usually more satisfied when they are in charge of differentiated assignments during the workday than do similar tasks all day long.
Workers occupied with different tasks all day long are easy to get a sense of achievement, either form the complexity of work but also from the variety.

Doing different tasks in a day is to some extent beneficial to our health and brains, since we are fully occupied and chaning another assignmeng means to change our brains and our ways of thinking in a short time.
It is also regarded as a way of relaxing and rest to change another task by some successful people.
People tend to get a sence of achievement at the end of the day when looking back what they have done for a whole day,which  sometimes be physical and mental demanding.
Solving different problems one by one in a day is quick to draw our full attention, creating a concentrated atomsephere inside and improve work efficiency at a large scale.
Spending all day long doing similar work is a contributor to  low efficient work.
If people continue doing the same work, it is  difficult to arouse interest,and the work will become increasingly boring and nonattractive, therefore  leading to low spirit.

Sometimes, employees may even get mental disease, for the reason that people are doing what a robot can do ,and are consistently afraid that they might be replaced by robots and machines oneday, making nerves stressed all the time.
To conclude, it is of great significance for workers to get involved in different tasks , but one thing can not be denied is that the variety and workload should be limited within one's ability.
thus we can make sure that workers are usually more satisfied when they are in charge of differentiated assignments during the workday than do similar tasks all day long.
Nowadays people gradually realize the importance of the relaxation, we tend to relax ourselves after long stressful work.
Some prefer to relax by working out.
I, however, believed that watching a movie or reading a book is no doubt a better way to relax.
First of all, for most of us, it is our minds that are really stressed out.
By enjoying a classic movie or a favorite novel, we can easily forget all the pressure on us by filling our head with the appealing plots.
For example, I love to watch comedy after a weeks' tidy works.
As long as I saw the those movies, there would be smile on my face.
Conversely, doing exercises may make our bodies exhauseted.
Moreover, activities like reading a novel can be done in everywhere and in everytime.
E-books and smartphones give us the access to movie and books when we are on subway or in canteen.
It's very convienient for us to make full use of those seperated time to relax in this way.
On contrary, doing exercise seems not appropriate in most situation.
It requires large space, big instruments and even some companions.
Besides, after doing it, it's hard for you to go back to work immediately without taking a shower.
At last, doing sports are not suitable for all of us.
Some exercises activities like american football, basketball and swimming require good body conditions.
For some disable or sick people, it's impossible for them to relax in these way.
In addition, some sports are also very competetive, which may provoke conflicts between those hot- head people.
However, reading a book and watching a movie really suits almost all of us.

The conclusion can be easily made that watching a movie or doing some reading has more advantages than doing exercises as a way of being relaxed, since its' mental relieving function, accessability and fiting for everybody.

Many people would say that parents who have a little time should play with their kids because playing with children can enhance your relationship and make children like you more.
I agree that having fun with kids can leave a happy time.
After all, when I was young I usually play with my father, we played toy cars and table tennis together, which made me love to stay with my father more than my mom in childhood.
However, from my perspective today, I hold the view that parents should utilize their limited time on kids' schoolwork.
Adimittedly, maintaining a happy relationship with kids is very important.
Without a relaxing atmosphere, kids might have some mental problems during their growing period.
On the other hand, if parents cannot care these two aspects together, doing things related to schoolwork is more significent for the following reasons.
Parents are children's first teacher.
They should play an important role in kids' academic studying.
It is impossible for kids to study well only rely on school teaching, and parents' education might have a great propotion.
Take my brother as an example, his parents, my uncle and aunt, never care about his schoolwork.
They contend that teaching children is teacher's work so they did not follow teacher's guidence to help my brother's schoolwork.
As a result, my brother had to go abroad because of his low academic performance.
By contrast, my parents usually communicate with my teachers and ask me to do homework as well as do some prepare lesson before going to school.
It is lucky for me to gain great score with the help of parents and teachers.
Children can have more fun when they play with friends, so it is not necessary for parents to use time having fun with them.
It is difficult for parents to get what kids interest in, but the same age kids can do better.
In a word, if parents can do the both aspects, it is the best choice.
But with limited time, parents should focus on kids schoolwork more.
Without doubt, parents want their school-age children to be interested in studying, and get good grades.
Some of them choose to give kids some money as a praise.
It do encourage kids to study hard, however, I don't think this way is very wise for following reasons.
The purposes of studying and exams are changed by this way.
People study for themselves, and through the process, they can harvest happiness or know what they are good at thus buid self-confident.
Money shouldn't be the final purpose to study, this will make the kids misunderstand the reasons for study and lose their way.
The purpose of exams is to check if you master the knowledge you learned before, and help teacher to know your situation on study then adjust teaching methods.
Using money as a kind of praise make the exams become tasks for kids.
In  some extent, they may get some pressure from this way.
If a children don't understand the purpose of sudying or exams, and his parents use this way to encarage him, he may cheat in exams to achieve the goal.
The kid may just want to get the money instead of learning something, so he may ignore how much effort he should put to learn well, and find a easy way such as cheating to earn the money.
My cousin Jerry was not interested in studying, so my uncle promised him if he get good grades, he will give Jerry 100 yuan as a gift.
Jerry tried to work hard and get good grades, however, he failed.
So he desided to cheat in the exam, and get the money, but this made him failed badly in a serious exam.
He can't enter the university and my uncle regrets a lot about his method.
According to these reasons, I don't think parents should offer money to their children to encourage  them to study hard.

Currently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among public: should teachers be paid at least as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some claim that teachers should not be paid at least as much as doctors, lawyers or business.
However, i hold an opposite view that teachers definitely should be paid at least as much as these workers.
First, being paid as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders may contribute to creative new ways to educate students.
It is because if there is much payment for teachers, more and more people would like to be a teacher in the future and they would have more ideas on education.
If teachers are paid for little salary, so many students would choose to be a doctor, lawyer ot business leader without devoting them to the develpment of education.
My math teacher is always complaining that he is paid too less, and he has to do some part-time job for his new house.
In this way, he just pay less attention to teaching and finally will never create some new methods which may have a better conclusion on teaching.
So, if teachers are paid as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid, they may more likely to create efficient ways for education.
Second, education is one of the most impotant fields among the development of every country.
Only if the teachers are paid as least as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid can show the importance of education while a country is quickly developing.
It is researched that China pay 3 to 4 percent of GDP on education while America pay about 16 percents of GDP on education.

It is all known that the education of America is the best around the world and teachers who work for American schools are always paid higher than other country, which is always concerned that teachers in America are paid as much as dotcors, lawyers or business leaders.
It shows that teacher should be paid more, at least as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid, to show that a country is pay much attention to develpment of education.
In summary, from what has discussed above, we can safely draw a conclusion that teachers shoud be paid as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.

With the mounting amount of pressure and tension coming from school and work, people in the contemporary society are thrilled to find methods of relaxing and releasing stress.

Nowadays, young children often make various mistakes.
It is a inevitable road that everyone must step on.
so, when facing these problems, I always agree that parents shoud let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
To start with, creativity needs one to make mistakes.
In contemporary society, it is essentially to cultivate one's creativity due to drastic competition.
However, success often follows failure.
Take Edison for instance, he invented thousands of inventions after thousand and thousand failure.
It is impossible for him to creat masterpiece if he didn't suffer such amount of failure and mistakes.
So, it is same with everyone that it is unavoidable to make mistakes when you would like to forster your creativity and become more confidencial.
Secondly, mistakes boost one's study and life experience.
As we all know, both study and life need a sum of pratical experience that can help us to adapt to the real society.
Surely, mistakes can play the role of the helper.
When we make mistakes, our brain will naturally learn the process and tell ourselves that it is a wrong way to do so, and we can get the memory quickly.
The is the most efficient way to learn a totally new thing.
In addition, this is a chance for children to accumulate study and life experience independently.
So, for parents, let their children learn the mistakes they have made is no question a best way to teach.
After all, let children make the mistakes that they should make is the proper way for parents to educate.
With the advent of the mature society, people are engaged by more things, such as working, studying or raising a family.
Some people may think the more people are doing different things, the less they are likely to do a good job.
Nevertheless, as far as I am concerned, people can still do things well on multiple things.
Here are my reasons.
To begin with, doing different things acts as an important role to add color to people's lives, which will make them excited and do a better job.
If a person only does a single thing, he may definitely get dull and find no motivation to continue.
I used to spent all my time in study and I seldom exercise.
Everytime my classmates went to play basketball when they were free, I just stayed in the classroom and read books.
As a result, I easliy got tired beacuse I found it no more interest in studying.
On the contrary, my classments who often exercised, could studied more effective and were more likely to be indulged in study and did a better job than I did.
Moreover, when being engaged in different things, people can get diverse knowledge, which can help people do a good job in another area.
In university, I came across a roomate who liked to play video games but could also do a brilliant job in study.
Playing computer games, she got to know so many attributes and functions of computers that were cirtical for wining a game.
As a result, when we studyed our major which was relative to computers, she always knew much more knowledge than any other students, which helped her a lot in her studying process.
It is true that people's energy is limited and they may get tired when facing so many things.
However, this does not necessarily mean they do few things well.
If we are burden with so many things, we can still choose the most important things to finish.
For example, when we are so busy with working, we can limit our time of playing with friends, which means we can still assure one aspect is been done well.
On the other hand, we can also learn how to manage our time and energy in that process, know how precious the time is and cherish it, which is vital in the future life.

In summary, I reinforce the idea that people can do excellent job when facing different things, for different things offers us way to get our mind off a single thing, making us understand diverse things and let us know the importance of time management.
Nowadays, people say that it is more difficult to teach children than in the past.

It is really not a problem that children will be difficult to teach now because of these.

In such a highly competitive society, people are paying an increasing amount of attention to educate children.
People's interest in the debate that whether more difficult for educating children today than it was in the past.
Different people present dissimilar opinion.
Some people in society think that educating children is easier today than in the past.
However, I disagree.
When it comes to the statement that educating children is more difficult task today than it was in the past, I strongly agree.

First of all, many technology products can disturb children to study, because they can ues a lot of time to play games on the computer and they can use cell phone to communicate with other people, they often wallow in these.
For example, I like playing computer game called LOL, when I was a junior high school student.
I discuss the LOL at school and play it after shcool every day, which leads to a serious decline in my academic performance.
My parents criticize me but I do not want to listen and argue with them, and they are worried about me playing games.
Many students have a same question, that is, should they study harder by spending more time on their own study tasts or get along well with other people.
It is a always controversial questions.
One would say that they should spend more time on their own study tasts.

However, from my point of view, the ability to relate well to people is more important than studying hard in school for reasons: They can balance their school life and they will know some people helpful for succes in a future job.
First, students can balance their school life by relating well to other people.
What they should do in school is studying hard, but it is always hard and boring for students studying for a long time every day.
Furthermore, they should enrich their time after class.
when they spend more time with other people, the problem will be solved.
Studens can spend time together do what they want to develop their friendship.
They can develop their ability to relate well to other people in campus.
Here is a real example of my friend James.
He used to be very shy person.
we became very good friends becasue both of us like to play basketball.
we spent much time together in school.
I recomended many of my good friends to him, later all of us became friends.
After we graduated and everybody went to work, he called me once.
He said he appreciated me very much because the friends I recomended to him helped him a lot about his job.
Second, students will know some people helpful for success in a future job.
It is very easy to make friends in campus, because there is much less interest dispute.
Students will make friends with people who have same major.
These people can be friends forever.
For instance, when I was studying in university, I made many friends who has same major with me -- communication studies.
We spent lots of time study when we were in campus.
After we graduated from school, most of us found jobs that related to our major.
I was also accepted by a company and my job is about jounalism.
I was confused about everything in our company.
I was too shy to ask my coworkers, so I asked one of my friends Koko who was a journalist.
He told me a lot of things that were very helpful to me.
That's how important to relate well to people in school.
To sum up, although it is very important to study hard in school, but the ability to relate well to people is more important for success in a future job.
The advantages are balancing school life and knowsome people helpful for success in a future job.

Teachers now will assign more work which need the students to work together because they think that students will learn more effectively in that way instead of one student learns the whole thing alone.
I agree with this idea for several reasons.

Admittedly, learning alone sometimes can be more effective than working in a group because some members of your group can be very noisy and they may do nothing but chatting with each other and this behavior will seriously affect your efficiency.
On the other hand, if you learn by yourselve, there are less distraction and you can learn in a more quiet environment which is good for increasing your efficiency.

Although sometimes working alone can be very productive, working with a group always can be more effiective because there are more people to finish a project which means there are more resources which can be allocated.
For example, a person needs three days to finish a project.
However, a group which contains three to four people can finish the same projet for only one day.

The reason why the group can finish the assignment much faster is that they have more people which means they can distribute the work into seperate parts and each one just needs to handle only one part of a hugh work.
In this way, each person will need to do less work but they can finish the work in less time, which shows that working in a group can be more effective than working alone.
Finally, working alone for all the time can be a very boring thing because there is nobody to chat with you.
There are just you and your assignment.
people can jsut give up whatever they are doing because of boring under this condition.
However, if you work with your teammates, when you feel bored, you can just invite your group members to have a little games between you to have a little rest.
Believe it or not, this little rest can make you very productive when you start working again because you just release yourselve and now you are ready to do more work.
Imagine that, if you just work for one thing alone for the whole day, it can drive you crazy and lead you to quit this which makes there are no efficiency to compare.

Working with your group can not only make you feel alot easier becasue you don' have to do all the work by your selve, you can also chat or play games with your teammates, it is so much fun than just working alone.
in conclusion, I agree with the idea which states that working with your group can be more effective since you just need to finsih your part in that assignment and you will not feel bored.

Some people think the books can reflect the way how someone look the world.
Others think firmly that it doesn't matter which kind of movies or books we choose.
Personally, I think the books and movies is a significant part of life, which can greatly help us to learn about a person.
As we all know, the types people reading books and movies reflect how they see the world and their view of life.
Moreover, which people had read affects their character and quality.
The person who like reading the fairy tales are more likely to be naive, and a fan of science fiction movies tend to have a great imagination.
The species of movies and books we had read have gone to be a part of us.
If you learn about a person's favorite books and movies, we will have more common topics with him, which means we are more likely to become close with each other.
As the saying goes that the best way to learn about someone is to be a friend.
Last summer I met a beautiful girl, who is so cute and smart that I really want to learn more about her.
I began to inquire about her love of books, and go to see the same film with her, which cultivate changes to discuss with her about the stories and the characters.
By this way, we became good friends, and I learn more about her unknown parts.
That's how the favorite books and movies works.
While some people think we should focus only on more significant parts like world outlooks, I believe that the books and movies are the indispensable step to learn about a stranger.
I think it's not a good idea for some parents to give their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
First,studying hard is one of the duties for a child.
During the growth,children learn much knowledge to enrich their brain and open their views.
Study should be a enjoyable thing,not a annoying stuff.
When parents award their children for each high grade they get ,it's just like to encourge them to regard study as boring work.
Second,giving money is not a wise choice to encourage children.
We can consider other ways,like going to a movie,playing in the zoo with his friends...
It will be a little early for the parents to give money as the gift to their children' achievement.
Third,parents all know it's not a easy thing to earn money and their children should know that too.
Only when the children get the first gold of their life,will they know it's how difficult to earn money--much harder than get a high grade!
Through this way,they can be more independent and nuture.
Through offering money to the school-aged children can take credict to them,
Nowadays, more and more students choose to watch movies or read books for relaxing instead of doing physical exercise.
But why not to choose to doing exercise for relaxing?
In my opinion, I agree that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book.
First, a vast of students must have experienced a tired and boring school-day.
So, what they really need is just to relax.
It is harmful to them if they insist on doing exercise, because they have used their brians frequently for a whole day.
Also, diong exercise may bring many extra pressure to themselves.
Second, Choosing a better way to relax themselves can let them be more peaceful and self-confident to the future exercise.
Watch movies and reading books may be popular ways to relax, they can relax themselves totally during the process that they can forget their pains and struggles on doing exercise.
Third, it is hard to take their variable time to relax.
And this is a good method to them to bounce back when they want to give up doing exercise.
Meanwhile, it can practice and help them to bulid their intrests and hobbies on movies and books, also can let them gain a vast of knowledge and views besides learning from the schools.
All in all, to relax by watching movies and reading books not only can decrease their pressure, but also can expand their horizons.
Always doing physical exercise just can lead them to the edge of giving up and lose confidence to themselves.
It is terrible to do it.
Namely, choose to use any other methods to relax is better than doing physical exercise, especially by watching movies or reading books.
And i suggest all students try to do this and avoid great pressure form their schools and any kind of exercise.

These are all the phenomena that shows us that people are spending too much time on the things they don't like.

Secondly, people all want to become sucessful, but through the journey to sucess, there are quantities of things that we hate a lot, even so peopple still choose to do these things because their enthusiasm to be sucessful.

In order to come up with some good ideas about advertisement, he force himself to think about three ideas about the products which are advertised on the subway he need to take to work place every day..
Even he says that this is so hard for him.

Last, some people are arguing that the park which is a place for peole to do what they want to do is uaually filled with people, and this can be used as a reason to suppor that people are tend to spend much time on things they like to do.
On the contrary, they do the things they like because they need to get refreash so that they can face the work tomorrow.
We can see people are walking in park everytime, but if you observing carefully, you can find that the expression on their faces are always show that they are very tired.

Currently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among student: We will be happier and more successful in the city than in the native village and town.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some claim that stay in the native village or town is the best choice.
However, contrary to their view comes my perspective that we need to go to different places to expand our horizons.
Firstly, move out of native village or town can have more opportunity.
To be more specific, when we go to big cities, we will be exposed to new people and new jobs, so we will have more choices in life.
On the contrary, if when stay in the native village or town.
Our job opportunities and friends will be limited because there wll be very few people in the town and native village, so if we stay long, we will have very few choices in life.
for example, i  was born in a small town of 500 people.
So our bussiness, education and economy are lagging behind than other town.
So my dream since childhood is to study and work in a big city.
At last i went to a big city, and i made a lot  of friends, so when i was gratuate, i open a company with my big city's friends and a got a lot of money and help my town to be better.
Secondly, there will be more friends in the big city.
To be more specific, because there are so few peole in the town, it's hard to find friends with the same hobbies, the right personality and even the right lover.
On the contrary, if we are i a small town, we may not find the right friends and loved ones.
If we do not find it , we wil be handicapped in life.
Because we may be alone forevery.
In my point of view ,  I personally don't agree with the oppinion that people today are more willing to help the struggling strangers.
Admittedly , there truly exist people who are very sympathetic and willing to offer strangers with enthusiasm without any feedback.
However , this phenomenom is not common.
Generally speaking , the existence of mobile phones and other high-tech products make a vital influnce on people's comunnication method .
Comparing with verbal communication , people today may prefer to use social media  which can help aviod embarrasement.
As we have stayed in such circumstance for a long time and are lack of face-to-face contact opportunity with others , our communication ability may decline .
Because of this ,we may  not be brave enough  to have further contact with strangers and offer them kindness, even though our service may be helpful to them .
For the other reason , being vigilant  when contacting with strangers is our subconscious.
For most people , they are just willing to hlep others only if they are their relatives and friends  or there exists some connection between them .
It's hard for a people to put himself into helping strangers and devote something for them.
Most of times , this only occurs  when doing this is beneficial for them because people often regard profits as a more important concern .
To conclude ,people today may be less willing to help strangers.
To be clear, I agree that young people nowadays are not given enough time to help their communities.
it's still debatable whether the children are busier compared to the past.

To begin with, some studies show that it's hard for people to find time in someone's schedule if the person did not want to do the thing.
In today's societies, more and more people move from the suburbs to cities and live in an apartment that will not have a lot of chance to talk to the neighbors.

Children have less and less time to spend with their families due to the increase of the time spent in school or homework, and not forget that we have social media.

Here are the resons.

It was parents who are much more experienced than their children.
In this case, they tended to  listen to parents' advice and let them to control determination.
As we all know, over the several decades, parents made the decision for their children who they would marry with in China.
At that time,  girls had no chance to meet the young men with the same age.
However, their parents had the permission to know their children's future partners through various ways.
Without doubt, it was a right choice to depend on their parents when making a decision in the past.
However, they can't get acess to a great amount of information, which do good to decision making nowadays.
Surfing on the Internet, clicking on the mouse, news will display on the computer screen within seconds.
What's more, after educating, they have learnt knowledge in a systematic way, which enable them to understand ourselves and the world better.
All of these create a good atmosphere for the young people to make decision on themselves.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether is more vital and decides your happiness, the ability of making new friends easily or the ability of maintaining friendship with a small group of people?
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some people claim that they think the ability of maintaining friendship with a small group of people is more important and will creat happiness.
However, I would stand on their opposite side and I believe that the ability of making new friends easily is more essential and decides happiness.
My viewpoints can be elaborated as follows.
Firstly, the ability of making new friends easily can cultivate an ability to fitting into a new environment very well.
Nowadays, teenagers become more and more shy and they prefer to stay in their comfortable zone.
They would not like to try new things or make new friends because they think they would not be accepted by them and they are worried that others would dislike them.
So the ability of making new friends easily become more and more important.
It is very crucial for people to adapt to a new environment because people can meet many good person which could bring more help to them.
Making new friends easily means that blending into a new group well.
Once people get along with new friends well, they would feel very happy because they could feel they are accepted.
For example, my brother was a very shy boy, when he graduated from his high school and came to the new university.
He told me he was unhappy everyday because he could not fit in the new friend circle well.
He felt very nervous since every time he standed out to answer professors' question, he thought his classmates would laugh at him.
Thus, his answer was not very well.
Secondly, the ability of making new friends easily can extend people's horizons.
Making new friends easily means that we can meet lots of people and learn much more things from them.
Every people would tell their unique personal experience, such as their homeland culture and their professional knowledge.
These things are priceless and very helpful and these can creat much happiness.
For example, I was a very outgoing girl and I like to make new friends.
Last year I went to Italy and met lots of people.
Some of them were American musicians, some were  Korean artists.
At that time, we got along very well and we became good friends.
They told me their traditional cultrue and I felt very excited and amazing.
All in all, I firmly think the ability of making new friends easily is more vital and decides people's happiness.
Educating children could be a lot different with it used to be, because new things have been coming out nowadays and the mind of educators are also changing.

As for the opinion that educating children is more difficult today since children are spending much time on mobile phone and Internet, it might not be that correct due to many other changes people have today.
It can't be denied that cell phone, online games and etc have been a phenomenon among the children, because they are not mature enough to manage to the addiction from electronic devices.
But this doesn't mean that children in the past didn't need to face temptation, which makes it not easy for their parents and teacher to control them.
Things like novels, TV dramas and etc are also strong attractions to children in the past, which indicates that this problem exists all the time and wasn't easier in the past.
This also requires people around the children to work on the problem together.
Despite the problem which technology brings to the children, it actually benefits more in education than the harm it does.
Nowadays children with cellphones can conveniently get in touch with their teachers and parents.
Once there's something wrong with the children, other people will be noticed as soon as possible.
It simplifies the problem which was hard to deal with in the past, and also improves the efficiency of education in an obvious way.
Meanwhile, educators today have more advanced educational minds and ways than they used to have.
While facing the problem children might have with those temptations, they can lead the children in an exact way and avoid the risk they might take in the past.
For instance, parents can set specific rules for their children to use electronic devices and encourage them to study better to gain more rewards.

Schools also have more detailed principles than yesterday protecting children from addiction, the assistance from each aspect of the society and the family is definitely building a better studying atmosphere for children.
Educating children is difficult all the time, but it needs the consistency from the educators.
Nowadays it should be easier than it used to be since people have found ways to deal more problems.
