Nowadays, a considerable of people, holding the idea that students should be awarded for their well performance in the school, claim that these will encourage them to study better.
Will, I agree with their opinion.
From my perspective, offering school-age children money for each high grade the get in school can encourage them to work hard.
Listed in the following contents, some reasons will demonstrate my opinion.
The main reason why I agree with the above statement is that money for high grades is an acception to students for their hard-working in their one-year or half-year study.
Being offered extra money by our parents means that they accpet that we have worked hard at school and they are happy about these.
So it will encourage us to try to work harder to satisfy our parents expectation.

For example, once I got extra money living expenses from my parents as an award for my high grades, I was so excited that my parents satisfied with my performence last semester and so I would try to work hard in the next semester not only to get extra money again, but also to make my parents happy.
So I gradually became a better students than I was before.

Another factor to support my opinion is that those students who are offered extra money for high grades can have the ability to eat more delicious foods or have entertainments with friends on their free time so they will be more happy and more powerful to study harder for their next extra money rewards.
And it is acknowledged that a strong willing and nice spirit can drive students to work hard.
A recent survey can back up my point.

The survey made by a university of my local town, after posting thousands of students in the university aged from 18 to 22, found that more than 80 percentages of the interviewees have the stronger willing to study just after a short vocation than those time when they have continued studying for a long weeks.
And almost all the interviewees admitted that delicious food can give them a nice spirit to study.
So more money for entertainment can drive students to study better.
In a nutshell, what we have mentioned above, when taken together, are in favor of the point that offering school-age children money for each high grades they get in school is a good idea.
Nowadays, people tend to have various ways to relax in a highly developed pace of society.
Either watching a movie, reading a book, or doing physical exercise are choices of relaxing during leisure time.
From my perspective, I agree with the statement that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than relaxing by doing physical exercise.
On top of that, physical exercise will increase the burden and intensity of body, which cannot help people achive the goal of relaxing.
Generally speaking, most people will not want to add more tensions to body after all day's work or study in order to be relaxing.
In contrast, watching a movie or reading a book will ease the body physically.
Doing exercise will even require more energy from body.
Sitting in a comfortable room, picking a book to read or a movie to watch will be easier than running and sweating.
Moreover, watching a movie or reading a book not only help to release the body, but also relaxing the mind and the brain.
Certain types of movies or books help people release better.
A comedy or love movie require less thinking of the characters or plots, so that people can appreaciate a movie without doing much thinking.
Likewise, a comic book could amuse people with funny stories, so that people can also relax by reading some funny books.
Lastly, the financial cost could be a factor when considering wether watching a movie, reading a book or doing physical exercise.
Going to a gym costs more money than sitting in a public library while reading a book or watching a movie on computer at home.
Some people would think about how much money they have spent on the gym while they were doing physical exerice, so that their mind and brain were still in an intense state.
From a financial perspective, relax by watching a movie or reading a book is still a better way.
In conclusion, taking into account all three factors, the advantages of relax by watching a movie or reading a book still outweigh the benefits of relax by doing physical exercise.

These days, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debated among people: whether teachers should be paid as the same level as doctors lawyers and the business leaders.
From my perspective, it is necessary for teachers to get the same level payment since teachers can play a significant role in our morden life, My point will be elaborated as follows.
Firstly, it is fair for teachers to get the same same money as others and this policy is conductive to building a harmonious society.
On of an impportant principles of our morden society is that people who make the same effect to the society should be paid the same money.
Receiving  the same level of money, teachers will feel satisfied about their current job and devote themselves to working hard, which is the base of a harmonious environment.
On the contrary, if teachers get less monty than people in other jobs, they may think unfire and feel unsatisfied about the government.
As a result, teachers may quit their jobs or even commit a cirme like robbary.
For example, the payment of my high school teachers is low in the past, and fifty percent of the teachers quit their job to attent businsee companies.
However after the improvement of the money, mant teachers enjoy the current job and
Secondly, receiving same payments is benefitical to improving education level.
Euqipping with a relatively high level payment, they would keep a high spirits every day, resulting in teaching more energeticly.
Satisfying with the current situation, they would find scientific methods to improving their education in case of losing the job.
On the contrary, they may pay attention to personal stuffs instead of  the teaching and show slack-workding.
A research conducted by Harvard University is the case in point, in which professors divide two handred teachers into two groups.
On get the same money with doctors, lawyers and business leaders, while the other only get a relatively little money.

It turns out that ninety percent of the high level payment group shows energetic teaching performance, well-prepared slades, and high marks in final grades, while only twenty percent of the latter group shows the same results.
All in all, considering the advantages is markable, paying the teachers with the same level money is necessary.

As Adam Smith once wrote in his famous masterpiece "A nation gets its well-being as long as it distrubutes works to its people".
It is to say that once people devote to and only to the work they are skilled in can the economy reach an efficient phase.
But that is only a perspective from the economist's view and it also has some flaws in it.
As far as I am concerned, I think it is not sensible to push people to do similar task all day long.
The reasons are the following.
First of all, people aren't so efficient even when they are doing the jobs that they are good at.
According to the recent research on the psychology, human's brain will get tired after performing the same task for a long time.
For each task repectively, it requires different parts of the brain to engage in the process.

Doing a similar job for too long means nothing but parts of the brain keep working while parts of the brain keep idling, which makes it more propone for the worker to be exhausted and inefficient consequently.
In addition, manipulating manifold tasks can also help the worker to learn the advantages they have and makes them less likely to get unemployed.
The workers in CTI, an electronic device manufacturer, always stand in the stream line, doing the same job like screwing the surface of computer.
So all the thing they know is to work like a robot.
Since the factory robot has already came into being and commercialized, in the future their jods will certainly be replaced by the robots because the robots are cheaper than human labor.

On the country, if their have the experinces of different tasks, their can form a better understanding of the production and get oppotunity to let the robots be their workers instead of being unemployed.
In conclusion, making the workers to do different works can make them more efficient and know their abilities in different tasks.
Consequently, they can gain more and seize more oppotunity and be more satisfied as a result.

History plays an important role in our daily life, expiecally throughout the education realm, but whether or not all university students should be required to take history courses no matter what their field of study is is still controversial.
Some people claim that it is not a good idea since most university students are very busy, they so not have enought time to take the course which they are not interest.
As far as I am concerned, however, I believe that all the students need to take the history courses.
To begin with, learning history will open up our mind since it can provide us a lot of intersting knowledges which we are not familiar with.
Owing to experience busy lifestyle in the high school, most university students lack of professonial history knowledge since they have not enough time to get in touch with this course.
However, in the university, students have chance to have a better understanding of history.
As we all know that the significance of history cannot be overlooked.
It not only help us to supply our background knowledge.
but also realize the outstanding of country.
In this way, those students  who are not field in history also have cahnce to know these.
Therefore, it is a good way to require all the university students to take the history courses.
On top of that, taking history cources is a good way to expand our social network.
By going to differnet courses, we will have chance to get in touch with different people, which may provide us necessary help in the future.
If we just take the course in our major, we facing with same classmate and study with each other everyday.
However, by taking the history courses, those students who are not major in the history will have a new study environment, they can commincate with those students major in history.
Moreover, when they facing some professional history problems, they can consult with them.
And in the future, the social network may also help people to solve some history field peoblems in the future career.

Judging from these evidences, we may safely arrive at the conclusion that it is beneficial for all the university students to be required to take the history courses no matter waht their field of study is.

I disagree with the viewpiont that students learn much more effectively in teamwork than work alone.
Here are my reasons.
First of all, teamwork will mentally release the pressure and lead to the result of distracted attention.
Students may think that when any problems occur, there are always team members to help them.
However, if they are assigned to work alone, they have to rely on themselves all the time, which urges them to think much more.
In additon, as we all know, teamwork provides the opportunity of getting away from individual duty.
In a Chinese story about monks, less than two monks would have water to drink, but three monks wouldn't.
Why?
Because no one wants to do more work than others.
If unfortunately the members are lazy students, they can not have the activity to finish the teamwork.
Last, working together means breaking tasks.
In theory, every team worker only shoulders parts of the whole obligation and need no to care about the other tasks.
Obviously, they can not learn as much as students who solve all the problems alone.
All in all, I do think that working alone on projects gives the best opportunity for students to learn complementary knowledge.
To be honest, this may be harder and slower in effects which can be saw from the surface, but students will learn real konwledge once they finish the tasks alone.

Many are concered about how to apply a correct teaching modes among teachers and there is a particular concern that whether teachers ask students to finish assignments together or just one student accomplish by himself.
From my standpoint, I consider that colarborative group could benifit students better becasue of several reasons.
First of all, the student in your team could help you to figure out the problem which is hard to you.

For instance, I major in Computer Science and once teacher asked us, formed a 4 student group, to bulid a program by language C. I am good at write language codes, however I nearly can't build up the framework, which is the basic step for a program.
If I were along, this homework would be impossible for me to accomplish.
But a friend of mine taought me how to work out this problem and he entirely instructed me how to apply by hands to hands.
Because of the group work, I really benifited a lot and that made sence.
On the other hand, group work means more effective because each student of the group can finish one part of the assignment , then combines all parts together.
Imaige one person finish a work cost 8 hours per day and last about fortenight.
What about another person join in the work.
These two guys, also work 8 hours per day, only need one week to finish the assignment.
In additional, one add to one sometimes even equal to 3 and 4, that is the function of colarborative work.
In conversely, people who work alone may lose their passion, they feel more and more bored and have no aspiration to work out a diffcult problem.
Accordingly to a recent study, If someone else has a competition to you, you will feel more confident and all things you want to do is beat him.
Therefore in a group projects, some students are better than you, you aspire to beat them  and work hard to gain more knowledge.
In conclusion, the group mode for student is a better mode in education for three mainpoints.
More effective, More passions and More gains.

For this prompt, it discussed the parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
I agree with this topic because it is important for the children to learn how to do the things correctly.
To begin with, the children always make mistakes.
The parents cannot stop them to make mistakes.
When the children make mistakes, some parents will to help their children to solve the problems, but some of them will not do this.
I command  the second way to let the children themselves to sovle the mistakes.
For example, if the children did the homework at a wrong way.
They can get the correvt answer by thinking of the correct way.
If the parents to help the children to do the homework, then the children cannot do solve the problem correctly forever.
So, the parents should let the children deal with the problem by themselves.
Secondly, correcting the mistakes can help the children to develop their intalligence.
For instance, when they make some mistakes and nobody to help them, they will think about the resolution to solve the mistakes.
If they do so, they might be not doing the same question in a same wrong way.
However, if the children make a big mistake, the parents should not let them to solve by themselves.
This is because the children are too young to deal with some big questions.
For example, the children broke a bowl.
For this situation, the parents should help the children pick up the pieces of the bowl and tell them how to deal with the similar problem in the future.
It can help the children to develop their abilities.
In conclusion, I think the parents should let the children to deal with the mistakes by themselves.
It not only can learn from the mistakes, but also could improve the children's abilities.
As we all know, people soon get bored if they keep doing the same tasks for a long time.
When face with various missions, it is easier for people to obtain a great sense of fulfillment after accomplishing everything.
As far as I am concerned, i strongly recommend workers to do a variety of tasks everyday instead of the similar tasks all day lond.
My reasons are as followed.
To begin with,  different tasks enable employees to refresh themselves and thus ensure the work efficiency.
Adult as we are, it is easy for us to get tired of the same repetitive work everyday.
Taking school teacher as an example, it is said that most teachers will become tired of their job in the hope of quitting it.
However, these teachers are as energetic when they started to teach as it is their ideal job.
I believe it is years of same teaching content that brings the tiredness of most teachers.
On the contrary, if workers need to cope with various of things in their work, they will find it more interesting and be more willing to get involved in their work.
Secondly,  shorter and easily finished tasks can give works a sense of accomplishement.
For instance, I will feel happier and more satisfied with myself at night if only i do lots of things in the daytime.
Time is limited, every moring, i will spend some time making a to do list so that i will be aware of my tasks.
If there are something which is not time-consuiming and easy to finish, it will be my top priority.
In other words, i contend that workers gain joy from accmoplishing their jobs.
If this job will take them a whole day, they will mostly be reluctant to do it.
Last but not least, working on one mission for all day long will reduce worker's positivity.
It is said by some scientits after several experiments.
therefore, we should avoid giving workers the same taskes .
In this way, not not the workers can become more excited and easy in doing their work, the bosses will also gain benefits since they may receive less complaints and have a higher work efficiency.

Working together plays a vital role in finishing project.
When students work to finish the projects whether work together can help them learn mor effectively than work alone is controversial.
As for me, I believe that students working together can indeed be more effectively.
First, when students work together, they can supervise each other and encourage other students to finish the project.
As we konw, finishing project is always boring, when some students lost their interest, it's necessary for their mates to help concentrate on the project again.
A typicl illustration is my friend.
He used to do everything alone without others' help and supervise.
However, when he was exhausted, he found it hard to control himself, he always palyed games or did other things which can help him be relaxed, which waste most of his time.
And at the end, he even could not finish the project in time.
To solve the problem, his teacher asked some of us to do the project with him.
Finally, we indeed finished the project well.
According to this, undoubtfully it can help us finish the project.
Second, with the team work, we can learn more than we do projects on the own.
When we do things in group, it means we will also learn something except the teacher wants us to konw, such as how to deal with the problems together or how to get on with other teammates.
For example, I used to be very shy and I always felt uncomfortable when I stay with strangers.
But mt teacher always asked us students to some work together, which forced me to be outgoing and try to make friends with others.
To tell the truth, it really helpful.
Now I am used to cooprating with others, and I indeed thank what I learn from those group works.
This can well prove my idea.
On the other hand, though work alone may can develop students' inpendence, it can just give a little benefith to them.
Ther are many other better and more effective methods to do that, and perhaps this is due to their parents.
What teachers should    do is to lacture how to live when they come to the society.
There is no doubt cooprating is vital in everyday life.
All in all, in my opinion, asking students work together can indeed help them finish it and encourage them to learn more.

Nowadays, the importance of colabaration is gradually more and more highlighted by the public for the growing sophisticated works in our highly developed society.
From the long-run moonlanding projects building rockets and spaceshuttles to the constuction of a school canteen, the essence of teamworking is irreplacible.
Hitherto vitrually all the education systems have focused mainly on the magnificance of teamworking, that explains why sometimes teacher assign projects on which students must work together.
As far as I am concerned, students not only learn more knowledge in a relative efficient way, but also equiped with the quality to deal with the sophisticated works in future career.

Firstly, the necessary pattern called brainstorming being existed in the teamwork, more ideas can be put on the scene when the group members sitting in a circle coming up with their different thoughts.

Not only can student gain the chance to gather different thoughts in an acoustic way, realizing where are their thought deadends, but they can have their critical thinking ability emerged by intensively comparing the various ideas, Numous benefits, including the ability to gather ideas and to think critically, are of great importance in increasing their efficient and accuracy in future study during the schooling.

Moreover, while collaborating with others, every student have to be awared that there will exist frequent agrees and disagrees in the groupworking ubiquitously, thus makes it vital for all the students to know how to stand for themselves as well as how to conpromise with others.
This ability, after being trained in schools, for example,can be widely applied into social affairs in the future when graduates in their careers face with dilemmas between the work and friendship.
Certainly students can learn something effectively far more than textbooks by teamworking.

In contrast, when a student is managing to figure out a problem in solo, chance is that he/she will likely run into deadends and without the help of others, it is difficult for one to find a proper solution out.

Plus, a student, being effected by the loneliness of workling alone, will convincingly reduce the work efficiency and the knowledge one can learn from working, and with passimistic emotions, a student may learm less effectively.
Anyway, it is glad to see that a great number of parents and teachers are paying more and more attention on the caracteristic of teamworking of the juveniles.

And with proper training during the schooling by finishing numerous teamworking projects, a graduate can be qualified enough with flourishing professional skills as well as socializing abilities, and can truly gain advantages in the fierce competitions.
Nowdays, there still many works in the world needs workers to do the same single things all day long.

And I think it's better for both the employers and emploees.

When I was in primary school, one of my best friends lost her parents because of a car accident.
Since then, she missed her parents more often than before.
In contrast, I spent most of my time with my parents and felt less care about them than my friend does.
This contradictory leads me to think a question that whether people should understand the importance of relationships through being away from people they love.
Personally, I disagree this statement.
First of all, being far away from your friends or relatives has negtive impact on the interactions betwwen two person.
You have to admit that everyone in this world cherish the moments that they spend with their closest person.
If you're far away from your friends, you will not be able meet them and have conversations with them as usual.
You lose the chance to talk about your innermost feeling and thoughts that cannot be impressed through telephones or social media.
And as we all kown, relationships need connection betwwen two person to maintain.
Since you have less interactions in this relationship, you would think it's unnecessary and forget it soon or later.
As a result, being too far away leads to the end of the relationships.
Moreover, being far away from your friends or relatives produces unreasonable conflicts to the relationships.
Take my friend and her boyfriend as an example.
They used to sustain a good relationship, however, my friend was sent to a out-of-the-way town to teach children there.
From then on, my friend always thought her boyfriend would cheat on her because she was not be able to company him.
Therefore, she kept asking her boyfriend where he went, who he met today, and so on.
At the end, her boyfriend was tired of her questions and broke up with her.
Distance would lead you to think the person you love are doing things that you don't like and want to know every details about days they has been through.
In the long term, that person will feel exhausted and want to end the relationship.
All in all, I think being far away from those person we love is actually a damage to maintain the relationships since distance can produce more conflicts and less interactions.

Rencently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate: whether young people today are more likely to invest their time and efforts in improving the world than young people in the past.
Opinion varies from person to another.
Some claim that young people are not willing to put more time and efforts in improving the world that young people in the past.
However,  contrary to their view comes my perspective that the young people distribute more time and efforts in changing the world than before.
My points are elaborated as follow.
Firstly, with the development of society, the young people could obtain more feedback if they choose to improve the world.

Today, the company and government are willing to provide more position to the young people and increase the sallery rapidly than before, which encourage the passion of young people to work harder in different areas, such as inventing efficient electronic equipment, building beautiful bridge, improving the method of teaching, so that the world is improved quickly.

By contrast, in the past, the sallery is relatively low, leading to the difficulty of meeting basic needs, so it is impossible for the young people to invest their time and efforts to improve the world.

Imaging the situation, if a man could gain a well-paid job as a engineer, which could guarantee him a high quailty of daily life, besides the earning money for making a living, he could distribute much time to improve the appreance of bridge.
In addition, the developed education arouses the awareness of making the contribution to the society.

Becasue the students obtain much more knowledge, so that it is likely for them to realize that they take a lot of benefits from the society, such as the chance of studying in the senior high school for free.
so they should take the responsibility of improving the world.

By contrast, in the past, without these knowledge, they would pay more attention to themselves and don't understand the importance to make contribution to the society, so they would not invest their time and efforts to improving the society.
For example, a fifteen years old people who has no chance to study in the senior high school work with his workmates.
Under this situation, the every day conversation is about the sallery, the price of the meat or the beautiful car and clothes.
So he could not realize the importance of the contribution to the society, and he also can't eveluate the import of society on him, and he is not willing to make feedback t

In conclusion, it is necessary to repeat my view that the young people is likely to invest their time and efforts to the society than before, because the society could give more feedback, and the contain the awareness of making the contribution to the society.

It is known to all that we are living in a demanding society.
So from children to old people, they all should work hard to live in this society.
Nowadays, people always pay numerous attention to the education of children in order to help them have a bright future.
In this way, I agree that parents today are more involved in the education of their children than were parents in the past.
To begin with, parents nowadays are required to pay attention to their children's study.
With the development of technology, the forms that children do their homework are changed.
Teachers may send the homework of the student to the wechat groups, which the children's parents are in.
And then, parents are asked to monitor how their children do their homework and give feedback to the teachers.
Moreover, sometimes parents are asked to attend parents' meeting more often than in the past.
In this way, parents now are always required to be involved in their children's education.
Then, parents now often help their children decide what to do in children's spare time.
Since the society is very competitive, all the parents want their children to be better than other children.
So they always decide which class their children are to take, and when their children should study at home and when they should go to class.
Take my sister as an example.
My sister is only 6 year old, who is just in the first grade.
Her parents don't want her to fall behind others, so they decided that she should go to the dance class on Saturday afternoon in order to make her look more confident and slim.
And they also suggest that she should go to a math class on Sunday morning.
So parents nowadays often help make decisions in their children's education fields.
Last but not the least, although parents in the past were also caring about their childrens education, they are less involved in the education process.
Parents in the past paid more attetion to the living condition of the family, so most of their time were devoted to their work.
They usually just told their children to act good in school, and they do nothing to help them study.

This is also because that few people in the past knew that education is fundamental to children's future and the society background is very different that it didn't need people to pay a lot of attention to education.

To conclude, though parents in the past and now all pay attention to their children's education, it can't be denied that parents nowadays are more involved in the education process of their children than are parents in the past.
As far as I'm aware,I think it's a good idea that school-age children should be offered money for their high grade getting in school.
Firstly,money can servre as a catalyst for those who don't have much interset or confidence in study.

What's more,children may get a significant topic from this idea  that persistence and intelligence is what it takes to fulfill their goals.
Every time they are provided with money in the exchange for their marks,they will be joyful and start fighting for a larger progress without a hesitation.
Last but not least, mothers will be comforted in this process that their money is used in a correct way.
In the past,their sons or daughters may ask them for money for no reason but now everything happens for a reason.
I do not agree with this statement.
I think it depends on  workers' personalities and ability.
A wide range of  tasks might make some people feel more interesting and freshing.
But for other people, they will find them too hard and complex to finish.
All kind of work need to be finished in one day , which can make workers crazy.
They need to pay attention to different things and think different ideas to cope with these tasks.
So i think this relies on people's personality.
Some individuals like to deal with many different types of work.
They think doing like this has more challenge for them.
While others hold the view that this will make work more complicated.
If this situation happens, their feelings will be influenced.
What is more, their efficiency will reduce.
The second reason is workers' ability.
Among workers, there are some people who have good capacity or not.
I think a company is like a class where there are students with different academic performance.
In one class, the teacher arranges four assignments.
The top students can finish them quickly with high rate of correction.
By contrast, students who do not absorb knowledge only can complete two or three homework in one class.
If you require them to do four, maybe they will do them without careful heart.
So there will be many falses in their homework.
Finally, the poor grades will have a negative effect on their confidence on study.
So do that in the company, the quality of tasks finished can be impacted.
When a boss has some work, he needs to take many aspects  into consideration.
One standard does not suit for everyone.
In conclusion, when workers meet various tasks, they may not feel more satisfied.
Also, they may think similar tasks are not boring.
People with different personalities and ability respond this situation differently.

As far as I am concerned,it's a good idea that children will get reward when they get high mark in school.
On the one hand,it wil atract children to study harder to get the gifts from parents,on the other hand,the reward they have got wil encourage them to study more harder for the next test in school.
It will make a positive circle that make children's passion grow and get a good grade.
As for me,when I'm in the high school,every month we will participate in the "per-month test",depite of the pressure from school,parents's care to me is also a big burden.
So how can I solve this question?
Eventually I found that I like animate,those figures of characters from animation will make me feel relaxed.
Then I make a deal with my parents,"As if I get good marks in the per-month test,I will get a animate figure which I want."
In fact,this deal works.
Becuase I have not enough money to purchase animate figure as a high school student,so the only way to get the things I want is to make a good mark in the exam.
And how I can get good grade?
Apparently,studying harder and harder.
A quite simple way,doesn't it?
Exactly,sometimes I can't reach the mark-line what I needed,so there is no reward for me,but it doesn't matter.
As an old saying goes,"failure is the mother of success."
I miss the reward this time,next time I will try me best to win back!
This kind of idea always encourages me to hold on at the way of study.
Finally,when I end my high-school life,What I have harvest are the letter of admission of a good university,and lots of animate figure I like.
What a great business for me!
So I agree that parents should offer school-age children money when they get high grade in school.
The educational problem can always draw a lot of attention.
All parents hope to enducate in an appropriate way which is better for their kids to grow up.
In the process of kids growing up, praising and puishment is two topic we can not avoided.
What is the best way to reward and what is proper to punish obsess all.
Nowadays, some parents offer their children money for high grade they get in school.
As far as I am concerned, this is not appropriate for school age children.
Admittedly, reward is a good way to encourage children to do better in the next time.
I can not agree with rewarding children better.
But money is the worst thing as a reward.
Here are the reasons.
First of all, the school-age children do not have the ability to deal with money.
When they get money, they will tend to use money for toys, computer games, even cigerates or other things which may be harmful for their growing.
It is hard for them to distinct which is beneficial and which bad.
They just justify by their own preference.
When the right to decide how to spend money rely on themselves, it will be hard to control in the future.
Asking their parents for what they want may be a better way.
So that their parents can help them to justify whether they want is proper.
In addition, it is not a good way to build their attitude toward money.
When parents always take money as an reward, children will think that only money is valuable.
They can use money to get whatever they want.
But this kind of thought is not appropriate for kids.
Reward should be a kind of thing which can encorage children to study they want.
Reward shoud be guide which let children to pursue their interest such as their favorite books or the painting utensil rather than money which can fufill their lure.
Other kind of reward will be more helpful.
To sum, there is no doubt that reward is a good way to encourage is a common sense.

Some people may think that if workers do similar tasks all day long, they will be more satisfied for a reason that their work life will become more and more smooth to handle becasue of their increasing skills in this kind of work.
However, I hold a utterly different kind of view.
The workers will be more satisfied when they have many different types of tasks to do.
First and formost, people will undoubtedly develop a sense of achievement when they learn something new.
And that is the case.
Workers who have different types of tasks are surely more likely to handle new skills and knowledge than those who do similar tasks all day long.
Meantime, that kind of achievement will uplift their spirit and push them being more energic towards their works.
Second, they will get safety from doing so.
As is known to us all, the less skills the work demands, the more suitable people are.
And competition, which is the main pressure many labors who lack various skills faced up with, comes to rise.
If more skills are handled, the worker will become more valuable to the company.
And as a result, he or she is less likely to be replaced by individuals who are more competitive.
This kind of safety can undoubtedly strengthen their satisfactory.
Last but not the least, workers can attain pleasure by socializing with others if they have different types of work assigned.
In many companies, the working zones are divided by the kind of work that will be done in this area.
It is obvious that you are capable to meet and socialize with more people if you can go to more zones through doing different kinds of tasks.
Once you own many friends rather than strangers in you company, a harmonous atmosphere will come into being around you which leads to happiness and satisfactory.
All in all, when workers have different types of tasks to do during the workday, they are more satisfied.
They will attain pleasure from learning new skillsï¼Œachieve a sense of safety for less likely to be replaced and be merged into a harmonous atmonsphere because of enough socialization.
With the development of the society, more and more people put a premium on their leisure time, during which they can chhose to raise a pet.
Now a heated discussion arises about whether it si beneficial for children to keep a pet.
Some people hold the opinion that children can benefit little from keeping a pet while others hold the opposite viewpoint.
As far as I am concerned, I endorses the latter for a couple of reasons.
To begin with, keeping a pet help children maintain both physically and mentally healthy.
Imagine this senery: when children finish their tasks at school and go back home, they may be tired.
However, if a pet such as a dog greet with them or even kiss them, they may feel relaxed at this moment,so pets can release their pressure temporarily.
Besides, chidren will set aside some time with their pets, like running after pets, hang out with pets, play ball with them and some other sports, in which both the pets and chidren can exersise.
In a result, chidren's body state can be improved.
On top of that, chidren can gradually establish a rational view on responsibity when taking care of pets.
To iilustrate, when a child wants to keep a dog, he need to feed the dog, play with dog and train the dog.
What is more, if the dog get sick, he may have to find this situation ang take the dod to hospital in time.
In this process, he acts as the dog's parent, and can feel it is his resibonsibilty to take care of the dog.
In addtion, he can gradually understand love of his parents, and aprriciate his parents, which can help him become more understanding.
All in all, it is true that keeping pets mat take up children's somen time and have a risk being infected.
However, pets not only are able to help children keep healthy ,but also make them be responsible.
Considering these benefits, I strongly agree that keepin pets is beneficial to kids.

As more and more entrepreneurs are reported to manage to establish their companies, more scholars become well-known for their brilliant discoveries, and more celebrities gain fame and be loved by the multitude, some ordinary people are inspired to achieve success.
Admittedly, success is important, but it is more significant to keep happy and optimistic in the face of failure.
To start with, without an optimistic mind one can hardly succeed.
To be specific, the process towards success is filled with obstacles and difficulties.
Those successful businessmen and the celebrities are the very small part of the hard workers, while the rest of them have to face the failure and disappointment.
In this case, under no circumstances can they achieve success and harvest power and wealth without the spirit of persistence and optimism.
In other words, they need to keep trying with the aid of optimism unless they succeed eventually.
For example, Abra ham Lincoln, one of the most famous US presidents, is an excellent point.
Before he achieved success in the election, he had suffered from numerous disasters such as several bankrupts, divorce, and even mental diseases.
However, tough as he was, he managed to tide the difficulties over, trying over and over again and performing better after each failure.
Eventually, he was elected as the president and led the north to win the civil war nad abolish the slavery.
Besides, success is not everything but only one way to attain happiness, but optimism offers the key to happiness.
To illustrate, as the ancient Greek scholar said, happiness is the ultimate end of one's life.
In other words, people are not born to seek for success but love and happiness.
In this society, people are prone to be anxious because of the overwhelming reports about success of the wealthy and famous.
In this way, people are triggered to be disappointed of their relatively tedious lifestyle and urge to experimence the perfect life that the successful persons enjoy.
Nevertheless, success may not the real target for some people.
Some persons feel lonely and less happy after they become famous and prestigious, and therefore miss the ordinary and peaceful life when they were ananimous.
As a result, the mindset of keeping optimistic and happy of the present life is much more important for everyone.

To sum up, although success may provide people with happy and the sense of fulfillment, the mindset of remaining happy and optimistic is much more essential for people to look for the door to happiness.

Do you think it is important for a student to have some sports acticities in their spare time?
So will you balance your sports and study time?
From my perspective, I really agree with the statement that sports and study should be regared as equal and then get the same financial support.
Only if we have healthy and energetic body, we can have the capital to study.
A strong body is the basis to study, let alone study in a high efficiency.
Yaoming, a famous Chinese basketball player, is a typical instance to support my point of view.
When he was a high school student like most of the students, he finished a bunch of assignments given by teacher, had highly intensed classes everyday and so on.
But he always slept on class and is really lacked energy during the study process.
After getting familiar with the importance of sports, he tried to have exercise everyday.
He became really enjoy the sweating from running, the breathing after jumping and so on.
What's more, he never slept on the class anymore and he felt extremely rejuvenated after some appropriate sports acticities, so the study effiency is greatly increased a lot.

We can obviously know that having sports acticities can help us have a health body, which is necessry during study, and then we can both have some rest in the exercise time and study in a more high efficiency.
Thus, the importance between should be regared the same and definitely get the same financial support from universities to build more sports facilities and chances for students.
Although social activities seem like a kind of entertainment, it can really teach us a lot which can not learn from the books in library and the teaching from classes.
Taks myself, a social activities lover in high school, as an example to illustrate my own statement.
I love participating social activities, including present exchange party, birthday party, dance meeting, speech matches, club activities and so on.
All I dois try my best to join in those social activities in my spare time as much as I can.
The difference between my and those people who only seat in the class is that I was more outgoing and can communicate with others fluently without out any nervousness.
Also, my friends are always much more than them, so I never feel lonely and boring in my study time.
Thus, the universities should spend their money also on holding some social activities for those people who are really shy and only love studying but can not do nothing when they leave the class.
Social ability is necessary in everyone's life and can be only learned from the true condition but not the books and teacher's theories.
In summary, universities should give financial support the same as the classes and sports activities.
No one is less important than the other one,

During the growth of the children, some situations will always bother the parents, and a part of the parents are trying their best to guide children to distinguish the mistakes and allow them to learn from the experiences.
I totally agree with   the idea of those parents, and i believe most of the pupils would draw a lesson from the unexpected.
Firstly, it can cultivate their responsibilities.

According to the database from bureau of education, almost 80 percent of kids will not be able to manage their own stuff, and 5 percent of children even can not ensure their own safety; only 15 percent students master how to live independently.

And after the interview of those ''special'' kid's parents, people learn that their children learn more more than the pupil in their parents's warm shield, they can make a lesson after having a real moral, not only emulating the ''book learning'' from their parents talk.
And those kids wiil have a faster mobility and the ability of deformation after all.
Secondly, the over-protected children will not be able to be independent, even worse.
For instance, a famous ''mommy boy'' in the news, he even can not take care of himself, and his mother is always surronded by him even he went to the college.
That is the result of over-protected.

While the layer of coddle covering the children, we believe we can harvest a perfect kid, but eventually, he will become a disabled person just like a real one who has no ability to handle any situations even a piece of cake.
At last , the mistakes can help with the development of confidence.

If a person who never been through the tough, once he met some diffculties, he may do cowardly things and choose to escape from the reality; this is the behavior of lack of confidence., while one people who is full of experiences after having lots of mistakes and problems, he will figure out how to make things right and do whatever he can do to give a solution.
All in all, a lyric show the story of this idea ''there is a love called letting go, beacuse their hands we learn ourselves''.
Indeed, this is the best way of learing in a real life.
With the proliferation of Internet, many civilian hope government could spend more money on it for its order.
However, I am frown on the comment that it is more important for govenments to spend more money to improve Internet access than to improve public transportation because I have several reasons.
Firstly, investing more money on public transportation are benefit to ecosystem.
Variety of industries of public transportation are purchase some low quality equipment to produce those transportation, which gives off too many waste gases and cause unecessary waste.
Therefore, the environment is polluted severly and the original ecosystem is damaged.
Like the river, instead of oxygen, now is full of sulfer dioxide.
Therefore, increasing fishes are die out and the predator of these fishes are endangered.
However, increasing the investment can reform those equipment, so that the efficiency can be boosted a lot and there are less wasted material could be remained.
In addtion, increasing the investment in such area could convenient people's life.
Nowadays most people search Internet just for entertainment.
However, every person needs to adapt in their live, and they could not live withoutbpublic transportation, because they need to go to school, go to work or go to the hospital.
Therefore, public transportation play a pivotal role in their life.
Admittedly, investing money to improve Internet access is important, becuase many people spread some fake imformation on Internet, which would disturb the tranquil life of civilian.
However, spending money to improve public transportation is significent too, since numbers of lives of human-being are losing because of government ignore the the safety of some transportation.
The internel engine, for example, are not qualified but equip on many buses which cause a number of exploration events.

there should be more effiective and variable methods to tell children that they have a good job.

Just as the ancient Greek scholar says, happiness is the ultimate target of one's life.
It is so crucial that almost every mortals spend their whole lives on seeking happiness.
In this modern world, finding a suitable job other than having a excellent social life is very significant to attain happiness.
To start with, people's work determines their life quality, which directly influence the sense of happiness.
To be specific, if a person manages to get a decent job with a bright prospect, it is more likely to gain massive salary and bonus from his career.
As we all know, Money is the financial basis of one's life, which determines one's life quality, allowing him to feel careless and relax most of the time.
On the contrary, ordinary people who possess limited wage are possible to struggle to make a living, not to mention looking for happiness.
For example, Tracing back to may school age, my family was always worried about the next meal for lack of money after my father's company broke down.
However, since we opened a little supermarket in the neighborhood and more money was comming to our packets, we moved to a bigger house in a rich region.
Furthermore, my parents did not have to be cautious about how to make a living and feel less stressful than before, allowing us to spend more time on going to the park and travel across the world.
As a result, we taste the sweet of life and feel the sense of happiness.
Besides, people are able to afford the sense of achievement if they can choose a adequate job.
To illustrate, apart form sleep time, work time occupies most of the life, as most of us have to work over eight hours to make a living.
If people can find jobs that to their tastes, it is likely they feel proud when they achieve something unique and great.
In this way, people will find their lives more meaningful and find the key to happiness.
On the contrary, if a person feels tedious and boring about his work, he is likely to lost and miss the direction of his life.
As consequence, he can hardly gain enthusiasm and pride out of his work and feel like wasting lots of energy and time on something he is not interested.
For example, my major is computer science, which is my favorite subject and I am willing to work as a software engineer for the rest of life.
Coding programs not only can make me indulged but also give me the sense of achievement when I conquest some technological problem.
To sum up, to get the key to happiness, people should find a job that to their taste.
Although social life may have significant impact on it as well, but people's career determine one's life quality and achievement.

Past several decades have witnessed the unparalleled development of society.
Meanwhile, our life style to relax has undergone profound changes as well.
It is widely admitted that movie or reading is a popular way to relax.
To me, personally, i believe that doing exercise is better than watching movie or reading books.
First of all, exercise can let people get more healthy body.
That is to say, by doing exercise, people not only relax themselves but become more healthy as well.
A good case in point, a study has done hy Harvard University estimates  almost 87% people through exercising can freefrom serious diseases such as cancer.
Furthermore, the result showa that individuals acquire better condition of mind by doing physical exercises than watching books or movies.
Hence, exercises can help people more relax than enjoying books and movies.
What's more, people can make more friends through doing exercise.
People are social animals , so they need some friends to share with their feeling.
To put it more concise, by exercising to relax, peple not only can reduce the pressurebut also can make more friends to share their sadness and bad motion.
Take myself as an example,when i am feeling very upset, i usuallygo to find some friends to play baseballs.
It is really an effective way to relax.
Irrefutably, coins have two sides, some people may say that people do not worry about either where to do exercise or find someone else to exercise with them.
Through watching books or movie to relax, they can just enjoy the ime to relax themselves, and they do not have to consider about these kind of problems.
However, the idea is hard to convince people due to the fact that sometimes individuals do not have opportunities to watching the content of books or movies what they want .
They will feel more upset ans even angry because they toally waste their time .
Have they gone to exercise , they will definitely do not worry about they dislike the kinds of physical activity owing to the fact that people choose he exercise they are good at.
All in all, for the reasons described above, i definitely believe that exercising is an excellent way to relax than watching books and movies.

However, we still use the avune to contact with others instead of only our extended family.

Nowadays, many people worries that the Internet provide too much information, which can cause many problems.

Teacher is deemed as a career to impart knowledge to students at school.
Recently, a heated topic is about whether teachers should be paid as well as doctors, lawyers or business leaders.
In my opinion, I do not think teachers' payment should be high but should not be compared with other vocations.
Admittedly, some people may concern that teachers are devoted to teach students through their whole life.
They have to study and improve their teaching methods constantly, so they should be paid as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders.
However, doctors, lawyers and business leaders are also devoted to their careers.
They should not only spend more time on learning about their careers, but also be more careful when they are working.
For example, doctors have myriads of operations to do during their life.
Every operation is vital to them because they are reponsible to the patients' life.
Once they are careless when doing an operation, they might lose their jobs and will not be admitted to the medical realm any more.
Thus, they should be paid high so that they could able to pay more attention on their work.
Moreover, business leaders have to manage big companies with many staffs.
They should make great stategy to run the business of their companies, also manage the people who are working in the companies.
It is of great requirement to make a company thrive.
The leaders should make wise dicisions
From what has been mentioned above, we can draw a conclusion that teachers should be paid high but their payment cannot be comparable with doctors, lawyers or business leaders.

Nowadays,some parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school .
They think it is an effective way to motivate their children to study hard .
Well I hold the opposite idea against them .
Firstly ,studying is a thing that will go through everyone's life which means that studying is a permanent thing not a temporary thing .

But parents'behavior like giving money to children to make them study hard won't garentee children enjoying studying, even leads children's value to a wrong way-I shpuld study hard not because I enjoy studying but I can get rewards from parents.
So the problem such kind of value contributes to students not enjoy studying in fact.

In addition , another problem this kind of behivor bring is that as the children grow up, they become difficult to be satisfied ,they will ask more and more ,and the parents will find is getting harder and harder to meet their children's meets .
Once parents can't meetb their children's needs ,children may even refuse to study hard ,such king of ending is totally opposite from parents' original expectations .
So as far as I am concerned ,helping children build up their interests in studying and encourage them when they make some progresses in time is the only correct way .
Here is an example : in some foreign countries ,parents will feed new-born babies a spoon of honey dropped on the page of book.
Through this way ,parents convey an idea to their children that reading books is just like drinking honey which makes you feel delightful.
Above all, it is totally wrong for some parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
Parents should make sure that children enjoy studying ,if not they should try their best to help children build up interests .
For studying is a permanent job , the money it self  can only make children study hard temporarly .

When I' m woking, I prefer to have many different kinds of tasks to do and I can work more efficiently and achieve more.
If I do similar tasks all day long I would feel tired and I can't feel a sense of achievement.
So from my perspective, I support workers to do various tasks during the workday instead of complete similar tasks.
First, doing a vaiety of tasks a day enable workers to be more efficient.
Many reseaches show that human use different part of the brain when they are doing different tasks.
For example, human's right part of the brain is more active when they are communicate or writing, on the contrary, while we are doing logical works, the  left side of the brain is more active.
If we do the same job all day long the single section is  active all day thus  our attention can not be concentrated and our work efficiency can be low.
By contrast, if we do different tasks the active section of the brain can change, therefore we can easily concentrate on one task.
Second, if we can do many kinds of tasks one day we'll feel more sense of fullfillment.
Because doing various task need we to think from different pespective and aspect and even motivate our creativity, these abilities can also be strengthened by always doing a variety of tasks.
It will benefical to your future career.
What's more, if we finally complete these task a day we can learn more and feel more sense of achievement.
Finally, doing a similar tasks can easily get tired and people can be more likely to get lazy.
Similar tasks can be tedious if we do it all day long and may lose the enthusiasm of the job,then we may get tired of the job let alone the prospect of the job.
Howerver doing various task can be more interesting and challenging to us, thus inspire us to learn more and be more excellent.
Overall, doing various tasks a day is beneficial to one's ability and career development.
Many people nowadays will encounter many occasions that your teachers or your leader says somethings incorrect.
Some people may be in consideration of their relationships or careers and choose to say nothing.
However, as for me, I prefer to wait until the class or meeting is over and the people are gone, and then talk to the teacher or meeting leader.
Waiting until the the class or meeting is over and others are gone and then talking to the teachers or leaders is the basic respect to the teachers and leaders.
Because if you interrupt and correct the mistakes in front of others, the teachers and leaders will lose their reputation, and other people may be concern about their ability.
And that will be a bad situation because your teacher or leader may blame for you if they have narrow-minded and your career and study life may get worse.
Nevertheless, if we tell them their fault secretly not in front of others, that will be a total different result.
Also, interrupting and correcting the mistake right away have no benefit on your classmate and colleague because the drastic arguements will cost a lot of unnecessary time.
For instance, my friend Jack is free-spoken student, and he had a extremly violent controversy with his teacher on the class.
The discussion spent nearly half of the class, and obiviously at last the teacher could not finish her teaching task, so she decided to prolong the class.
Eventually, everyone in the class had no time for lunch and they were all angry about Jack.
As for saying nothing, it is the worst choice for us.
Say nothing is a choice that is not responsible for us and others.
Because, if we do not correct our teachers and leaders' incorrect opinion, they will continue to spread out the wrong information, and others may get wrong knowledge.
By and large, I will choose the second one
Nowadays, as we all know, there are many different ways for students to study.
And sometimes they may be assigned to finish the project.
So there is a type of situation, professors may require them to work together.
And this type of means are thought to be less effective for students to study.
On the contrary, I think working together as a group is a great way for students to learn more effectively.
Communicating with each other can widen their horizon and make the plans more bueatiful, and also the clear role in the team can make the work finished faster.
First, students can get new notions through communication with others when they work in goups.

In the process of communication, people will exchange there own ideas frequently, as a result some of them may realize the shortage of themselved and distance from others, than they may try to overcome the disadvantages, which might be the process of progressing.
Taking my own experience as the case in point, once when I was in the senior high school, we were required to finish a series of math questions by working together.
During the discussion with many other classmates I discovered many other thinkings to solve the difficult problem that I had never met before, thus bring me lots of surprising.
After trying to approach that, my ability to think with a more effective way had improved a lot.
Thanks to the groups.
Second, the task might be easier to finish in a proper way by means of working together.
This is because students will play clear roles in the teams, so that many tiny works can be done at the same time, which increase the vlocity entirely.
Taking my cousin's experience for example, when he was in the college, he usually carry on the projects by himself alone.
During that process he often left out many small things in the whole project, because of the limited time and energy of just on person.
When facing the multiple tasks, students' attention might be extracted and divided into several proportions, which might have much bad influence on the efficiency.
In conclusion, working together as groups is a more effective way for students to finish the difficult and multiple tasks.

Currently, a contoversial topic has aroused heated debate: Whether people will spend less time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years than they do today.
Opinions vary from people to people.
Some claim that people will invest more time on cooking and preparing foods in the future because of the increasing awareness of physical health.

Howevr, I hold an opposite view that future people will value their time more and not waste their time on cooking and preparing food, since they will be overwhelmed with much more tremendous tasks based on current trend and the development of technologies to assist them to get rid of cooking.
First off, future people will live overwhelmingly hectic and hurried life, so they do not have the basic condition of cooking and preparing foods like today.
To illustrate, modern people especially those working and living in big metroplics are experiencing tremendous amount of assignments everyday.
It will be common that people have to work extra work.
After the whole day work and get home, they have already exhausted all their energy and time.
In this case, they will not do the cook by their own.

For instance, not only are my parents occupied with the countless tasks, but also they have other commitments and worries such as family, kids, mortgage and loans, all of which they need to spend time and energy on.
The time they can devote to the cooking and preparing foods is quite limited.
Therefore, my parents and I usually eat at the resturants, which saved lots of their energy.
Additionally, with the development of technological gadgets, some cooking devides will substitute human to prepare food.
To elaborate, there are already some kind of novel mechanic which can make some easy food.

Based on the current speed of the development of technology,  we can preview that the advanced mechanics which can cook diversity of delicious food  in the future and people can be liberated from the daily tedious cooking and preparing foods.

For instance, on the first Anibaba technology exhibitation, a group of scientists and cooks have successfully worked out an atonomous mechanic, which can make all kinds of food according the menu in 5 minutes, such as Chinese roasted duck, Dongpo meet and some original chinese food, without human supervise.
Moreover, it eliminates the process of washing dishes and owener can deliver a order to make food on time through smart phone, so when they get home, they can immediately eat the hot food.
So it is not exaggerated to say that some advance technology will take place human to make food.
To put it in a nutshell, I, personally, think that people will spend less time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years than they do today, because of their hectic life and advanced technology.

Nowadays, with the rapidly progressing of the electronic technique, people's privacy face the more serious threat than ever before, so do the famous entertainers and athletes, more and more people attach importace to  the issue whether should the celebrities and athletes deserve to be safer protection.

In this case, no one could gain some usefull information but those famours' privacy.

With your long-time endeavor, the massage you find is obsolete.
Ultimately, students won't wrtie a satisfying paper, businessmen won't have a good command of the market condition, and the famours will live with pain day and night.
So it is our duty to cease digging out their privacy, for their dignity, and for people's happiness.
All in all, explore the famours' privacy undying is an irrational action, it will hurt the celebrities, and destroyed social discpline as well.
So their privacy is deserve to be protect.

I think it's not a good idea, parents should not give their children money for getting a high mark on their test.
Firstly, achieving good grades is our responsibillity for being a student.
Being a student, one of the main goals in our life is to have good grades, just like earning money for the family is our parents' responsibillity.
If you give a student money just for getting a high score, the student will have a feeling that everytime he\she takes a test is for the money.
For them, money may become a whip to keep them forward at studies.
Slowly, they might even forget their purpose as a student.
Secondly, score does not equal money.
As far as I'm concerened, money is just an ecouragement for the student.
What parents are doing nowadays is giving their children the feeling that you ought to give him\her money everytime he\she had a high grade.

Once you stop handing out money, the student will immediately have a huge decrerase on his\hers marks, due to the thought of score=money, for him\her the equation is nothing simpler than: no money then no score.
Thirdly, a lot of students have been given money at quite a young age, way too young to know how to use their money wisely.

Parents are alway confused about the method which can efficiently motivate their kids to study hard, it is disfficult to get everything in control.
Recently, one topic is highly debated: whether or not parents should provide their children money when they obtain high mark.
Some people advocate this idea, while other hold an opposite opinion.
From my perspective, giving kids money for each high grade they acquire in school should be encouraged among parents.
Firstly, there is no doubt that children are prone to feel more motivative.
Having kept the money which they may get after getting high grade in their minds, they are more likely to try their best.
With the money, kids can buy something they have loved for a long time.
Taking my brother as an example, my parents promise to offer him money if he can reach good mark in the final exam.
These two months, he has worked so hard in his study.
He is alway troubled with English, hence he plans to review the textbook every morning to improve it.
He told me secretly last night that he want to but a robot which is fascinating and a little expensive.
In order to purchase the thing which he is eager for, he puts all his heart to study.
In a word, using this way to encourage children to work hard is of great efficiency.
Moreover, parents can have kids known the value of money.
Teenagers seem not exactly realize how difficult for parents to earn money, as a result they don't have the awareness to cherish money.
However, when their parents offer money to them as encouragement, they will understand that it is not easy to get money.
It is beneficial for them when they leave school and then go to the workplace, they should not be innocent any more.
Besides, having better understand on their parents can let the relationship between kids and parents more harmonious.
Admittedly, this mehtod seems to empahsize the significance of money, but all adolescents should know about the fact.
No one can deny that we work hard for better life and money can support the better life.
They will definitely be exposed to the complicate society, so realizing the importance of money is necessary.
In conclusion, praising children with money is extraordinarily effective, also it can bring a lot of other benefits to the whole family.

Issues related to the habit have never failed to attact people's attention.
When it come to the mordern life, recently a hotly debated topic has aroused among the public: whether young people should develop the ability to plan and organize in addvance.
Some may insist that young people should do whatever they want at anytime.
However, as far as I am concerned, I believe that young people should train their such abilities.
And my points of views will be illustrated as follow.
First of all, planning and organizing helps young people to solving affairs more efficiently.
To be specific, for most young people, especially teenagers, what they are caring about is not only about their study that extra-intrest classes and entertainment are also important.
As a result, if teenagers can have a good plan in addvance, they can manege the time well like deviding it into pieces of part and finishing one thing during a piece of part.
And then they will not waste too much time that they should have finished their complex stuffs, and all their work can be solved rapidly and efficiently.
For instance, when I was about 15 years old, I am not only focus on my school work but also leaning electronic piano and basketball.
Because I had to go to school on weekdays, I just managed my time well to divide the Saterday's time to train electronic piano in the morning and play basketball in afternoon.
Eventually, I can efficiently solve all my work on Saterday and make good use of the Sunday to have fun.
On the top of that, learning to plan and organize precipitate a better career for the young people in the future.
In details, as young people, one day they finally enter the society and do their job.

If young people can develop such habit during the young time, in the future when competing of a work post, they can solve problems methodically and step by step and then achieve the fianl goal well and fast, which provide the boss a better felling and it is eaier for him to approve their capability and hire them.
For example, my cousin developed the habit to make good plan at a very young age.
Last year after graduatin from university, he decided to enter an international Internet company.
During the intership period, his good ability to organize events in an orderly manner helps him to win from the severe comitition with many other job seeker and obtained a well-paid job.
All in all, judging from all above, I strongly agree that young people should learn to cultivate the ability to plan and organize.

As a result of it, having no friends that I can have fun with is not a big deal for me.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether it is better to relax by a movie or reading a bookd than doing physical exercise.
Some claim that doing physical exercise can meke them more relax than reading a book.
However, contrary to their view comes my perspective that watching a movie or reading a bood is more effective way to relax.
My point can be elaborated as follows.
To begin with, people will forget all the unhappy things when they are watching movies or reading books.
To be more specific, books and movies can create a world for readers so that people can immerse themselves into the books and movies.
They will imagine that they are the characters of the books and they are taking some adventrue in a magic world.
In this case, people's mental would get fully relax.
On the contrary , physical exercise cannot make people forget their circumstance and just tired their body.
For example, I always saw the series of movies, Harry Potter,  when I was upset.
I will imagine that I was a little wizzard in that magical world and took adventures with potter.
Becase I was really into it, I forgot the upset and became happy again.
My mental got relax and all the pressure were gone.
However, if I did some phsical execise, it just made my body tired and did nothing with my mental relax.
To be followed, people can have a comfortable enviroment when thay watch movies or reading books.
To illustrate, when people watch moives or read books, they always find the place which is quiet and comfortable.
What's more, they can decide how they read books or watch movies.
For instance, they can lie on the bed or just sit on the floor when they are watching movies.
These kind of freedom will make people more relax.
On the contrary, if people do some physical exercise, they have to go to the public area such as gym or running route.
In these places, people are limited by the common ruler such as they cannot do something which will bother others.
This ruler will meke people feel unconfortable.
For example, when I want to relax myself, I always go to my room.
Then I can read a book llying on my bed with my cat lie behind me.
This environment makes me confortable and I can conrol all the things in my room.
Then I will be fully relax after reading a book.

In conclusion, people will forget the unhappy things and get mental relax when they are watching a movie or reading a book What' more, when people are reading a book, they often have a more confortable environment than doing physical exercise.
Hence, it is better to relax by a movie or reading a book than doing physical exercise.

With the high pressure of social competition, a feeling of anxiety about education sets in.
Parents have never been more concerned about their children's education.
As a consequence, parents are going out of their ways to motivate their children to be more engaged in studying.
Using money as a stimulus is one highly debetable method.
Some may assert that this kind of awardness is misleading and might lead children to be too money-oriented.
Yet, I confirmly believe that money could serve as an advisable award for studyin diligently.
Meanwhile, it can help children to establish a rational value for money.
In the first place, giving children the money can be regarded as a reward for all the efforts they made and can motivate them to study harder.

Nowadays, many young people tend to do many different types of works to get the passion of working.
So as a young man, I prefer the statement that workers are more satisfied when they have many different types of works to do during the workday than when they do the similar tasks all day long.
On the one hand is that doing different types of works can easily get more passion on working.
Working on the same tasks can easily make people get bored, and it can be easily distracted by something else because people always do the same works will take less care on their tasks.
But if I get different type of tasks, it will force me to keep more focus on the task I am doing right now.
Because the fresh thing make me feel stressed, and some proper quatities of stress can make people get the passion to overcome it.
On the other hand, doing different types of works can let people get more responsibilities on his company.
If people have more kinds of tasks, it will help him to understand how other departments work and how the company it works.
For example, people in the marketing department can try to join the design of the company's products.

In this case, not only the person in the marketing department will understand the difficulties the technical department are facing, but also he can give some advice on the favor of the customers which can help the product get better.
With the more efforts he put in this product, the more feelings of pride and responsible he will get.
Further more, doing different types of works can let people know what they really like.
Not everyone can know what they really like or what is their talent.
And by this chance, it can be helpful to personality.
So as I say, I prefer the statement that workers are more satisfied when they have many different types of works to do during the workday than when they do the similar tasks all day long.
