Family is very important for us, but whether or not the extended family also impotant for us.
Some people think that the extended family are not significant now than in the past, but some people claim that the extended family are more crucial now than in the past.
Personally, I believe that the extended family are more important now that it was in the past.
To begin with, no matter our parents or the extended family, we have the same bloodhoud.
For example, when you meet some troubles in other city, your aunts and uncles in that city, you need someone help you to solve this problem.
Even though, you have friend in the city, but they are not your family.
If that problem connect with their profit or harmful, they could not help you.
However, if you ask the help for your aunts and uncles, they are completely help you, because you are relatives.
Secondly, the extended family are our backgroud that can protect us.
For instance, when your sister get marry with others, one day they are fight for argue.
However, her husband will think about her extended family, if he hurt your sister, not only your parents, but also her extended family, like grandparents or cousins will help your sister.
So the extended family is also very impotant.
Adimittely, the extended family are more crucial now than in the past, but maybe nowadays the extended family are not important, because some relatives are afraid of help that you ask.
For example, some relatives want to rasie money to change a big house, but they will not ask the relatives to raise the money, because they think the relative is very complex.
So they could get help form their friends or classmates before rather than own family.
In summary, I believe that the extended family are very imporant now than it was in the past, because we have the same blood and can protect us.

I think that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
Now as most parents just support a child, they are apt to do all they can for their kids which leads to the children's dependence and lack of experience and common value.
Hence, we have seen various social problems such as drug abuse, computer addiction and so on resulted from teenagers.
To change the phenomenon, what parents can do is educating kids to experience and comprehend from mistakes in it.
Making mistakes is the most valid and directest way for children to know how serious the mistake is and remember not to make it again.
For example, if George Washington hadn't destroyed his father's cherry tree, maybe he wouldn't had known the importance of honesty and being careful.
Similarly, children learn more from making trouble than just reading books.
Also, learning from mistakes leads to the sense of awe and respect.
If a kid ate too much snacks so that he was too full to eat at lunch.
It is reasonable for parents to educate him to respect the grains ang the efforts spent on the meal.
with time going by, right value natrally builds in his mind.
Our lives brimmed with every kind of pressure.
Some pressure come from the schools and companies where we have to finish tons of work in order to get a decent grade.
Some people agree the point that doing physical exercise can help us relax because doing sports is a good way to relieve the stress.
In my opinion, watching a movie or reading a book will be more efficient to relax than doing any physical exercise.
We only want to relax when we are physically or mentally tired of doing the work.
When this comes to us, exercising can help us nothing but increasing tiredness and stress because we have to pay all attention on the sports we are doing in case of injuries.
In addition, a fierce sport will make us more tired.
It can be seen by the moment after we end doing the exercise that people just want to take a shower and go to bed because they are even more tired than before.
In contrary, watching an interesting movie or book is a splendid way to relax or release the pressure that the school and the company brought to us.
A good movie or bookcan bring us enjoyable joy and have enough relaxing time because we do not need to do anything but open our eyes during the time of watching movies.
Thus, our tiredness and pressure can be perfectly released by this activity.
Besides, we really can learn from good movies and books which are instructive and are filled with morals.
Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among the public: Whether people spend less time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years than they do today.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some people claim that the people today spend much time on cooking and preparing foods.
However, I would stand on their opposite side and I believe that it takes less time for people today to cooking and preparing foods than before.
First of all, the people today have large of works to do than before which means they have to cut the time for cooking and preparing.
This is primarily because the competition is more significant than before and if the people who do not work hard in their field they would be dismissed.
So everyone works hard which results in a situation that they choose fast food to save time.
For example, my professor has to hand papers regularly.
So he spends his most time in the lab to research in his field.
When he feels hungry, he will go to KFC and buy a hambarger in our unniversity.
Further, the people today is willing to enjoy a higher quality of life that the people in the past is hard to experience.
It is largely since the most of paople today have enough salary which support them to enjoy a delicious meal in the restaurant.
And going to restaurant for business or relasionship is gradually becoming a common scene nowaday.
For instance, every weekends, my family will go to local restaurant to have a tasty meal.
We will talk about recent events and exchange insights during meal.
Having meals outside has became a part of life to my family.
To put it in a nutshell, I firmly believe that people spend less time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years than they do today.
This is not only because saving time for work but also enjoying life.
Friendship is indispensable in our life,and it do bring happiness to people.
However, there's a question:"Is it matters more to maintian an old friend's relationship than to make new friends?"
My answer is absolutely "Yes".
Admittedly, we can get pleasure from the freshness by making new friends.
However, the relationship among old friends is more likely to play an important role for one's happiness.
First of all, old friend is the person who understand you the most.
We have friendship with our old friends for a long time, so they know our hobbies and characters well.
Also, we don't to worry about the communication topic between us.
Take my own experience for example.
The day was my 16th birthday and I had appointment with my old friends as usual.
To my great surprise, when we reached the restaurant, the waiter showes me to a room full with the balloons and the food I liked.
I didn't konw that gift before, but my old firends are familier what I like so they prepared this birthday party for me in advance.
In addition, old friends are more loyol to you than new ones, which means whenever you have problem,they will always stand by you and support you.
For instance, there's a time when I got a severe illness and stayed at home.
My friend Lucy, who has made friends with me for ten years, not only brought flowers to see me, but also she took the textbooks to teach me the school course patiently.
I was so appreciate that she can spend time to look after me.
If it's a new friend, they may not even know I got sick.
To sum up, the ability to maintain a long-time friendship is more significant to me.
It's my old friends that give me the warmth and security.
And I believe that old firneds will be the ones that stay with me the lonest.

If you watch on your mobliephone, it cannot make you feel relax but even do harm to your eyes and make you feel tired too.

Thirdly, I would like to say why doing phisical exercise is better for relaxing.

Finally, I have to say that my opinion may not suit all people and all of the conditions.

Just sit for a while or take a nap may be better than any of the above.
So, if your brain feels tired, just do sports.

With the development of education and technology, the youth now can have better education and attain more acknowledge.
There is a hot debate about whether now the young people can make their decision independently or not.
Some people say the young people now can make their decision individualy.
Others might say the situation stays the same nowadyas the young people still depend on their parents to make decision.
As far as I am concerned, I agree with the front one.
First, nowsdays the parents are open and wise.
In the past, due to the chinese traditional culture which is a little bit conservative.
Parents held the absolute authority, the young people are not allowed to make their own decision.
However, nowadays since the increasingly developed education people are taught to be open and the family statue of parents and kids become more and more equal.
For instance, in the past, the society is patriarchy, kids must absolutely follow their father, they do not have the authority to say no to their father.
Second, nowadays the parents are focusing training the independent ability of their kids, so it is more likely the parents will let their own kids to decide individualy.
For instance, since I was 8 my parents always led me to decide what I would wear tomorrow and make me decide what I will bring during the school and family vacation.
When I grew much older,like now, I will independently decide what I eat every day and where should I spend my money for in case I do not have enough money at the end of the month.
The life experience I have, the way I deal with my life, you can say my parents make me have the ability to be independent and strong.
I admit that you might say there is still a lot people who depend their parents to make the decision.
However, there is always a pattern for the kids like this.
The kids who are spoiled are more likely lose the ability to decide for their own.
Their life since they are kids are all handled by their parents.
So if you put them into the society they will suffocate and panic,because they grow in the greenhouse, they are used to have the help of their parents.
They can live without the parents.
To include, I agree that the young people now can make their dicision on their own.

It's all common that all people would like to have a job.
However, when people have acquired a secure job, different people may have different points of view about their next choices.
Some of them may be willing to search for another job that more suitable for them.
While as far as I'm concerned, I'll make the decision to take my present job at once.

Generally, parents believe that giving their school-aged children money may hence children's motivation to study hard.
However, this solution probably will have potential negative influence on children's attitude to study.
Personally, i think that this measurement's disadvantages outweigh than its' benefits.
There's no doubt that most students can get high scores if they are willing to bury themselves in study.
So what really matters is their attitudes to study.
I confess that money can get a school-aged student turn off his computer and start to prepare for exams temporarily.
But the strategy does not change students' attitudes to study.
They still hate to study as long as the money is not sttractive to them.
So the strategy can't work long.
Once their children lose the desire for money, they will return to playing.
As far as I am concerned, I think this is not a good idea to encourage the school-age children to study hard.
Although giving moneny to the children perhaps can encourage them to study hard, it will bring more disadvantages than advantages.
Firstly, the chidren have no concepts of the count of money, so they may fling their money around or buy some expensive toys, which they can not afford.
Secondly, if a kid takes too much cash, she or he will be robbed, even hurted.
And some senior students will collect the protection fee from that kid.
I do agree about parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
The reasons are as below.
First of all,every single person make mistakes during their whole lifetime.
And the more you failed earlier the better you do  in the future.
As we can look around,you will find the so-called successful person are almost sucks in the childhood or have been through extremely unbearible problems.
That mistakes we have made can finally become our own wealth.
So,as you get the wealth as soon as possible,the more closer you are towards success.
And also,ther is an proverb says that "failure is the mom of sucess".
It indicate that there is a lot of things that we can learn from failure.
As for myself,i failed to get an satifactory score about two years ago when i took TOEFL test for the first time.
Actully i feel quite disappointed when i get my score.
But after analysis my score distribution,i find out my weakness in English study.
I can do a more suitable plan for myself to prepare for the test.
I got pretty low score in listening and reading part,that tells me that i should take more time on those part.
Children is at their most developing period of their life.
They need to try different things among most of which is their first experience.
So the mistake is unavoidable.
Parents should not prevent their child from making miastake,for they can learn more from the mistake they made rather than the advice from their mom or dad.
With the uncertainty of our environment is increasing.
Parents have to practice the ability of their child of solving uncertain problems that exists among our life.
That is an extremely vital part of the process for a child grow into an adult.
The reasons can be explained more for mistakes just a neccessary part of life.

As increasing number of up-to-date technologies advance into our society, it is a common fact that almost every family has television and we always can see some advertisment designed for children.
However, I undoubtedly am into the tune that we are supposed to stop this kind of advertising.
In the first place, some interesting advertising on television will bring nemerous negative impacts on children's physical healthy.

When my family watch television together, my little sister Jane always approchs to television can stire the cartoon advertisements such as two dancing bears on the screen; furthermore, she even searchs more this kind of cartoon advertisements about some cookies and clothes because she thinks they are too funny and vivid.

However, owing to the long term watching television for Jane and children's eyes do not grow mature yet, she, a only five years old girl, wears eye glasses, which will bring unbelievebal unconvenience for her.
Therefore, in order to protect children's physical healthy, we are supposed to stop these advertising toward young children.
Asiding from this negative impact, advertising directly toward children will hurt their psychological health as well.
My own experience never fail to illustrate this opinion.
I saw a threaten cartoon advertising which decribed a snack attacks a small boy in evening when I was five years old.
After that, I still fear of everything about night and I even fear to go to the polite alone nowadays.
That threaten cartoon advertising leave me an unremovable fear of night and my classmates always laugh me about this thing.
All of these add a uncolofur and unhappy memory in my childhood.
Therefore, in order to provide children a happy and psychological health living condition, we should interrupt these advertisements now.

Finally, because children who aged two to five do not obtain the mature cognitive ability, they are fail to distinguish which behavior is right and which behavior is wrong; therefore, they always blindly follow some wrong behavior.

It is a common phenomenon that we always learn news that children in kindergarten fight other children because they saw some charaters in cartoon advertising fight with each other and blindly follow them;additinal, some children aged two to five even steal money in order to imitating the behavior in advertising design for them.
Obviously, these advertising towar little children causes sumless bad effects on children and they may obtain lots of bad habits baside on these advertising.
Thus, we have to stop spread of these advertising.
To sum up, the advertising directed toward young chikdren are supposed to be interruped as soon as possible.

Currently, a controversial topic is heated debates among public: are young people toady are more likely to invest their time and efforts in improving the world than young people in the past.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some claim that young people in the past are more likely to spend their time and efforts in improving the world.
However, i hold an opposite view.
My point can be elaborate as follows.
First, as economy develops, young peolpe consider less on their diet, which may lead them invest more in improving the world.
It is all known that if someone is struggling with the starve and thiristy, he may not able to pay much attentino on improving the world.
Only if people live comforable, they will try to achieve other goals such as improving the world.
My grandfather, who is severty years old, said to me that there were mere food to ear when he was twenty years old.
Everyday he had to think how can he do to get a cup of water or a piece of bread.
After the hard period, he became a teacher in high school and he could eat fruits and meats everyday.
In his days of teaching, he told me that he considered that he should make his efforts to teach his students which may improve that world.
So, young people today have enough food to eat and they are more likely to invest their time and efforts in improving the world.

Second, with the development of internet, young people nowadays can easily get some information about different kinds of need around the wourld, which is beneficial for them in thinking what they can do to improve the world.
You can easily learn about that people need more healthy food to eat and more exercising equipments to use.
It is common to see that many young students is making efforts to create more healthy food or try their best to collect money to build some equipment for public.
My classmates, who uses the mobile phone everyday and gets infromation about healthy food requirement everyday, just build a company to offer healthy food to people.
He think that is it his duty to do so.
In sumary, from what have discussed above, we can safely get the conclusion that young people today are more likely to invest their time and efforts improving the world than young people in the past.

With the world changing so rapidly, some thinks that people are less happy with their lives than people were in the past.
Personally, I disagree with this idea.
In contrast, I think the oppoiste is true --- people are more happy with their lives that people were in the past.
First, people are more satisfied because they can keep in touch with their friends and families easily whenever and wherever they are, thanks to our advanced technology.
In the past, people suffered from home-sickness, when they were away from home.
It was hard for them to get in touch with far-away friends or families.
Nowadays, we can enjoy keeping touch with our families and friends regardless of the distance between us.
Take me for instance.
I study in Hubei province, which is quite far from my hometown.
Everytime I miss my family or my old friends, I would call them, or talk to them face to face with the aid of Wechat or Facebook.
I cannot imagine what if I cannot talk to them a whole month as our ancestors did.
I may be sick due to missing my family.
Thus, I think people are more happy because they can get close to their family with the help of phones or internet.
Second, people are more happy because they can enjoy enormous materies, without need to worry about lacking of food, etc.
It is common to see the bright smiles when people buy their favourite food or clothes.
Lots of people, in the past, died of starvation, which sounds scary to most of us who have overwhelming food.
My grandma told me she had four brothers, one of who died of starvation in World War II.
I know this is really painful for her.
This terrible thing is so far away from most of us.
We are happier without worrying about food which may take our life or our families away.
Third, people are more satisfied because they have access to much more entertainments.
In the past, there are few entertainments available for people.
They have to go to bed early without of light.
Now, we have more fantastic night life.
We also have fun due to our advanced technology, such as computer games, electric novels, etc.
All in all, I think that people are more happy with their lives that people were in the past, with access to connect with friends or families, sufficient materir
More and more parents worry about their children's grade.
To encouage their children to hardworking, some parent will offer their children money for each high grade they get in school.
Although some people think study is students' primary task so good mark needn't be rewarded, I think offer money is a good way to motivate children to study well.
First of all, in that way children will benefit from their good grade in a material way.
Now lots of parents just praise their children when they get good mark or just think their children should have the good mark.
If their children fail in the exam, they will beat them or criticize them seriously.
Therefore, the children will feel lots of pressure during the exam because they are afraid of having a bad grade.
They study because of fearness.
On contrary, if the children can get some money because of their mark, they will have a disire to hardworking in order to acquire the money.
These children study because of encouragement.
The later absolutely have more power in studying than the former.
Secondly, offering children money could let them have a ability to manage their money.
Children can use these money to buy anying they want such as toys, a basketball or some vidio tapes.
When children get these money, they would not permit to ask extra money for entertainment so  they could form a habit to save money.
To get the money, children will study hard.
In that way children will have a useful ability and a good grade.
Lastly, there are lots of ways to improve children's mark just like a tutor or buy some test books.
However, I think offer money is the most useful and effective way to help the children have a good mark,
Many people would say that awarding young kids for their good grades is a bad idea because they may abuse the money with unproper uses.
I agree that it's no good to give kids too much money.
After all, I've seen teenagers buying cigarettes and alcohol with their money.
However, I do think parents can praise they kids with proper amount of money for their grades.
For starters, some proper money can surely evokes kids' interests for study.
When we were kids, we always want some more money because it meant more snacks and more toys.
So kids may try some ways to earn some money by doing housework or part-time jobs.
Therefore, if parents tell them to perform well in the school by which they can earn some money, kids will be pleased to do the job.
For example, my parents once encouraged me to get a 100 points in th final math exams.
And if I did that, they would praise me with 100 yuan which is a relatively great amount of money.
Thus, i just tried my best to study math and finally I got 100 points in the final math exam.
Since then I have been fell in love with math which is still one of my favorite and best subjects.
We can see that a proper encouragement with some money do increase kids' interests for study.
What's more, if parents offer the kids some money to allocate for their grades, kids will learn how to manage their money at a young age.
We can see that when kids have money they usually don't konw what to do besides playing and eating snacks.
We can tell them to spend the money on different kind of purpises such as charity, buying books, and just saving them.
These kinds of money managements are essential for kids' future.
One day they have to manage their own money.
How can we teach them not to abuse the money and use it properly.
If we offer them some money to spend, they may control their money better in the future.

For example, Li Jiachen, one of the richest men in China, gives his sons some money when they perform well in school and teaches them how to manage them because he is a successful businessman himself.
When his sons grow up, they are both good businessman nowadays.
Admittedly, it's true that when kids have money they may use the money to do some wrong things, which is harmful for their entire life.
But it will be alright if we just offer them some small amount of money so that they cannot do anything bad for themselves.
On the other hand, we should also tell them to use the money, which is a part of parents' resbonsibility.
Therefore, when they have enough money even to do some bad things, they will know whether they should do the things.
Parents have the chance to teach them.

To sum up, whearas there is an arguement  taht kids shouldn't be given money for good grades, namely the fact that they may abuse themoney, evoking kids interest for study, coupled with money management makes a storng case that kids should be rewarded with some proper amount of money when they get good grades in their schools.

the topic point put an idea that workers can feel more satisfaction from different kinds of assinments than repeating sigularly one tasks during their work time.
I agree with this oppion to some extend.
for most people, different tasks can bring them more fun and more interest.
as we all know, it is difficult for people concentrate on one single thing for several hours let alone all day lone.
so it is a good way to let people alter their work contents.
in this way, not only can strengthen their focus but also canimprove their work efficiency.

besides, doing various tasks can make wokers learn more things. a lot of people want learn new things and new knowledge from a job, so if a company can arrange different tasks for their workers, their woker can gain more sense of success from this job.
however, altering work contents does not suit all people.
some people think that focusing on one singular task can make the work easier in that everyone has his own profession and talents.
only we make full use of these specalty , we can improve the work efficiency instead of wasting resourses.
what's more, not all people have enough ability to learn new things and completely handle with different types of assignments.
furthermore, making everyone do several types of tasks will increase the cost of company because they need spend time training workers time by time, which is quite a waste of resources.
as far as I am concerned, it is up to a job's needs.
if a job in some specific area like astronomy, it is not a good way to arrange different tasks for them to do because the work requires high professional skills and intense concentration.
in the other hand, jobs like assistants can add various tasks for them , owing to the boredom this job.
all in all, the best choice is a company should arrange suitable work content in coordience with the job requirements and the merits of a person.
Offering money for school-age children is always a debateble question.
From my perspective, giving money for small children outweighs its disadvantages.
First, apporiate amount of money gives children the incentive to study better.
It is widely acknowleded that study is the most significant stuff for students and if giving money can help them do better, why not?
If children receive money from their parents, they will learn they must try their best all the time in order to get encourgment.
Take my sister for example, her parents promised her a little sum of money for her high grades.
Since then my sister spared no effort on her homework, she even bought extra books and studied till late in order to obtain good marks.
Furthermore, giving them money can teach them that 'no pains, no gains', and hence let then develop a good habit when they are young.
We all know that success comes with sweat and hard work, and no one can get a satified refult easily.
If parents are willing to pay money for children's effort, they will work harder definitly.
For example, my brother always gets good grades at school.
when I asked him the reason, he told me it was the money that motivated him to move toward.
Lastly, offering money for children can make them adapt to the society.
We have to leave our parents and we have to confront the society by ourselves sooner or later.
Giving money to little child let he learn that only your work is useful can you get your payback.
My friend Mary got money from her parents at a very young age.
Later, when she works in a company, she is more competitive compared to her collages because she has less mistakes and less time for the same work which is owing to her parents behavior.
All things concerned, offering school-age children money for good marks is a good idea,for the intention to do better, the principle they learn, and quicker adaption to the society.
I agree with the statement that the question makes which is that because people are buusy doing so many different things, they do very few things well.
My reasons are on the below.
First, there was a story that which is about a monkey.
The story is.
Oneday, the monkey wants to get the peaches on the tree.
When he climbs onto the tree and get the peaches quickly, he sees some corns are on the ground, then he throw the peaches and then get the corns.
Suddenly, he sees another something good.
The thing is some peanuts.
Then the monkey throw the corns out and picks up the peanuts.
But unfortunatelly, he sees one watermelon, and he throw the peanuts out and runs quickly to pick up the watermelon.
He pick up the watermelon successfully and then hold the watermelon to go to the home.
However, the monkey drop the watermelon suddenly on a lane and the watermelon rolls too quickly for the monkey to catch.
This story tell us that if we do many thing in one time, then you won't do anything well.
Second, if you are studying on one subject directly, but the teachers says that you havce to finish these works in one time, I think you couldn't don any work succefully.
It sounds like if you wants to get the fish but you go to catch the butterfly, but you couldn't get any fish and catch the butterfly.

For example, there was a professor who wants to get many awards at one time, so he learns physics, geology, chemistry and archeology, but at the end, he couldn't get any awards, and the things he has learned he couldn't remember anything.
Third , if you study on one thing, you could do it well.
There was a famous ancient Chinese writer who is named Li Bai.
One day, he goes out for traveling and he travels to a small villiage, and he met a old woman who is making a thin iron stick by rolling one very big iron sticks on a stone.
He is so puzzled that ask the old woman why she do this, the old woman says:" If you have enough time, even a big iron stick could rolls into a thin iron stick."
The story tell us, if you want to get successful on one thing , you couldn't average your mind on other things.
So that's why I agree with the statement that the question makes.

Recently, a controversial problem arouses people's debate: in parents' busy life, if they have time, whether they should spend family time in having fun such as playing games ,sporting or doing thing together related to children's school work.
Some people make think accompany with children in studying is more helpful for their children.
However, I believe that parents should play with their child in their spare time.
My view can be illustrated as follows.
To begin with, it is good for parents and children get close relationship.
Because if children play with their parents, they can experience same emotion at the same time together so that they can understand more about what you are considering.
Furthermore, they can easily express themselves when playing, thus parents and children can communicate well.
In this way, their relationship can be enhanced.

On the contrary, if parents doing things related to children's school work, they may feel uncomfortable because they need study five days in a week, if  their relax time with parents will be occupied by things related to school work, they may feel boring.
My brother John is a good case.
John usually played basketball with his father, so when they won the conpetition or lost the game, they would share the same feeling.
This time, his father would make deep talking with him, they both enjoy the moment of talking.
Therefore, their relationship was strengthened.
Beside, it is less time-consuming and energy consuming for parents to play with their children.
Because parents just need to ask their children to play games with them anytime they want.
Busy parents actually have few time to accompany with their children, if they need to prepare an activity that related to children's school work, they will have less time to play.
Finally, parents may give children wrong hint about school work if they do something related school work with thier child.
With the development of society, the education methods and sequense have been changed a lot.

So if parents do works related to the children's school work, they may want to impart some new knowledge to their child, but with the current teaching system, parents cannot sure whether is the best time, best way to tell the information to their children.
It is possible for parents make the children misunderstand some knowledge.
On the other hand, if parents play with children, they need not to consider about that.

Relaxing physically or mentally    In today's society, fierce competition and pressure from life can make people feel tired and stressful.
So relaxing in our free time seems to have great significance to us.
From my perspective,I agree with the statement that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than relax by doing physical exercise.
In the following part,I will give reasons from three aspects to support my view.
First, I want to talk about the convenience of relaxing by reading and watching a movie that doing physical exercise doesn't have.
As is known to all, we can read a book or watch a moive at any places and at any time.
That means, we can relax in our home,on the way to home or in our working places.
Also we can relax by doing so before sleep,during the break between work or the weekend and holiday.
But doing physical exercise needs enough time,such as 30 minutes or more, and it asks for suitable places,suitable clothes,suitable boby state and so on.
So we can't relax through this whenever and wherever we want.
In the contrast, relaxing mentally can be easily available to us.
Secondly,I want to mention the possible harm that doing physical exercise have but reading and so on doesn't.
Obviously,doing physical exercise needs guidance and carefulness.
If we are not familiar with the sports or if we are not aware that our body may not be suitable to doing this or that,it may be dangerous for our body and healthy.
And after exercising,we should have long time to calm down,so we can continue our job.
It takes too much time and wastes our energy.
But reading a book or watching a movie can easily begin and easily finish,so we can go oo our job quickly.
And mentally relaxing cannot do any harm to our body.
Last but not least,I want to talk about the benefits of relaxing mentally that doing physical exercises doesn't have.
By watching a movie or reading a book,we can not only relax our mind and body,but also we can gain knowledge from those things.
We can broaden our horizons and have a better understanding or our world, our life and ourselves.
It can make us think about things in different ways.
It can be helpful for our future work and life.
In a word, I believe that relaxing by watching a movie or reasing a book is better than doing physical exercise.
In our everyday life,we should be based on the mental relax,and when needed,doing some suitable physical exercise .

Many people says that the government can reduce the cost of police because no matter how much reward, the police can protect the citizens.
Other people may choose to decrease the cost of public transportation, after all, many family have private cars.
But I choose to cut down the financy of library for these reasons.
Firstly, many people don't need read cheap or free books in library.
This is because before the economic crises, most people already have their own book lists, namely that they have bought the books they favorate.
Nowadays, as the technology becomes so advanced, many people can read books on Internet, so a library seems less necessary than before.
On the contrary, if the governement cuts down the money in police, that can infulence the satisfaction of their career.
If the authority decrease the money on public transportation construct, there will be more traffic jam.
Both these cases lead to worse quality of people's life.
For example, my friend, Hong, studied at Hubei University.
Once the school undergoes the financial crisis, so they reduce the frequency of renewing the old books.
Many students don;t worry about this problem, including my friend.
Because they always reads book on devices, such as electronic books, smart phones, computer.
She never goes to the library.
So she never worries about whether school library is open and where the library is.
So the less resourse in library might not make significant problems.
Secondly, reducing the financial aid in police can create potential risks to the citizens.
This is because if the policeman get less money, they may complain about the occupation.
Even though, they feel responsible to protect the public, their families may complain.
In this case, they may cannot concentrate on their work.
Another proplem is that if the government cut the cost according to employe less police, more crimes may occur, with a sense of luck.
Finally, another choice is to reduce the cost of public transportation.
Even though many family have private cars, too many cars may cause damage to environment which may need more money to manage.
Too many cars also can lead to traffic jam.
That can decrease the satisfaction of settlements.
To sum up, I choose to reduce library during economic crises.

It is no doubt that the world is changing every second.
But what about the people who live on the earth?
People say they feel less pleasnt and content than those who were in the past.
For my part, I totally differentiated on that part.
The world is developing to a much more international word with the international transportation and Internet.
Things have more possibilities, as for our human beings.
In the past , we were just constrained in our hometown,having no fast and moderately way to tour around the world.
And also most of what  we  know just from mouth-to-mouth saying is from the elder relatives or tutors.
With the advent of fast transpotation and Internet , you are closely inter-woven in to the world, knowing anecdotes from Steven Jobos and making e-pals on the otherside.
The world  creates more chances for everyone to strive for his dreams.
More chances means more channels.
If you are not good at studing, you can just transfer into the field that really fit yourself.
In the past, that everyone views doing the study is the only way to make a prosperous career.
Those who can not do well in the study are looked down upon and hold nothing to say.
Look the moment now, people can thrive in the different channles, such as trading, computing, accouting, even cooking.
People's less satisfation don't lie in the outside world but within the inner heart.
If one doesn't take every possible chance and try his utmost, I am sure, he can make nothing.
Those who are quite successful , to some degrees, seize every second and strive hard to fulfill their dreams with possible techniques.
So, to put all in to a nut-shell,don't blame the world for not satisfying your needs and desire.
The changing world offers you a varity of channels and ways and you should closely take every chance to make yourself from nobbdy to somebody.

In a day when different countries are more and more closely connected, people pay high attention on international affairs even though some events are unlikely to effect their daily lifes, and I am one of those people.
From my point of view, it is significant to learn about international events.
Firstly, knowing what happens around the world can help people make more preparations for the future.
Nowadays, there is growing trend that schools and companies send students or works abroad for further learning.
And to gathering this opportunity, one must have some basic knowing about other countries, which could be obtain through browsing through some events happened in other countries.
Secondly, it is also helpful to make some international friends.
Knowing about some international events can help people when they talk to foreigners, thus making it more possible to make friends with them.

I adimit that in modern society, people are busy with their school tasks or works, and it seems a waste of time to care about something happening in other countries which have little influence on our daily life.
But from my point of view, in a time when informantional technology is highly developed, those events can be easily and quickly gained on the internet.
What's more, with the smartphone, one can use his sparse time to read pieces of international news on some news websites.
Thus, time will not be a big problem in knowing about international events.
Based on all three reasons listed above, I support the opinion that it is necessary to know about events happening around the world.
With the development our living standard, in present-day society, there are more various approaches for individuals to gain entertainment.

Nowadays, education is the most important part in people's life.
Many parents always ask their kids to gain as higher scores as they can.
However, it is controversial that whether parents should pay for their children's high marks they get in exams.
Some believe it will bring benefits for the kids, while others hold the opinions that it will not work in the long run.
In my opinion, spending money for children's success is very conducive since it motivates the young and improves their skills.
First, reciving the money from parents implies children to work hard in academics.
They will feel confident and motivated due to the benefits and expexts from parents.
They will study even harded to earn their parents' awards and satisfactions with them.
Take my experiences as an example.
When I was in third grade, I was terrible at math.
I did not know what the equation meant and had trouble figuring out how to divide 205 by 3.
I got frustrated and refused to work hard.
But one day my mother told my that if I could gain a 90 on my math exam next time, I would have 10 yuan to buy anything I wanted.
At that time I was so attracted to toy dolls and I dreamed of buying one doll called Rosie.
So I worded hard, even though I did not like this subject.
I raised my hand in class to gain every chance to answer the question and I asked my teacher to help me better understand the concepts in class.
As a result, in the final exam, I got 98 which was the highest score in my class.
Thus, in this case, my mother motivated me to learn a subject I failed to understand and used the money to help me gain the interest or the confidence in study.
Second, other skills would be enhanced if the parents give their children money.
Students could improve their time management skills since they need to make a balance between study to get the money and their leisure time.
When one child wants to play Angry Birds, he will notice that he needs to finish his homework first and then play the game.
So instead of starting to use his iPhone as soon as he returns home, he will make himself a schedule and requires himself to finish the task in half an hour with full attention.
Another one is that they can become self-displined.
Consider the cited example.
The child may desire to play the game so much, but he will force himself to study because he knows what is more worthy spending his time.
So rather than do whatever he wants as usual, he clearly knows what his plan is and will  perform the plan step by step.
Although it may seem that children could rely on the money to study, it is not normally the scenes.

Based on experiments and observations make by researchers, it could be easily conclude that compared with children who are not offer the money, the children who are provided have much more interests in one subject than the other gropu even at the beginning they both refuse to learn.
So students not only become more interested and confident in study, but also they care about study itslf rather than money in the end.
In conclusion, money brings children with great motivations and improved skills which will in teh long term benefit the students' future careers.

In everyday situations, parents are inclind to award their children's excellent behavior.

From my perspective, I consider it appropriate by the following reasons: giving encouragement, developing a wonderful conception, improving the education system's structure.
Firstly, it encourage children to work harder.
To be more specific, money enlarge the sense of achievement in children's heart, letting inspiration go through minds for kids to move on on the way of chasing his dream.
Take me as an example, when in middle school, my parents offered me a scholarship for entering a key class, which help me to strengthen my force into studying.
By listenning the class carefully, doing the homework seriousely, asking questions to teachers Secondly,  it developed a conception in children's mind that learning new things is equal to having fun.

As a celebrated dictum says, a friend in need is a friend indeed.
That's to say, people are likely to help friends who are in great trouble.
With time going on and economy booming, common are the occasions when people are willing to help the struggling strangers out of pure good will.
Thus, I agree with the statement that people today are more willing to help the struggling strangers, especially compared to the past.
When it comes to the reasons why people today are more willing to the struggling strangers, my reasons can be listed as follows.
To begin with, with the economy booming, people can earn more money than in the past, thus becoming wealthier.
Therefore, when confronted with a struggling stranger asking for help, people are likely to think less about the economic consequence of their good will.
That's to say, they think less of the cost their contributions than in the past, so they are more willing to help the struggling strangers.
Moreover, giving aid to struggling strangers is more likely to make people feel content than in the past.
I'd like to cite myself as a vivid example.
When I was a sophomore, I once encountered a beggar on street, weeping sorrowly and waiting for help.
I gave her what I could offer and she asked my telephone number.
To my great surprise, she sent me a message about how my contribution could change her world, which I considered to be very little myself.
Thanks to modern technology, I felt extremely content that my slightest contribution counted.
Last but not least, thanks to the Internet and modern technology, giving aid has become much more convenient.
For example, there are websites specialized in raising funds, where people can donate a few money by applications such as Alipay.
By means of Internet, raising funds have become more swift and more convenient.
Therefore, people today are more willing to help the struggling strangers, because of convenience.

Taking what I mentioned above into consideration, we can safely draw a conclusion that people today are more willing to help the struggling strangers because they are better off, they can feel more content and giving aid has become more convenient.
Some parents offer the school-age money for each high mark they get in school,I think it is a uesfull thing to encourage their children to get a high mark,so I believe this is a good idea.

As for the work arrangement for the worker ,some people think doing the same tasks everyday will eliminish the difficulties for workers so that make them more satisfied about their job.
But I strongly belive multiple tasks will keep the workers mor energetic and concerntrated in the job.
Firstly,the workers will more easily to get tired when they just do similar tasks than do different types .
It is known that the specific activity we perform is acutately controled by the paticular district in our brain.
When we repeat that activity for a long time ,that part of brain  will be overused .

On the contrary,when you alternate different chores ,you let different part of your brain take breaks in turn,and in that case you will not get fatigue so soon,thus will improve the satisfaction towards the work.
In addition,when workers change from one chores to another ,there will be a sense of freshness ,whereas doing the same tasks lastingly will make one feel the work is tediousand get bored.
This is applied to all of us.
Imagine a scene you are a student in school and one morning you find that your classed today are all mathematics ,from the begining of the school to the last minit.
What will you feel at this time?
Would you want to attent to school in this situation?
And that is why students have different classes in a day.
Similarly ,various type of tasks avoid the workers feeling boring about their work.
Last but not least,workers who do the repeated task easily get distraction ,which is bad thing in their career development.
Research have found that poeple who repeat the same activity for a long time go through hard time to focus ,and consequently will make more mistakes.
That will have negative infulence in the worker's promotion,and it may cause punishment.
When workers cannot see a bright future of their job,the will be less satisfied.
To sum up,workers  will feel better when do different types of job.
This should be a principal when arrange the work day.
It is nomal that most of the students in university want to be succesfuls in the future job.
Some of them think studying hard ar school and being capable in the future job is significant.
Others attach greater importance on the ability of relating well to people.
In my perspective, I think studying hard in school is more important.
The reasons are as below.
First of all, the accomplish you will get in the future job bases on the knowledge you learn in school.
Without the knowledge you have learnt, you will not finish your assignment.
For example, if you want to be a reseachor in the future, you will not be able to finish your paper without the knowledge you are learning in school.
Futhermore, if you want to be successful, productive and creative in the field you study, you will study deeper than what teachers have told you in shool.
On the top of that, studying hard in school can also cultivate some personalities that can not be gained by relating well to people.

The ability to persist on one thing, the ability to think in different aspects of a problem, the ability to keep confident when you are in troubles can be cultivate when you are studying hard in school.
And the ability above is of great importance in the future job.
However, the process of relating to people can not help you to develope these ability.
Admittedly, the ability to relate well to people is important.
However, if one spends a lot of time on relating people, there is not enough time for him or her to think how to do a better job.
You maybe do as whar people told you instead of being creative and perfect in the work.
The standard of being sucessful is not how well you can relate well to people but how much and how well you do in the job.
For the reasons above.
I heartfully agree with the statement that studying hard in school is more significant than the ability to relate well to people for success in a future job.

These days, the opinons of celebrities has played an critical role in the society and has been discussed among public with much enthusiasm.
Some people holds that celebrities, which involved in entertainers and sports stars, are more significant to younger people rather than older people.

Put in another word, it indeed provides an effective approach for people to keep in touch with the imformation about celebrities.

It also should be noticed that most of the younger people have not set up correct values of their lifes and they are more likey to be disturbed and even follow other's opinons or behaviors.
Differently, older people gained more knowledge from their experiences, it is easier for them to judge the perspectives from celebrities without any preferances.
Overall, it considers that the opinons of celebrities have much impact on younger people instead of older people based on the receiving degree of the techlonogy and thier life values.

With the great development of technology, it is much easier for people to get information from the Internet.
Some people hold the view that the Internet provides people with a lot of valuable information.
While others say that access to so much information creates problems.
As far as  I am concerned, I think it is easier for people to absorb valuable information from the Internet.
Here are the reasons.
Firstly, everyone may have own phone and they can surf the Internet wherever they are.
It is much easier for them to get the useful information they want to solve the problem when they are in trouble.
For example, last month, I went to Japan to enjoy my vacation.
When I took off the airplane, I did not know how to go to my hotel.
I solved this problem with my phone.
I used google map to search the way to my hotel.
I followed the guidance of the Internet and easily arrive at my hotel.
Secondly, if people want to get some knowledge without the Internet, the only way they can use is to search for the information in the books.
This process will take them a lot of time and money.
But it is easier to search in the Internet.
Last week, I should finish my paper.
I should get some information about the history of China.
So I searched it in the Internet and got a high score.
However, some people disagree with me in the reason that access to so much informaion may creates problems.
They think that young may be influenced by criminal movies and rob their classmates or hurt others.
But this argument is not reasonable.
The parents should take care of their children and stop children to see these movies.
So the Internet will not create many problems.
Above what I said, the Internet could help people to get a lot of valuable information as they want.
Our daily life and society will become much brighter with the help of Internet.
In my opinion, it is significant to know about events happening all over the world,even though it seems like having nothing to do with our daily routines.
As a person ,we should be curious about the outside world, we are supposed to have sympathy for the poor,we have to devote to the communication with other parts of the world.
Knowing about the rest of the world enables us to embarce different lifestyles, values,making us more tolerant and peceful.

Take myself as an example,I live in wuhan for a long time and quite familiar with the food,the accent,the transpotation in wuhan,but my parents requires me to read newapapers and magazines since I was a little kid.
So I develop a good habit of accepting differences and never complaining about someting I am not satisfied with.
After graduating from high school,I leave for Beijing for further study,although I am not accustomed to the environment here,I try to accept it and gradually I fall in love with the city.
Being exposed to the outside world can broaded our horizons and open up our eyes to the outside world.
We can acquire interesting knowledge and relevant background about a certain issue,which is very essential not only for our studies as well as being a graceful person.
One of my best friends are full of curiosity,when he learned that the England voted to leave the union, he really wondered the reasons.
So he surfed the internet,looked up materials in the library.
He finally made it and became an expert in Enland history.
I really admired him,and he is such a fascinating man.
Last but not the least, it is significant to know about events happening all over the world,even though it seems like having nothing to do with our daily routines ,because it makes us better persons.

some people claim that people will spend more or same time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years than they do today.

For example, as we all konw, the inventment named quick noodles change world.

In a nutshell, I think in twenty years, people will spend less cooking and prepar food, because, it is saving time and people have not enough time.

Nowadays, there is an increasing number of parents who offer thier children for their high grades.
My parents used to do such things in order to get my grades higher.
I'm under the impression that it's a good idea for parents to reward some money when children get good grades.
First of all, some reward encourages students to study much harder.
Their purpose could be more clear and easier to achieve.
Take my little brother for example, there was a short period when he had no incentive to study.
He got tired after always getting high grades instead of something else.

One day, my mother found that he had paid his attention to a series of toy robots for a long time and she thought of a solution that she would give my brother some money as long as he got grades which reached our ideal ones.
At that time, my brother felt himself more incentive.
He studied as hard as he used to be .
He hit himself to the books and finally,he got what he wanted.
Also, giving some money helps children become more self-discipline.
They could learn how to manage their money in a reasonable way and respect their parents at the smae time.
I cannot manage myself well when I was a sophomer in primary school.
I just handed in my assignment after my teacher reminded me many time and always lost my pin money as soon as my father gave me.
So my mother treated my with the strategy she also used for my brother.
I was able to get a portion of money if I performed well in each of my tests.
That portion of money would be the source of my pocket money.
Under this rule, I no longer lost my own money and developed a habit to study on my own.
In a nutshell, giving money for each high grade truly has a great impact on children's study life.
If parents and children all treat such thing in a right way,this will be beneficial for both of  us.
As far as I'm concerned, I' not for this kind of idea used by many parents.
There are a few reasons why I'm against it.
In my opinons, although receiving high grades can make parents satisfied and feel proud when talking it with other people, offering their children money may not be the proper way.
It can indeed encourage students to work harder in their studies, but it can mislead children to study for their parents but not themselves.
I think studying should be a motivated prosess and it's not linked with money.
Besides, offering too much money to children who are young and cannot spend it wisely might cause wastes or even worse effects.
I remember when I was a child in elementary school, some of my classmates' parent used this kind of strategy to encourage their children.
And for our school is one of the best among our district, the studying fees used to be high and most of my schoolmates came from wealthy families.
My deskmate was one of the example, for she was about a middle student in our class, her parents might offer she a lot of money if she once rank top 10 in our class.
She sometimes could won the prize but after she won it she would be too proud of herself and spent less time to study from then on.
What's worse?
She used most of the money to buy novels that were written on the websites which did no good wo our studies and became addicted in them.
There's no doubt tha she became even worse than she used to be before she won the prize.
She also made our teacher angry about her
I do think it is a good idea.
A reward may be a inspiring stuff.
Youth can be motivate by the thing they really like.
If your child is absurbed in a computer game, you can make a deal with your child.
For example, you can tell him or her that if they can get high grade, you will give him or her some money.
And then one day he or she can use it to buy a brand new computer.
So you can see, some thing which have bad influence on their study do have a bright side that can stimulate your child due to the reward.
Though school-age children won't have many chances to spend the money they were offered, they stiil have merchandise which they want to purchase.
And it is easy to satisfy a child.
They will certainly be pleased if their parents give them a reward.
No matter what the reward is.
And money may be the best choice.
They can use it to do everything they want, even if they want to donate it.
It is obvious a way that you can cultivate your child's ability on manage those money.
It sounds like a win-win.
Both benifit to their study and their social skills.
When I was a child, my parents always told me that they will offer me some money if I get high grades.
Though they will just give me a small sum of money, I was pretty motivated.
Becase I think it is also a way that shows I can make money through my diligence.
I never mind what I can buy with those limited money.
What I do mind is I finally have a goal.
Provide that my parents did not do that, my grades will be worse than now.

The way of educaton do plays a vital role in students' performances, which is a truth especially in terms of the assignment toward students.
Some teachers prefer to let students do homework alone, believing ot will beneifts students more.
However, it is a desirable way, I think, for students to study collectively for several reasons.
First of all, when addressing homework in group, students are likely to cultivate their abilities related to academic and real life.

To be specfic, being confronted with difficulity, students are possible to question their partners for help, which means that they have to communicate with other in decent demand, as a reslult, it will enhance the ability of  interpersonal, directly related to futural study and career.

In turn, such ability is highly demanded in today's job peformance.
Take me for example, it is the group assighment that push me to acquire the skills of being a leader.
In my first year on campus,  talking in front of  a vast of number of people scares me a lot, however, having been a leader in my assigned group allows me tons of chance to be a leader.
If  I were not participate in such group works, I would not have a chance to be the one today.
Morever,  it is a wise idea choice which contributes to effectiveness when it comes to assign projects.

In other words, dealing with tough tasks alone, student has to try hard but possible without any result, which us time-consuming, nevertheless, when students facing such difficulties collectively, they will sove it quickly since the group power.

In conslusion, owning to the benefits as cultivating abilities as well the effectiveness, it  benefits more for studnets to work together instead of study alone.

When I was in middle school, my parents always promised me a gift after I achieved something.
Sometimes I got a high score or finished a goal they would give me reward.
Once I was in grade seven, and I did very bad in a certain test.

My father wanted to help me retrieve my confidence, so he made a deal with me that if I made it to the tenth in the rank or better, I would receive an outfit of NBA players wearing on the court which was worth nearly a thousand yuan.
And I was extremely excited, hoping to get the prize.
The following month I was more hardworking, trying to learn well, and the result was really a surprise: I was just the tenth in class.
Consequently, I received my gift and I learnt that I should be more diligent and more devoted in study.
Only if I did in this way would I get my gifts.
Actually,  one negative factor is that parents may give their children money or gifts too easily.
If a kid can acquire a precious gifts or a large amount of money by simply achieve some easy goals, it will be really difficult for him or her to know good things require diligency and devotion.
No one living on this planet can simply get something without paying.
There is a saying goes no pain,no gain.
Parents must let their kids know the principle.
Another negative factor is that parents purchase very expensive gifts for their kids or directly give them a large amount of money as reward.
I affirm parents may cause kids to show off among people around them like teachers and classmates, thus leading to robberies or thefts.
We know that thrifty is a good virtue.
Therefore, I still hold the perspective that offering gifts or money is a good idea,as long as they don't go too far.

Nowadays, whether the old should keep learning new things as the young do has aroused intense debate among the public.
Some people argue that it is still important for older people to learn new things; however, in my opinion, learning becomes less important when people grows older.
To begin with, it is hard and ineffective for older people to learn new things.
When people grow older, they gradually lose the ability of learning, because their brians are not as effective as the young.
And since they have already learned a lot in their lives, they tend to form stereotype that keeps them from accepting new things.
So even if we force the old to learn new things, they may be much less effective than the young.
It will be better for them to keep   using the old ways.
For example, my grandmother has lives for her whole life without phones, and even though the phones are widely use today, she cannot understand its usage and advantages.
She thinks its useless, even though we finally persuade her to learn to use it, she just cannot memorize the ways of using the phones.
It will be more easier for her to find us direcly instead of trying to contact us with phones.
However, my cousin has no trouble learning to use the phones and he even knows more than me now.
The low efficiency for the old to learn new things makes it less important for them to learn new things.
In addition,  it is more important for the old to teach rather than to learn.
The old have much more experiences than the young.
When people grow older, what they should consider is the development of the next generation and pass their experiences to the young in order to guide them.
The new things should be learned by the young but not the old, since the one who will support the whole society in the future is the young.
For example, the great scientist Feyman focused his time on education for students rather than his own reseach when he was old.
Because he knew that he can never make a breakthrough in science, but he can pass his knowledge to the next generation and they will definately finish his work one day.
To sum up, it is less important for the old to learn new things than the young.
In contrast, what really important for them is to pass their knowledge and help the development of the next generation.

I think it's neccessary for parents to let their children make mistakes.
Firstly, everybody is born imperfect, making mistakes is more than common in our daily life.
Secondly, as a saying goes, practice makes perfect.
Here I would like to see this saying as an exellent sentense to attach importance to DIY.
As we all know, nearly every great discovery in science and technology are based on experiments, most of which proved unsuccessful.
Only when you have the courage to make mistakes or fail can you find the best solution at last.
And that should be what parents teach their children.
Thirdly, learning from one's own mistakes is usually far more impressive than learning from the text books or from other's experiences.

American president Franklin once cut off a precious peach tree in his garden when young, but his dad did not criticise him very severely, instead he made this mistake a really meaningful lesson for young Franklin.
Franklin's father's wise education eventually made Franklin a great president in American history.
Forthly, children have the right to taste the love forgiveness when they are young, which could help them develope into a kind and tolerant person when they grow up.
If a person is often beaten by his or her parent in his or her childhood, he or she might be as cruel and kindless to others when he or she grows up.
On the contrary, if one is treated with love and forgiveness, the chances that he or she should become a lovable person will certainly increase considerably.
in a word, everyone make mistakes, parents should let their children make mistakes as long as they don't break the principle or the law.
A really great person is not the one who never make mistakes, instead , great persons make a lot of mistakes before they correct them again and again, which parents should realize.

Never before in the history has the problem of education been such salient than today.
Since people treat education much more important, parents are likely to create some new methods to encourage their children to become more passionate about study.
Rencently, the phenomenon that parents give their children money as a reward for getting high mark in school has caused wide public concern.
Some people indicate that it will change children's opinion on study, making them believe only money is the purpose of study.
However, I contend that giving some money to children as a reward is agood choice, a choice that its merits weigh out its drawbacks.
To start with, giving money to the children as a reward can stimulate children to study harder.
When children get feedback of their hard work, the study will become a happy job instead of just a boring duty.
We cannot refute that sometimes study could be really boring, doing a lot of exercises, reading passages, working out math prombles.
So setting a goal for children is necessary for the children to keep their interests.
If they could use the money to buy what they want as a gift, children will pursue the good mark harder.
Another reason drives me to indicate is that finacial thinking as an important ability which is useful to the modern people,meaning that we need to teach our children how to manage their own money.
During the method taht giving money as a reward, children will have a chance to manage their own money.
Parents will benefit children not only to their current life but also to their future.
Admittedly, it is unwise to give much money once a time when children get a good mark, since that children will seek only for money during their study.
The goal we expect is to encourage our children and tell them to pursue more success.
However, if we make sure that children will not misunderstand the meaning of the reward and keep a healthy attitude to the money, it will be fine to do so.
Recently, an interesting topic has aroused a heated debate: whether or not it is important for old people to learn new things like the youngers do.
The answers vary from person to person.
From my perspective, i suppose this statement that elder people also should study or learn new things in their life.
To begin with, learning new things prevent them from being left behind by the society.
As we know, with the increasing development of technology, especially the smart phone, most of people rely on their smart phone to communicate online.
Under this case, if elder people are willing to learn how to use the smart phone and how to chat online, they are more likely to close the relationship between relatives, such as their grandchildren.
For example, my grandpa bought a smart phone online last year and she asked me to teach her the way to use Wechat, an application for chat online.
Later,my grandpa always talked with me by using this app without paying any extra money; and I found he is so cute and hunmorous that I have never noticed before.
Without using Wechat, i would  never form new perspective to my grandpa and much more like him.
Furthermore, the new things they have learned can be regarded as an entertainment to kill the boring time in their life.
This is because most old people are retaired for many years and their recreation life is limited by their health condition.
According to the survey, most of old people feel extremelly bored.
In this case, if they may well to learn the new skills or new games, such as photograghy and chesse, their life must be more colorful and energetic.
To illustrate, my neigbourhood was a retired people for several years and he learned to take photos by cell phone accidentially.
He are crazy into taking photos to landscape.
In that way, he also learn to take a good photos  on the internet and borrow some intro books in the library.
To some extent, photography makes his life more meaningful rather than boring.
To sum up, it is advisable for old people to study new things as the way as younger people.
This is because it can exclude old people from being left behind and allow them to enjoy their life again, which is also beneficial to their children to stop worrying about them.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether it is better for colleagues or classmates to communicate in person than through emails in order to do a project?
Some claims that using emails is more convenient.
However, I believe that communicate in person is better.
To begin with, communicating in person can help deal with the problems people meet in the project.
If people find some difficults when they are doing a project, communicating in person can sooner brainstorm to solve the problems.
This is because people can show their opinions or oppose others opinions immediately and the collision of views can create the best solution to the problems.
On the contrary, if people just.

send emails to talke about the problems, they would not have any collision of views since writing emails need time and it is hard for people to write the emails to show their opinion and oppose others opionion at the same time.
Finally, they might not solve any problems.
For example, I and my friends were planing to hold a party in order to celebrate Christmas.
At first, each of us focus on one aspect of the projects and send emails to discuss the problems we met.
However, I found it is just waste of time because I received several solution of my problems but I do not know which is the best.
Thus, we decided to communicate in persons.
Then, each of us can show our opinion about one problems and find the best solution of that
Recent years witnessed the debate between working together and working alone .
While most people think the cooperation will be better.
From my perspective, the advantages of woking alone outweighs the group work for following reasons.
First,working alone will be more familiar to us .
Since most of the assignment is finished by ourselves, we may feel uncomfortable when discussing something with others.
And we will be more efficient because we get used of the styles of ourselves.
For instance, our class was asked to prepare a presentation and I decided to do it with my classmates.
While some of other people worked alone.
And the results show that students who did by themselves spend less time than our group.
Then, woking with others means more distractions.
Every student in a group may has different opinion ,and we are easily influenced by others.
Also it may cause argument in the group, which will severely affect the efficiency and the friendship between them.
The same example, we had different ideas about the title of the presentation and argued for hours.
But it was just a small part of our task.
So it turns out that the debate is absolutely a waste of time.
Last but not least, the person who can trust is youself.
Some of the parteners may be not reliable at all.
In a group ,the task will always distributed to each teammate.
And it is common that someone forget it or do not complete it before the deadline,which may destory the whole group's work.
Based on what is discussed above, I undoubtly suggest to work alone.
And

Some families have a sort of rule betweeen parents and children that parents will award childen with money gor their high grade in school.
Many people especially some students support this idea.
However, some others doubt that this rule will not bring positive effects to children.
On a personal note, I also hold an opposite opinion towards such phenomenon.
Firstly, it might lead to the children considering it natural to ask for money for their every efforts, which is a fault recognition.
Parents' rewarding method directly links students grade with money, which is a very negative indication.
It does have effects to some extent on encouraging children to study hard, but neglects the real purpose of getting more knowledge.
As a result, children will have a tendency to ask for money for everything they do though some are their duties.

A recent research conducted by New York University shows that eight-five percent of students who used to be rewarded by parents with money take studing as a way of earning more, and tend to take it for granted for asking for money as repayment when they complete some tasks.
Secondly, it is also harmful to the healthy development of children's personality and life values.
Awarding children with money makes it too earlyfor the rules in adults' world to enter children's lives.
They realize the rule of exchanging and will try to imitate.
Generally they will have the tendency to asking for pay for every effort they give.
They have a higher possiblity of becoming selfish and worshiping profits in the future.
It can make children difficult to get along well with others.
One of my classments was used to being awarded often by his mother.
He have a habit of asking for pay for every effort or piece of information he gives, even if he was communicating with his classmates.
No one liked to stay with him.
Thirdly, it can make the family relationship quite distant.
As the way of awarding is directly connected with money, which make family relationship generally become utilitarian.
there have been little warmth and comfortable atmodphere in the family.
A recent research conducted by school newspaper has proved it.
