It is difficult for a parent to just look their children making mistakes.
Most parents have been got used to doing everying well for their children.
However, at some point part pf being a good parent letting them do it just themselves and making mistakes.
No matter how much we want to help our kids.
Our kids need  to have the freedom to make mistakes and learn from them.
Your fails and mistakes can be greatest lessons.
Children experience what they had done wrong and they will know how to do it right next time.
They will also know how to think about the question.
What matters best is not the result but what they have learned.
When i was young,i forgot to bring my homework to school.
My teacher was angry and told me to get it quickly.
So i phoned my mom to send it to me.
To my suprised, she refused my request and told me it is my own bussiness.
So my teacher punished me.
But from that day, I always check my schoolbag twice before i go to school.
So i never forget to bring my homework anymore.
Anyone will make mistakes in their own life.
So we shouldn't be afraid of our children's failure.
By this way,they will have courage to do anything.
If they make mistakes,they will also learn something from it.
They will know how to think about their problem and how to avoid making mistakesagain.
Obviously,our children will be more creative,they will have more thoughts and try to make them.
In conclusion, if we want our own children to developa sense of responsibility, we just need to let them do it themselves and making mistakes.
Because no one can protect their children forever, and we can learn to live our own lives by growing up through our mistakes.

Latter generations will live in a more beneficial circumstance that the previous one never had.
However, every period forms different kinds of people, in other words, each generation does not have entirely identical ideology and thought.
As a result, parents who were being pioneers to their kids meet some inevitable problems when that teach thier children how to face mistakes.
Should parents let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes?
As far as I am concerned, with current educational tendency, I probably say absolutely 'yes'.
This process will bring kids tremendous advantages at least for nowadays.
The moral ideology and academic purpose's integration and synthesis will bring countless benefits to the children that some of them have to be acquired form making the mistakes.

To paraphrase the prompt, it is students' teachers, rather than their frients, that exert more influence on them.
As a matter of fact, when students are at school or off campus, both their teachers and friends would have impact on them.
From my perpective, however, it is a student's friends that would outweigh his or her teachers when it comes to the influnce that they might have on a student.
My reasons are as follows.
To begin with, it is self-evident that, compared with  friends, teachers do not ususally have much time comminicating with students.
Even worse, in some schools where teachers change frequently, the time students take together with their teachers would be even more limited.

On the contrary, since students take most of their time with their friends, both in classrrom and after school, they could communicate with each other more efficiently and imitate each other more easily.

For example, regarding the issue of having naughty students fix their problems, it is far more beneficial for such a student to imitate the obedient behaviors of his or her classmates than following the order of a teacher to address the issue.
Besides, due to the fact that they tend to more in common with their friends, teachers have a far less manifast impact on a student than his or her friends.

As a matter of fact, due to the sharp differences between teachers and students, it is not surprising that sometimes teachers might even fail to understand their students and accordingly exert no power  when it comes to the influence over his or her students.

For instance, when a student shows the sign of distracting himself or herself from study by skipping classes for some blockbusters, an intimate fellow of his or hers could be more advantageous since such a good friend could pinpoint the real cause of this student's truancy.

On the contrary, however, it is more often than not that, facing such a disobedient student, a teacher could easily hit the ceiling and inform the students' parents of  what happened without asking or even wondering why the students would have the thought of skipping class in the first place.
Admittedly, teachers do have their role to play when it comes to influencing their students.
Needless to say, a teacher has to be the role of model when it comes to the students' study and the formation of world values.
However, due to the rather limited time and energy that a teacher could distribute to a student, the teacher's influence is not that much when students have formed their own ideas.

In a nutshell, while it is more than clear-cut that both teachers and friends of students certainly exert impact on them, there is no denying that it is the influence of their friends that outweighs that of their teachers for the reasons given above.

The project that my teacher asked me to do was often postponed for several times.
Then my teacher changed the way and asked me to cooperate with another student.
Thanks to my teacher, it really helped me a lot when I wanted to give up study and enjoy myself instead.
It is awared that there are abundant tasks for workers to do during the workday.
However, the variety of tasks can affect workers' satisfaction level while working that some prefer various works while others just want do the similar tasks all day long.
As far as I'm concerned, different types of work can be more advantageous to improve our satisfaction for several reasons.
The major one noticed by every worker obviously is the fresh feeling different types of work can provide.
Workers are faced with one task in the morning and another one in the afternoon.
People often get tired doing the same thing over and over again and may fall into sleep as a consequence of boreness.

However, when there are two or more tasks to be finished, we may not follow the same patterns to accomplish them and have to come up with something new, thus refreshiing our brain and end up more satisfied when we get the work done.
The next significant reason is that differnt tasks require versatile skills.
While we repeat what we have mastered previously, we can't really improve our ability of working and are limited whinin one specific area that may be eliminated gradually.
For instance, a typewriter used to a decent job for people in the early 1900s, but now everyone have access to computers, a professonal typewriter is no longer needed.
So it's quite important to acquire more skills in the work and it makes people feel better.
The third reason is about effectiveness.
We all want to be efficient at work and leave the office on time.
But sometimes, similar tasks are just too long and reduce our interest in working.
As a result, we may finish a task till the very end.
But when provided with new tasks, we have the belief in mind that once this task is finished, we have to do the other one just like a video game that we come across a series of difficulties.
However, once we finish them, the happiness just can't be measured.
With the above reasons, it is safe to assume different tasks are better.

Nowadays, job definitely is an essential ingredient in our life.
Job not only can solve our basic life requirements, but also never fail to help us achieve our future achievements.
Do you want obtain a job with unbelivable high salaries but you need to leave your family and friends?
For me, I refuse.
I prefer chosing a job with low salaries but I can accompany my friends and family.
In the first place, living in a condition without any friends and family members, even huge amount of money you get, will bring lots of negative impacts on people's physiological healthy.
For instance, in the past, I could earn million dollars one year when I worked in comuper company.
However, I was so busy and I almost spend all my time on writing electronic codes and organizing comuter system.
This way, I even had not enough time to sleep, leave along to stay with my friends and family members.
However, I gradually got physiological illness because of this kind of life; I could not sleep can did not want to eat.
Finally, I queited the job and work in a resterount near my home now.
Although salary is not high as much as ago, I can have a walk with my parents every night and I can play the basketball with my friends three times a week.
Graduaylly, my body turn into a normal condition and I feel confortable everyday.

Secondly, we are supposed to consider for our family members so we need to spend more time to accompany them; therefore, it is better for us to choose a job with more time to stay with our family members and low salary.
My friend's example can successfully illustrate this point.
James works in a international company with high salary.
However, he always have no time to go home to see his mother.
His mother yearn him everyday and finally get a severe brain illiness.
When James visite his mother, his mother has not too much time.
He told me that the biggest mistake he makes in his life is that he only consider his job rather than his parents and family members are important than everything.
Based on his experience, I realize the importance of family members and I prefer choosing a job with low salary in order to stay with my parents.
Finally, it is impossible to use money exchange happiness.
However, staying with family can embrace lots of happiness.

However, if improving Internet connection is at the cost of mitigating the development of public transportion, further discussion is needed.
Needless to say, Internet changes our life ratically in many ways such as ways of doing business, obtaining information as well as making friends.
But in some rural and remote areas, Internet is inaccessible.
The people living in these places can't keep pace with modern society's development because of information barrier.
To be more specific, they can't get information as fast as we can, so they are always backward.
Introducing Internet access to these areas will absolutely strengthen the link between these people and outside world.
Also, it makes it easier for them to do things like searching for study materials and promoting their products.
However, improving public trasportation is equally important to Internet access.
On the one hand, convenient transportant will increase people's happiness index, which means that they don't wait for a bus for a long time and don't worry about environment inside the bus or train.
What they need to do is to enjoy a faster and comfortable trip.

On the other hand, in the long run, developing public transportation is beneficial to our environment becasue to some extent, it reduces the usage of private car, which mitigates exhaust pollution and does good to air quality.

The issue that whether employers should have a diverse range of tasks in a day or not is highly debatebale.
And some people support that  workers are more likely to achieve a sense of satisfation when they get a variety of tasks.
However, I hold on the view that different professions have different requirements and when it comes to the job satisfaction, the specific  job should be considered .
On the one hand, having different range of tasks has positive influence on employers who work for the art fields.
It is known to all, many vocations, like clothing design or building manufacture, need experience new things and environment to come up with creative or innovative ideas.
Under no circumstances will the designers make a successful product when they stay in the office, drawing the pictures for a whole day.
As for they, it will be beneficial for them to do some other activities even if they are just assigned to have a rest and enjoy the river or flowers in the park.
After all, feeling relaxing helps to release their pressure during work, which is essential to designers.
On the other hand, it is important for some workers who specilize in serious fields to repeat their work in order to be more qualified and experienced.
Take the scientists for example.
It is well accepted that scientists paly a significant role in the well-being of the society.
Every time they devise a new elctronic device or new medicine, it will definitely bring plent of impact on people's daily life.
However, all these outcomes will never obtained without numerous experiments and data collected during that period.
It may seem a little tedious or even easy for some people who are in another job.
However, once a elusive mistake happen in the experiment, the medicine may be useless sometimes may be poisonous to human.
At this time, they need to do similar experiments all the time.
Apart from that, doctors especially those who conduct operations also need to do similar works all day long.

Will you believe in a surgery doctor who attaches more importance to other tasks like learning how to inject or an experienced doctor who keeps operate patients many and many times during working time.
The truth is that the more time you spend on one task, the more you tend to be professional on the field.
In conclusion, we should take a person's job into consideration when we tale about the job satisfaction.
Not all the works are  the same.

To paraphrase the statement, compared with merely doing similar tasks day in and day out, workers would be better off if they could undertake various types of tasks during the workday.

Whereas opinions regaridng this proposition might differ from one person to another, I tend to on the side of the statement and am truly for the benefits that results from going through a variety of different tasks during the workday.
My reasons are as follows.
For one thing, having many different kinds of tasks to fulfill is nearly an inevitable means by which a worker could make the most use of his or her time and energy in the work..

In fact, while focusing on one task might be more likely to get one thing done as perfect as possible, it is more crucial for us to realize that, professionals today tend to have a more interdisciplinary carrer than ever before and, consequently, it is far more pivotal to get the whole job done well instead of simply putting all one's efforts on getting one task done well.

One needs to consult no further than a CEO of a conglomeration or a director of an investment bank in order to realize how indispensable for them to organize their daily work schedule based on various types of tasks, namely listening to the debreifing of others, making strategic decions regaring their companies or inititives and having both formal business appointments with their clients and informal social gathering with colleagues to keep themselves posted.
For another, undertaking various types of tasks would also be a good means by which workers could relax themselves and help themselves keep their own efficiency.

Whereas spending long hours in similar tasks would more or less get workers tired of their professions and such a negative cyle would continue as time passes by, having more than one or even several types of tasks would be a more self-releasing way for workers to adapt themselves in their daily work schedule.

In fact, the drowziness and all the negative feelings would be gone when an IT engineer take a short break from staring at his or her screen and just read some latest research papers relevant to his or her field, keeping himself or herself posted in the industry and, meanwhile, helping relax a bit from the pressure of staring at screen.

In a nutshell, it is more advantageous for workers to adopt a schedule of organizing his or her workday with various types of tasks  than simply diving himself or herself in similar tasks all day long during the workday.

While it is of great importance for workers to allocate a certain amount of time on one task and make sure the job would be done as well as possible, it is more paramount for workers to realize that, getting the whole work done well means that undertaking different types of tasks during the workday would be an means by which any professionals could maximize his or her work efficiency.

I remmeber when I was in high school, students had to follow a strict rountine repeatly, meaning the tasks that we were asked to do are pretty much the same every day all year round, including morning reading, eight classes, heavy load homework, and endless exams.
It is common known by Chinese citizens' that all of these are for a piece of paper permitting you to go to a college.

It felt good sometimes to have such a clear goal, but being forced to do the same thing over and over again for saveral years, students started to lose the ability to think independently, which has almost eliminated the possibility for people making progress in metal development, strenghening faith in their future, or having interest in innovation.
However, people seems more radiant and engergetic after we entered college and adopted much more different way of studying and getting things done.
Especially with more freedom to take chances and try out things that we have never done before, we tend to become more interested in being good and making the world a better place.
Undoubtfully, it's human natural to persue for things that seem refreshed to us.

People would feel much happier to do things that can help them to feel achievement by overcoming difficulties, sovling questions, finding out the unkowns, or getting to understand better about the world.

In addition, people nowadays prefer to have more interesting lives than living a normal regular life, and with the continuelly develpment of technology, more robots will be used to replace jobs that require repeatly tasks, which would make people's lives much more efficient, but only those who can work multitasks would stay employeed.

The only joy they may get is the change of their work or a little difference of the job.
By occasionally change their jobs, they are more likely to find themselves more motivated and more enthusiastic to do the job.
However, this question differs in terms of which kind of bussiness and company they are in.
Highly professional jobs tends to have long length of time to acquire for a professional staff.
For tasks like this, even they could be dull if the works contiues to do it for a long time.
It takes risks for a factory to change the worker for the job too often, for it can cause the dissminish of the quality and reduce the efficiency of producing the product.
For example, when you are familiar with typing the words, you probabaly do not even need to look at the keyboards.
You will also feel quite satisfied because you are familiar and really skillful for the task.
However, it takes a long time for a person who is not capable to learn the position of different alphabetical order of the keyboards.
That will definately reduce the efficiency of a company.
And the person will not be satisfi There are some other jobs that are less required which can be changed for the workers to avoid them getting board.
When the workers are familiar with different jobs.
The efficiency and the quality of the work will not decline if the workers are changing occasionally.
In addition, by doing so, it will on the contrary increase the efficiency of a company without workers getting dull with their daily task.

On the other hand, if the job changes to fast or there are too many kinds of the job for the workers to finish, it could also not come to satisfactory because too many kinds of jobs will make the worker mess up with the task and they may get stressed out with the job changing too often.
However, for companies which highly values profits and incomes.
They cannot ignore the feeling of workers for they can never be treated like machines.
There are also some works who otherwise enjoy the stable of the job, they are likely to get annoyed if their tasks are changed too often.
There are high possibilities that they are more efficient when they are doing the same work steadily and unchangingly.
The factory or the company should know the need of the workers needs.
Sometimes the satisfactory does not come from what job they are doing but from what working environment they are under.
The noises and poor environment can not make a worker satisfied even his job changes all day long.
In current sociaty, children are controlled by their parents and school so strictly that children have no time to do somethings they wanted to do.

However some people believe that children shouldn't spend more time on school tasks and some public activities, they should have more time to do something they enjoy, but some people don't think that.
In my opinion, I think children should have more time to do whatever they want anyway.
First, let children to do whatever they want can help them find out his interest and talent in some field, and let them develope their interest.
For example, I have a sister who is not good at math, but her school and parents force her to study math all day, thereby she hardly make any progress.
Until, she started her university campus life.
Without parents and school control, she found out she was really good at painting, so she started study painting and hard-working.
Finally, she got unusual achievement.
Secondly, let children to do whatever they want can boost children's acadamic motivation, and make them study more happlier.

For example, when I was in primary middle school, I can only contact some formmal curriculums, just like math, Chinese, physics and so on, and studied these boring and cliche subjects continue the day by night.
Although l was willing to study these in the surface, but in fact, I can't stand these anymore.
Until I proposed that I need time to do thatever I want, and my parents agree with my point, and I recover the motivation on study at all.

I don't mean that doing homework or participating in organized activeties are so bad, but we can't let children to spend more time on it, or they will feel boring and lose acadimic motivation, even they will be depressed and commit suicide at last.
Finally, I think this sociacal situation is abnormal, we shouldn't force children spend more time on dong homework or particapating in organized activitied.
We should let children have more time to do whatever they want, this is a efficient way to educate.

somebody are willing to have an independent study style where others enjoy to study with their friends or partners to solve all problems in study.
As for me,I'd like to choose the later one to make sure my study is effective.
First of all,when we meet a really difficult problem,I dont believe anyone can solve by herself/herself unless he is the descendant of Einstein.
So we must set up a group which contains several students.
We can solve the problems by dividing into some parts according to the number of persons.
Then everyone does his or her own assignment.
It must be better and more efficient than everything doing by yourself.
One man can't build a house without a group with a clear division of labor.
So,learning with a group borh can increase the quality of the project and keep a effective style.
Secondly,one smelly cobbler is the top of three Zhuge Liang.
everybody in group can have her or his own solutions to the projects.
We can put the answers toghther and compare them to choose a best one to submit to our teacher.
For example,a mathematical problem similar to a deometric problem can be solved in many ways,but there must be the best one to use inside this.
If I study alone, I possiblely can think about three or four ways to solve even less than this number.
But in a group,every person can consider two answers for the problem,to sum up, our group will get more ten ways to solve.
Also,I can study from this problems more because I acknowledged others' thoughts.
In a conclusion,teamwork in study or work on projects is a way to get the best of both sides.
For the efficiency in study,group work can save a large amount of time by divide problems into many pieces.
For the learning effect,we can put our thought toghther to know about more way to solve the project which teachers assign.
With the development of the sociaty and the transportation, the world becomes smaller and smaller.
As long as  there are events happening we can know the news very quickly and these news which may will not affect our life may can birng us a lot of thinking.
And these things are unlikely that they will affect your life may have some big influence that you may not find.
So I agree with the point that we should know the events happing around the world.
Fitstly, some events that happen around the world may bring a lot of thinking to us.
For example, in the last year a ship met accident on the sea and there are several hundurd of students in this ship.
Unfortunately, most of the students cannot escape from this accident; they staied in the sea forever.
This news astonish me very much; it seems has no relationship to me but when I think for some time, I found I learn a lot from this news.

The first we must to follow the regulation; the one reason that the ship met the accident is there were too much people in the ship and when the ship fall into the sea, the ship cannot provide enough small ship for these students to leave.

Furthermore, this news also teach me that we cannot lose order even though we are being great dangerous; when the people in the ship saw the ship will fall they all very nervous; they all want to be the first one to leave these bad situation.
Consequently, the efficiency of them to leave the ship decrease and they all could not leave the ship.
All these details give me very deep thinking and I learn a lot of things like we need follow regulations and to be come down whatvever we meet.
This news likely have no relationship with me teaches me so a lot.
So you can say the events happen on the world have no influent on our daily life.
When I go home, the most frequent words I hear from people around me is that you have changed a lot.
One thing I am sure in today's world is that the world is changing quickly and so do people.
Some people ,like my parents do not ilke it .
Their idea is that changes scare them since they do not know how to adapt to the current world.
However, as far as I am concerned, I firmly believe that changing is fantastic which makes people become happier than before.
My reasons are as followed.
To begin with, with the development of science and technology, a lots of innovations are brought, enriching people's lives and making them more convenient.
This is to say,  things like public facilities, health care service, and so on , are improved to make this world a better place.
Nowadays, with the support of the government, when getting sick, people can access to free treatment, which largely improves people's sense of happiness.
For instance,  nowadays, patients with AIDS can get free medicine in certain hospitals,helping them to sustain their lives for years.
The soical  innovation plays a iimportant part in people's lives.
In addition, as we all know, economy has made a giant progree in the past few years, rendering people lead a richer lives as well as providing them with more ways of entertainment and richer lives.
It is said that material life is the basis fo a happy life, so people now can pursue what they want, buy whatever they like and go wherever thay fancy, they are definitely happier than before.
Taking myself as an example, 10 years ago, being a poor girl, I hardly ever had the ability to buy things I like, but now I am much richer and shoping gives a great sence of fufillment.

Lastly, I admit that changing also has some negative effects, for example, nowadays, it is much harder to make real friends and most young people are engaging themselves in online games and seldom talk as what people did in the past, however, all the merits mentioned above overweigh the shortcomings.
In conclusion, It is believed that people are happier than before as a reuslt of all the advantages brought by the fast changing world.
Nowadays, an interesting topic has aroused a heated debate: whether it is necessary or necessary for all university students to take history cources despite their own major?
Some people hold the view that students are only supposed to study their own subjects.
However, as far as I am concerned, studing history is crucial for every college students.
My view can be elaborated as follows.
First of all, it helps university students improve their academic performance in their professional subject.
As we all know, every subject has its personal history.

Therefore, it is a precious chance for college students to master the logical system of their own subjects' former talents and get some significant inspirations from the experience in terms of how to think the professional questions and further accelerate the development of their own expertise.
For example, Bragg is a fomous professor in physics and he has received the Nobel Prize in 1922.

One time he received the interview of a media and he said the reason why he could devise a brilliant method which had the ability to observe the structure of cystal was that he had learned the history of phycis and found some interesting experiments conducted by another famous professor and got some inspiration.
Furthermore, it helps people make more friends.
It is for granted that history is interesting and attracts the attention of many students.
Hence, always will university students will broaden their social net by participating in the history classes.
Silmutanously, given the existence of many chances for studensts to communicate with others during the class gap and after class time.
The relationship between studensts and their friends encountered in the history class will be consolidated a lot.

For instance, I chose history cources last year and our professor provided us with abanduant time in order to let us share our personal ideas about the specific historical things and work togther in the form of group to have a presentation for the class.
Therefore, my group nembers lived and studied with me in a long period and therefore we became good friends.
From what has been discussed above, I can safely draw a conclusion that taking history cources benefits college studenst a lot no matter what their field of study is.
Not only can they have a good performance in their own subject, but also will they make more friends with others.

When it comes to the question whether parents should offer their children money through their marks, different people hold different views.
Personally, I believe that it is not a good idea to evaluate chilfren by their grade.
To begin with, parents should pay more attention to children's interests and life.
It's acceptable that children don't gain a high mark.
But it doesn't represent that children are not smart enough because the result may caused by many factors such as the bad mental condition.
Instead, parents are supposed to care their children's talents and offer them encouragement and praisement to let them pursue what they really like.
Only by this way can children find what they are good at and make efforts to improve themselves.
In addition, that parents care more about their children's grade rather than their true feeling will bring more pressure to them.
Everyone has their speciality.
Some do well in study.
Others have a good command of art or sports.
Therefore, grade can be seen as a standard to evaluate children.
What's more, most children have peer pressure so that they can't be blocked out of the stress accumulated in their daily life.
If their parents are unable to find their difficulities but to require them to get a high mark when they are stressful, it only increases their pressure.
Granted, high mark is beneficial for children to apply for a good university.
However, if parents offer children money for each high mark, it may hurt their feeling in certain extence.
What's worse, they will have a heavier burden on their shoulders.
Therefore, it's  parents's duty  to justify children' s grade properly.
To sum up, it is of less benefit to provide children with money

In China, offering school-age children money for high grade they get in school are becoming more and more common.
From my perspective, I don't think this is a good idea.
It couldn't be denied some money for getting high grade in school is good for children's high enthusiasm, but it will lead to an unforeseeable result especially as lying.
Children are young, they can't realize the importance of honest enough.
Sometimes they want to get extra money, they may lie to parents, which will lead to the result of a bad habit.
I still remember the story my mother told me about my uncle.
When they were young, my grandparents gave them money for snacks if they got good grades.
But my uncle didn't like study so that he never got high grades for extra money at first.
Overtimes, he began to lie that he got good grades to get the money from grandparents.
Certainly, they knew his trick, but they didn't expose him at first time.
And now, even becoming adults, uncle still lies to us sometimes.
That is a bad habit of dishonest.
Moreover, while young, parents should help children form the idea that study is for themselves instead of other things.
Students study to gain knowledge for further use after entering the sociaty.
If parents always give their child money for each high grade, the child would form a contrary idea that only if I got great grades, I could earn money.
So they would study more for grade and exams, rather than study itself.
What's more, to school-age children, their only goal is to study knowledge, so money should not be the thing that they think about.
Parents should give their child enough money for their need.
One of my friends' parent is same as the topic talks about, and now he become a man who is very mean.
So on the conclusion, I think parents shouldn't offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.

There is no denying the fact that parents' early education has become more and more important in this competent situation.
Whether parrents should tolerate the mistakes made by children and make them then from them has always been a significant debate nowadays.
Many parents are too strict to their children so that they tend to punish their children when they make mistakes.
I think it's unfair, so I agree with the idear that parents should take the children's mistakes for granted and teach them how to avoid them next time.
Here are my reasons.
Firstly, there is an old saying goes that 'no one avoids mistakes'.
The parents often make mistakes in their own work or something else, and they can't finish their job without any obstacle.
Hence, it's no doubt that the innocent children can finish their acadmic assigments without making any mistake.
What counts is not what mistake they make but what they can learn from the mistake.
For example, the famous inventor of the United States, Edison, used to make mistakes during the time when he was aborbed in the process of invention.
In order to make the factories more efficient, Edison decided to invent something that can give off light to make sure that workers can work during the latter time.
One experiment after another, he could not make the electricty into light power, and failed again and again.
However, he learned from the mistakes that it's impossible to tranform electricty into light directly, so he began to try something else.
Finally, he kewn that fire is very blight, which means he could use the heat to make light and he eventually invented the bulb.
Acoording to this example, we can understand that mistake is the step stone of success.
Moreover, making some mistakes can help children to exercise their heart.
Every time children make mistakes, they are going to feel upset and lose motivation to go ahead.
If parents choose to critisize them strictly, they may lock them heart and don't want to do what they have failed.
No wonder that hurt their heart and ruins their self-esteem.
For my own part, I totally agree that parents should take the children's mistakes for granted and teach them how to avoid them next time.
As long as parents learn this, their children is bound to embrace a brighter future and turn over a new leaf in their life.
It is a signifiant thing for a person to determine a most efficient way for he or she to organize a day's schedule.
No matter he or she is a leader of a company,a journalist of a magazine or a professor  of a high school.
they have to choose,the basic thing, doing various things or doing the same work in a day.
As far as my opinion,I will choose only do a single task in a day,and here are my reasons.
Firsly,somebody will say,different tasks means one can change his mind several times in a day and we all know that if we keep on doing one thing it may let our brain feel dumb and tired.
While I do not think this is a problem,because we can take rest  when we feel tired.
Even though you are taking various work in a day,withou the intervals for having a rest.
You still will feel tired.
While if you have a short rest after each step of  a same task.
You will never feel tired.
As old saying goes,only work  no play makes Jack a dull boy.
Whether you are tired or not is a matter with the frequency of having rest and which has nothing to do with the sorts of work you do in a day.
Secondly,only concentrating on one thing is the most efficient way do address things.
If you take so many things in a day,it also  means you should conduct many begins of various tasks.
Compared with doing single task ,stating doing various task without the connection between task to task,you should pay more time to get start.
Take myself as an example,when I going to finish my math homework and english home work in one day,I have to prepare both kinds of reference meterials for checking,while those  work are sweat paying.

When I pay all my attention on the math homework I forget to prepare the reference material for my english,so I have to borrow it from one of  my classmate in the library,while when I use this to finish my english homework,I find that is not the correct version I want to use.
So what I have done is in vain at last.
So we should put our attention only in one single aim in one day.
It will help us make less mistakes and do things more efficiently.

Nowadays, an interesting discussion has arose among the public, whether children should spend more time on doing homework or participating in activities organized by school.
Some people think this idea is reasonable, but other group of people think that children should be given more time to do whatever they are willing to do.
From my perspective, I agree with the idea that children should have more time to do whatever they want.
Here are several reasons I will explain.
Firstly, having more time to do what they want is good for their mental health.
As is known to all, the duty of education is not only focusing on the physical development, but aslo focusing on the mental growth.
With too much homework or compulsory activities, kids cannot bear the pressure from their daily life, which do harm to their mental growth.
As a result, we should give children more time to do what they want, that is more helpful for their spirit.

For example, when I was a child, my parents usually told me that I do not have to finish all the homework assigned by my teacher, while I should have more time to do things I prefer, like playing chess with my grandfather.
And that is really good way to help me balance the study and rest, making me feel relaxed and let me have a good preparation for the next day's study.
Secondly, children have more time to do whatever they want can improve their self-studying skill, which is significant for their future career.

With the great development of ecomonic and technology, we should be attached more importance to the self-growth, because this era need the talent people who are equipped with the skill to study new things.
And the children should have more time to exercise their creation and innovation by doing what they are willing to.
As is universally acknowledged, there are many agency which accept the children to train their ability of imagination and creativity by letting them do things they want.
And with the time goes by, the result proves that this training seems have a good effect.
Therefore, for the children, they should have more time to increasing their hobbies and imagination.
Admittedly, children should do homework and attend the activities from their school or their parents' instruction.
However, if they control their time in doing what they want and balance the time between both, it is undeniable that this way is better for their growth.

Taking everything into nutshell, I totally agree with the idea that children should spare more time to do the things they want, which is good for their mental health and the improvement of their sell-study skill.

Nowadays, with the various company models developed, the working style relatively converts variously.
People  can decide their working style.
Some enjoy to work only three days a week for long hours, for they think it is more enjoyable to have a entire time to deal with their private stuff not being disturbed.
However, the others hold that to have a job where you work five days a week for shorter hours will disperse the pressure from the everyday work load.
From my point of view, the former is more attrective for me.
The reasons are as follows.
Fristly, working three day a week means one can enjoy a more flexible schedule.
They can either take avacation or participate in some kins leisure activities on another 4 days.
For example, if i want to take a trip to Thiland, i no longer need to ask for leave since for eache week, i have two more off-duty days with this new working schedule.
On the contrary, this kind of flexibility can hardly be achieved with a 5-day workday.
In addition, there is an increasing tendency that many employees are forced to work over time, soetimes many employes are forced to work over time, sometimes even without pay.
Obviously, a longer- hour workhday suits them better.
They can take better rests in another 4 days and resume their work with full energy next week.
For instance, IT engineers in my department often work till 9pm because they do not want leave some minor bugs to the next day.
However, their hard work is not compensated by more paid vacations or overtime pay.
Admittedly, for some people such as a new mom, working shorter hours is better.
It is because they need to take care of their family on a daily basis, and a five- day workweek offers them with more time every day to fulfill these responsibility.
For example, parents may not be able to pick up thier kids from the kindergarten and prepare the meals for them every day if they chosse to work longer hours.
However, in general, most people can benefit more from the three-day workday.
In conclusion, iwill favor the three-day workweek compared with the traditional five-day work day.

The mistakes help you grow better
Many parents would like to teach their children all their lfe experiences and skills and they think this will help children to go less wrong road.
However I think this is not good for children's growing up.
Everyone has his own road, and nobody can repeat others' method to success.
In this way, to make some mistakes in early age and recorrect it, is benefit to the whole life.
First but not the most, to make some mistakes, you will know what you cannot do well and yu will have a clear way to improve yourself.
Just take myself for example, in my childhood, every time when I made some mistakes, such as did something wrong or not did well in exams which I could have done well.
There would always not the critic from my parents nevertheless the idea that I could use to do better.
As a result of this, I could do better no matter in my stdudy or to do things.
With the mistake, I clear know my faults and later I will train it and cover the shortage.
Secondly in China, there is an ancient saying that you were not the god and you can't do everything right.
So you cannot avoid every mistake.
To compared with using your energy on help children avoid it, it is better to teach them how to correct it.
Children will general assembly meet the problem or do something wrong some day.
If they don't have a training when they young to cover the mistake, they will be puzzled when they later meeting it.
At that time it will be late.
Last but not the least, to make mistakes does not lose face.
For the same thing, one gets over it with parents' help and the other does it wrong and do again until he succeeds.
Maybe the first one would do it more quickly, however this thing will give him little expressions and give him nearly no experiences.
To let children know what they do wrong and help them learn from the mistakes is better for children's growing.

The courage to face the mistakes, the method to cover the problems and the experiences to benefit the life, all these kinds of things can only gain after you make your own mistakes and getting over it.
As far as I can concern, the mistakes you make can help you improve yourself and have a more colorful life.

Different high school teacher have different education style to  cultivate students.
Some teacher believe that teacher should find students that are really need help and help them make their own future carrer.
However, I totally believe that helping students to learn by themselves is the most important .
Although helping student to make their future plan can save them a amout of time inthe future.
Besides, after students making plan for their future the still need to give effort for theri dream.
If they don't hardworking for their plan, their plans are just dreams.
And, those plan that students make maybe will cause students be lazier than before.
For instance, when I studied in my high school, my neighbour class teacher asked his students to choose one university they want to go.
All of his students choose very high level university.
When middle exam caming, they didn't get good grades.
But, they still missed some important classes because they thought they could join the high level university.
The result is almost fifty percent of students got fail in the final exam.
So, making a plan for future is not very important for high school students.
Comparing with that, if students have ability to study by themselves outsied of the classrome, they go to libray or the nature, they could easier to get more intellegience from textbooks or nature.
They can research the yellow cedar for their biology exam, do some part time job like restaurant adimistrator for their statistic exam and so one.
According to their own experience, they could not only enjoy their spare time but also increase their academic grades.
Finally, high school teacher don't have enough time for finding students that really need help.
Although they find this kinds of student, thay will find that it is hard to improve their grades cause those students are don't want to study .
If high school teacher spend too much time on those students, that unfair to other students that want to ask some question.
If they still do that, the result is the grades of almost sixty percent of students will decrease.
To sum up, high school teacher should encourage and help thier student to study by themselves outside of the classroom.
The society is developing constantly at a very fast pace,so it's inevitable that we have a lot of things to deal with to catch up with the trend.
Therefore, i think it's necessary to have the ability to plan and organize,otherwise we would get lost in the torrent.
To begin with, having the ability to plan and organize can help us cope things more logically and clearly.
With an well-designed organization, I know clearly what I should do today at a specific time and place and I wouldn't get confused or find nothing to do.
What's more, I wouldn't miss out a thing that might be important to you.
For example, when I was little, I always did things without any plan.
I do anything just according to my own mood and interest.
I love math so i did the math homework first and leave the Chinese composition to the last.
Hence, every Sunday night i struggled with the composition and didn't go to sleep until midnight.
That really develope a bad habit and it's harmful for my health.
If i had plan and organize, i wouldn't feel tired in the Mondar morning and effeted my study.
Besides, the ability to plan and organize gives me an aim I need to fight for.
Sometimes you did one thing just because of it's your job or someone ask you to do so, you wouldn't stop to think about the meaning of it.
Keep working without a plan makes you like a working machine and even yourself have no idea why you're doing this.
Thus, haveing a plan is really essential.

For instance, when i was in high school, i always had trouble learning biology, but to break through this, i just keep doing exercise all the time but didn't try to understand the basic knowledge it want to convey during the process.
It turns out that it's meaningless.
However, my teacher told me that i need to know the reason i'm doing this,not just because of the practices but the thoughts and ideas i used to solve this problem.
Later, i made out a plan and it worked well for my progress.
Above all, what i want to illustrate is that the ability can guide you on your way to the success, it help you perform more wonderful.
With some much distractions around ,you need to be clear what you want.

People are generating more and more fat, that's a big problem to everybody even if they don't want to confess this.
No one would be happy if he's to fat, if  people are unhappy, how come they can be relaxing for a long time?
Secondly,exercise can help people build up their selfconfidence.
It is becase exiercise is hard for us to   keep on, there will be so much more pleasure when we really did it.

Finally, taking exercise for leisure is quite different from other activities, especially when you do it outdoors.
It's the best way for us to get ride of a day's boring work and embrace our mother nature.
Taking an action is always better than submerged in the world of imagination, like what books and movies often creat for us.
Taking exercise calls our original abiilities back to our life, which is long forgotten in the modern way of life.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: During economic crisis, which one of the following expenditures should be reduced by goverment: library, police or public transportation?
As far as I am concerned, government should cut down the expenditures of library.
My point can be elaborate as follows.
To begin with, library is not necessary during the economic crisis.
To be more specific, people are very anxious because they lost their property and jobs.
What they need to do is to find a job or way to earn some money and make a living.
They need would never have time and money to read books.
For example, my uncle Wang lost his job and most of his property during the economic crisis in 2014.
He also had three kids, old father and mother.
He need to find a job to earn enough money so that he can afford his family's life.
He spent all his time to search a job and did some part-time job at the same time.
Although he was crazy about reading and always visist library before, he never read book during the economic crisis.
On the contrary, police is necessary during the economic crisis.
To illustrate, some people lost hope of making a living since thay might lost all their property, jobs and even family.
This kind of people might do some illegal things such as robbing and stealing.
In this case, we need more police to ensure the public security.
Thus government should increase the expenditures of police instead of reduce it.
For instacne, at the start of the economic crisis, there were many thieves in our country.
Then government hire more police in order to improve the publice security and it worked.
What' more, public transportation is also necessary during the economic crisis.
This is because government can reduce unemployment through funding some new transportation project which can create a lot of jobs.
It is very good for social stable since people do not complain if they have a job to make a living.
For example, my country funded new metro during the economic crisis and millions of people get the jobs from those projects.
And our society is very stable during the econimic crisis.

In my own consideration , I cannot agree with such strategy.
Any strategy will have its benefits, though.
Use money as an award and source of motivation to stimulate the interest of children about study.
It may get very impressive result in the short run.
Children who are really thurst for some awards such as expensive toys, candies etc. will obviously make their effort to study much harder to get their target accomplished.
But , however .

First , If the problem of school-aged children confronted is not the motivation of study , but the method of study , this stimulate machanism will just drive them into a more anxious status that studying not well is not just a problem but a sign that their parents will not love(award) them.
This will obviously lead to a cycle that maybe result in a fear of study itself in the end.
Besides , children's mental area are easy to be manupulated.
Guiding them with physical material to push their study makes no different from training dogs with bones.
Dogs will chase the bone , but in the long run ,they will only responde when their masters throw object.
So does children that are awarded in such machanism.
Study is a long term behavior , even throughout our lives.
So , if these parents really want their children get good scores in the exam and enjoy study in the long run.
To study with them , communicate with them , take part in the whole period of early study and help their children to establish their own interest and good habit .
Try their best to provide their children with an environment that is suitable for study.
Only in this way, as Children grow up ,their habit of study will be firmly established and maintained.
So, pay more on heart and attention rather than cash and toys.
Finally your children will get their own way for studying.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether is it as essential for older people to learn new things as it is for younger people?
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some people claimed that it is not as improtant for the elder to study as it is for young people.
However, I would stand on their opposite side and I believe that it is vital for older people to study as it is for the young.
My viewpoints can be elaborated as follows.
Firstly, it would increase the level of knowledge of the whole citizens include the older people, if older people study or learn new things.
With the development of electric technology, older people would not understand the advanced technology or knowledge.
If we just concentrate on the education of younger people, the level of whole citizens of knowledge and culture would unchange or go back.
If we want to make a big progress in national civilization, we should pay as the same attention to the older people as we pay attention to the younger people.
For example, Wuhan was assessed as advanced city last year because the older people which from Wuhan took part in the scientific model contests and got good grades.
More and more older people now are encouraging to learn more new things and our level of knowledge has been increased.
Secondly, older people would feel happiness if they learn new things.
Many people would think that it is unnecessary for older people to study in their current ages.
However, if older people study or learn new things, they would feel sense of accomplshment and feel happiness because it is not easy to achieve for older people.
They can also share new things with their family.

It is the same when it comes to human beings.
Mistakes help children learn for lifelong.
Making mistakes is a good method for children to grow up.

It is widely known that parents cares so much about their childrens' gardes in school that there is almost nothing they wouldn't do in order to obtain a higher score.
Thus, some of them would choose to give awards to children to encourage harder-working.
This is not a bad idea based on psychology researches.
Simple as it is, we usually expect something in return of our hard work.
Knowing that high grades does not necessarily attract all children, we need to provide them with something they want in trade of what we want from them.
As far as I am concerned, this "work-award" system is much better than punishing them in circumstances where they fail to be distinguished.
After all,high grades are what we want from them, not necessarily what children value the most.
Agreeing that it is important to encourage children with rewards, it is inevitable to discuss the methods.
Money is flexible enough to be almost anything only when children can use them wisely.
We have to admit that there are criminals out there aiming at our children who do not have enough experience to help them tell honesty from lies.
Also, they may think that you don't care about them enough to spend time on getting to know their interests,or maybe just asking the question.
One solution is to find out what else you can give them in stead of money.
For example, supposing thst your child likes football, you could promise him a ticket to a football match, thus making it an award to his high grade and also a priceless chance to bound with him.
What is really important is to show that you care, not simply demanding something form them.
It is of course also vital to let them understand why you are doing all this and that you are always stiking together no matter what comes along.

It is a long-time controversial topic about whether leadership is gifted or learned.
It is said that some peole are born to be leaders, and that some people cannot grow up to be successful leader despite of elite edution.
Despite of all the examples taken by these people, I disagree with the argument that one cannot learn to be a leader.
Personally, I believe that one can become a leader with great effort and help from others.
First, one needs great effort to grow to be a leader.
Being a leader means great responsibility and better ability in some sense.
A leader should work hard enought to take the responsibility and gain corresponding ability.
For example, Zhu Yuanzhang, the first king of Ming dynasty, paid great effort to grow from a beggar to a king.
Being poor and uneduated, Zhu were accustomed to follow the orders of others.
It was the death of all his relaves that stimulated his awareness to be a leader.
He worked day and night to obtain knowledge and paid enormous efforts to be a sussessful leader.
It is not easy to be a leader, but leadership does't come naturally.
It requres hard work and great effort.
Second, growing to be a leader needs help from others.
Leadership asks for a group of people.
One needs help in the way to leadership.
Besides, a successful leader gain supports from other.
Jane, one of my pre-classmates, works as a management in a big company.
As a young girl, she was taught to get along with other and took specific responsibility.
Then, she worked as a moniter, helping teachers deal with class problems.
Her parents, teachers, classmates, and later her bosses play a significant part in her growth to be a leader.
Thus, help from others is an essential element to leadership.
All in all, leadership does not come naturally.

I agree with the statement that it is better to relax by watching a mvie or reading a book than relax by doing physical exercise.
Here are some of my opinions.
Living in such a competitive society,people are always busy with their study or work in order to create a better future or just to earn more money.
From adults to teenagers,it is very evident that they all have much stress.
Therefore,they are bond to relax themselves sometimes.
And I think watching a movie or reading a book may be more efficient.
Firstly,as is universally acknowleged,people will probably get exhausted after they fight for their lives and what they need is to relax wtihout taking their physical strength.
What if people choose to do physical exercise,they may be more tired and have no more energy to continue their formal work.
Consquently,watching a movie or reading a book in people's leisure time can help them store more energy and then get their work or study better.
Secondly,from my perspectives,watching a movie or reading a book to relax can give people more efficient comfort to their heart.
There is no denying that when people deal wtih something or get failure,they are likely to feel upset or even sometimes they may be lost in despair.
And at that time, a film or a book can give a hand to them.

On one hand,watching a film or reading a book can make their sadness fade away,on the other hand,it can give people more courage or confidence to overcome the difficulties and eventually acquire success.
In a word,watching a movie or doing physical exercsie can both get you relaxed,while watching a movie may be betterand more suitable.
And no mather  which one you choose,you are bond to remember to take 5-minute- break and then go on your work.

Facing the situation where we hold different opinions with our teachers, we are encouraged to consult with the latter after the class.
Based on what I have learned, I will wait until the class is over and others have gone, and then talk to my teacher, if what my teacher says is wrong in my opinions.
My reasons will be explained in the following paragraphes.
First, discussing my ideas with my teacher privately cannot only sovle my problem but also save her or his face.
If we have problems, they can only be tackled if we face them and talk about it.
Besides, we are often told to argue with others in an approriate manner, like in private place rather than a public place.
Several years ago, my mom, together with me, attended a kind of meeting aiming to promoting the communication between parents and teachers.
When my teacher talked something about my grades, he made a mistake about the mark.
I felt blue and wanted to cry.
I told my mom that what he said was incorrect.
My mom told me that my teacher would be sorry for making such a mistake, but we should told him after the meeting was over.
I felt terrible, but I followed her words anyway.
The following result defended my mom's words.
Therefore, telling your opinions to your teachers or leaders privately will lead to a happy ending.
Second, interrupting and correcting the mistake immediately will disturb the class or meeting and harm teachers' face.
When I was a middle school student,  we had chemical experiment classes.
One day, our chemistry teacher made a small mistake, that is he forgot to wash a jar.
I poped up and said that he forgot it.
My teacher was so embarrassed and I felt sorry about it.
From then on, I learned that we should take into consideration others' feelings, even though we are right.
Third, saying nothing will make us confusing during learning.
My cousin is a very shy boy with excellent English accent.
The strange thing is that he cannot get a good grade in the primary school.
He said that he knew that many English words pronunced by his English teacher was incorrect.
However, he dared not to speak to his teacher about it.
With time going on, he losed his interest in learnin

Recently, an interesting topic has aroused heated debate among people: in order to attract tourists, is it good for the government to improve the safety by hiring more police or improve the appearance by improving the old buildings and streets?
Answers vary from person to person.
Some cliam that it is the best idea for government to attract tourists.
However, I would stand on the opposite side and I am firmly believe that this two suggestions are not beneficial for city's tourists.
And some reasons and examples given below can illustratre my point of view.
Firstly, hiring more police is not good for tourists.

For one thing, we all know that hiring more new police would take more money containg training activities, take new uniforms stuff and their salaries, thereore it is not the best way for the government's finance.
Moreover, if there have more police stand on the most streets, it would seems serious rather than easy, but most people want have an relaxing vacation.
Second, improving the old streets and the building are destroy the tourists.
What the treasure of one tourist city  are the old buildings and streets.
This unique places are the intertesting of the visitors.
If the government improve the appearance by improving the old streets, the visitors would go out and the city would lost the valuable things of the tourist.
Third, the government can improve the safety and theappearance by another ways.
Such as they can fix many camera in the public that stand on the secrets.
And they can also improve moral sense of the local people such as do not throw rabbish in the public.

To put it in the nutshell, I think the two ways is not good for the tourists that is not noly because of hiring more police is expensive but also because of the old streets and building is precious for one city.
And we can use better way to improve the city that being a good tourist place.
When it comes to the better relaxation way, I would contend that we should stay outside and doing physical exercise.
So I disagree with this statement.
The reasons that account for my opinion are as follows.
To begin with,there are disadvantages about watching movies or reading books.
As a student,I will have to spend a large amount of time to stay in the classroom and study.
But if I still choose to sit there when relaxing,which is relatively easy comparing with doing physical exercise.
To some degree,it is not a kind of relax.
In order to keep the balance of the body,we should do some exercise physically and metally.
So here are the advantages of doing physical exercise,for not only can we get fresh air outside,but also we can sweet and expell the toxin in our body.
More importantly,we will be more energetic when we get back to work.
But in comparsion with watching a movie or reading a book,we will be more tired and under great pressure by taking this kind of relaxation.
So this is the difference between these different ways of relaxation.
For chinese students,it is necessary for our to do physical exercise rather than watching and reading.
It is not exaggerated to say that we are lacking in exercise in our daliy life with heavy study work.
In the recent years,the healty of Chinese students is decreasing,which has bought a lot of concern to it.
So as far as I am concerned,enough attention should be paid to this problem and measures should be taken.
For the government they should advocate more students to get involved in physical exercise,and improve the quality of the exercise equipment.
And for our students and other people,we should be more considerd about our healty.
In conclusion,doing physical exercise is the best way for us to relax ourselves.
Only we more and more people aware of this can they strenthen this body while having a good relaxation.

In China,parents always tell their children what is right and wrong ,what they should do to achieve their goals before they do it , children could avoid making mistakes and find the shortest way.
However,in western countries,parents always let their children go and tell them what is right and wrong after they do it.
In my point of view,parents should let their children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
Here are the reasons.
Let children make mistakes when they are young can be a great forturn for their future.
For it will be more clearly for them to remember if they had done it once before.
Therefore,they will not make the same mistake if they had suffered from the bad results brought by the mistake.
They will know how to settle the same problem next time if their parents introduce them to learn from the mistakes .
Making mistakes does not matter, what you learn from the mstake matters a lot.
Children will have much more confidence if they find ways to aviod the mistake by their own.
Nowadays, some parents award their kids with money for good marks their children win at school.
Whether it is a good idea is under the debate.
I firmly believe that high grade should never be equal to money.
If children receive money only because of their acdamic performance at school, they may regard the purpose of studying as to win money and awards in a quick way.
Hence they will underestimate other virtues they ought to poccess.
What is more, acdamic perfomances may not win them awards and fame in their future carrer if they are involved in the field of science.
There is potensial risk that they will spare no means to accelerate this process, which can sometimes be illegal.
Also, it is essencial that a child should learn that he is studying for himsilf rather than anyone else.
If he only works for awards in his childhood, he will feel confused in the future when he finds that there are no longer clear goals.
This is the inevitable consequence of wrong education.
Some people may argue that award children with monry can motivate children to work harder effienctly.
I think they have overlook the problems.
Money may work now, but the trick won't last long.
At a young age, we should urge children to go through the experinces which are eccential.
Or it will pay back in the long term.
Overall, right parenting is of great importance.
While parents are focusing on the good grade their children get, they should also pay attention to their children's psychological development.
Kids need to gain their self-assessment and goals for lifetime through experinces anmd frustrations.
So parents ought to by long-sighted rather than stick to the grade their children get.
Hopefully every parent will raise children who live with satisfaction,

Books and movies consist of most of our means of entertainment.
And since the competiton of the society is becoming more fierce, more and more peolple are inclined to relax by these means.
When being asked whether it is better to ralx by watching a movie or reading a book than by doing phiscal exercise, different people have different ideas.
From my perspective, I feel inclined to relax by watching a movie or reading a book.
My reasons are listed below.

Firstly, as we read the books or watch movies, we will indulge ourselves to the world created by the author or director and be endowed with a temporary detachment with the bothering cuurent sictuation.
Stories nowdays are so appealing thta we can hardly resist the temptation to take a glimpse of it even when we are loaded with tons of pressure.
And many books or movies not only privide wonderful stories but also offer inspiring ideas which can benefit people a lot.
And for instance, thousands of white collars will take going  to the theater to see the newest blockbuster as the best relaxation after a nine-to-five work.
Accordingly, I think books and movies help people relieve pressure effectively.
Secondly, books and movies are readily available, therefore it is convenient for people to choose them to be the means of relaxasion.
Since the techonology is well-developed now, we can get every book or movie we desire from the internet, No matter how old the book is, or which country the film producer coms from.
And our booming ecnomy give a propulation to the development of theaters.
Imagine, after coming back home, we can have a bathe and meanwhile enjoy a brilliant moive.
How glad and relarxed that experience may be!
On the contrary, sometimes it is comletely inconvenient for us to do some kind of sports.
For example, we can not run outdoor if it rains or if it is foggy.
However, buying a big and heavy running machine and put it home may take up most of the area of your bedroom.
While reading a book or watching a movie only require a phone or a computer.
Therefore, these two means seems more convenient.
To put it a nutshell, If want to choose a good means to help us relieve pressure, effectã€budget and convenience should be the key reasons taken into consideration.
Reading books or watching a movie will indulge your in anthor world and forget about the current bothering affairs.
And it is much more convenient than doing physical some exercise.
So why not try this effective and easy way to rest for a while?

As a young man, I get used to receiving information from different sources including electronic media, like TV, or Internet.
For one thing, we will devote oursevles to thinking deeply with print media.
With a newspaper or a book, we will take more seriously what we are reading, which will provoke our thinking.
When I was in high school, I found it really hard to build a composition.
Faced with the title of a compositon, I did not know whether I should agree or disagree with it, since I had no evidence to support my idea.
To be honest, I did not have an idea.
I was suggested to read newspapers and then share the contents with my classments.
Listening their comments about the newspaper, I learn to view the newspaper in a critical way.
I learnt to analyze the causes and results of an event.
Thus, getting information from print media is a good way to gain critical thinking ability.
For another, we can get up-to-date news from electronic media.
If one is reluctant to be cut off from the outside world, he or she should keep pace with the latest news, which are often provided by electronic media.
In one of our English class, we were asked to share our knowledge about foreign culture.
We worked in group.
Our group chose the United States.
Somehow, we mentions the differences in politics in China and America.
When my peers mentioned Trump, I asked a silly question: "Who is Trump?"
I was so embrassed.
From then on, I started to learn some lastest news, even though I did not adore any international news.
Therefore, we can gain up-to-date news to keep pace with our peers with assistance of electronic media.
Admittedly, absorbing information from various news sources may be time-consuming, whereas it can improve our time management and boost our time efficiency.
In the past, I spent too much time in searching for news.
These days, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether colleagues or classmats should communicate in person or through emails to do a project better.
From my perspective, communicating in person is a better choice.
My point will be elaborated as follows.
Firstly, communicating in person is conductive to improving the efficiency of doing the projects.

It is largely due to the fact that colleagues and classmates can discuss with each other and share the different opinions with each other, resulting that everyone can have a complete overview of the project.
Moreover, sitting together and communicating in person can guarantee that they can solve the new aroused problems and make sure that they go towards a correct direction.

On the contrary, if the colleagues and classmates use emails to communicate, they cannot receive and send emails in time because they may concentrate on the other stuffs, which would delay the process of solving the project.
For example, I took part in a project targeting at environment probles with my classmates.
We shared viewpoints through emails, sending materials to each other.
However, it turned out that we used three days to just finish the first step.
So we changed our communicating methods and discussed  with each other in person in the team-work room.
It is no wonder that we finsihed the project in just two day with everyone find reference and solve the problems immediately in a limited time.
Secondly, communicating in person can help colleagues and classmates understand the project further.
With everyone sitting together, they can discuss the project and find the hidden meaning of the key points resulting a better understanding of the concepts.
Solving the difficult tasks and sharing the methods to have easier access to the projects, they can clarify the misunderstanding and think further towards the projects.
On the other hand, the emails messages may cause misunderstanding because they cannot explain the tasks with so much words.
For example, a research conducted by Harvard University shows that teamwork especially the communicating in person with others can have a positive effects in solving the most difficult tasks.
All in all, communicating in person is a better choice.
