There is growing tendency that people begin to pay more attention on the education their offspring will accept.
And one of  the hot topics is the cooperation projects.
Whether the projects on which students work together is more beneficial when compared with projects just involving a single person?
As far as I am concerned, working alone is more educational for students.
And following are my reasons.
First of all, working alone is more efficient for students to bring what they have learnt from the class into the realistic condition, such as the offices in the work place or the factory.
The theories are useless if the students just read books, attend lectures and rely on their parters when faced with the real difficulities.
Working alone will force them to rely on themselves, which is more beneficial and educational.
For example, one of my classmates, who has not worked hard, will turn to other students to cooperate with him, when face with a challenging project.

It is surperising how Rare knowledge he can get Secondly, for the company and employee, evaluing the ability of working alone is an important part in the interview of the students who just graduate from the university.
So being able to and being familiar to work alone is precious for students in the competition of the labor market.
As you can imagine,the employees must have a special preference for fewer employers because the small number of employers always means the low cost for the company.
What's more, they are also willing to get the assistance from a single employee who can work as efficiently as a grounp.
There is no doubt that the cooperation is also helpful in the course and assignment for students.
Because they can learn to communite with other students and make some friends.
Nevertheless, in the serious accadamical projects, the unexperienced students are very like to regard the cooperation as idol chatting so that they cannot focus on the projests.
And in students' spare time, it is more convinient to make friends without taking up the studying time.
So it is better for the students to work alone.
Have you travelled in a group with a tour guid?
Did think they make no sense?

I have travelled Mountain Yellow in a group with a tour guide, but I think they tell us things that we can search on the internet and urge us to use money on souvernirs that are expensive but we do not need.
Therefore, I do not think it is the best way to travel in a group with a tour guide.
There is a couple of specific facets why I think in this way.
Initially, tour guides always are not the good vehicles for transferring value imformation to us when we go sightseeing.
This is because they tell us the information that we can get from the internet.
For instance, when my families went for a trip in Mountain Yellow, we wanted to know the information about local falks about the interests.
But the guide in our group just introduce some basic information about this mountaion, such as its history.
However, if we only need to know the history, we can search on the internet, but want to know entique or fanny informations about the local people.
Hence, we thought it is not worthwhile to travel with a guides.
Moreover, guides often introduce their tourists to the store with much more expensive souvernirs than the nomal stores have.
This is the way that help them make benefits from cheating tourists with the store owners.
For example, when we wanted to by some souvernirs for our friends, the guides introduced us to an expensive store with some normal articles that we can buy in our city.
We were angry when we found out that.
Thereby, guides are almost not kind.

Even though guides can help people find their way to the sightseeing sites, I still hold fast on my idea that guides cannot do much more things to help us than we think so, and I think that people can do what guides do by themselves, if they make plants carefully.
Taking account all the factors mentioned above, we may safely arrive the conclusion that it is not the best way to travel in a group with a tour guides.

With the development of society, nowadays more and more people are educated than before, and that is all because of the hard work of the teachers.
Now there is a hot debate about whether the teachers now are more appreciated by society or not.
Some people might say yes that teachers are being more appreciated than before.
However, in my opinion, the teachers nowadays are not much appreciated than the past time.
First, teachers'status are much lower than the past.
As we all know, in the past time of China, especially the 19th centuary, there were only a few teachers.
The people who were educated at that time were admired by the iliterate people or the most of the people who were farmers.
If someone else got the education certificate, the whole village would celebrate.
As you can imagine, the teacher who have high edcational dioploma will definetely gain the respect of other people.
The status of the teacher at that time is superior than the normal people.
For instance, my grandma's mother was a teacher, at that time she used to recevied lots of respect like complaints and gifts.
But now my cousin who is also a teacher, she needs to apologize for she misses the message that sended 2 minutes ago from the student's mother.
Second, the salaries of the teacher is much lower than the past time.
If the money of past teacher converts to nowadays accurancy, it will be much more than the teachers' salaries now.
That is simply because there are too many teachers now and the subsidy from the government is too limited.
The teachers now cannot even buy the products easily bacause of their poor salary.
For instance,  my grandma' mother used to have 500 RMB at that time, that converted to nowadyas currency is almost 20000 RMB.
But my cousin who is also the teacher nowadays, she can only have 2000 RMB salary, which is not enough for the daily purchase, and she needs to do the part time job to support her life.
I admit that some people might say the teacher teaches us the infomation which will be the prerequisite of success.
And the people now are more aware of the eduacation than before.
So the teachers now is more appreciated than the past.

However, teachers now do not have the deserved respect, they get rebuke from the students's parents if they do not do exactly that parents want them to do, and get unfair punishment just because the students who do not behave.
Teachers now are not truly appreciated they are actually discriminated.
To conclude, I  agree that  the teacher is more appreciated and valued than now.

Recentlly a controversial topic has aroused a hated debate among people whether movies and television have more negative effects than positive effects on the way young people behave.
Some people claim that movies and television have more negative effects than positive effects on the way young people behave.
However I would stand on their opposite and I believe that movies and television have more positive effects than negative effects on the way young people behave.
My reasons can be seen as follows:
First of all, movies and television can teach young people many knowledges.
As we all know, movies and television programs base on the real life, so they have many life knowledges, which can teach young people many knowledges.
And some TV programs even project for children such as follow me and so on.
For example.
when I was a high school stuent, I realy hated history, because I think it is so boring.
One day, I watched a TV program named small class about history.
It attached my atteation.
The program make the history become many interesting story with many humous speaking.
I felt interesting, and watched it everyday.
At the end of this semester, I suddently found I like history, and I get good history grades.
What's more, movies and television can release young people stress.
As we all know, all of us have much stress when we live in the world.
The children is as well, and they do not have many ways to release stress like adults such as smoking, drinking and so on.
So movies and television provide a good way to release our stress.
For example, when I was a child, I realy liked watching TV.
When I leave school and back home at Friday, I would watch TV to release the stress accumulated in the week.
I felt happy and had the confidence to face the next week and the weekend homwork.
In a nutshell, I think movies and television have more positive effects than negative effects on the way young people behave.
Because movies and television can teach young people many knowledges and release young people stress.

The education issue has never been more prominent in history than it is today.

Financial thinking as an important ability is useful to modern people, which means we need to teach our children how to manage their money.

Parents are not only good for their children's present life, but also for their future.

However, only focusing on good grades are not practical as the grade can be influenced by the level of the exam.
If a test is too simple, getting a good grade actually means nothing.
Thus, the grade student get does not equally fullfill the parents purpose.
Even though the grades are a good way to test a student's ability of study in a period of time, the ranking of the students at his or her class seems to be more important.
Also, to use money in exchange of student's hard work and good grades is materialisic.
I have witnessed a friend of mine, lie to her parents about the exam's result so that she will not be punished as she did not meet her parents' requirement.
It could be predicted easily from this example that, children may lie to their parents about their grade only to saitisfy their parents and get the money.
They will even make fake grade report, which is indeed terrible.

In a nutshell, I agree that, under the circumstance of the student being honest, there may be a win-win if the parents are more practical and focus on their kid's hard work and care a little less about the grades.
However, I cannot deny that money reward on every good grade may seems foolish sometimes and may have an opposite effect on students.

last, I think mistakes are more memorable than phenomenons for children.

Nowadays, money are not only becoming more attractive to adults, but also to the children.
Some parent will encourage their children wih money when they get good scores in school.
From my point of view, it is a controversial idea to discuss and my reasons are listed as follows.
To begin with, it is a very effective way to reward and encourage the children to put more efforts on their study.
For example, if a girl wants a doll in the shopping center for a long time, but her mother requests her to get good marks on her final exams then she could buy the doll.
The girl will surely pay more attention on her classes and try her best to do her work, because it concerns about her doll.
Parents use this method to stimulate the childrens' interests in study, but it is not a long-term thing.
When parents offer their school-age children money for the good grades, it deprives the childrens' instinct in study.
They study just for money and gifts, but not the real knowledge they gain from lectures.
When they are not aware of the importance and the real purpose of study, it is difficult to maintain their interests and hardworking.
So I suggest that this idea can be a temporary one to stimulate the childrens' interests in study.

As the children are aware of the purpose of study is to develop themselves and find the happiness in study, parents are supposed to cease this method and continue to tell them the importance of hardworking.
The work you have done is for yourself, not for the parent.
Above all, this method will surely stimulate the children, but we could not let them rely one this.
It can not be a long time thing.
When someday there is no money reward, children should still work hard because they know they are doing for themselves.
Despite the rapid development of today's society, occupation is no more than a commonplace.
Recently an interesting question has aroused heated discussion: Should people take a secure job immediately or wait for a more satisfying one?
Some people have the idea that they would wait until a excellent job is offered.
Others claim that a proper job should be taken immediately.
From my perspective, I agree with the statement that people should take a appropriate job immediately.
My reasons are as follows.
To begin with, taking a secure job right away enrichs experience in professionallism.
Due to paticipating in work earlier, people can become familiar with the interpersonal relationship, the softwares used in work and other things.
With the experience which is significent in professionallism, the people who paticipate in a job immediately are more competitive in workplace.
And the experience is the advatage in changing a more satisfying job if the people want.
For example, my sister took the opportunity of a secure job right away after graduating.
She then got a great deal of experience in working.
With the experience, she became professional in her field and have a good career.
On top of that, people can begin to earn money earlier if they take the opportunity immediately.
Waiting for a more perfect job in the gap years, people cannot earn much money themselves because they do not have a full-time job.
They need the financial support from their family.
On the contrary, the people who take a secure job right away do not need support from family.
Due to secure salaries for their labor, they can live themselves.
They are independent and do not need family's support anymore, which reduce the living pressure of the family.
Moreover, they can buy some gifts for their parents.
Admittedly, waiting for a more satislying job may lead to a better career.
During the gap years, people can study knowledge used in the job and think thoroughly about what kink of job they really want to paticipate in.
However, there are minor factors when compared with the reaasons above.
Without the experience in work and sufficient financial support, people cannot study and think efficiently and peacefully.
To put it in a nutshell, I totally agree with that one should paticipate in a secure job rather than wait for a job that is more satisfying.
Education is more and more important today, and teachers play a very important role in education.
However, should teachers show their social or politicial ideas to students is debatble.
Some people advocate it because it can make students have a wider inspective, while others argue that this might mislead the students.
However, I strongly agree with the  latter, here are the reasons.
First of all, this behavior may reduce students' studying time.
Talking these views must take some time.
There is only 40 minutes in one class so every minute should be valued.
These topic is really un related to the teaching so they should not appear in the classroom.
I have a very good example of this.
My math teacher was exactly a person like this.
He was really nagging and always talked something that had nothing to do with the class.
At first, there seemed to have no difference, but gradually, we were surpassed by the rest of the class in math.
We could be the first, but it was our math teacher that slowed down the teaching process.
In conclsion, thid kind of behavior is really bad to the students.
Secondly, when the teachers discuss those topics, it might influence the students' own perspectives in some way.
Students are still not so mature yet, they are still learning.
So what they hear today may even direct their life path.
However, what the teachers say can't be 100 percent right, so this behavior can just mislead the students which has a bad influence on students.
Thus, teachers shouldn't make their social or politicial opinions toward students in the classroom.
All in all, teachers make their social or politicial perspectives konwn to the tudents in the classroom will make the students less effective and maybe can mislead their life.
So, teachers, don't make you social or political views known to the students!
With the advancement in technology, many electronic devices and internet games changed our lives.
Near 90 percent of the children have a cellphone with them.
Some people think that because of these electronic devices and internet games, children today are harder to educate than in the past.
From my own perspective, children are not harder to educate than children in the past.
First, the advance in technology can provide children with faster information reaching tool.
This can help children to find their study resource more quickly than in the past.
Imagine this, if a child in the past need to learn some new subject, he/she had to look for some book in the library and there may be some book was not exist.
However, nowadays, there is a more varied way to get to knowledge.
For example, online courses and electronic books.
Students can easily find those things if they type them on the browser.
And in recent years, we have smartphones which we could carry to everywhere.
That's means we can acquire knowledge everywhere and every time.
another reason can be seen by everyone is that there are some internet games that border people's normal duty.
Nevertheless, that's not true, researchers found out that human's brain ability can be improved if they play online games for adequate hours.
That's means if children are not playing games for so long that their eyes maybe hurt, this activity may be a good way to relax and develop their brain.
Also, online games can improve social ability because they have to communicate with other's and even make more friend.
Admittedly, mobile phones and online games take up a lot of time in today's society.
Some children can not stop using mobile phones, and some children play online games for one night.
These things may take up their time that should be taken on the study.
However, I think parents should guide their children on how to make a daily routine more reasonable.
In this way, their children could have a good habit on their daily schedule.
Like for what time they go to study, for what time they go to play games, and for what time they go to the bed.
I think this is very essential in educating children.

All in all, I think educating children today is not difficult than educate them in the past because of the advance in technology serves a  good way to reach the study resource, and online games can relax and develop their brain.
Also, the problem of wasting time can be fixed if their parents guide them properly.
Nowadays,the competitions among students are becoming more and more competitive from Math,English to Sports.

Therefore,parents try their best to figure out a proper solution to stimulate their kids to pay more attention on study rather than spending time on playing cell phone or chating with their friends about some topics which are not related to learning.
After these parents struggled to seek a way out to give their children a promising future,money as a reward could be useful to some students during the period of studying.
It is hard to deny the temptaions of money due to every human beings,even a child.
Setting a goal for children to achieve is constructive and educational,at the same time,a reward could play a crucial role in this process.
And money,which can buy every thing in the world,is suitable to consider as an offer for school-age children when they get a high mark.
Giving kids money is not only helpful to concentrate their eyes on learning,it also provides an opportunities to cultivate a correct understanding of money.
When people are young,they are not sophisiticated with handling money,by this chance,let they deal with their own money,assisting them to have a good command of money management.
Last but not least,most kids don't aware of the difficulties of earning money,however,they earn money through their hard-working,they would understand nothing will come easily without efforts.
As young generations,once we ask for some things,parents won't reject us.
Sometimes,this behave is regarded as love,but i think it is more than love when it becomes an usual situaion.
Spoiling children will make their path more muddy,more dangerous.
To sum up,setting a target for children to chase during their learning period has plentiful advantages and it is worth to spread wildly around parents.

Nowadays, there is a heated topic arised among the public: whether it is more important to have the ability of making new friends readily than to have the ability of maintaining friendship with a small group of people.
The answer is different from people to people.
Some people think making new friends easily is more important, however, I think maintaining relationship with several friends is more important and gives me happiness.
To begin with, maintaining friendships with a small group of people can help me be far away from the bad mood.
It is acknowedged that old friends know more things about me, the characteristic and hobby and so on.
If I am unhappy, they would  accurately share the things which will let me happy or communicate with me to make me feel better, so I can forgot the unhappy things.
For example, I failed in a music competition last semester, I was disappointed at that time.
When my old friends knew these, they took the cheese cake which is my favorate food to me, and encourage me that I was the best musician in their minds.
In this case, I temporarily forget the frastration and turn to be happy.
However, the new friends would not know real me, so they do not know how to help me out when I am in trouble.
Moreover, maintaining friendships with a small group of people can cultivate my responsibility which is essential to get happiness.
To illustrate, keeping relationships will friends ask me to spend lots of time to talk and care them, so I should give up the time which can be used to do other things.
This kind of giving up have positive effect on me, since I know what is the most important things.
In this case, paying more attention on friendship helps me respect to the relationship and help me to be a genuine person.
By contrast, even I can make lots of new friends, if I do not pay attention on the friendships, I can not get the genuine relationship, so I can not be really happy.
In general, it is more important to maintain friendships rather than make many new friends.

With the remarkable process of people's living standard, more and more parents pay more attention to the children's education, and they try their best to motivate their kids to get a high grade, For example, some parents will give some money as a reward to their children for their good learning performance in the shcool.
In my opinion, I think it's an unsuitable method, my reasons and examples are given below.
Firstly, this kind of motivation will cultivate a wrong awareness of their children's learning value.

To imagine that, if their children always get some money after they got high grade in the school, as days going by, their main purpose of leaning is to earn money instead of gaining some useful knowledge and skills.
Apparently, the wrong awareness is harmful for their later career in the future, they will miss many truly happiness from the wonderful knowlegde and useful skills.
One day, they eventually lose their passion for their wok and life.
Moreover, the money will bring some adverse effect to their children's study.
With the plenty of money, students are more likely to go to internet bar, vedio game hall, or dance hall.
As a result, they will spend more time on playing computer games, vedio games and dancing rather than study.

Workers play an indispensable role in our daily life, so how to boost their efficiency and increase their satisfaction is a worth- thinking question.

However, in my opinion, doing some different kinds of tasks is more satisfactory.
First of all, doing the various tasks during the worktime afford a really good way to reduce the tire and then enable the workers to get a strong feeling of satisfaction.

However, figuring different types of work is totally different.

All in all, workers are more satisfied when they deal with similar tasks all they long considering they can be less easy to get tired and the feeling of achievement they gain.

I agree with the statement that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.

Through making mistakes,children can get to know more about what the task they are facing actually means,i.e.,making mistakes can lead them into all kinds of situations and give them a thorough view on the task at hand.

It's like drawing a map of the whole site instead of drawing only the route the children should take,which indicates what happens when parents lead children through the task without allowing them to make mistakes.
After making a series of mistakes and getting the thorough view of the whole task,the children can easily know what they should do by themselves.
This is what I'm going to talk about next:parents that allow children to make mistakes allow them to gain independence.
Imagine a child is lead everywhere by his parents so he can go without making mistakes:he cannot see how to make choices or how to complete tasks by himself.
The children that are allowed to make mistakes,on the ohter hand,learn with every mistake they have made a bit of knowledge about how to handle everything by themselves,so they can get independent.
Additionally,children who are allowed to make mistakes can be calmer when they have to deal with emergencies.
Through making mistakes,children can get into all kinds of unpredictable situations,and sometimes these situations might cause severe consequences.
While children are forced to deal with these situations,the situations are simultaneously testing and promoting their psycological qualities.
Thus,the children who are allowed to make mistakes can handle more easily when facing emergencies as grown-ups.

To conclude,I would like to say that I agree with this statement,seeing as children who are allowed to make mistakes and learn from these mistakes can have an overall view over their tasks,they can grow more independent,and they can be calmer when they face emergencies.
In a word,the children who are allowed to make mistakes can actually grow up.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate: whether the best thing to reduce air pollution is for the government to raise the cost of fuel.
Opinion varies from person to another.
Some claim that it is the truth that raising the cost of fuel is the most effective way to reduce the air pollution.
However, contrary to their view comes my perspective that there are other effectve method for government to reduce the air pollution.
My points are elaborated as follow.
Firstly, reducing the use of the private car is an effecitve method to reduce the air pollution.
As we all know, the gas which was released by a large number of cars is the main resource of the air pollution.
Therefore, if the government limits the use of the private cars, people who live in the urban cities could choose other public transpotation to the company.
And then, becasue the public transportation are able to pick more people, such as the bus, the number of the cars could decrease apparently, leading to the low releasing of the air pollution.
By contrast, if there are more cars in the roads, the air condition could go worse.
For example, in my hometown, the government limits the private cars by taking the method: one car could be allowed to run in the same road fifteen times a month.
Thank to this strategy, the air pollution declines, leading to a beautiful scene, the sky become more clear than before and the air is more fresh than before.
In addition, inventing the new efficient technology of using the fuel is an effecitve way to reduce the air pollution.

With the development of the technology,  the fuel could be used in a higher efficiency, so the air pollution could be reduced because the fuel could release less pollution than before, although it is still used in various areas.
By contrast, if using of fuel could still produce plenty of air pollution, the environment could be polluted heavily although the price of the fuel increases.

For example, in the past, burning a ton of coals could produce ten thousand stere volume of polluted air, while with the advanced technology invented, buring a ton of coals releases only one thousand stere volume of polluted air, which makes a large contribution of reducing the air pollution.

In conclusion, I must repeat my point that raising the cost of fuel can't be regard as the best way to reduce air pollution, because reducing the use of the private car and inventing the new efficient technology play the vital role in reducing the air pollution.
Having a glimpse into soceity, different people may have different working habits.
However, whatever your vocation is, there is no better way to achieve goals on work than working slowly in order to make sure that everything is correct.
In the first place, for certain work, the accuracy take the first priority for workers since just a small mistake in work will cause sumless cost.
My brother,James, is a astronomy engineer.
It is a generally accepted fact that accuracy is the most important ingredient in astronomy field because only a centimeter mistake in engine will cause a devestated impact for skyrocket.
In this way, all the machines in astronomy need engineers to check lots of times.
Even these sophisticated processes take lots of time to finished, it can assure the accuracy in each part of rocket.
Therefore, to work slowly and accuratelly can make sure astronomers' life and reduce the cost.
So, it is necessary to work slowly in order to make sure the accuracy in work, which can reduce the sumless cost caused by mistakes.
In the second place, work slowly to avoid making mistakes can greadually enhance our ability.
My onw experience can illustrate this point.
When I study foreign language, I always finished lots of tasks including writing, reading and listening in a short time in order to make sure the quatitive.
However, study quickly for me was not effective because I actually did not absorb the knowledge at all.
After that, I slow my path and spent lots of time to remember unfarmiliar works and reviewed my notes lots of time.
Greadually, I removed the barriel in understanding means in reading because of the long-term accumulation on words and grammers.
Therefore, work slowly and patiently never fail to enable people to improve their ability.
Finally, work slowly could inspire people.
My sister is a painter and she always spend her whole day just to draw one painting.
Firstly I am so confused because I think she is uneffective.
However, she tells me that painting slowly can provide her more time to thinking the fram and color in the work.
All of these are crucial part in painting.
However, if people paint quickly without thinking, it is not usefull for painting thousants of painting in this way.
Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether people should chase the ambitious dreams or focus on achieving realistic goals?
Some claims that people should chase the ambitious dreams because it can inspire people to work hard.
However, contrary to their view comes to my perspective that people should focus on realistic goals since it is the foundation of sucess.
To begin with, focusing on realistic goals can give people constant motivation.
To be more specific, people can always reach the realistic goals if they are focusing on it.
Once they reached the goal, they will have a  sense of accomplishment which will continously inspire them to set and reach the next goals.
In this way, people will always be energetic and hardworking.
On the contrary, if people chase the ambitious, they will meet several frustration before they touch their dreams.
Sometimes this frustration will make them give up and achieve nothing because they do not have any sense of accomplishment as motivation.
For example, when I was a high school students, I always set the goals which I can easily reach if I focus on it such as improve mathematics by two points.
In this way, I constantly achieved my goals and my points were also constantly increased.
Finally, I became thefirst place in my class even I never dreamed that.
To be followed, focusing on realistic goals can help people achieve their dreams.
To illustrate, the ambitious dreams can be divided into several realistic goals and once people do that , they  will exactly know how to chase their dreams.
Foucusing on the realistic goals and achieve it step by step and people will finnally achieve their dreams.
If people just watch the whole ambitious dreams, they will never know how to achieve it.
For instance, Jianlin Wang, the richest man in my country, builded his bussiness empire with small realistiv goals one by one.
He never just follow his dreams

Some parents offer their school-age children money for each high mark they get at school.
In my personal point of view, this idea can be effective and is quite understandable in some certain degree.
For paying high for high marks is a way of encouragemant for children.
However, it not a policy that suits every single children.
It is universally agreed that one who works more is more likely to harvest more.

And when parents offer the children some small treats after they did a good job in their studies, the action will leave the chilren with an impression that behaving well in their studies is encouaged and it is the right direction where he should pay his efforts on.
And thus he might work even harder in an effort to recieve more money.
Their are some drawbacks however.
Firstly, some children might not be interested in getting paid for he is well aware that money he get is no more than a special prize for his good behavior.
Secondly, this kind of action might leave the children an impression that study is the only thing to do to get his parent's adorance.

And this might leads to the unhealthy growth of his mental health and his communication with others, for the strong will of getting more money might drown him in studying, which is certainly bad for a child's self-growth.
Moreover this policy may work in an opposite way for it might intrige some children's repellous emotion.
As a conclusion, I think that it is necessary for some parents to apply this "high treats for high grade" policy onto their chirdren.
Because for some children, this policy may achieve a great outcome.
However, this family policy can't be efficiently applied on every single child.
Parents who are considering to apply this policy on their children should think thoughrouly.
Your children's characteristic, his age and many other factors should all be taken into accont.
Or else you might get a result that you might never thought of.
Most importantly, it's not the policy you applied on your children that have the greatest impact on their growth, it the way you treat your chilren and your attitude that matters most.

As the society is developing at a fast pace, people can receive information easier than before.
Thus, people now not only have the access to events not just happening around them, but also the events happening around the world.
However, whenever asked about whether it is essential to know about events happening around the world, even if it is unlikely to affect your life, people usually exhibit an air of uncertainty.
I wholeheartedly agree that it is important to know news around the world.
To begin with, knowing events happening around the world can expand our horizons.
Most people don't have the chance to travel in many countries to get to know about a country.
However, by reading news about events happening around the world, people can get to know many things happening in other countries without spending money to go there.
Moreover, the society is developing, so people should learn more by many means including knowing events happening around the world to keep up with others.
For example, when I was in junior high school, I read a news about people in France marching in the street to ask the government to arise their salary.
By reading this news, I knew that in france, people can legally march in their work time.
In this way, I learned things in another country.
So it is important to know about events happening around the world.
Then, getting to know events happening around the world can help people plan their future better.
The situation in the world can change very fast, so being a memeber of this world, poeple should know events happening aournd the world to plan for their future.
Nowadays, people can go abroad  more easily.
Therefore, many students have the plan to study abroad and many people have plans to travel in another country.
However, wherever people are, safety is in the first place.
Thus, before going abroad, people should know about the events happening around the world in order to know whether it is appropriate to go abroad, even if the news won't affect their life now.
Last but not the least, knowing about events happening around the world can enrich people's lives.
When people have free time, they usually chat with their friends, it could be boring if they chat only about their daily life.
Thus, knowing some events happening around the world can give people a chance to start a interesting conversation with people around them, in this way, their daily life could be more interesting.
So it is important to know events happening around the world.
To conclude, It is important to know things aroud thew
Nowadays, as the society steps forward, there is a controversial debate that whether job generates a more significant impact on your sense of happiness than that social life does.
Many people holds that a good job does affect their life more than social life brings.
However, I want to insist that it is social life that     charges my mood more than my job for the following reasons.
Firstly, job brings about the impact that can be mitigated by your social life.
This is because, everytime when we finish our work and come back to our social life, we will lay down all the things that are related to our work.
What we always do is watching a TV program, seeing a film, reading our favorate books.
These things all can help us to release our stress.
In this case, no matter what happens in our job can be forgotten.
For example, my mother who workss a clerk in the China Bank, always needs to deal with the clients' question of finacy.

Things often happen, that people put their money in the wrong credits and they blame the mistakes to the bank clerk and think that no clerk is willing to help them, when My mother cannot make them understand it is their fault.
But when my mother comes home she forgets about all these unhappy thing.
Secondly, people always do not care about what bothers them in the job, due to the fact that they only need to consider about incidents within the limits of their duty.
This is because if one person accepts his job, he must have prepared for the all kinds of problems he may meet in his job.
They only need to solve the problem during their working time.

On the contrary, what happens in the job is not an important thing, because we know this is our duty so that it cannot dominate our mood, while social life is people's real life, so they can be affected when they face the living problems.
For example, my cousin who works as an online custom service, needs to solve kinds of conflicts between the customers and the company.
In this situation, she must deal with many types of customers, many of which are irritable or unreasonable so that they always  release their complains to my cousin.
But my cousin knows that has been her duty when she accepted this job.
So it does no significance of her happiness.
I agree .

As the society is developing at a top spped, a mounting number of parents choose to give their children extra money if they get high mark in schooul.
As far as I am concernched, I strongly disagree with the idea.
The reasons are listed as follows.
For one thing, as a student atudying at school, parents can satisfy their basic needs in most time.
For example, they don't need worry about what to eat and where to sleep at home without paying any money.
What's more, parent will pay for their accomodation and eating for their children's school life in advance in most cases.
Therefore, students in the school age don't need masses of extra money.
Owning too much money, students tend to spend money in alchohol and drugs that not only exert a negative effect on their study but also harm their health physicall.
For another, parents have the obligation to not misunderstand their children in the attitude towards the meaning of study.
For my point of of view, we students study to enlarge our knowledge instead of getting extra money if geeting high marks in school.
To persist in studying, we must be aware why we study at first.
With parents just awarding money, students will lose interests since they aim to get money rather than form a good study habit.
In conclusion, as parents, they should limit their eyesite to the high mark of children but what they have learnt at school.
School-age is a crucial period for kids to develop their attitude towards life.
Connecting the mark with money will easily leesen the kids' happiness in study, thus giving their an unhappy childhood.
If we just only aim at money, students will forget the essence of the knowledge and just persue the high mark in the exams.
Whether the rules that societies today expect young people to followand obey are too strict?

And I think  both of them are not so strict.
Firstly, most of the young people have not violated the rules about laws in societies.
Since people nowdays have a more wealthy life, and people do not have necessary to violate the rules like steal things or kill other people.
And because of the better level of education, people nowadays totally understand it is not true to do those things which violate the rules.
Moreover, because of some temptation, some young people could not control themselves to do those things, so laws can regulate them.
Therefore, it is totally necessary for government to set those rules.
In addition, it is really necessary for adolescent to obey those rules which civilian's behavior and moral, otherwise the society will not tranquil.
For example, there is a rule in society that people should offer their seat to old people or pregnant women.
Some people may argue that children are still the people need protected, it is too strict for them to obey it.
However, I believe children are springtly, and they are the fundamental part of our country.
The opinion of those people is selfish, since children need to be impart that they have the ability to help others, rather than I need other people to help me.
When they grow up, they will still remain the mindset of such selfish, so they need assistance from others instead of h
Granted, children are not so mature as adults, and sometimes it is so strict to force those children to obey the same rules as adults.
However, I think adults should inculcate such mind to children that obey this rules when kids are naive, rather than condemn the rules are too strict.
Since  establishing the rules is reconsidered by several authority and specialists, it is really reasonable for children to conduct.
Many people would say that it is not that important for everyone to know the events around the world because people are always busy with their work and studying.
I agree that it is not necessary to know all the international events.
After all, I am always struggling with my life and knowing many events seems impossible for me.
However, in my opinion, it is better for people to know the international events even though it would not effect our normal lifes.

Firstly, knowing events would help people impreove their social skills: people who knows the economic events would have more chances talking with the people that is also economy lover; people who likes politic events would have more chance communicationg with the people that is also interested in politic things; people who likes the sports events would have chances to communicate with the people who is also sports fans.
Knowing all the international events can certainly help people to find more common topics with other people.
As a result, they can become good friends and people's social comminicating skills would impreoved.
For this, my brother Lee would be the best one intending to support this idea.
Lee is a sports fan who spends all his spare time watching international spots events like the NBA competition and the World Cup.
He watches all the competitions and writes a lot of commets to state his opnion with each of the competiton.
Inthis case, he finds many people on the internet who has the same opinion as him and they communicate a lot.
After a long time communicationg with each other, they become good friends.
Lee told me that, after he has these friends, he found himself having more communicationg skills than before like how to be a good listener, he is glad that he can have them.
Secondly, it can make people's knowlege field abundent.
We have known almost all the knowledge from the textbook, our major field and life.
However, these knowledge are not enough for us.

People are always saying that it is crucial for us to keep learning until we are old enough, so that is the reason why it is important for us to know the event around the world, which is beyond our knowledge.
Image if you are a university student who is politic major, your professor asks you to write a paper for graduating.
Would you like to write all the thing based on the knowlege that you have known in university?
Of  course the events that you have know would be equally important for you to make your paper looks individual and perfect.
So that is just the reason why I persist talking about why knowing the events would abudant our knowlege, and obviously, it makes sense.

In conclusion, even if there is an argument that it is not important to know all the events, namely the fact that people are always busy, better cmmunication skills, coupled with abudent people's knowledge, makes a strong case that it is necessary to know the events around the world.
The salaries for university professors has always been a hot tpoic of dicussion amoung people.
Should we spend more money to it in order to enhace the quality of education.
I personally believe the answer is obvious, yes.
The very first thing I want to point out is that high salaries can let professors concentrate on teaching and researching.
Just imagine what will you pursue if you are in a poor condition.
Will you stick to find out the truth of a theory?
I think most people can't handle that.
In the same way, letting professors could put all his or her heart and mind on academy we must cut off their worries about life, and that's also the first step to improve the quality of eucation.
In another word, the satifying payment can make professors focus on education and realize their values utmostly.
What's more, high salaries can be a motivation for professors for development.
Of course money doesn't mean everything, but it also shows a repect for their work.
One of my dad's friend, a professor in a  famous university, make all his efforts for his work such as working several weeks without a long sleep just for fiishing a viral experiment.
How could he do it?
It depends on his salary.
Just after this experiment his school increase his salary to a much higher level which seems like a prize for him, and that motivates him to do something more.
Therefore, increasing salary means a repect and admiration toward the professors' efforts and inspires them to devote themselves to education.
Finally, many people may ask why not put those money on the improvement of facilities?
It is reasonal.

As to children, they should have the ability and the capacity to face a mistake and manage to learn something.
Mistakes are not ashame, however, making the same one again and again is terrible.

Have you ever made some new friends in your spare time?
Of course, everyone might have.
Hence I think it is more improtant for human to possess the ability to make new friend, and then having fun with them.
Some might say making new frienfs will take a long time.
However, I think more people means more happiness.
Thus, I will write down my points below.
To begin with, more friends means we can obtain more fuun from others.
If you always talk about the same jok with your old friends, they might not think that is funny.
In the contrast, if you talk with some new frienfs, who never heard about this jok before, you will all be happy.

All in all, I prefer to make new friends instead of maintaining the small group of people.

In the 21th century, family education has long been a hot-debated topic which many educational experts explore constantly.

When it comes to the question that how parents encourge their children to study hard, many people would support the point that parents can offer their school-age children for each high grade they get in school.
Simply speaking, they use money to inspire their children, which I totally disagree for the following reasons.
First of all, using money to encourage school-age children will, to a large extent, distort their opinions on value.
If parents make money a fuse for children to work hard, it's inevitable for their children to attach too much importance to money.
What's more, they tend to think that the aim of their studying hard is just to earn as much money as they can, getting astray.
For example, one of my mother's friends used to take money as awards for her son's excenllent performance in exams and the higher he scored, the more money he would received.
During the process, he forgot his initial goals, becoming a ecological scientist, and got in the swamp of chasing for fortune.
What is mor severe is that he became very indifferent to life and refused to do anything without correlation with fame and fortune.
Hence, using money as encouragement to children is doomed to result in the loss of self awareness.
Moreover, it's irrational to give chlidren money as a reward to their high score in the school, because they are so ignorant about what money really means.
In other words, they don't konw how to spend those money properly and it's beyond calculation how much money they will get squandered.
Specificlly speaking, nowadays many children use their 'earned money' to buy some eletronic or even virtual things in the Internet, during which their parents suffer most is the Internet games.

They spend money buying equipments to strengthen their idole in  the virtual world and it's just like Pandora's box, which means that as long as they sink into the trap once, it's impossible for them to stop and they will invest iun it constantly.
According to above all, not only will the award of money distort children's value point, but also they cannot take a good dominant of the money.
Supposing parents use other things, their children are bound to embrace abetter future.

They are too young to control themselves perfectly, so they may often make mistakes.

Should children get paid for their high marks?
It is a contorversary topic.
I suppose that the initial pupose of this behavior is to give extre credit to these children for their hard-working and devotion to knowledge,as encouragement.
But I do not consider this action can paly a propose role in the children's childhood as it meant to be.
The way to praise children can be roughly devided into two parts,the sprital way and the material way.
At the beginning of the school-age children's childhood,they can be satisfied by praise words of parents or tfachers.
But later they become harder and harder to please.
At this moment,money may be an alteration but it could express the wrong message to children,which is that they study hard in order to get that money.
This wrong message may lead them to laziness as long as they cannot get paid or less paid by their parents.
It is parent's duty to educate children but what is more important is to help them build the correct concept of money and their life.
Seldom pay is acceptable but it is extremely harmful once becomes a pattern.
Money is essential for everyone in this world but yet children have not relized that yet.
So it will not be wrong for parents being very careful.
I always assume that one do not study for anyone or anything else except himslfe or herself.
Yet this action may express mislead conception.

What weighs more is children is very vernourable when facing this kind of triggers,so parents should pay more attention to what they do and how they treat their children,for the reason that they are the modle of their children.
Study for pleasure but not for money.
As is known to all, we human beings always need encouragement to move on.
Not only adults, but also kids.
In spite of the good heart that those parents who offer their children money for encouragement, I do not think this is an indisputable idea.
What a students should see as motivition to study is the pleasure of doing it.
Not some other reasons like gaining money or satisfaction of vanity.
As competent parents, they should know this.
If you use this measure to encourage your kids.
It is unlikely for them to dig into the pleature of studying.
And this kind of way can't last forever.
There is High likely that your kids will form a habit to finish things just for money, if this way is insisted doing.
Which can resulting to another habit: They don't concentrate on jobs when doing it.
This habit is never something that you wish your kids have.
And as a school-age children, it is dificult for them to spend thier extra money properly.
They may use the money to buy some stuff that they can't afford before, like game machine, which is another problem that may affect thier school grades.
Comparing those kids who truly love studying, your kids may keep their good grades for one year, maybe two, but can never last forever.
Cause their mind isn't into studying, which is a kind of tasks, waiting for them to finish, money is something that can really interest them.
Judging from what has been mentioned above, I assume you are with on this opinions.

There are so many other ways that can be done to encourage a child to work hard in school, such as a family trip after the final test, maybe a new computer, even a fresh new game machine is better than some cash.
But after all, your kids are up to yourself.
From my point of view, it is a good idea to give children money when they get a good mark at school.
First of all, with the development of economy, children should have a broaden horizon of economy.

According to the BBC news, the sales money amounted to 5.6 billion dollars on the Single Day, the summit of the economy indicates that children should be awared of how to efficiently use their money when they are young, and they should get to know that money is a general way to present appreciation and encouragement, so that they can conduct a good investment when they grow up.
What's more, when children get honors, they will be happy and make the money more significant.
When children get high mark at school, parents should show their happiness and appreciation, so that children can know that getting good mark is a good thing.
With the identity of a gift and honor, money will not just money in children's eyes.
They will possibly cherish the money and save it, or use it to buy some good things, do some kind things or learn a new skill.
Thus, money is given new significance.
Last but not least, when given money, children will probably behave better next time.
With this method, parents let their children know that when they reach high grade in school, they can get honors or gift.
Hence, children will think that once they behave well, such as getting good mark, helping someone or doing the cleaning, they will get honors.
In this way, children are encouraged to do more good things.
In summary, providing kids with money when they have good grade in school is a good choice.

Nowadays, an increasing number of people are thinking about the difference between working by oneself and working by a team.
So here comes the question: which way will be more effective for students to finish their work?
Team work or individual work?
In my opinion, working individual is a more effective way for students.
First, whatever a individual in the team approaches the project well or bad, he or she will be rewarded and blamed as a whole team.
In that case, when someone has done nothing for his team, once his team has done a good work, he will be rewarded as well, and vice versa.
Therefore, it is unfair for certain members in the team.
Take myself for an example, as I was working together with several classmates to make a math model.
I almost had done everything for my team.
I proposed the formula we will use, gathered all the materials we need, and ultimately made it almost by myself.
When the final day came, our work are prased by our teacher, and they are also rewarded.
I have remember this thing for a long time since it is not fair to me.
So I can see the drawback in teamwork through my own experience---teamwork is unfair.
Second, the creative members in the team may be ignored because of the leader's attitude towards their ideas.
And unfortunately, it is impossible for a team not to have a leader.
My cousin has experienced it.
One day, his teacher asked them to make a poster to celebrate the coming new year in several teams.
On following days, he thought about it carefully till midnights, and he even has drawn a lot of sketches for his idea.
But after a few days, when he discussed with his team members, they did not have further discuss at all just because the disagreement of the leader, who, decided to drop my cousin's idea immediately.
However, my cousin's idea was pretty creative and attractive.
To sum up, I think teamwork is not effective for students to use when they can work alone on projects.

Television advertising aiming at young children is not uncommon these days and have been increasing.
When it comes to the controversial debate about whether television advertising directed toward children and youth should be allowed or not, I hold the believe that it should be permitted.
For one thing, this advertising will assist children to find their interests, enriching their lives.
Young children have limited knowledge of the outside world, television is a significant access for them to catch up with it.
Television advertising may give more options for their lives.
When my niece was four years old, she asked my uncle to teach her dance.
We were all surprised, since on one in our family can dance.
Then, she switched the channels on TV very quickly and showed us the advertising about dancing.
Then, my uncle sent her to learn dancing.
Now she can dance really well.
Besides, she made many friends in her learning process of dance.
Thus, television advertising may expand the outlook  of the young and help them find out interests.

I don't think it's a good idea that some parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade or high mark they get in the school.
The reasons are as follows.
Initially, the behavior that parents offering money as the reward of the high grade or high mark will turn the children from "study for themselves" to "study for the money".
Once the parents reduce the amount of the money or cancel the reward, they may possibily stop their study or even argue with their parrents.
Yes as we can see, children will gradually interest in the reward--money but not the progress in their exam.
In addition, children do not know how to manage their money.
They may form the habit of abusing their money for they may get a lot of them as rewards.
Once the habit of abusing money is formed, there's no denying that it's really difficult to change it.

I have a neighbor who gives his child whatever his child want when the child is young, and now as the child has grown up, he cannot manage his money properly and often has to lend money from his friends.
Parents should wait until the children have learned some finacial knowledge then let the children to have touch with money.
Otherwise it's harmful to the kids.
Further more, it's a burden for the parrents.
As we all know that nowadays parents are having a hard time paying for the car, the house, the water, electricty, gases, and the kids' school fees or the education fees.
It's costly for them to offer their school-age kids money for each high grade or high mark they get in the school.
Maybe for some rich family it's affordable or even a piece of cake, nevertheless for most of the family, it's not acceptance.

If the area is destroyed, we will live very uncomfortable.

From what has been mentioned above, communicating in person is not only the most direct but also the most effective way for people to do a project, which may also promote their relationship.

First, People have less and less leisure time currently and this trend will continue existing.

This technology also increase the odds of spending less time on cooking.

Workers are the supporters of our world.

There are many concerns about the welfare of workers, including questions about whether they are more satisfied when they have many types of work to do, or if they think it more comfortable for them to do similar tasks all days long.
Different people may have different ideas, but if I were to choose, I would opt to have different types of tasks to do.
There is convenience for workers who do similar tasks all day long, seeing as they can get very familiar with their work in this way.
Workers can avoid making mistakes and improve efficiency as long as they are familiar enough with their work.
One of my uncles have been working as an expense charger of a parking lot for more than 20 years now.
He does the same work every workday: charging.
All these years of experience got him so experienced that he's highly efficient working here.
However, he always complains to me how boring this job is.
Thus, we can see that simliar jobs all day long can easily get workers bored, and they are probably not satisfied with this.
Moreover, repetitive and boring work sometimes may lead to disastrous results if it is accompanied with great work pressure.
Workers may not be able to stand the circumstance.

To illustrate, there was once a serious incident happened in my country: several workers of the same factory suicided in the same day, because they couldn't bear the more than fifteen hours per day of repetitive work in the factory.
However, with different types of tasks to do, workers will be more interested and more motivated, so it will be esier for them to put up with the work pressure.
Last but not the least, workers with capabilities would definitely love to have different types of tasks to do.
As long as they are qualified enough and they manage to finish the tasks, they will have a sense of accomplishment.
My cousin, who works as a computer programmer, never complained about all kinds of demands his official gives him, because he really liked finishing these tasks.
Therefore, we can see that for those workers with enough ability, it's best to assign them with different tasks to maximize the productivity and their satisfaction.
In conclusion, I strongly believe that workers will be more satisfied when they have different types of work to do.
For the sake of happiness and productivity, it's the best to assign workers with multiple choices of tasks.
Recent years have witnessed a rise in the enthusiasm for people to learn from the celebrities.
Many books and videos are made to fulfill people's need in this aspect.

However, whether the opinions of the celebrities are more important to the young than to older people remains a question, and in my point of view, these opinions are actually more useful to the younger ones.
Firstly, young people need more opinions from the outside world.
For the adults, they have experienced enough to form their own point of views to many issues, while young people still need many guidances to ensure their success in the future.
Celebrities, though they may be some good examples, may not be able to give useful suggestions to the adults due to their different life experiences.
For example, I used to be confused when I am choosing my major.
However, after listening to a report made by one of our local celebrities about employment environment, I made my decision to major in engineering.
Secondly, celebrities', especially famous entertainers' fans are mostly young individuals.
As the modern society changes ever faster, the adults may not be able to accept the unknown celebrities who actually pay more attention to attracting the teenagers.
In this way, it will be easier for the younger people to take the celebrities' advice.
In my own family, my little sister always listens to the music made by TF Boys and she said she learned a lot from their hard-working practices.
On the contrary, my parents consider their music to be pure noise.

Some people may say sometimes these opinions from the celebrities may be useful to the adults as well, but I think the older people tend to ignore the suggestions made by someone who is at the same age with themselves, or adults may even think it is too late for them to change themselves.
In a word, due to different preference and life experience, opinions from the celebrities may be more acceptable and important for the young compared with the older ones.

I believe everyone has the experience of doing simple homework, like copying textbooks, during the early elementary period.
Most people must feel bored of doing those rigid homework.
It comes the same for the workers.
If the workers do similar tasks all day long, they will feel the loss of fulfilling feelings in addition to creativity.
Doing similar work everyday might wear down worker's enterprise.
Let me illustrate this viewpoint with the example of Foxconn.
Foxconn is a company that runs the business of assembling spare parts of smart phones.
As a result, workers there do similar assembling work every day.
As is reported by media for many times, a relatively higher ratio of workers in Foxconn have the tendency to commit suicide.
From my perspective, this phenomenon is caused by the loss of achievement feelings.
They do the same simple work day by day like machines so they lack the feeling of achieving some goals.
And the absence of satisfation feelings makes them cast doubt on the value of themselves and in turn leads to suicide.

By contrast, lawyers tend to have a more satisfactory feeling toward life because they face various kinds of cases to defend and that offers them chances to overcome differing difficulties and obtain the sense of achievement.
As a matter of fact, human is a sort of animal that prefers fresh feelings.
If everyday is the same, which means your work is the same, the food is fixed and the people you meet never change, then why shall we live for thousands of days rather than one single day?

Can money be an appendage of study?

We always talk about the puppose of study, our teachers often tell us that you don's study for your parents, you study for yourself.
Actually, when you gain the knowlege, it is not only learned for your examination but also serve for your entire life and give you an opportunity to know the whole world.
However, when it comes to money, study become more utilitarian.
Children will not pay attention to gain the knowledge, they may concentrate on the money and take every effort  just to get good grades.
Beacause the lure of money, cheat can occure.
What's more, this method can't make children form a good habit in study.
I have a nephew in school-age, his parents offer him a big meal for each high grade.
But he never achieve his parents' goal.

The reason he fail to get good grades is that he always thinking about how happy he can be when he get good gradedes, it decentralizes his attention and he will have a bad attitude towards his examination.
Parents should encourage thier children to perform well in thier school but can't by the method of giving them money as a reward.
More time to company thier chilren or take them for a trip can be a better way.
What would you do if you are confronted with two kinds of jobs, the secure one or the more satisfying but risky one?
I think this is the kind of situation that almost everyone can be faced with, and different people have their own choices.
From my perspective, the latter one is a better choice because it can bring you joy and make you improve yourself.
First of all, a satisfying job can bring you happiness.
Job is one of the most improtant part in one's lifetime.
It comman that you spend nearly one thrid of your time on your work.
In that condition, whether the job you are working with can bring you happiness is of giant significant.
Let's suppose you don't like your job that much, you choose it owing to its security.
When you get up everyday in the moning, the awareness that you still need to do the boring thing for a whole day will definitely upset you.
What makes the matter worse is that this is what you need to face in every weekday.
However, if what you are doing are what you are interested in and you can get a sense of satisfaction from it, you will be motivated everyday and even want to go back to work in the holidays.
So a satisfying job can bring you hapiness and joy, despite the risk you need to afford.
Moreover, you can have the chance of self-improment if you take the satisfying job.
Since the more satisfying jobs are what most peer persons are interested in, this kind of jobs are always attached with the characteristics like high competition and more chances of evevation.
So choosing them can give you the chances to improve yourself.
The secure jobs, however, are usually combine with the characteristics like easy and comfortable, with little chances of elevation.
Once you have been improved and have more experience and knowledge in this field, you can find a better job and earn more money, which you can't achieve if you take the secure one.
Under this circumstances, choosing the more satisfying jobs can provide you with the chances to become better.

As we all konw, it a good way to relax by watching a movie or reading a book because it can attract our attention and help us to feel less stressful.
Admittedly, I also watch a movie and read a book to relax, but doing physical exercise is a better way to relax.
Not only can the physical exercise help us to relax, but also can enhance our ability to adapt to pressure.
It is proved that doing sports will accelerate the matebolism in our body which make our brain get more fresh blood.
It will help us to relax physically, while watching a movie or reading a book help us to relax mentally.
We will feel down again when we stop watching a movie or reading a book.
Secondly, physical exercise are more convenient of us.
For instance, we can do exercise anywhere, in our home, in the park, in the playground, etc.
If we want to watch a movie, we need to go to the theater to buy a ticket, and wait until the movie begin.
The long waiting may make our mood become worse.
Lastly, physical exercise is less costly.
We needn't pay money for our exercise, unless we go to the gym.
Even if we do exercise in the gym, it will be cheaper than watching a movie or buying a book to read.

Recently, a topic has aroused a heated debate: is success or remaining happy and optimistic when fail more important?
Some people think success is important because they can get the sense of achivement from it.
However, I insist that remaining happy and optimistic even we meet failure is of greater significance.
To begin with, keeping a positive attitude when facing failure can help people find another way to achieve success.
People who are optimistic are usually happy to try new things when they are failed in doing researches or tasks, which helps them get new dicoveries on the course of solving probelms.
The new dicoveries would probably be the key of their reaching success.

But I tried to use my grades to apply for another famous university in Hong Kong, and I studied for a year to improve my learning skills.
Then I applied for my dream school after a year of hard-working.
Fortunately, I was admitted by
Moreover, maintaining happy and optimistic when we fail can help us learn from the unsuccessful experience and accumulate life experience.
If a person was failed in finishing his work and was fired by a company, and all he did was drinking day and night, he could not learn a little from his failure, not to mention got success.
Nowadays, people's life excepts working, studing, they would also pay more attention on other's privacy, because it can satisfy with their curiosity or relax.
I think the outcome created by this phenomeon is the famours people exprosed on public more and more frequently, thus, they have got to under too much pressure.

In the contemporary society, people have more demands to the quality of the professions and the work.
During the process, some argues that workers prefer to finishing different types of tasks rather than doing the simiar assignments all day long.
From my perspective, Completing a wide range of tasks is more beneficial for workers.
First of all, people are able to learn a wide range of new knowledges that can be employed in the future.

It is not difficult to imagine that if individulas received different projects from the bosses, they can satisfy their  bosses from disparate perspectives like the standard forms of the files or bosses' interests.
Moreover, workers enable to enhance the efficiency of the tasks and their own conpetencies also increased during the process.
For example, when I was a clerk in an international company.
Every day I just finished the simple tasks like creating a chart according to the datas.
Nevertheless, my boss prefered to give me a wide range of assignments to complete such as finding to higher-position bosses to submit their paper.
Gradually, I overcame the difficulties to face the bosses and enhanced my ability to compete with other employers.
Furthermore, it is essential for people to expand their social networks through this process.
It is obvious that individuals often want to make new friends in the enterprises.
If they just complete the projects by themselves, the vital goal will fail.
As a comsequence, a wide range of important tasks require workers to understand disparate workers surrounded them.
On the contrary, if people just complete the simple and similar work, they cannot connect with different individuals who may bring enormous opportunities to them.
Apparently, letting people finish the similar taksks all day long is also appropriate in the work.
They can exercise their carefulness to one simple assginment and improve it strongly in the next time.
Instead, individuals may get bored with same tasks and diminish the ability to challenge what they do not know about.
Therefore, they will lose a lot of opportunities such as being in a higher position or reassgining to another place which has more chances.
In conclusion, I demonstrate that worker should have more satisfaction with a wide range of work.
They can notice the disadvantages of themselves from different perspectives and avoid them next time.

However, to those children who are not sophisticated enough, giving this type of money could made these children fall into disaster because they don't learn how to use the money appropriately.
