Public transportation has always been a major issue that government would take into consideration.
On the other hand, with the remarkable development of human society, Internet access seems to be much more important than ever before.
Therefore, some people initiate the debate about whether government should put more money on the improvement of Internet access or public transportation.
From my perspective, Internet access is more important.
First and foremost, Internet access can promote education fairness between rural areas and cities.

Acting like a window, Internet can help people from rural areas know more about urban lives as well as the most advanced technologies, which they might not easily experience without living in cities in person.
If teenage and youth has access to Internet, they will have chances to learn something online.
For example, there is a remote village in China, where most kids wouldn't receive further education.
But since there installed computer and Internet devices, they have had opportunity to watch video recorded by the most brilliant teachers from huge cities.
To a certain degree, they have virtually the same high quality education as the kids in the city do.
Besides, Internet access can boost the development of an area.
It is widely acknowledged that Internet can increase the efficiency of work.
The more efficient people work, the higher value they are able to create.
And this would lead to the boom of an area.
For example, my hometown, where Internet access was seldom found, used to be quite small and not developed.
However, after government spend money promosting the Internet access, there appeared a great amount of companies, which is conducive to the development.
So it has already been a competitive city with much more population.
Admittedly, public trasportation do funtion a lot in making people's life more handy.
But Internet access is something that goverment should be more concerned about.
According to Chinese acedamy, the proportion of people who have access to Internet is still frustrating.
To put it into a nutshell, government should spend more money incresing Internet access considering the above-mentioned benefits.
Recently an interesting question has aroused the attention among people: should children be given more time to do whatever they want?
some people say that they should spend more time on doing homework or participating in organized activities related to school or sports.
While I believe that give children more spare time to do what they want is beneficial for their development in the future.
To begin with, having some more time on what children like can cultivate specific interest in their life to hold on to.
Nowadays a lot of young students have no idea about what they like and what they want to do in the future.
Due to heavy work and organized activities all the day, they start to lose their curiosity for everything.
To give them a goal to make efforts to, parents and teachers have to allow them to have more time on their own willings.
Take my little cousin for example.
When he were 8 years old, my aunt send him to 5 professional learning classes out of school.
He just stressed out everyday in that period of time.
As a result, his grade began to fall after learning in too many classes because he lost his dream for acting.
The organized activities forced him to give up his interest and lost his energy.
Secondly, giving more time to children can make them  have better arrangement of time and become more independent.
Children in modern society are used to relying on their arranged schdule and the ability of arranging time validly themselves is becoming worse and worse.
They need to have an opportunity  to practise being independent.
My roommate Olive is a very independent guy.
He said that it's because when he were in elementary school, his mother didn't send him to classes out of school.
So he spent a lot of time reading and hanging out with friends.
That makes him very outgoing and always know what to do to make the time worthwhile.
I believe he will be successful in the future with his dream coming true.
To put it into nutshell, I strongly support that children should be given more time on what they would like to do.
That would be a great promotion to their success in their lives.

State finacial expenditure is always an big issue for citizens to talk about.

Some people may think governments should spend more money in support of the arts than in support of athletics such as state-sponsored Olympic teams while I believe that more money should be put into athletics rather than arts.

In my opinion, there are three main reasons such as athletics activities can stimulate people's national honor, athletics training costs more money, and the athletes can earn the bonus for their countries.
First of all, spending more money on athletics can stimulate civil national honor.
With plenty of money spent on, athletes can get adequate elements to win the sport contests.
After they stand on the podium, their names and countries will be known by people from all over the world.
Additionally, the national flag and the national song of the winner country will also be shown to the whole world.
This is such an honor that will rise the citizens' national pride for sure.
Secondly, athletic training need more money than arts activities objectively.
Hiring top-level trainers, buying suitable training fields and hiring famous doctors and other workers for the athletes will cost a barrel of money every year.
However,it is the only way to win the important international athletic competition like the Olympic game.
The fewer money the government spend, the less chance for the athletes to win.
Thirdly, athletes can get a big bonus for the government.
Whatever how much the government spend on sports, the final goal is to win the fierce competition.
And after the sporters win, they will get more bonus back for the government.
What the government spent before
All in all, I think athletics is more worthy for governments to spend more money on.
Nowadays, teachers always play a vital role in students' development.
Some people hold the idea that teachers should not tell students their own social or political views, while others may think it will be good to share opinions in these aspects.
As far as I can see, I prefer the later attitude.
The reason are as following.
First, teachers can help students become more comprehensive by talking about social and political issues.
In recent years, students use more and more time to focus on their study, so there are little time to learn about social skills and political events.
If teachers could share their views and tips with students, they could not only know more about society and politics but also the social skills and the right attitude towards politics.
When I was in high school, my history teacher like sharing his experience and social views with us.
It was really interesting and beneficial because when I attend university, I found everyone needs to face the situations he told us, like how to reject others and so on.
Second, it is a good method for teachers to arise students' interest.
It is obvious that if teachers talk about the professional content all the time, students will be distracted and feel boring.
Therefore, sharing views in other aspects is a good way to relax themselves and students.
Take my own experience for example, I acted as a tutor to a 16-year-old boy last summer.
When I focused on the course's content, it was difficult for him to be concentrated for a long time.
Therefore, I talk about some social events and political views with him and he was interested in these topics.
After talking about that for a while, he could work more effectively.

Actually, I could understand that some people think teachers should not make their views about society and politics known to students, because they may not hold the right attitude and it will distracts students' attention.
However, students also need a time to relax themselves and it is a good choice to talk about that baecause

There is no denying that nearly every government puts more and more value on education than ever before, since a nation's development depends on soft power, especially higer education, to a considerable degree.

For the sake of enhancing the quality of education, universities tend to increase professor's salaries, for the reason that with affluent income professors would be undoubtedly more devoted to their work, thus improving the whole education naturally.
On the contray, I firmly believe that it can hardly be regarded as a wise decision to increase the budget for salaries of faculties.
First and foremost, it is highly likely that this implement would exert the burden on students who have already been overwhelmed by high tuitions.

With a tight budget for nearly every university in our nation, enhancement of professor's salaries is probably supposed to come from tuitions, which have been increasing straightly for over ten years.
A large number of students are complaining about this issue and unfortunately the majority of them are obliged to loan from the bank or work in part-time employment in order to make the ends meet.
Consequently, the top priority of students, study, has been interfered by their worries to pay for the loans and their endless part-time jobs.
Apart from that, even if salaries of university professors are upgraded, it does not necessarily mean that they will be more committed to teaching.
Faced with huge pressure of research and publishing, there is every prospect that professors would be dedicated to their research projects and climbing the academic ladder.
Sadly, fewer professors give their priority to educate students, which should have been the crucial part of this vocation.
Besides, lots of other temptations have restricted professor's concentration on instruction.
For instance, they have to purchase apartments to ameliorate the living standards for their own families.
Finally, the best approach to reach a better education environment is to invest in university facilies, rather than salaries.
That is because most universities in our province, for example, suffer from out-of-date facilies, including those for experiments, dormitories, and libraries.

When I was a freshman, it was stunning to find that there was no hot water machine in my dormitory, resulting in that I had to carry hot water to take a shower from another building 200 metres away from my room.
Especially in harsh winter, I sincerely wished that we could enjoy hot water to warm our bodies just in our rooms.
This obstacle for the safety and well-being should be removed immediately.
In conclusion, rather than raising salaries of professors, universities should put more value on facilities to increase the level of education.

Is it polite of you as a underling to interrupt the meeting for some fault of the leadership?
Are all of your opinions true affirmatively?
As a elite in our companies, I must not interrupt the speech of anyone in our companies for any reason in the meeting.
From my perspective, the interruption is uncourteous, and we need to hear other people's opinion humbly, so I will correct them until the meeting is over and the people are gone.
On the one hand, we should respect anyone in the formal occasion for the courtesy.
To be more convincible.

In our country, there are the customs that telling us the significance of esteem: you do not interrupt the speech of the speakers since this behavior not only will influence the discipline but also might cut in on the speakers' idea, even you might be hated by your leadership, then you gain the dismissal.
And on the other words, just thinking a environment that no one respects each other, the team will become  chaotic.
Meanwhile, on one says that you could not correct the mistake for the speakers while the class or the meeting over.
Obviously, correct the mistake until the meeting over and the people are gone is the best choice.
On the other hand, you point of view is not necessarily the right point of view.
To be more specific, since each person's view of things is not the same, focus on one thing, we always have several angles.
So the best choice for us is to listen for other one's idea humbly and derive their different ideas, it is not only can boarden up our horizon but also can enrich our l
There are many things to consider when confronted with a situation where others' opinions are incorrect from your perspective.
Different people have differing ideas about what to do.
Some may think they should interupt and correct what they think is wrong right away to avoid further spreading of the mistakes.
Others may say nothing for their fear of offending the leader.
As far as I am concerned, both of the ways above are inappropriate.
We should wait until the class or meeting is over and people are gone,and then talk to the teacher or the meeting leader about the mistake.
This way, we could not only avoid offending learders in public but also make our own opinion known to them.

First, I believe it will be awkward for anyone to be interrupted and blamed for a mistake in public, especially for those who are accustomed to respect from subordinates, such as teachers and leaders.
If you interrupt and state your opinion right away, even if your opinion is right, you will possibly leave a bad impression on the teacher if the teacher is narrow-minded.
In another case, if your opinion is incorrect,  you not only will offend the teacher or leader, but also waste the public time, which is considered as a poor behavior.
In a nut shell, this kind of behavior is not a wise choice to take.
For another choice, saying nothing is also not a reasonable choice.
In this way, you can indeed avoid offending the lears but you also lose the chance of impressing them with your innovative viewpoints.
With the time going by, you are likely to lose the desire and ability to raise doubts on others and that is the emblem of average people.
These phenomenon is common in college, isn't it?
Many college students think if they offend the professors, they will get a low score in return and they finally don't raise questions, and that is what innovation requires.
So, we can't offend the leaders in public and we can neither say nothing, then what shall we do?
Waiting until the class or meeting is over and the people are gone and then talking to the teacher or the leader about your opinions is the right thing to do.
For there aren't people around, you don't need to worry you will make the teacher embarrased.
On top of that, you do seize the chance to impress the teachers or leaders with your unique opinion and that is what we call 'Kill two birds with one stone.'
Some people says that students are more influenced by their teachers than their friends, but I can not agree with them.
When it comes to the statment that students are more influenced by their friends than their teachers, I strongly agree.
I agree with this statment for two reasons, students stay togeter with their friends more often than they do with their  teachers,and there is a big gap between the students and their teachers.
Firstly, the students stay longer with their friends than with teachers, which means that they know a lot about their friends and know less about their teachers.
As a reasult, they are more influenced by their friends.

For example, I live in my school with my friends, so I know a lot about them, and I have been influenced by them a lot, but I know little about my teachers, so I have been influenced more by my friends than my teachers.
Secondly, there is a big gap between the students and their teachers, so they will not be able to influence the students much.
As the old Chinese saying says "three years, one gap."
So you can see how big the gap is between me and my teachers.
For example, at my school, my head teacher is crazy about movies, he says he has seen more than one thousand films.
However, the movies he likes are very different from the movies we like, and he hates Marvel, Disney or Hollywood, which is basicly what we like, and we cannot understand him.
So how can a person so different from us influence us even more than our closest friends?

For these two reasons, students stay togeter with their friends more often than they do with their  teachers,and there is a big gap between the students and their teachers, I agree with the statement that students are more influenced by their friends than their teachers.

Nowadays some parents offer their school-age children money for each high mark they get in school,which is obviously a bad idea.
According to me, this will do little help to the kid's grades, and will even have a potential risk on their education.
Kid's grades only get higher when they study harder.
Meantime, it is plain that studying becomes more difficult as children's grades rise, and children's need for pocket money goes up as they become older.
If a child is studying hard for money, it is easy to find out that his price will go up, so this is plainly not a idea for long.
Why do children study hard?
They may be studying hard for their interests, their goals or their dreams.
And all these motivations take time for children to discover and develop by themselves.
Sadly, parents' money undoutfully has some negative influence during the process.
The influence may be deep or not, but it surely traps children from discovering their own very reasons to study hard.
And when time goes by, the children may turn into some people who do not know what to work hard for, thus becoming lasy, aimless daydreamers.
Any way, parent's money will do no good to their children's study, which should originally be their dreams or interests that can really cheer them up and make a difference.
How many time you spend in studying everyday?
Do you like to do some other funny things like playing onlion, chtting with friends and so on?
From my perspective, I really agree with the statement that educating in nowadays is much more difficult than before because of some new inventions.
Because children feel really enjoyable when they spend time on cell phone, online games and social networkig Web site, they are not willing to study which is really boring and difficult.
Mayun, a Chinese businessman, is a typical instance to support my point of view.
During his educating year, technological smart phone start to show up which is a really innovative electronic device and he find that it is really interesting when playing it.
At moment, something is going to change between today's children and those in the past.

Children in nowadays are addicted to using smart ohones which is not invented until today, but not willing to spend time in study, including solving hard questions, reciting long articals, dictating difficult words and etc.
On the contrary, no these new inventions will occupy past children's live; thus, what they like to do is only working hard and sometimes play in the park with their neiborhood children.
It is not difficult for them to study because no internal interruptions will affect them.
Although some people thinks that children can learn more from those platform, it is actually become more difficult because less chidren can control themselves well.
Take my self, a high school student, as an example to illustrate my perspective.
My teacher always ask our class to search some effective information online and hand in our homework by sending the e-mail.
I follow my teachers steps but after I finish those steps, I begin to play online and even chat with my friend for a extrem long time.
Online can really help us but also do harm to us and because we are young, we will find that it is difficult to control ourselves not tp paly online.

From my owen story, we can know that because of the appearance of cell phone , computer and the lack of self-control, we will be easy to spend too much in playing rather than studying  without any expectation.
In summary, educating becomes more and more difficult because og those new inventions and we wil be hard to control ourself after study online.
Therefore, the statement is really correct from my point of view.

In this busy and noisy world, more and more people are struggling to find a ideal way to relax after work.
Some may choose to watch a movie or read a book, for it is possible to enrich their knowledge while they are relaxing.
However, as for me, I believe physical exercise is a better way than that.
Here are my reasons.
First please ask ourselves:" am I tired and stiff after a whole day's sitting to work with my computer?"
Most answers are sure to be "yes."
Then why not stand up and go outside to do exercise?
Running, swimming, yoga and so on, besides helping our nerve from stressful task, they will also stimulate bodies' function to improve health.
And, on the other hand, physicla exercise can also bring you happy surprise.
For example, when you do exercise in a same location, you could meet several new friedns who have similar interest with you and then chat desultorily here and there.
In view of this, physical exercise is also a efficient way to learn to communiacate after those dull and deadly silence works.
What's more, it is likely to give you inspriation during sports.
Believe or not, some people have found their love during relaxing physical exercise!
Last but not least, my friends, what I want to tell you is that people would dig out their potential for sports by exercise.
Many athletes take part in international sports competition are not totally professinal.
Some of them just found great interest as they were doing physical execise for relax and then developed it.
So what  physical exercise can give you is not a good spirit to carry on career, but also a stage to show your brilliant ability of sports.
I tried to relax by watching a movie or reading a book.
And yes, the movie was marvellous and the book was touching.
However, because of my continuing to sit with one gesture, my neck became sore and my eyes were almost striked in the end.
It was no good to efficiently improve my next work.
As far as I am concerned, physical exercise is really a nice method to relax.
Stand up, and go outside!
Let us move!

In such a highly developed society, the message always spread fast and widely know.
And the information is significantly improtant when people are participated in some business.
Some people believe that they need to gain information from many different ways, so they can obtian as much information as they can.
In my oppinion, I hold the view that people should concentrate on a certern news sources which they are pursuing with.
First, gaining informations from many different ways does make some benefits.
Unfortunately, it also would make some mistakes when we get the wrong information.
My friend Joe used to work in a medical company.
Once he had purchased a type of medicine that he bought from a mechant.
The reason why he was willing to buy this product is that he was heard the price of this product would increase for a while.
In contrast, his teacher, who is also a doctor, told him this product would not increase the price because of the lack of curative effect.
Joe believed the mechant rather than his teacher.
Eventually, Joe failed to sell the medicine and lost a lot of money.
Second, correct information would do a considerably help for us becauce of the accuracy.
If we had take many different sources of information, no one can insure that all the messages are correct.
It is improtant for us to get correct information when we want to resolve the math problems.
Every difference of the numbers will affect results.
So it is important for us to take the correct information.
Third, the relevance of the information is also a important factor.
We can illustrate the reasons by the example of taking a test.
Every test has the range of the knowledge.
For instance, the teacher is going to test the chapter one, you would not get a good grade if you were review the others chapter.
So does the information.
It would not help us if it was not relevant.
From what we have discussed above, we can draw the conclusion that getting information from many different sources sometimes are not good to us.
The accuracy and relevance is more important when we obtaining the correct information.

Nowadays, an intersting discussion has arisen among the public: whether the teachers should get a salary as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders get.
Some people think it is reasonable to get the same income for those vocations.
However, from my perspective, I disagree with this idea.
Teather should not be paid at least as much as doctors or other vocations are paid.
Here are the reasons I will explain.
First, the population of teachers is more larger than the amount of doctors and lawyers.
If the teachers get the same payment as that of doctors, the fanancial support of government will be cost rapidly.
As is known to all, with the development of human population, more and more infants are born everyday, which means the number of student is increasing.
So, the number of teacher is correspondly enhanced.
Government should keep the balance between the salary of individual teacher and the increasing number of teachers.
However, the number of doctors and lawyers is small.
If the teacher get the same payment as the doctors or lawyers.
The cost of government will be huge.
Second, the teachers' working time is shorter than other vocations like doctors, lawyers.
It is universally acknowledged that the teacher only needs to teach students in the weekday and they have two periods of vacation in one year.
So, the amount of work for a teacher is far less than the doctor who needs to speed greatly long time in accompansion with the patients.
The doctors is reasonably deserved to get the higher payment than that paid for teachers.
So it is with the lawyer, who should be devoted into huge amount of work in judgement.
Admittedly, teacher is still a great vocation for its delivering education to students.
However, the teacher should not get the too much higher income.
They have other ways to be cridited, like getting a long period of vacation, which is a big gift for the teachers.

Taking everything into account, I think that teacher should not be paid  as much as doctors or lawyers are paid, not only for the hugh number of teachers, but also for the less heavy work done by teachers.

I understand that nowadays it is very efficient for parents to offer money to their school-age children for stimulating them on each high grade.
As a matter of fact many people equate money with success from a young age: the more money you earn, the more successful you are.
However, thr financial aspect is not the point of a student's study.
The learning experience with one's classmates, the personal fulfillment from one's hard-working, and the opportunity to balance your study and relaxing time are much more important for a child.
A student who spend 12 hours everyday or more at their study just for money, in my opinion, should change their mind and enjoy their learning environment, especially the company of their classmates.

After all, the prospect of having to spend any amount of time in a classroom with people who does not respect, who are hostile, will have a very negative effect on one's disposition and mental health.
A few more money that parents put in the bank account can't compensate for this.
Similarly, a student should derive a special fulfillment or pleasure from his test.
One should not waste his time by doing something that is boring or of no use for his life even if it is well paid.
this is an important point that should be taught to a person from a young age, but what the parents do just have the opposite effects.
We should keep in mind that the money earned only enrich one's life away from work but not enhance the work experience.
Finally, the study life can only be enjoyed adequately if there is enough interst in your learning experience.

Afluence affords many nice things, such as games, toys or other things you dreamed of, but a person who has to study night and day just for money without any happiness will not be able to derive any pleasure from them.

Also, a father or a mother who provides a lot of money for their children might be able to attract them into getting a higher grade, but how much good does that do if their children never respect his study?
Thus the money offered to get a high grade might cost a person more than it affords.
Although hardworking is pretty important ingredient for one's success, the help from one's family is also ignorable.
Which period is the help from one's family more important?
Nowadays or in the past?
For me, the help from one's family play a priority nowadays than before.
In the first place, nowaday people's though is more liberate; therefore, children's success does not lock by their rank.
It was a common phenomenon in the past that  children must followed their parents' vocation.
Therefore, if you wanted to a engineer in the past and you parents were labor, it is impossible for you to achieved your dream whatever you were smart or hardwork.
However, nowadays people's thought is liberated and the rank disappear.
In this way, even your parents are labor, you can still to be a engineer in the future through study hard and go to a top university.
In this way, you parents can help you to get a good grade by mornitoring you and add tutor courses to you in order to help you master more knowledge.
Thus, it is much easier to achieve our goal with help from our family nowadays than before.
Secondly, as more technic device come into our life, it is more easer for our parents to help us achiving success by using these technology.
It is known to all that getting a good grade is pretty important for us to go to a top university and achieve our dream.
With the help from up-to-dated technology, our parents can use them search a myriad of knowledge and lots of good means to study help us absorb quikly although they have not too much knowledge.
However, my mother could not get help from their parents on study because their parents never got high level education and they absolutely had not technic device to help them solve academic problems.
Therefore, nowadays our parents can help us to achieve success more than before.
Finally, nowadays there are no more children in the family as past; thus, childrens nowadays can get more investment on education than before.
It is common that the family have one or two childrens nowadays; howewer, in the past there were even more than five children in the family.
In this way, nowadays children can use get more investment on education from their parents and lots of children even got chance to study abroud.
This good chance was rare in the past because to feed all children in a big family still was a tough issuse.
Therefore, nowadays people can achieve their success more easily with help from their family nowadays than before.
Nowadays, to encourage their school-aged children to study harder, some parents will offer their children money if they get a good grade in school.
Their children would most likely to study hard to earn the money.
It is a win-win for parents and their children.
However it is not always a good idea.
Since parents offer money to children when they get a good grade, they would mistake getting a good grade is the most important thing.
Some kids will study hard for it while others, however, would learn to cheat.
They would think of ways to get a good grade easier and start copying others' test papers.
If they were not caught, they still get the money their parents offered them.
After that, they copy more and not reaching their parents goal.
Some kids would think their parents care about their grades more than anything which is not the truth for most times.
These children are usually good at studying at first but then started getting lower scores.
They would be in a bad mood because they are not staisfyed of their scores.
If this continues, they would be in depression.
Some of these children would even commit suicide because of the pressure they have got from others, but mostly from themselves.
In conclusion, although parents got the idea of offerig money to their children in order for them to study hard, it is not always a good idea.
Children mistake their parents' idea and starting to cheat, kids getting too much pressure and commit suicide is happening around the world every minute.

The question which is better to relax, watching a movie or reading a book, or doing physical exercise, is a complex and controversial issue.
A majority of people believe that watching movies and reading books are better because these ways give people huge space to imagine.
However, people in increasing number hold the opinion that doing physical exercise is preferable.
It is significant to recognize that doing physical exercise is beneficial for most people.
To begin with, doing physical activities facilites the maintenance of health for people.
There is a tendency that people work and study for a long period of time without enough exercise to keep healhy.
In this case, doing physical exercise is pretty important for people to relax.
For example, my younger brother, who studies in high school now, hardly ever takes part in extra activities due to large quantities of workloads at school everyday.
For one time, he got seriously ill for lack of sports.
Finally his parents took him to see a doctor and he was suggested to do exercise everyday.
And later took some time for running a day and kept it a habit.
He got recovered within a week time and realized the importance of outdoor exercise.
Therefore, by doing physical exercise, people can not only relax but also keep healthy.
In addition, doing physical exercise periodically can strengthen the relations between friends.
For instance, activities required cooperation, especially playing basketball, create an opportunity for people to communicate and collaborate with each other, making your relationships stronger.
Before a baketball match, people should communicate with friends about the strategies that can be used in the competition.
And during the match, they need to collaborate with each other to better progress this competition with other people.
And this process gives people means to compete in the match and finally get relax after the match.
This physical activitiy strengthens people' relations and relax themselves.
In conclusion, doing physical exercise is a preferable way to refresh yourself, especially after a long time work.
Whether parents should let their children make mistakes and lte them learn from it become a debatable question nowadays.
From my perspective, leave children do things wrong and allow them learn from their ow lesson can be more effective.

To begin with, children have the right to make errors, because they are just imperfect  young people, and learning from their own mistakes can make the memory more unforgetable and long-lasting, even for their whole life.
For instance, my sister Mary always became distracted in class and always unwilling to do her homework.
Concequently, she failed in most of her exams and became the worst student in her class.
Fortunately, she became aware of her error and learned the significance of study.
In hence, she gtes up early to recite English words and do extra home work till midnight.
After a semester, she became the top 5 inher class and she insisted on studying because she will never forget the hard time when she failed and was looked down upon by her classmates.
Moreover, the behavior shows the tolerance of parents and help develop a healthy relationship between parents ahd children.
No one are born perfectly and it is natural for little child to make errors, so parents should just take it as normal thongs and not punish their kids.
For example, my friend Tom lost his expensive toy car due ti his careless when he was a kid but his parents did not scored him in stead they let him think about the whole thing by himself.
So, up to now, my brother is still willing to communicate with his parents about his problems because he know his parents has the tolerance and they have a good relationship.
Last but not least, letting kids make mistakes and correct them on their own can make kid know how to behave themselves.
Parents should interfere when their children do something wrong.
When children know they have to pay their price for their doing, they will want to behave beyyer and make less trobles.
My friend Bob, always eat lots of snacks when he was a child even his parents told him not to do so.
Later he became extremely fat and has the illness of obisity.
It was the illness that let him know the inportance of keeping fit, so now he goes to the gym 3 times a week in order to stay healthy, preventing the same thing happen agaun.
All things considered, is an effective way for parents to do so.
For its long-lasting effectiveness, the equal relationship it created, and the willingness for children to behave better from the bottom of their hearts.
Nowadays, mang young elites are back their coutry with their high diplomas and the experiences of studying broad, trying to do some important things to change the country.
However, in my opinion, younger people still have a lot to learn from elder people, it is the proper time for them to learn, not to make decision.
So I agree with that the young people today have no influence on the important decisions tha tdetermine the future of society as a whole.
First, the young generation's experience is much less than the older generation, which would make them be struggled with making decision.
For instance, the president in every country is always the mid-aged man.
They understand what the country needs in the situation right now, they know what the society needs because they have already experienced.
However, the young elites rarely experienced this.
Although they got high diploma in the most prestigeous school, they could not understand what the society needs and what the citizens need.
Their mind is not matured yet, so most of the time they could not make the right decisions under the pressure and certain circumstances.
Second, the younger generation are not calm as the old people when they face difficuties.
The older have already seen a lot international changes, they know why the events would happen and the similarities between these events.
They have seen more and experience more, so they could be more calm when the face difficuties.
There is an old Chinese saying: The older, the wiser.
I believe this saying deep in my heart because the young could could never see as much as the old.
So the new situation to the young is the familiar one to the old.
When the young are confused with certain situation and become struggled, the old could help to fix it.
However, it is not to say let the young making decision is a bad thing.
Sometimes the young people can change the world.
You can take the fonder of Snapchat as an sample.
He was only about 30 but the accomplishment he made was remarkable.
The young may be not as experienced as the old, but they can accept the new and fresh things more quickly than the old.
Without the creativity, the society could not improve.
As the result, the elites that the society need is a calm person even in the face of crisis; but the creativity is also the key of the construction of the society.
Nowadays the most important thing is to keep calm and stabilize the society.
So making the old to operate the society and make decision is more reasonable.
Nowadays, it's a common circumstance that some parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade or mark they get in school.
Parents take this action as an encouragement for their kids to persue better education level.
As a result, students do get much more higher mark on their examinations.
For its positive impact, I definitely support this idea as one of inspiring approach in education.
We all know that schools have scholarship regulations for those excellent students whether they have achieved great success in coursework or research.
Parents' giving money to children for their high grade is exactly a kind of scholarship in family field.

For instance, when I was at my junior high school, my father had made a rule with me that everytime I ranked the top 5 among my class in any significant test I can received a certain amount of bonus from him, if I ranked the top 5 among my whole grade in any significant test, then the number of money would surprise me.
Because of that rule, I studied extremely hard to reach my ideal position in the school.
Eventually I succeeded to enter a better senior high school after the graduation which I never thought that I could be enrolled before.
My father's educating experience on me  indicates that appropriate money encouragement is somehow indispensable for students' future.
However, the bonus is not always suitable for each family cause those parents who are facing with poverty surely cannot afford with the payment.
Under this circumstance, they mustn't choose this way to encourage their kids.
Instead, they can turn to purchase some special gifts as a praise.
Overall, the method is good for children to study hard in the school.
Both students and parents want to get a high grade during their study in the school.
Hence, some parents would use reward mechanism as a way of encouraging their children to put more effort on their study.
However, as far as I am concerned, give money to their children is not a good way of reward their hardworking.
I will provide several evidence as follows.
To begin with, the reward mechanism contains many ways.
For instance, a trip to other places or play a toy for them.
Especially offering a trip to them is a much wiser choice.
This is because the children can relieve their heavy burden of study pressure.
Moreover, they can exercise their ability of managing all sorts of problems and gain more experience and learn historical or geographical knowledge through their trips.
If parents just simply give their children money.
You don't know how they will spend it.
To make it worse, this will rise the problem of bandwagon effect.
Therefore, your reward could cause some negative effects.
Moreover, the parents should let their kids to realize that the hardworking study benefits themselves, the children should not study for the money.
And also to make a high grade is not a way of earning the money.
If parents offer money to them, the children may become more and more depend on this kind of reward mechanism.
And if someday parents stop rewarding them, they might stop studying hard.
To summerize, parents want to reward their children is a good thing, for they want to encourage their children's willing of study.
However, they should seek a right way of doing this.
To give their children money is definitely a bad idea.
This will pose a bad influence on their children, like bandwagon effect or let them misunderstanding the true meaning of study.
If parents consider a much better way to reward them, their children will gradually love studying, and make high marks consequently.

When asked about whether always telling the truth is the most important consideration in relationship, the overwhelming majority would support that honest is a valuable quality people desired.
However, others take the opposite attitude and assume that truth could hurt other's feelings.
As far as i am concerned, i believe that some truths could be more harmful than lies.
The reasons are as follows.
To begin with, sometimes truth could be so ruthless that relevant people cannot handle it.
People do not tell the truth for other's own sake.
For example, a person was diagnosed early cancer, the doctor suggested that keeping a positive attitude would benefit the effect assistant with the medicine.
The wife of this patient decided not to tell him the truth about tumor.
This patient thrilled and pick up hope again.
If the wife told him the truth, it would be hard for him to get rid of the cancer and keep in a good mood.
To some extent, concealing the truth might optimize the outcome we want to achieve.
Moreover, telling the truth regardless the situation would be inappropriate.
Small white lies usually are win-wins.
For instance, your friend asks your opinion about her beloved pop singer.
Although that singer is not your type, it does not matter if you compliment him to your friend, otherwise, she will feel disrespected and end the relationship with you assembly.
So when it comes to some irrelevant issues, proper with lies are required to facilitate the achievement of harmony.
Last but not least, there is not only white and black in the world.
Things are more complex and complicated.
It is very possible that there is no truth at all.
People only hear what they want to heat and tust what they want to trust.
Probably no matter how reasonable the truth is, when it is revealed, nobody is prone to believe it because that truth is far beyond their consciousness.
On the other hand, the truth people are telling may be subjective because it is the truth that he chooses to be truth.
Truth could be different from different perspective regarding the same issue.
To wrap up, taking into account of all these factor, we may reach the conclusion that always telling the truth might not be the most important consideration in relationship.
Sometimes truths are too overwhelming to cope with, sometimes irrelevant white lies can have positive influence, sometimes truth ate so hard to tell because it's subjective.

My father always tells me to focus on one thing in order to succeed, but i accidentally saw in a TV show states that the broader knowledge you gain, the more possible you can be successful.
After watched that show, i started to think whether wide range of knowledge is of great importance.
In my opinon, broader academic knowledge have more advantages.
To begin with, the distinction among subjects becomes less remarkable.
To solve a problem in a certain field, you can use knowledge in another aspect.
For example, you can solve Biology problems through Math methods rather than in biology way since math can give you new perspective to deal with the tasks.
Through this connection, you can have better understanding of each subject and lead to more achievements.
Second of all, having wider knowledge is good for making friends.
If you are good at both Math and English, you will be able to exchange ideas with people who are specialized in Math or English.
On the contrary, if you only specialize in English, you only have conversations with people who study English.
All in all, the fewer fields you specialize in, the fewer people you are likely to communicate with.
Thirdly, wide range of knowledge helps people find well-paid job.
Nowadays companies want their emploees to be well-rounded developed.
Therefore people who have wide knowledge of academic subject is more likely to have important position in the companies and make contributions to the whole companies or countries.

Broadly speaking, specializing in specific subject has advantages, however, having broad knowledge is better choice for modern people because it helps them have more oppotunies to achieve their dreams, make more friends, have better understaning of those academic subjects.
With the development of the information era, children nowadays are very different from children in the past.

However, whenever asked about whether young people in the past depened too much on their parents while young people nowadays are better at making their own decisions, people always exhibit an air of uncertainty.
I wholeheartedly agree that young people now are better at making their own decisions.
To begin with, young people nowadays are more mature than young people in the past.
Nowadays, young people have the access to many information than young people in the past because of the widespreading of smart phones.
Thus, young people now know more things than young people in the past.
In this way, they can learn a lot of things happened in the society, which young people in the past can barely know.
So they are more mature to make decision about their own lives.
However, Young people in the past can be more innocent.
They have few ways to get information.
They didn't have smart phones, even internet.
They can only get information from the people around them, and sometimes adults may not tell them things that happened.
So they are too naive to make their own decisions.
Then, young people nowadays have the rights to make decisions about their own lives while young people in the past do not have the rights to make decisions.
Now, most families are living a happy life without many worries.
However, people in the past have a lot of difficult time to go through.
For example, they may had a time worrying about their food or crops.
So young peope in the past have no alternatives but to follow their parents to go through the difficult time.
They didn't have the condition that give them rights to make decisions about their own lives.
Last but not the least, young people now are more personalized than young people in the past.
In the past, the society required young people to follow what the leaders or the adults said.
They are restricted with strict rules, although those rules can be unreasonable.
Therefore, young people in the past did't cultivate the personalities to think differently.
However, young people now are freer, adults are more respect to their thoughts.
In this way, young people nowadays have cultivated their own personalities to think personally.
So,young people nowadays are more personalized than young people in the past to make decisions about their own lives.
To conclude, young people nowadays are better at making decisions about their own lives because of the change in society and many other factors.

I think it is a good idea for parents to offer money as awards for the high grades their children get in school.
Firstly, most children don't really understand the benefits of high grades.
They cannot find the relationship between high grades and a good future.
So it might not be a good idea to tell them what benefits they will get when they grow up if they study hard.
Also, most people do not have strong willpower when they are young so that they might not spare more efforts on their study without awards or punishments.
As a result, children need some kind of motivation to push them to study hard.
I find that money is a strong motivation for many children including myself.
When I was young, my parents often offered me pocket money whenever I got high grades in an exam.
Honestly, the reason I worked hard at school was mainly the pocket money so I could buy candies and chips.
And actually I really did get high grades when I was a kid.
Secondly, evidence shows that high grades actually have a strong positive relationship with high salaries in people's careers.
So working hard at school have something to do with money.
If parents offer their children money for high grades they get in school, they will build up the recognization as soon as possible that if they want to gain money, they will have to study hard.
However, we also study for knowledge and pleasure.
So parents should also offer their children something other than money.
Above all, I consider it a good way to give their children money as a motivation for them to study hard.

In nowadays, more and more parents are concerned about thier children's education.
In order to encourage their child, parents may use differant ways.
It is a saying that some parents will award thier child some money when they get high grade in school.
Perhaps some people will think that this way is excessive for the child because they don't know how to spend it.
As for me, I agree with this reward system, so here are three reasons to support my opinion.
As the old saying goes, ' no pains, no gains.'
So if the child want to gey that reward, they have to study hard.
In this way, it can encouage them to study harder.
So, this can stimulate thier intrest on study.
My cousins, Jack, once was very naughty, if you told him to sit down and study, he would totally run away and play outside.
One day, he wanted to by a transfomer toy, but, as you see, he did't have enough money.
My uncle got an idea.
He told my cousin if he would get enough grades at school next time, he could get a summary of money.
This method changed my cousin immediately.
After he konwn this, he started to work hard and really success in next text.
So you see, with this ways, my cousin successfully changed his bad habits.
Give children some money can also help them to manage thier own finance.
If they get the money, they will start to think about waht they can buy with it and what else they can do with this award.
This will gradually culture thier financial ideas.
They will get independent in this way.
Take my own experience as an example.
I got a sum of money myself in the spring festival when I was eight.
When I received the money, it is hard to think what I can do with it.
To not waste my money, I make a plan to save my money in a bank for half a year, and after that I could take it out and buy a book which would public right at that time.
I made this and I felt really proud with this step.
So I really think this is a good way for parents to award thier children.
Though there are indeed some disadvantages with this situation, but above all, I think the advantages far outweigh than disadvantages.
Nowadays, partial parents tend to prize their children with money when they did well in the examination.

Then, they are possibly to put more efforts to get a good result again, whcin is highly helpful for them.

Second, the money they get could be a kind of motivation to inspire them to study harder.
As we know, study is a boring and annoying sometimes, students, who are in their young ages, may cannot burden this pressure.
When they receive the prize, they may consider it as a target.
They could be really stimulated from the prizes.

With the development of our society, we have an increasing number of options about our life, our study, and our work.
For example, which way of working or studying will make you satisfied?
Doing various types of tasks or doing similar things everyday?
As for me, I prefer the former one.
First, doing a great variety of tasks all day long will presents more challenges and more fun.
More challenges and fun will make us be interested in those tasks.
And I have read a research which states that, as people are doing tasks out of insterest, they will be happier than those who does similar things all day long.
Also, happiness lead to health.
Another research indicates that among people with more happiness, ninty percent of them will have lower odds to have cancer, insomnia, and other diseases.
Take myself as an example, I used to have insomnia when I kept doing the same tasks everyday, such as listening to class, writing my papers, and listening to class, then writing my papers.
But one day, I changed my life routine, I used my spare time to try some different things like swimming, climbing the mountain, taking other classes provided by another professor.
Soon I was happy and had no insomnia at all.
So it is more satisfied for me  to have many different types of tasks to do than having similar things to do during the workday.
Second, when we are doing different tasks, it seems busier for us than doing similar tasks all day even though we may worked for the same hours.
In that case, we can feel a strong sense that our life is under our own control, and have a better expectation to our future.
Take cousin for an example.
When she kept doing almost the same tasks during the workday, she always complained to me saying:"I fell hopefulless, and It seems like my life has gone out of my control."
However, after I encouraged her to change her life like I used to do, she has made more new friends and now, she is looking forward to her future.

Nowadays, the ability of adapting is becoming as significant as the knowledge we learn.
This also make sense when it comes to working.
At the present, we cannot have perfect performance unless we are able to adapt to the group we are in.
And socilizing is also crucial in our work, which is something we need to adapt to when we are in a new work environment.
First, we need to coopreate with others to make us work better, for wich we need to adapt to the new environment.
For instance, a university classmates of mine, who was a programmerand  had very good grades in university, had a hard time recently.
According to his words, he could not work well with his collegue which made the groupwork not efficient.
He could not adapt himself to understanding the process of the group work immediately, which resulted in his confusing of what  phase the work enters.
When we got toghther, he told me that there is no better way to make you work well than adapt to the company environment.
Since only if you know excatly how the process the company take to write codes and what strategy company take when meeting problems about the bugs int he codes can you follow your collegues.
Without the ability of adapting, you could be just a fool in the company and do not know how to write your codes.
Second, with good adaptation, we can learn how to get along with the leader and boss to prevent us from being criticized.
The example of Leijun is a case in point.
Leijun works very well about computer and can suddenly solve the problems the company face.
On the basis of this, he could have been praised by the boss.
But in the talking to introduce how he solve the problems, he did not know the temper of the boss and utilized some wrong words which made boss angry, which resulted in his later quitting job.
Afterr he became the EXO of Xiaomi, he talked to the young man and warn them that it was very significant to know how to get along well with boss and leader.
If he could used some words that the leader prefer at that time, it is of high possibility that he would be prompted.
In view of this, we can understand the importance in adapting to new environment which could let us know the leader's likes and dislikes to let them understand our work.
From the two points above, we can excatly know that adapting to new work environment is as important as excellent knowledge, and only with the ability of adaptation can we maximume our work efforts.
The answer of this statement depends on own experience and life style.

Children nowadays shoulder heavier pressure than before, for they are expected to be excellent kids by their parents and teachers.
And one of the measurement of exllence is their school performance, for which children spend more time devoting themselves in the home work or organized activities.
An interesting discussion therefore has arisen among people: should children be given more time to do things they really eager to do.
Opinions are divided and personally speaking, my answer to the question is yes.
Giving more time to do tasks they wants helps him plan for their own future.
Because of the fact that their path has already been paved by their parents and teachers, children nowadays are increasingly dependent on others.
They even do not think about their future or dreaming career, for there is already planed by others.
This is appalling that children will finally become robots only follow the instruction by others without their personal thought and discretion.
Take my brother for example, what he truly liked to do is photographing.
However, my parents wanted him to be a good doctor then whose future would be more promising.
He buried himself in tons of reading materials to reach the goal required by them.
He surely is a doctor now, but with terribly negative attitude towards his career and he has no dream at all.
Also,  giving more time to do whatever they want shapes their own judgement.
Driven by their own curiosity and interest, they are more willing to explore the things they currently do, that provokes deeper thinking and fresh thoughts.
If something puzzled or trumbled them, they would just be fully involved in it anf tried to figure out the solutions ny themselves.
This process carves their thinking pattern and helps to form their own judgement.
My friend Tomy is exact instance.
He was given much free time to do whatever he wanted to.
His afterschool life was so colorful and impressive for me, such as doing chemistry experiment by himself and reading foreign language novels even he was mere a  primary school students.
By doing this, he always thought about many issue I never come up with.
And every time our teachers asked us to give comments about heated topic, he usually gave powerful and insightful speech that surprised all of our class.
In conclusion, children should be given more time to accomplish the things they really want to do, for that helps them to plan  for their own future and shapes their judgement.
With the freedom to fully become aware of what they are and what they really have passion in, children are surely perform better in their later academic performance and even their entire life.

therefore, fiction movies and cosmic books are my favorite, i can get fun from them ,making me relax and refresh, since i have no extra physical energy to do exercise.

most of us are use cell phones or weixin to change our ideas and connet our friendship.

if i have the popular topic to share with my favorite friends, it makes me happy and relax.

Parents always give prizes to their children when they get good grade in school and those prizes including money to encourage them keep wrking hard.
It's very common and reasonable.
Money is attractive, expacially when kids are young because they are easy to be content.
But it's may not a good behaviour to give money to their children.
First, it's harmful to set up right values.
If parent give their children money when they get good grade everytime, children will assume that money is the only improtant and useful things.
Whatever they do or others do, they did it for purchasing money.
They will built a very wrong values and igoner many other thing such as relationship and dream.
After they growp up, they will give up evething for money.
Second, it's not helpful to cultivate the habit of saving money.
When kids are young, they won't realize how hard to make money so they won't appreciate it and spend them on something unuseful without second thinking.
When I was young, I have a classmate whose parent are very rich.
His pin money more than everyone of us and he can get much more when he got good grades.
Guss what?
He addicted at computer game and put all his money on it.
So before we capable of using money correctly, there is no good effect to own too much money.
Third, children compare with the highter when they got some money for award.
When kids get money and buy something that others kid don't have, they will compare with each other.
It happens a lot when I was a kids.
It's a very inppropiate phonomonon.
And the best way to forbit is don't offer money
Overall, there is many other methods to award their kids, such as travelling and go to resturant.
I think there is no need to give money for each high grade.

Family and job are two big topic that we will face sooner or later, and how to balance the job and family is very hard to most of us.
As far as I am concerned, the family are better than jobs that offer us more salaries.
I have seen people who earn much money are unhappy for having no time to spend with family.
And it is alos very common that people's work is influenced by the family problems which are caused by the distance between them and family members.
Still, far from friends, our social need cannot be satisfied, which will shift out focus from work.
First, we earn money for happiness which is just staying with family and enjoying ourselves.
So what is our purpose of leaving family behind for more money.
I have seen a lot of relatives complain for having no happines since they have no opportunity to stay with family.
These people are always working in big city like Shanghai but they can just play with their sons in holiday.
What a pity.
The origin purpose of earning money is to make the whole family to have a better life quanlity.
But when they earn enough money , they find that they are far from their purpose because their time are filled.
Besides, I have also seen people who earn less money but they can go to Disney with their children to give children a childhood with no regret.
Undoubtedly, the latter person have more happiness and they can live a colorful and brightful life, which is the final purpose.
Then, I can say that spending more time with family is something that we should measure more than high income.
Second, some people often go abroad to meet costomers, which can lead to quarells between wife and husband, whcih will influence the work.
The instance of my uncle is a case in point.
My uncle always go abroad to attend crucial meetings.
Due to this, my aunt have no opportunity to communicate with him, then the problems between them are becoming more and more serious.
At last, my aunt porposed divorce.
Thus, my uncle could not concentrate on his own work any more because he thought all about the problems between him and aunt, and also he could not finish the work that was assigned to him.
Then he quit his primary job and found another job in our city, after that, I ccould always see the smile of my uncle and aunt.
Regardless of the family problems, he can always do the job perfectly because he can totally concentrated his mind on the job and did not care for the quareels.
Hence, the psychological problems did not exist any more, which is both beneficial for my unlce and his job.
Globally, diverse career can be specifically divided into different type of work; particular jobs may contain extremely diverse work to do or inconceivably monotonous tasks to finish.
Concerns like whether many different sorts of tasks or tasks that are akin to one another will satisfy workers most.
From my perspective, I prefer the point that many different types of work to do during the workday.
Admittedly, doing similar tasks the whole day will apparently be more relaxing and less challenging.

In other words, being sucked in things that are precedented will undoubtedly lower the pressure of unfinishing worl due to the difficulties and gey more stable wages without any errors to make due to familarity.
However, if one really master the career, such concerns will be eliminated easily for one will definately be confident about his or her own skills.
In the first place, doing "colorful" tasks can promote the interest of workers.

That is to say, by confronting all variety of challenges and facing all sorts of new things, workers will obviously get interested as a sense of innovation and satisfaction come along; consequently, workers will be more willing to do such work due to the freshment of work, personal enjoyment and a feeling of never get bored.
Instead, if a particular work is done day by day, workers should have sucked and loosed the concentration and hence decresed the productivity due to lack of satisfaction of the work.
Secondly, doing different tasks enable workers to get higher salaries, hence satisfaction.

That is, as far as the public know, someone with more skills or capability will undoubtedly have less job mobility and more appreciation due to they can easily transfer to another kind of work if possible; thus, a firm will be more likely to hire such person with higher wages, for his or her unsubstitutional value and even unprecedentedly diverse abilities.
My uncle is such person who get strong satisfaction.

He was a successful manager of an international company not only for he once majored in business or economic, but also due to his amazingly diverse ability like computer programming, accounting and managing; consequently, not to mention his fertile salaries or bonus.
In conclusion, workers will obviously be more satisfied when they have many different types of tasks to do during the work day, for the durable interest and demanding wages.

Getting involved in similar tasks can never outweigh the benefits of diverse work, only when one have his or her own world rocked by interest and satisfaction will he or she find the meaning of the life and own value, so come and try such work!

With the development of the gobalization, goverment would like to attract more tourists by using several strategies.
Recently, a heated debate has been aroused among people whether goverment should increase the safety by employing more police or not.
From my perspective, I firmly believe that the governemnt should enhance the security by employing more police.
Here are some reasons and examples supported my viewpoint.
First, hiring police would have a remarkable impact on country's reputation.

Tourists definitely love to visit a country where there is safe, so if some tourists visiting one country and experience a safe and joyful traveling here they would share their good experiences to other visitors, leading to more and more visitors coming for the country.
However, if one tourist suffer from an extreme dangerous situation when he travel a country, he would not forget his experience and claim that country as a bad place to the public.
For example, there was once a famous place that all the people love to have a visit.
But a series of serious cases such as robbing, rape, murdering happened in that places.

The government would not like to invest more money in this place and leaving few police here, so the severe cases kept happening, resulting in a bad reputation of the place that no one would dare to visit.
Second, more police would also help the local people and thus more active in economy.
Local people would benefit a lot from the addition of police and when they feel safe they can concentrate on their work and create more values to the society and country.
When the fortune accumulates, the society or country would become more and more flourish, attracting more visitors.
For example, there was a place that are well planed and exploited.
The government there enhance the local police and everyone invest their money for the local company because the company is well developed all the time.
Soon, the people in that place become rich and construct a lot of spetaular.
To put it into a nutshell, I hold the view that the government should enhance the safety by employing more police.
Because not only the reputatuion can be built but also the local economy can benefit.

Nowadays, one controversial topic has aroused a heated debate around people: whether classmates or colleagues should communicate in person or through emails.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some people argue that talking face to face helps students have an effective communication.
However, I hold the opposite view that sending email is a better way to communicate for students.
My point can be elaborated in follows.
First of all, communicating by sending email is more convenient for students.

People can send email to their classmate for asking questions about their project anytime when they suffer some problem and their classmate can also reply this email when they figure out this problem.
If they choose to talk about this pronblem face to face, they have to make appointment that they are all free and find a quite place, which is time-comsuming.

One research conducted by Wuhan University is a good case in point, in which the professors investigated two hundred students in Wuhan University aiming to find out which commnicate method do they prefer.
It turns out that seventy percent of students prefer to communicate with their classmate by email and thirty percent of them prefer communicating in person.
It is crytal clear that it is better for classmates to communicate through email.
Furthermore, Sending email helps students remember what they have talked, which is good for their project.
The email box can store what people have writen to others and what people have receieved.
In that case, if students forget how to solve a certain problem they have talked with, the email box can help them remember the solution.
However, if students talked about a problem in person, they can only organize another communication to talk about this problem again.
For example, I was assigned to do a programming last year.
After I wroten down the code in the C programming language, I cannot run this program because their is a bug in my program.

As a saying goes, 'Parents are the best teachers of their children', we often expect parents to play an essential role in the development of a kid's habits and virtues.
But debates continue on how should parents educate their child.
For some parents, it will be better to teach their child hand in hand thus they will not encounter some troubles.
But I insist that parents should let children exprience making mistakes and then learn from it.
Here are my reasons.
Children have to realize that things are not always going so well but keep going wrong and is then recorrected.
If parents do not let children make mistakes, they will intend to consider whatever they do simple.
And that is not good for their growing up, for they will be easily beaten in their later years.
My nephew is an apple in his parents eyes, thus he was protected too carefully.
While he was learning to walk, his parents always followed him and astisted.
As a reslut, he never fell.
But once he was in my home, trying to walk without his parents protection, and he fell.
Crying as loudly as he could, he just sited on the cold hard floor instead of getting up himself.
He just didn't expect the danger he was facing.
We can see that, children could be braver if parents let them make mistakes.
As children growing up, they will be more confident to solve problems if parents do so.
It is from these experiences of making mistakes and trying again that children gain a confidence that 'I can do it if I make efforts'.
And they are more likely to presist in one thing.
Let me raise an example of my own.
When I was at primary school, my math was poor.
I always turn to my father for help, who was a doctor in engineering.
But from some day on, he did not answer my questions any more and I had to work them out myself.
I made many mistakes first that I almost gave up.
But I did it finally.
Since then, I had the confidence of solving math problems.
My father's letting me go really helped me.
Admittedly, children may deroute if keeping making mistakes.
And parents help is important.
But parents can let them make mistakes and then asist them solving the problem.
So there will be no worries about those problems.
I believe that children can benefit from making mistakes and solving them.

Nowadays,many Chinese parents love their children so much that they shelter their children from everyting that may hurt their children.
As far as I am concrened,parents should let children try difficult things themselves and have them make mistakes.
In this way,children can learn from the mistakes and become wiser and stronger.
There are three reasons for my opinion.
First,the kids will face more and more difficulties as they grow up.
Parents can't protect them forever.
If parents overprotect their children,children will not be a man who can face anything bravely.
Second,making mistakes can make children more cautious and confident.
No one in the world can avoid making mistakes.
But those who make more mistakes are always more excellent.
Edison,a great inventor,has failed hundreds of times when he is inventing bulbs.
But finally,he made it on the basis that he had made many mistakes.
Third,children should be encouraged to solve problems.
If the parents always help children with thier questions,kids may become afraid of difficulties and give up themselves,which  absolutely does harm to the development of kids.
In such a cruel society,if we don't keep strengthen ourselves,we may live an unhappy life.
Mistakes are not always bad.
If we can adjust our attitude towards mistakes and try to learn from the mistakes,we may be a very learned person.
Children are the hope of most parents,I think those parents who prevent their children from making mistakes should change their ways to educate their children.
Appropriate educations are vital important to the children's life.
In a word,for children's future,parents should let it go and let the children learn from themselves.
Nowadays, many parents give their kids money as the award for getting high scores.
From my perspective, this is a very dangerous idea and may jeopardize the children's growth.
In the first place, most kids don't know how to use money correctly.
Since they still have not received enough education, for most time, kids don't know what is good and what is bad.

If parents just grant their children with money as long as they do well academically, those kids may spend money in ways that are unhealthy for their development, for example, buying video games, drinking alcohol and smoking.
Therefore, parents should not just give their kids money and allow them to spend it whatever they want, because children's growth does need scientific guidance.
Furthermore, giving money as the reward may mislead the children's world view.
In a child's early ages, what he really needs is love, and love can by no means be measured by money.
Use money to show the parents' love may make the kid's world view more materialistic, thus the kid is more likely to become a superficial person when he grows up, which is absolutely a tragedy.
Finally, besides giving money, there are so many ways that parents can adopt to award their beloved childen.
For example, after the kid gets improvement, the parents can travel with him, or buy a very valuable present.
Though such practices can also cost much money, what they mean is completely different from merely giving money.
The former is a way to show the parents' love and joy, while the latter may just seem a  trade.
By giving all kinds of meaningful presents, parents can get a much better result.
In conclusion, rewarding children money for academic improvement is by no means beneficial.
These days,some parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade when they get in school.
In my opinion,it is not a good idea for parents to encourage their children to get high grade in that way.
Admittedly,it can encourage children to get high mark in some ways.
But It tells children that you get high grade only for money rather than yourself.
We can't get money every time we finish some asignments greatly.
So it's important to teach children doing our best is what we need to do rather than for money.
Firstly,I think what children want is getting more and more expensive.
this time,you give them 10 dollars for a toy and maybe next time they want to get 50 dollars for computer games.
Offering them money for high grade will make them more and more greedy.
And if you can't satisfy them,then they won't make any effort for studying.
that's why I don't approve of this method.
For example,when I was in high shcool,my parents always gave me a gift if I get high mark in the exam.
At first,what I want is just a nice meal.
But generally what I want is changing all the time.
I want comic books,games,shoes and so on.
If I can't get a gift,I don't want to strive for high mark.
