The most difficult role in the world is probably to be a parent.
Because parents have to make money to support their families, they often hardly have enough time to spend with their children.
I think that if parents have time, they should play with their children or do some sports.
Playing games together allows parents to walk into the inner world of their children and listen to the deepest voice in their hearts.
Compared to the guardians and mentors, children always prefer companions who fight with them.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: which way will come up with the best solution to a problem, being creative or planning carefully?
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some people claim that being creative will come up with the best solution to a problem.
However, I would stand on their opposite side and I believe that planning carefully will do that.
My viewpoints can be elaborated as follows.
Firstly, planning carefully can make people consider things with a mature way.
People always feel worried and nervous when they are facing a trouble or problem.
Although they are very ceative and have original ideas, they could not come up with the best solution right away.
They would be easy to make mistakes and think carelesslly.
If one person do anything with a mind that he should plan carefully, he would find the best way to sovle the problem.
Because he has patience to plan and it can make him to avoid the bad solution and choose the best one.
For example, my sister was a very careful person and she had a time scheduel about every day.
Last week, she had a time conflict between the school party and the history class.
She planned carefully and attend to the party after the class because study was more important for her.
Secondly, planing carefully can make the solution much safer.
careful mind can reduce the risk of making the wrong decision.
At many times, people cannot come up with the best way just by the creative thinking, because there are no guarantee that this creative thinking can success.
For example, My classmate attend to a science contest and their group wanted to use the new and creative technique.
However, their strategy failed because they ignored the defect of this creative technique.
All in all, I firmly think that planning carfully will come up with the best solution to a problem.

People always admire some celebrities, some even go so far as to regard their words as the authorities and make those their mottos.
But people at different ages sometimes judge those opinions differently.
Some people say that the opinions of the celebrities are more important to  younger people than they are to older people, however, I just see it in a opposite way.
I thinks that the importance are equal to old and young, even sometimes those words may play a more important role in aged people's life.
To begin with, young people need to explore the world in their own ways, it's not always good and appropriate for them to listen to famous people's advices and follow them simply.
Young people, who have a lot of energy and a buntch of time, should always follow their own ideas and think in independently.
Famous people's opinions do have some good aspects, but everyone should explore their own ways to success instead of copying others.
One of my roommates admired an idol so much that she soon became a cult fan of him.
She even wants to make her ways to a singer too.
But she just didn't fit the job.
Copying the idol's way didn't work for her, and because of her indulging in that, she got a worst grades ever.
Celebrities some times can encourage people, but since young people do not mature enough and not rational enough, sometimes following celebrities without thinking ruins their lives.
On another side, old people need the encouragement  from the celebrities to refresh themselves and be positive to live again.
Older people have more burden than the younger one, so they need a way to relax and to entertain them as well as give them the energy to live again.
In addition, older people are sensible and rational, they have a strong mind to tell the right from the wrong.
As a result, thay have ability to pick the right advice for themselves without being distracted from the normal life.
To sum up, we should always tell the essence from the phenomenon.

We can't just dump into the conclusion that the opinions of celebrities are more important for younger people than they are to older people because old people are more likely to control themselves and be benefited from the celebrities.
Things have changed a lot during the past fifty years, many people starts to wonder that the advice given by our grandparents is still useful.
Some finds that the advice out of context; while others believes the wisdom of their grandparents.

Nowadays, although the Internet seems to be bringing people much closer then before, the actual connection between people seem to have become further then it once was.
When facing struggling strangers, more and more people choose to mind their own business and walk away.
The main reason that accounts for this situation is that trust between people is more unlikely to acquire than before.
When ever someone sees an elderly person falls down in the middle of the road, the first thing that comes to his mind is not rushing over to help.
He would first ask himself, "Did that man fall down on purpose?
Would he ask me for money if I go over to help him?
Would I be held responsible even if I was there to help?"
With so many questions asked, one might just decide that it would be better to pretend nothing's wrong and walk away.
Secondly, people nowadays have a much faster lifestyle than before.
Everyone has a lot of 'his own business' to mind, thus leaving them no time for others' problems.
Suppose that one has already been exhausted after a day's work, it wouldn't be very unreasonable if he just doesn't want to help a stranger with his heavy luggage.
Last but not least, people nowadays care more about what others think.
When one sees that other people choose to look away, he would feel stupid to step forward.
Therefore, one would think that he might as well walk away too.
To sum up, I think that people today are less willing to help the struggling strangers, because they fear that they would be deceived or hurt.
They are busy, tired, and unwilling to be different from others, which is why they are always waiting for others to step forward first.
Are you into having multitude of tasks to do or just doing similar tasks all day long?
In other words, are you fond of stable schedule or abundant lifestyle?
With the development of economic globalization and technology, people nowadays can do a variety of works by just staying at their office.
But due to the different types of jobs, people have diverse content and style of work.
I totally support that I prefer that I have diversity of different types of tasks to do during the workday because the feeling of freshness and the satisfaction of solving challenges.
On the one hand, there is no doubt that some people want to have a stable work schedule everyday.
There are multitude of reasons that some people hold this kind of view.
Firstly, they do not like to change more about their life, doing the similar tasks all day long can maintain their lifestyle.
Besides, people who want to have similar tasks in working field is the people who hold the characteristics that not very outgoing and introverted.
They just follow the rules made by the managers or the administrators, in other words, I think those people are into the things that others impose on them, like a robot.
On the other hand, when talking about the reason why I am fond of having many different types of tasks, I think the most significant reason is that I want to gain the feeling of freshness everyday.
There is an instance, when you give a new stuffed-toy  to a kid, they may abandon the toy that the hand in their hand at that time.
So if children have the feeling of freshness, the adults have this kind of feeling as well.
In addition, the satisfaction of solving challenges is very essential for me.
People always feel nervous and exhausted when they are facing challenges, but if we solve this issue successfully, we will gain more than we thought before.
In conclusion, although different individuals would have diversity of opinions, I still hold the view that I need different things happened everyday in my working field.
Even though facing some unpredictable issues is very complicated and difficult or coping with a large number of things is very exhuasted, I can gain more experience instead of sticking to convention.
I donâ€™t think it was a good idea for those parent who offer their school-age children money for each high grade.

secondly,this method may lead to cheat in exams.

So workers will have more interests to finish the work.
And maybe it wil help them improve working efficency.
All in all, workers will be more joyful if they have different kinds of working tasks, no matter for the pleasure or the experience and knowledge.
So it's a good suggestion for leaders to assign different tasks for a worker to enhace his working efficency and working passions.
"Do just one thing or some things" , this is a question.
If one person should just do one thing for all day long or can chose seaveal satisfing tasks to do?

Machine, The workers are human, which are different from other animals because of our mood.
We can feel and think about ourselves.

If we just do one thing, we can not creat the superior machine,so as the company.

A good teacher can not only teach, but also be concerned about her students.
The sound from the student is the best gift to the teacher.
There isn't any thing can replace the satisfaction that made by the students.
Through the communication, the teacher can achieve herself and the student can make friends with the teachers.
Last but no least, more types can be more choices for us.
A fantastic man can do different kinds of things and have more chances.
Once you don't like to do this, you can chose anthor one.
So I insist my oppion.

There is nearly no doubt that if parent use the money to stimulate the children,they will learn much harder in order to get higher grade.

Besides,after my parent decided not to give me money as an encouragement,I lost the motivation to study,I bagan to hate studying.

leadship plays an essential role in group working.
Due to the leadership,the team can find a way to march on.
Due the leadership,the team can have courage to face the challenge.
Due to the leadership,the team can embrace a brigther future.
However,when it comes to leadership,there is a question needs to be discussed.
The question is whether leadership comes naturally or people can learn to be a leader.
From where I stand,I firmly hold the belief that people can learn to be a leader.
The reasons why I hold that perspective are as follow.
Everthing can be learnt.
including leadership.
If one can not be a qualified leader,it is because that there is something they can improve.
So,he can learn from others,from experience to improve himself,to make himself to be better man.
When all of the qualification is satisfied,he can be a professional leader,either.
Taking Mao Zedong as an example to illustrate what I am demonstrate above.
Mao was born in a rural village and his family was very poor.
In that period,the government loaded a lot of pressure and burden on ordinary peopleâ€˜s shoulder.
So,he wanted to changed this situation and readed a lot of book.
He studied a lot to know how to lead a revolution to improve people's situation.
And finally,after studing and learning,he accomplished the revolution.
And second reason is that people need to fight for who they want to be and what they want to do.
Becoming a leader also needs people to pursue and chase.
If one person want to be a leader,he can make his efforts.
When these endeavors are seen and appreciated by the others,he will be a leader.
For instance,when I was in college,I participated in a club.
And one day the team came up with a advice that the club needed a chairman.
In my inner thought,I wanted to be this man.
However,I stepped back.
There was another people stand forward to apply for this position and he listed all the thing he had done for this club.
Then,he won the position.
Some people may hold the opinion that when thing proccess into a particular stage,the leader will emerge.
However,although this man show up,we can not deny the fact that he has improved himself and fight for this position.
In this way,this reason can not make any sense.
From what I have been referred above,we can come down to following: leadership can be pursed and be learnt.
If people want to be a leader, they need to take antions right now.

So he don't have much time to stay with his son on weekdays in this conditions.
But he usually paly basketball with his son on weekends and that contribute to their relationship a lot.
Moreover, having fun with their children can help parents understand their children better.
Owing to lack of time staying with their children, parents may not know what their children think.
But when they choose to play with their kids, they are bound to have plenty of chances to communicate with the kids.
During these communications, both of them can know each others better.
I will still use my uncle for an example, he get informed about a lot of informations about his kid's school life, which is really useful.
Although spend time doing the things related to schoolwork can help with children's study, the benefit of this kind of choice is little on account of the lack of time.
Studying is a long period which needs to be repeated everyday.
Under this circumstances, spending the deficient time on study are more likely to get out of perspective.

Nowadays, with fast development of society, young generations seem do better in their life choices, but a group of people think that young people today are actually not able to make better dicision about their own lives than young people in the past.
Personally, I strongly believe that today young people are better able to make divisions about their own lives.
To begin with, young people nowadays have plenty of reliable resources help them to make fair dicision.

In the past, communication had many limitations so that young people could only turn to their parents or relatives for suggestions to help them make better dicision, and sometimes parents cannot give right ideas.
But now people have lots of ways to communicate so they could consult professionals for help or they could just learn relevent stuff from Internet to help them make better dicisions.
For instance, my friend want to buy a game computer but don't know which sort is best fit his requirment.
His parents know nothing about computer so he ask professional people on the Internet and learn what kind he wants.

In this case, young people don't need to depend on their parents to make decisions because they already had a better way to assistant them so they are better able to make decision about their own lives.
Secondly, young people today are more independent to the past and the society is also more opened.

In the past, it seems to be a tradition that parents should consider and make dicision for their children and this tradition existed for quite a long time, but now is quite different because young people today are no longer need to follow this old fashion and are progressed to make their own dicision.
In this circumstance, young people can make decision freely and practice making sicision, with practicing, they could make dicisions better.
To put into a nutshell, because of the development of technology and change of society, today young people are better able to make decisions about their own lives.

It is becoming more and more popular to work together in our international society.
Although students will concerntrate more  when they are working alone, I hold the viewpoint that working together is a better way for students to get effective study.
Generally speaking, working together can save more time which students can spend on more important activities.
If students are working alone, they will take more time to get all the frames of that projects and to complete the whole works.
In the contrast, when they are working together, they can discuss together and make the works partly so that every student in the group only need to do appropirate number of works.
Once the students get their own parts to finish, the aim would be more clear and each of the students can concentrate more attention on the work they need to do.
What's more, even though the group working might produce more peer pressure, the students can be motivated by other excellent peers.
There is a saying that the pressure is the source of the motivation.
When a student is surrounded by many greater students, he or she may get much more ambious to be excellent.
Take myself as the example, it's when I was in high school.
I transferred to the other better science class when  the school delivered all the students to different classes.
In that class, I got touched with some higher-grade students, and I began to think why he was greater than me.
I tried my best to learn from him and always asked him questions.
Eventually, I won the first price in one exam, I got a large sense of achievement and I was sure that I improved much.
Therefore, it's great to have someone to motivate each other.
In addition, when we discuss with others, we can get lots of different perspectives about that project, which may make students learn more from that project.
When different students show their own opinions on the topic and the argued with others trying to persuade them, they will find their own errors during that period.
Acctually, thinking one topic from different aspects is a great way to learn, which is useful in many situations of our daily life not only in learning.
As far as I'm concerned, we cannot emphasize the importance of group working too much.
Only when we learn from others or learn with others, can we improve much more.

Have you got pocket money from your parents when you was a child?
Have you managed how to spent them?
When I was a child, I always got pocket money from my mother.
And she asked me to write down every expenditure clearly on my diary.
Thanks for her requirement, I built up a good habit that makes me know where my money go.
Hence I think if children want to become financially responsible adults, they need learn to manage their money at a young age.
There are two specific facets why I think in this way.
Initially, as financially responsible adults, people shoud know where their money go and avoid spending money on the thing they do not need.
I think that write down every expenditure can help.
For instance, when I was five, I got my first pocket money.
At that time my mother asked me to write down my expenditure on my diary and she would check it every month.
Now once when I spend money, I will record it on my phone.
After a month, I will check it myself.
Sometimes I find that I spend much money on things that I do not really need.
At the same time, I would reflect myself and avoid by those articles.
Hence, I save more money and figure out where my money go.
Moreover, people need to the value of money when they are at a young age.
Most of children get money  from their parents firstly, because they cannot make money themselves.
However, children who do not manage their money will mostly be able to spend money faster than children who do manage their children.
For example, my little cousin do not manage his pocket money.
When he run out all his money, he asks his parents for money.

Taking account of all the factors mentioned above, we can safely arrive the conclusion that if children want to become financially responsible adults, they should learn to manage their own money at a young age.

In my point of view, teachers are not supposed to voice their personal political views to students in the classroom.
Among countless factors which influence the choice, there are three specific aspects as follows.
For a start,  the main reason for my propensity for contrary is that teacher are aimed at cultivating students' learning skills.
Because students have no choice but enhance their personal ability to face with challenge.
There are numerous exams in their study career, they have to study extremely hard to go beyond other students due to the current education situation.
For instance, there is no need for a math teacher to make his politcal views to students because it has nothing to improve his teaching level.
Therefore, teachers should focus on teacheing instead of making social opinion.

In addition, an equally essential factor which deserves people's attention is that teacher should provide an opportunity to allow students voice their opinion, as well as cultivating an ability to think issues by themselves.
Teachers are supposed to provide a platform to let students think, talk and pay much attention to social and political issues.
Given an example of that one of my political teacher always held a discussion when some social problems happened.
She hoped we could think and even sovle this issue on our own.

The main problem with this arguement is that it is ignorant of the basic fact that students are easiely influenced by teachers' views because they does not form a reflection system.
Students are too young to be persuaded by others.
For instance, a student could easily hate some teachers because they have opposite view.
Thus, he could not be able to listen to this teacher carefully
Taking into account of all these factors, we may reach the conclusion that teachers should not make their social views to students in the class.

It is universally acknowledged that always keeping in mind important events around the world is key to success in life, because fresh news always equip us with various kinds of know-how that is practical in daily life and meanwhile give us the chance to bond ourselves with our country and even the world.
To be concerned about events around the world is like travelling, which enriches our life and broaden our horizen.
A simple example of my personal experience will suffice.
Once I read a piece of news on the newspaper saying that the children in Russia wanted to learn about Chinese culture.
Though it is just a small report, I instantly felt the need to spread my country's culture to somewhere else.
And I really did that and I taught tea ceremony there, which made me really joyful.
I just bond myself with russian children there, which is something I have never imagined.
So this news appears irrelevant to my life, but indeed you can just take a step deeper and contribute yourself to the difficut conditions in other parts of the world.
Moreover, a wide assortment of the news is conductive to our academic progress, which means the theory in your textbooks is practiced in the real world.
Sometimes we get confused about the term or a historical event used by our professors, since they are abstract and we have no idea of it's practical use.
Take myself as an example.
When I first met the macroeconomic terminology "GDP", I could not understand its importance in the economy of a country.
It was not until I watched the news program on television aboout economy that I realized that it serves as a precise indicator of the progress of our developement.
The charts and tables on the screen vividly describe what the number indicates.
In this way, the significance of news that seems not to affect my life really amazed me and will never be neglected.
Considering the two factors, getting to know the seemingly irrelevant events happening around the world is a pivotal part in my daily life.
The era of big data certaily witnesses the importance of news.
In everyone's childhood, shool activities and assignments are essential part of education, and an interesting memory.
Recently, an compelling discussion has arisen among the public that should children spend time on doing homework and joining the school activities or on doing whatever they want.
While some people think it is children's rights to do what they wanna do, I, personally hold the viewpoint that it is necessary for them to spand time in homework and school activites.
My reasons and examples are elaborated as follow.
Firsrt, school assignment and activites are significant part for providing students knowledge to face challenges in the future.
Listening to teachers carefully just can help students understand knowledge, but if they want to streghen these  becoming permanant memory and a part of idealolgy, homework is necessary.
Only by being apart of ideology, can students use and apply knowlege fluently.

There was a time when my elementory classmates and I went to park to have fun, and a saleman was selling his candy, who showed us two types of consuming method, buying 20 with 10% discount or buying 5 with 1 free.
Since we have accomplished home related to this math problem, we sorted it out quickly and enjoying the candy with the lowest price.
However, if we refused to do homework and playing video games as we like, we could not purchase in such a low cost.
Besides, school assignment and activites can teach students way of social interperson skills, which will help them a lot in the long term.
Homework such as group presentations will force students to cooprate together and communicate to find the best solution and work for the same target.
During these period, they spand time to learn not only knowledge form textbooks, but also these communication skills.
For example, my sister in junior high school are not usually have to make presentations and holding disscussions with schoolmates.
She was a very shy girl, but she was obligated to undertake her duty.

By participating in these activities, she developed communicating skills and possessing confidence to move on.
Admittedly, some times students may under too much pressure of these tasks and activites adn

In conclusion, spanding time in homework and school activites is an important part of growth, which not only help children acquiring knowledeg but also give them a chance to build up social communication experience.
First of all, I think that it is every parent's choice to decide whether to offer their children money if they get high grade, and different child will react differently when they get the money.
So, it is hard to say whether it is a good thing to offer children the money.
However, as far as I am concerned, I don't think it is a good idea to offer children the money.
First of all, if children get money when they get high grade, they may consider that they are studying for money, not for getting more knowledge, which is harmful for their future development.
Apart from that, the action may make the children more greedy, if they get the money because of their good  performance in exam, they may ask for more money next time if they do better.
As time goes by, what they want maybe a large sum of money that their parents may feel hard to afford.
Last but not the least, I think that taking money as a reward for children is not a good choice.
It is a bad thing for children to create their affection on knowledge.
when they grow up , they may feel bored about study, because they will not like doing things without getting paid.
What's more, I think there are many other choices that parents can offer instead of money.
For instance, if your children get good grades in the exam, you can offer them a small gift, rather than barely money.
Besides, books will also be a good choice.
You can also take your children with you to a restaurant to allow them to eat what they want.
By this way, they may also feel comfortable and consider their hardworking on exams worthwhile.

At last, I do not think it is a good idea to offer children money, but the condition varies considering everyone is unique, so what parents should do is treating their children practically and make the best choice that is helpful for their further development.

In this way, he will not use the money   causually, which is one of the best virtues a student needs to get.

To put in a nutshell, I reckon that teacher should be paid as much as other jobs like doctors, lawyers or business leaders.

Now, the world is more diverse than before.
So everyone has their own opinions.
And the opinions between everyone also have differences.
But when our in a classroom or a meeting, we need to listen to teachers or the meeting leader.
They are an individual, so they just says the opinion that they think is correct.
So when their opinions are conflicting with my opinion, I'll wait until the class or meeting is over and the people gone, then I talk to the teacher or meeting leader.
In order to improve my impression in the teachers or meeting leaders' mind, keep the discipline well and respecting them.
Firstly, everyone want to give a good impression to the teachers or meeting leaders.
If you want to attain the purpose, you need to make them know your differences with others.
A good way is tell them your great opinions.
For example, when I was grade 7, during a math class I founded that I has an opinion are more different with teachers'.
So after class, I went to her office to talk about my opinions.
Then she said her opinion wasn't the excellent.
After this, she always think I'm a good student, so my math grade has significant increasing.
Secondly, a class or meeting must has the rules.
If I interrupt and correct the mistake right away, others  will not be concentrated on the teacher or meeting leader.
Maybe the class or meeting will not be continued.
For instance, a student interrupt the teacher's teaching and tell his opinion.

And his opinion make a lot of students laughing, so the teacher can't continue to teach the class, after class the teacher gave punishment to the student, because he violates the rules and make the class messy.
Finally, we must respect the teacher and meeting leader.
So we must keep their authority in public.
If we correct their mistake right away in public, they will feel awkward.
When a leader feel awkward in public, they'll be very angry.
And we also need to listen carefully about them, because they spend a lot of time to finish it, we must respect their products.
So I think the second choice is the best, it can also attain my purpose, improve my impression, but also respecting them and other listeners.

With the fast development of Internet technology, the way we get information has been changes a lot.
In these mordern days, we can get much valuable information from Internet, while there are some people concerned about the problems caused by too much information.

First, Internet provides us with valuable information which helps our study.
Nowadays, when we have some problems with our study, we can looking for answers through Internet instead of going to library or ask our theachers or classmates, which is really convenient.
Take my exprience for an example, when I wrote a course essay last week, I need to read more papers to make my essay authoritative.
I searched for these papers from Internet and got a lot of choices, which is very convenient.
I think it made me more effective because I coulld save the time going to library.
Second, Internet provides all kinds of information, like traffic conditions.
When we go out and wanna know the traffic conditions, we just need to look for it from our smartphones.
Everyday when I want to go to some places, I can know how to get there and the traffic conditions, so I can choose when and how to go there.
Third, people can get information from their friends through Internet, which help them to make and keep firends.
Today there are many social platforms like Facebook and Wechat which can help we know the recent situation of our friends, just as where they are and what they are doing these days.
So we can contact with them if we want and get some topics to talk about.
Last month, my high school classmates found me through Internet and thanks to the information from Internet, we built our connection again.
In my opinion, parents should not let children to make mistakes and let them learn from their experience.
My points are as follows.

Firstly, life is short and precious so that parents should tell children what they should do and what they should not do at an early age, in which way parents can ensure that when children live their life alone, they will not break the law.
Few years ago, Jachie Chen' by was arrested because of drug use.
If Chen had told his boy that he could never do anything illegal, such as using drugs, his boy would not be sentenced to jail today.
Therefore, parents should avoid their  children making mistakes.
Secondly, parents is rich in life experience and they should help their children when their children know nothing about dangers and failures.
If a child is left alone at home when a thief come in, what will happen when his parents have not told him not to fight with the thief face to face?

If a child is addicted to video games and does not mind failing tests, what will happen to his future when his parents have not told him it's of great significance to get rid of his bad habits and focus on study?

Thirdly, when parents offer suggestions and help their children figure out the solution to problems, they can get closer to their children and know more about them, in which way the children will trust them more.
Love is a two-street way where you devote your time and energy you will get what you deserve.
From what I have told above, we can see that it is apparent  parents should not let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
Parents should try their utmost to help their childre avoid mistakes.

Food is an essential element in our everyday life, we cannot imagine a day without it.
We all agree with the statement that the way we treat food today is far from the one we used to in the past thanks to the development of the society.
So there leads a controversial topic that will the people spend less time cooking or preparing food in the near future then we do now, the opinions varies.
For my personal view, I firmly belive that the time used for cooking and food preparing will be reduced greatly in 20 years .
Primarily, the improvement of technology will contributes to the saving of time in cooking and food preparing.
As a skilled cook, I regard the major period of time consumed in the process of making a meal is waiting.
We need to wait for the water to be boiled, the pies to be baked, the ice cream to be frozen, etc.
And I'm confident that the future technology will minimize the time of these process with high efficency electronic inventions.
In this way, it will be unneccessary for us to staring at the pot or waiting by the fridge for minutes.
Making a meal will be a job that faster and easier than ever.

Take the example of the Gravity Pot as an example, it is a kind of pot with unique creative features that it can increase the boilling temprature point of water by creating a high gravity inner environment.

As a result, this newly developed technology makes it possible for people to enjoy their food in a shorter time of waiting, and as the day goes on, I think in 20 years, more inventions like Gravity Pot will come out and makes the cooking itself less time consuming.
In addition, it's aknowledged that we are living in an era of fast pace, so the form of meal will be reformed results in the reduced time in cooking and preparation of food.

People are under stressful competition today and their working hours can be long, spending hours to sit down to have a relaxing meal is unaffordable to the most of people since they need to invest most of their time to commute in large cities or work, and the trend is surely to continue in the twenty years.

So it is common that more and more people are choosing light foods, represented by boxed salad or milk shake to replace the traditional one, which takes lot of time to make and eat for the reason to keep up with the busy daily routine.

My aunt Judy is office lady who works in a large city, and because of her tight schedule, she choose to use apple juice and cold sandwitch to replace her formal meal since it can be either made or finished within minutes.

Assuming in the 20 years after, the people might face with more pressure and tiring life thanks to the boom of population, so their time to cook is sure to be less, and they will tend to choose new form of food for this reason.
To sum up, I think the people in twenty years is more likely to take less time in cooking and preparing food than current, for the newly introduced technology and new form of food.
There are millions of teachers in my country who are the fudation of the education system of our society.
Recently, there is a fiece debate about the problem that whether teachers should be paid as least as much as other people who work as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.
Some people deny it.
However, from my perspective, it is necessary to pay teachers as much as doctors and other people.
To begin with, many teachers work very hard every day and usually under great pressure, so they deserve high payroll.
As we all know, high school teachers have to assign a lot of homework with high quality to students and repeatedly check their homework and correct their mistakes on day basis.
Obviously, this work is painstaking and sometimes monotonous to some extent.
What's more, they need to bear the pressure from the students' parents and the leaders of their school, both of whom expect they can cultivate outstanding students.
For example, when I was in high school, my math teacher always arrived at our classroom at 8 am, supervising us to study hard.
And we all cherished his homework which helped us to understand the knowledge fully and deeply.
Once when I made a mistake, he taught me in person to ensure I could understan it.
Secondly, the work of teaching is significant to the development of science and technology.
Knowledge is the step of innovation and properity.
And it is teacher who passes down the useful knowledge to next generation.

For instance, most of the professors in the University of Washington are prominent scientists who improved the development of our society in numerous aspects, such as chemics, astronomy, geometrics, physics,and archaeology.
They have a good command of the core knowledge which can ensure the prosperity of our world.
Those knowledge are worthless, especially when they are taught to the young students in the class.
So paying enough money to the professors reflecting the importance of the knowledge.
Admittedly, the amount of teachers are very huge, and most of their salary are paid by governmemt finance.
So it will be a stressful burden for the government if their salary are higher than doctos, lawyers or  business leaders.
But we should still pay them enough, at least as much as the doctors and other people, so that we can ensure the education prosperous of our country.

With the development of modern society, many young people are searching for the essential ability for them to improve the probobility of success.
And the ability to plan and organize is taken into account.
Some of them believe that the ability to plan and organize is not essential to them because of the fast speed of our modern life.
But in my opinion, it is essential for young people to have the ability to plan and organize.
Admittedly, as changes in our lives are so frequently, we must grab opportunities in time instead of having the ability to plan and organize to prepare all the things well.
Some chances in our life will disapper soon if we are restricted by our plan.
For example, as we all know, Bill Gatze droped out from university, owning a personal company and becaming the richest person in the wrold.
He realised that   the computer market is very promising, so he droped out immediately rather than to finish his university study as most students planed.
However, his success is an individual case.
It is arbitrary to say that the ability to plan and organize is not essential.
Firstly, with the help of the ability to plan and organize, young people can prepare for their personal works well and finish them in order.
Making a plan before embark, they will have a whole view which can help them divide their assignments into small tasks and they can finish them one after another.
What's more, they can find out the most difficult and significant parts in the tasks, so with more practices and attention in these parts, they can fulfill them smoothly.
Thus, the ability to plan and organize is essential for young people to succeed.
In addition, in a team work, the ability to plan and organize can insist them in coordinating with the relationship between team members and group works.
So, they can be a good leader.
It is essential to prepare for a team work, deside the working processes and assign tasks to the grop members.
A leader with this ability can give one task of the team work to the most skillful person.
It will make the work more effencial.
In conclusion, the ability to plan and organize is essential for young people.
Although it is importent to grab chances in time, it is more crucial to finish works in order in a personal job and  coordiante all the things well in a team work.
Only in that way can young people enhace the probobility to become more successful.

For recent decades, the issue of choosing jobs is often discussed among educators and parents.

Though a fraction of people tend to argue that it is better for children to choose jobs that similar to their parents's jobs than to choose jobs that are very different from their parents' jobs,  I personally beileve that children should choose the jobs which they really engage in, rather than just following their parents' choice.
On the one hand, children can develop their talent in their prefered area.
It is vital important for them obtaining career success in their social climbing ways.
To be more specific, when people really devote themselves into what they really engage in that would bring self-fulfillment and achievement.
All of these could became the motivation to inspire people move forward and make them self-developed and success.

For example, my grandfather was a famous lawer, but my father was a actor, if my father chose the same job as his father did, I will never see such a wonderful actor in the screen or at stage to perform fantastic plays for us.
On the other hand, if children always follow their parents' footprint to live that would cannot adapt the intense competition society and non-stop changed world.
That is to say, jobs would vary according the social development, if children always follow their
Before reaching a conclusion about the debate, let's back up a bit and recall that is there a phenomenon that obesity rate among young children is increasingly higher?
Is it familiar to you that more and more children begin to put on glasses at a younger age?
These kinds of health problems among young children can't be neglected because children are the future of the world.
So why not engage young children in playing games and sports during the time when their parents are too busy?
By doing so, childen can have fun with their friends in addition to cultivating the sense of competition and cooperation.
After all, that time is originally meant for leisure time between parents and children, not for shoolwork, right?
Playing games can cultivate their sense of competition.
With the population reaching highest through the history, competition also becomes unprecendentedly fierce.
To prepare young children for the success in their future life, sense of competition must be cultivated from a young age.
Playing games, as far as I am concerned, is a perfect way to foster them.
As we know, there must be victory in a game which motivates the game player to compete for it.

With the will to champion the game and win praise from others, every child will endeavor for the victory and thus a fierce atmosphere is formed, offering the children involved with a taste of competition.
Then, they'll know the world is not always nice and there do exists frustations in life.
Playing sports is a perfect method to recognize the significance of cooperation.
By playing sports, one can obtain extrinsis and intrinsic income.
They can not only strenghthen their bodies, but also learn many spiritual lessons.
Take basketball as an example.
By playing sports like this, they will be aware that they should rely on the teamwork to win the game, no one could do it alone.
And that will leave a significant impression of cooperation in their minds, which is very helpful for their future life.
All in all, playing games and sports has more advantages than disadvantages.
So doing this in the busy time of their parents is a good choice!
Nowadays, the issue of how to pursue a craeer has become one of the hottest topics in people's daily life.
Someone states that people are more statisfied when they have many different types of works and others contends that people feel more content when they do similar tasks all day long.
However, as far as I am concrned, I believe workers are more satisfied when they pursue all kinds of job.
First, the popele who have many different types of career are more likely to find what they are reallly interested in.
For example, I have an uncle who majored in economy in university.

After he graduated from university, he found a job as a financial reporter and after a peoiod of time he was not like this job so much, because he didn't not like the feeling of sitting in front of the computer all day.
Then, he went to apply for a jon as an accountant, however he was not so interested in accounting.

Finally, he decided to try to be a math teacher, and at there, he found what is he really interested in and very satified with his current job, as he liked the feeling of imparting knowledge to others.
So if he didn't try diferent kinds of job before.
He will not have the oppurtunity to find what he really interested in and he will not be satisfied while working.
Second, tring all kinds of job can make us keep a feeling of freshment while working and we wil feel much happy.
Because people are always pursue a positive atitude toward new things.
So we will keep this feeling of freshement all the way while working and we will not fee dull.
However, on the contrary, the peopple who are do similar tasks all day long, they will creat a negative emotion toward their work and will feel tired and boring while ding work.
As a result, their work efficency will also be affected.
So doing all kinds of job is better.
Adimittedly, someone may contends that pursue all kinds of job is unstable and you may face the porblem that lose the job.
It is true that tring different jobs may ahve some risks, but actually the ture essence of life is keep tring all kinds of thing and acuire the sense of satisfying from it.
So pursue all kinds of career can add more fun and surprise to all life.

In conclusion, I think people are more satisfied when they have many different types of work, as they can find what they are really interested in and feel more happy and keep a sense of refreshment while doing work.
Nowadays, celebrities's opinions are becoming more and more important and influential.
Whenever asked whether celebrities' opinions are more important to younger people than they are to older people, crowds usually exhibit an air of uncertainty.
However, I wholeheartedly agree that the opinions of celebrities are more important to younger people.

It is known to all that younger people are more likely to have an idol than older people do.

Most older people have retired, and they do not have much troubles other than health problems.
What's more, they can be taken care of by their children and the government, so they have not much things to worry about.
On the contrary, younger people have to face a series of problems like their salaries, their parents and their children.
And nobody will help them.
At this time, they can listen to celebrities' opinions, which may be useful to themselves.

At this time, celebrities' opinion seems very important to them, because celebrities have more difficult life than ordinary people.
So celebritie's opinion can be useful and can also comfort younger people.
Last but not the least, I admit that the opinion of celebrities are also important to older people.
However, older people have faced a lot of problems when they are young.
Thus, they have the ability to think, and they may think twice about the celebrities' opinions because they believe in themselves more.

To conclude, although sometimes older people may think celebrities' opnion as very important, but compared to younger people, celebrities' opnions are obviously more important to yonger people than older pe

I think it is a good idea.
Firstly, my parents did this when i was in high school, which turly gave me some power in a degree.
I do not think money is an evil thing which must be judged by the method and people who use it.
Everytime I got the money, i used them to buy books that I really wanted like The Three Body Problem.
However, my classmate would use it to buy video games that did deep harm to their studies.
So I think set money as a reward to children is not a bad thing itself, which must be used in correct ways.
Secondly, it is benificial that children have a chance to touch the money which belongs to themselves.
It pushes them to think how to manage their own things in an early age, which gives them a good chance to study many necessary live skills like accepting or rejecting.
Beside this, using money can teaching them how to choose independently.
THirdly, giving money as a reward is more pratical than other windy promise, because money can help children to do what they really want to do, but not their parents want them to do.
It also make them konw the importance of money, which they will meet inevitable in the future.
Only when the child got their want, did the reward meet its effect.
Last but not least, I do not know why some people think this is bad idea just becauese they think money is too social to children who will grow up in the end.
If parents can watch their children effectively when they use money, that nothing bad would happen.

Taking everything into consideration, offering school-age children money for a reward is a good idea which not only can make them happy to study, but also help them enter into society easily in the future.
What I believe is that offering school-age children money for high grade is not good.
Because of the money, students may try any way to get the high mark encluding cheating.
what's more,giving them money chang the purpose they study.
Without the money, they are studyingfor knowledge and theirselves.
However,they are studying for money now.
If their parents stop giving money,they will loose their passion for study.
And that may do bad to the students.
One of my classmates' parents do this,and he once cheated to get the high scores.
By cheating,he got an iphone.
This experience may lead him to a wrong way,which is surely not good for his future.
Compared with his parents, my parents never give me money for high grades.
I just study for myself,trying my best to get the high grades,but never cheat.
And I always feel happy when I learn new things.
Only in this way can a student devote himself to study.
The student can get happiness from getting high grades which stands for having a good command of knowledge.
The happiness will last forever, but the money won't.
Although the money can bring some joy,but the student cannot get the joy from leaning new things.
In that case, parents shouldn't give money to their children for high grade.
By and large,  giving money to their children for high grade is bad for children's studying.
There are many things to consider in terms of communication with people, different people have different ideas about this topic.

Some of them hold the view that using emails to communicate with classmates and colleagues have advantage over talking them face to  face, while others think that it is better for colleagues to communicate in person.
As far as I am concerned, I prefer to the latter one.
There are some reasons that illustrate my viewpoints.
To begin with, communicating with people in person is a great way to narrow the distance between two strangers.
This is because when we  talk to others face to face, the emotional connections are easily established between us.
Although it sounds weird, it does exist and is proven by scientists.
For example,  it is very common for people that their best friends are usually the people who played with them during their childlihood.
Why?
Because their friends communicated them many times and they experienced many anecdotes and unforgettable things.
In contrast, emails as a mean of communication is less likely to build this kind of friendship, since many people distrust online friends.
Second, communicating with people in person can improve your efficiency, which is important to work.
To illustrtate, many people may not check their email boxes everyday, which make it hard for people to get responds on time.
Taking me as an example, as a college students, I am very busy everyday and have a lot of works and assignments to finish.
Sometimes those assignments and exams drive me crazy.
As a result, I may forget checking my mailbox, which may miss some important information and notice from my classmates.
If they arrange a meeting and talk to me face to face, I will respond them on time.
Adimittedly there are some downsites about communicating with people in person, Such as wasting a lot of time and inaccurate express.
But  if we just fully prepare for this, it will not become big problems.
So I still believe that it is better for classmates to connect each other in person.
To put it into nutshell, my preference for communicating face to face that demonstrated by above-mentioned reasons and cases is due to the fact that can narrow the distance and improve efficiency.
As the develpoment of the society, people begin to care more about what kind of work can lead to a secure and successful life.
Some people hold a point that now it is easier for us to identify a job's prospect than before.
However, others argue that it is more evidently now.
As for me, I strongly believe that it is easier to identify a job today.
Firstly, we can look for tons of information on the Internet which enable us to have a better understanding of a specific job.
Nowadays, the Internet is much more convenient than it used to be.
People share their opinions toward one job on the Internet.
Your can have a total and wider horizon on the job.
As a result, you can know exactly what  this career's prospects are and then certainly identify what kind of career would lead to a secure and successful future more easily.
Secondly, the law is more strict now which is a invisible guard for our career.
In the past, many officer may do many illegal things because they may think that they can not be caught.
However, paper cannot wrap the fire.
There is a very large possibilty for the civiliens to take them to the court.
In this way, the is no guarantee for those officers.
These jobs seem to be wonderful and many would hold a point that those jobs can lead to a secure future, but as I explained above, it is just fake, like a sweet lie.
Then, it increase the difficulty to identify a job's security.
On contrast, it is totaly different now.

The job is exactly like what it likes on appearance--- the officers are not possibly to break the law, so this career is just as safe as it looks; the thieves are finally punished by the police, do this job is as dangerous as it sounds.
In conclusion, now it is much easier to identify what type of career would lead to a excellent lift because of the wide information the Internet offers us and the strict laws we have today.
First of all,I agree with the statement that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
I think it is a way to learn the life skills.
However,there are many parents do not think it right.
They may think it wastes of time.
They think their children can learn at school,learn from books,so they do not need to learn from mistakes.
As far as I am concerned,there are many things that we can not learn from book.
For example,the good manners,a good manner is the thing that we must learn from our life.
What should we do,what should not.
What we must do,what we must not.
I learn a story from a newspaper lately.
It is saying that there are many people applying for a company,but just  ten minutes  after the interview the manager choose a boy without a recommodation.
A friend of the manager asks how he can choose a boy without  a recommdation.
He says that the boy pick the book he put on the floor on purpose,and he give his seat to a old man and so many good manners.
From this story,we can see how important the good manners is!
But, I want to say that the good manners can not be learn from the books.
It must be learn from the mistakes.
If the parents do not let their children make mistakes ,they would not have the chance to learn the good manners and many other things which must  be learn from the mistakes.
And there many people who have really good grades but do not success in the end.
The reason is that their parents want they have more time to study do not let the have the chance to learn from the mistakes .
After graduations,many company and many relationship between people and people need we have the life experience which means the things we learn from the mistakes.
With social development, it is important to have a decent job, which means that you can have a better salary and life a better life that you desire for a long time.
Of these two options, many people want to choose different jobs so that they can step out of their comfort zoo.
However, as far as I am concerned, I'd like to choose a job that is similar to my parents' job.
Firstly, it is a desire for me to choose a similar job with parents' conversion.

As we all know, our parents have to face the tons of assignments every day and consider complex situations to make a proper decision, so it is hard for them to talk with their fellows during the work time.
However, when they go home, they can have a private time with me, and it is convenient for them to turn their brains off and talk about the problems and some fascinating experiences with me.
As time goes by, I am familiar with the job that the parents take and want to have the same experience.
Secondly, choosing a similar will build up a better relationship with parents.
Before I have a job, I spend less time with my parents than my friends, so my parents almost don't know what I'm thinking and feeling.
When I face the complicated situation in the career, I will search for help with my parents, which means I will talk to my parents with my experience and my career.
Hence, it is a good opportunity for me to build up a better relationship with parents.
Thirdly, if I choose a similar job, I will gain more experience towards parents.
For example, if my parents are doctors for many years, will gain a wide variety of knowledge about medical search.

A controversial topic has aroused heated debate: whether it is more important to maintain friendship with a small group of people, compared with the ability to make new friends easily.
Opinions vary from people to people.
Some claim that the capacity of making new friends is more signficant since the broaden social network make it for us easier to success.
However, I hold an opposite view that the ability of maintaining friendship with a small group of people outweights the ability of making new friends.
First off, old friends are more genuine and sometimes they are willing to sacrfice themselves to help us.
To illustrate, modern people are now living overwhelmingly hectic lifestyles since they need to earn money to cover their expenses.
It is much easier for modern people to make new friends since most the people are willing to broaden their professional network, even though they are unfamiliar with each other.
However, if they have exhausted all the worth of you, they will discard you as soon as possible.
In this case, such new friends are not worthwhile making.
In constrast, the small group of friends are usually time-proved, and they are more genuine.

When you fail, they will encourage, motivate and inspire you; when you win the victory, they will not take advantage of you and prevent you from losing; when you get astray, you will spare no effort on guiding you to the right way.
Additionally, a small group of people are more familiar with you.
To elaborate, your friendships has witnessed long time.
They are familiar with your habits, routines, and preferences.
It is more likely to have infinite topics among them, which is conducive to comforting you when you are depressed.
In contrast, making new friends easily does not mean that these new friends are familiar with you and share the same interest with you.
With time going by, you might gradually realize that most of them are counterpart to you.
Under this circumstance, the gap between yourself and your new friends will be expanded.
For instance, when I participated in the basketball team in Wuhan No.1 high school, I made lots of new friends through basketball game.
Unfortunely, most of them have all kinds of bad habits, such as indulging in computer games, escaping from school and conflicting with their parents, which interfered with my study.
Finally I decided to break up with them and continue to play with my small group of old friends, who are familiar with me and have a positive effect on me.
To put it in a nutshell, I reckon that the ability to maintain friendship with a small group of people overpasses the ability of make new friends easily.

Nowadays people are more than willing to help the people who they don`t know(for example ,giving food and clothes to the people who need them) than they were in the past.
As society develops and civilization moves forwards,one would expect to see more and more acts of kindness between strangers.
We would all like to think that people are growing more compassionate as humanity advances.
However,this is not the rality we live in.
Compared to the past,I think today`s people are less willing to help people they don`t know.

Big cities train us tostop seeing others as human beings.
We encounter hundrds of people just taking the subway in  the morning to work or school.
Most of them just fade into the background.
Others may stand out as obstacles: the person who doesn`t let you pass on the escalator ,  or the beggar who asks you for money everytime you`re walking home tired from work.
Most of the time we are dosensitized to those around us.
As a result,fewer and fewer people are willing to help strangers.
Secondly,people have t work harder for less money nowadays,so they`re much less willing to par with their hard-earned cash.
For one thng,there`s the recent economic recession--a lot of people were recently laid off their jobs.
Those that could find jobs often had settle for menial work outside of their preferred fields.
So when people strugglng to make ends meet are aske to help others,they may react negatively.
In fact,I often see people lashing out at beggars on thw streets."
I earned my money.
Go work for yours."
This tpye of harsh mentality probably stems from the financial difficulties people have been facing lately.
Granted,sometimes people today d demonstrate kindnes towards others.
However,this is only really prevalent in smaller communities where people are more familiar with each other.
For instance,the other day,I forgot to bring my wallet while grocery shopping,and the owner of the store told me I could just pay her back  later.
I am a regular customer at the store.
Peopletoday are dsedsitized to others.
Due to recent economic troubles,they`re also more likely to be only looking sfter their own interests.
Small acts of kindness may still be found here and there ,but only if people are least somewhat acquain
To find a niche in the society is undoubtely important events for everyone owing to the fact that job is an important and neccessary gredient in our life.
Life always associates with our job.
Therefore, what choice should we make?
To choose a secure job as soon as possible when it occure or wait for a satisfying job occure eventhough this is a long process.
In my opinion, I am in tune with the fact that do not take secure job right away, we should wait for the satisfying job.
In the first place, interest is the compelling power behind the happy life; therefore, we should choose a job in our interest field.
My brother, Daniel who is the love of labor for basketball, can successifully illustrate this opinion.
When Daniel face a position in the computer comany after graduate, he do not choose this job eventhough the salary of this job is pretty attractive.
Finally, he become a baketball player, which is his dream because basketball is the only thing he love in his life.

Eventhough the salary of this job is not high when compare it to the computer conpaney position as well as basketball players always injury in the games, he never give up and he always feel happy and satisfied.
He told me that enthusiasm is the crucial conerstone toward achievement and you will not feel tired and bored when you do a job you are interested in.
Therefore, waiting to a satisfying is what we are supposed to do.
In the second place, challenges are wealth experiences in our life; therefore, we can not just choose a secure job.
For me, when I graduate, I have an opportunity to work as a banker.
However, I give up this opportunity even this job is very secure.
I choose start a satisying business, to set up a company with my friends.
This is highly challenging because we face the massive work load and we need to do carelly budget about company's consuption and to address the contrasts between the eployees.
Nevertheless, I think this is exellent experience in my life because I learn lots of social skills and this work equipe me the ability to manage a team.
Therefore, to wait for a challenging job can enrich our life.
Finally, some people think that we can not miss the secure job because you may will not meet again in the future.
However, I totally disagree with this point.
I think that we need to spend time to strenthen ourselves rather than to get a secure job right away, which can generate more satifying opportunities in the future.
When my mother graduate from university, she just obtain two opportunites including banker and teacher; however, she was not satisfied with these.
Finally, she choosed to obtain the mastery degree, which definetily improve her work ability and expand her outlook.
After that, what my mother face was new word because she can choose almost every job according to herselve.
My mother's experience illustrate that we need to spend time to aim us rather than to get a secure job.
This way, we can hold fast more satifying oppotunities in the future.
To sum up, I suppose that we should to wait for the satisfying opportunity rather than to get a secure job because interest, challege and improving our ability is the most important thing.
With the masses' increasing affluence and the development of technological gadgets, people can have multiple access to any events no matter where they happen.
Currently, a controversial topic has aroused heated debate: whether young people today are more likely to invest their time and efforts in improving the world than young people in the past.
Opinions vary from people to people.

Some claims that young people devote less time and efforts in improving our world since most of them now are living overwhelmingly hectic and hurried lifestyles, leaving no time for them to concern about our world.
However, I hold an opposite view that young people are now investing more time and efforts in improving our world than young people in the past.
First off, the appearance of state-of-the-art technological gadgets and devices make modern young people have more approach to know the urgent things happing arould the world.

To illustrate, thanks of the convience of the advanced technology, such as cell phone, cemara, desktop and laptop, young people can attain the first-hand news immediately, as long as there are some people reporting on the websites, compared with young people in the past.
Then they can spare no effort on improving the world.
For instance, China witnessed a destructive earthquake in 2008, which deprived the life of millions people and  tolled down thousands of house.

After the news reported on the World Assistance Commitee, the wordwide people from different counries, culture and color have denoted all kinds of substance to help refugees to get rid of the demage as soon as possible.
In contrast, the congestion of information in the past make it difficult to make great difference on time.
Additionally, the gradually increasing awareness of working together to improving our common world triggers more people to deveto themselves to make our earth better.

To elaborate, it is common that modern people has realized the importance of cooperation, since only after each individual has indulged in some events can we adress the thorny global problems, such as global warming, proverty, environmental protection.
In this case, more and more people will devote their time and energy to improving our world.
For example, the environment has been constantly deteriorated, which is caused by the fumes emited by vehicle, forest exploitation, and water pollutant and so on.
All of these problem alarmed the young people that it is imperative to take some actions to prevent them.

More and more young people sacrifice their time, energy and appealing salary to clean and recycle the pollutant in the oncean, serve as volunteer to reconstruct the habitats for wild animals and work on the renewable and clean power to substitue the pastroline and natural gas.
To put it in a nutshell, young people today invest more time and energy in improving the world than young people in the past.

Some againster claim that giving money to students for their high grade in school is a very great idea because , in some extent, it will inspire the students to study harder.

Most of the students lack this enthusiam, especially for long run.
At this time, students do not want to study hard anymore but they want more money from parents, so some of them may use fake grades to cheat their parents.
Teachers use common red pens to correct the paper, and it's too easy to change answers after the teachers gave answers to students.
It only need a little bit time, but students can get a big amount of money.
Nowadays, this has already became a useful way for stuents to cheat their parents and teachers.
So, in this way, parents do not know if their child's grade is real or fake, and this can also cause large problem for student's future habit.
In addition, students are too young and they are lack of the ability of money management.
Some middle school students which are only twelve or thirteen years old, they are so young so they may have a large amont of troubles in using these money.
For example, if a thirteen year old girl get these money, what should she do then?
How to deal with this problemï¼Ÿ
She will think of storing these in her desk, of course it is a good choice, but what if she wants to spend it?
She can buy books, flowers, gifts for parents.
These are certainly good choices, but if she buy some make-up,whichis not suitable for her age or her parnts disencourage her to use this, her parents may regret in giving money to her.
There is actually another solution.
The parents can ask the child for a gift list, if she get high grades, they can choose to buy one item on the list for her.

With huge increase on human population, how to satisfy people's housing need is an absolutely important issue.
Should government to build new housing or preserve old and historic buildings?
For me, it is more important for the government to build new housing.
In the same place, building new housing which can include more residents can provide people affordable house to live.

For instance, in the past I lived with my parents and my grandparents in a small house in the past because that time the housing resource was limited, which made house's price pretty high and my parents had not enough money to buy a new house.
After that, the government replace lots of old and historic buldings, which increased largly resident rate.
Following the house's price had a huge drop and lots of people can buy new house.
Noweadays I live with my parents isolately because increasing number of new housing more people can live in causes the drop on house's price.
Therefore, government is supposed to build more new housing more people can live in since this can solve the residents' bais problems.
In the second place, building more new housing instead of preserving old and historic buildings can protect wild animals' living condition.
It is known to all that lots of government which in order to fullfill housing need without destroying old and historic buildings puts a lot of deforest program into practice.
In this way, lots of animals lose their homeland owing to the land fullfillmend and city expansion.
Furthermore, the appearence of some wild animals will bring huge unadversable effects on ecosystem.
Therefore, the government should replace old buildings with new housing, which not only can solve the need for more people, but also can protect environments.

Finally, some people think it is important to preserve old and historic buildings because they have histori value for next generation; therefore, the government should preserve old and historic buildings.
Nevertheless, I totally disagree with this point.
Although some historic and old buildings have value to appreciate, the government could onl preserve one or two buildings of certain buildings.
In this way, the government not only can satisfy our living need, but also can enable next generation to appraise these historic value.

To sum up, it is more important for the government to build new housing than preserve old and historic buildings because of positive effects on environments and availuable means to solve living needs.
