When people are young, there are many things waiting us to choos.
And if young people have no ideas to choose, they will ask their parents to help them.
At this time, their parents will tell them how to choose is better to their future.
There are two different opinions now.
Some people think today young people are better able to make decisions about their own lives.
And other people think that in the past, young people not depended on their parents too much.
In my opinion, i agree the latter.
First of all, in the past, there were less things to choose than now.
Because the technology is developing.
Just for students, when they face graduation, they should choose their major.
For example, when my mather graduated, there are only several kinds of jobs waiting her, like teacher, cook, doctor and so on.
My mother choose to set up a business.
But now, i will graduated , the jobs become more and more.
You can work for computer if you want.
And if you can, you can work abourd.
I do not know my future, so my mather askes me to become a doctor.
Because i will make a lots of money if i am a doctor.
Secondly, in the past a family has many children.
Sometimes the older teenagers will help their parents to take care of they brothers or sisters.
In this situation, they grows fast.
Just like my aunt, she is the oldest in her family.
Because her parents diedn when she was young.
So she had no idea to raise the whole family expect finding jobs.
She growed up very early.
But now, every family just has a singe children,just like my family.
So, my parents worried all days about safety, and they care about my future too much.
So they help me to do a lots of choices.
so, i think, in the past the young people are more independent.
The adults are under grate pressure due to the responsibilities of resing a child, but the parents have other things that bring pressure as well.
They need to provide shelter to the families, work in other to make money.
The parents are very busy, so they may not have enough time to spent with their children.
So it's always been a debatable subject that what is the best way to spend the limited time with children.
I think the parent should have fun playing games or sports with their children together by following reasons.
First, the parent needs to obtain a strong relationship with their kids.
kids need a place to be felt safe to unload their feelings, and the parents are the best candidates.
The studies show that the stronger the relationship between the parents and kids are the less likely the kids will develop mental decide like depression.
For example, I watched a documentary, it 's a story about a depression patient.
The patient name Ryan, he developed depression when he was in high school.
Lots of the patients commit suicide and lost their life is because they didn't speak up, sometimes the closest people didn't know they have depression.
Ryan and his father are both like football, even his father is busy but his father will always bring his son to watch a football game at a studio once a month.
Unlike other patients, Ryan told his father about what he felt like every day.
And eventually, Rayn has diagnosed depression and receiving the help that he deserves.
Second, playing sports can make kids more healthy.
we all need to spend a lot of od time in school, and we just sit there and not moving very often.
So and some kids get obesity and some even worse, diabetes.
It's all because of the laking of the exercise.
So we should take the exercise more serious than before.
My friend Andy is a high school student, he has obesity.
his families try everything such as ties and exercise too, but he will quite the jogging after a while.
And his father decided to run with his son every day, and he lost 30 pounds just 2 months after that.
so I think it's a great way to spend time with the child.
To wrap up, even the parents are very busy, they will always put their child first, and I think to spend time with your child by playing and doing sports is the best way.
In the high competive sociaty, grade is become more and more important both for students and parents.
So, there is a heaten discussion in the society recently about whether is right that parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
Opinion may vary from individual to individual.
Personally, I strongly believe that it is a great idea for parents to do so.
To begin with, offering children money for high grade can help them build the desire for winning.
Nowadays, it's becoming harder for people to live in this world well with the high cost of different aspects of living, like food, house, car, electronic products.
So, it is great to teach the children the importance of getting good grades or they could not live in the society well in the future.
To appraoch this goal, material beneficial is a great strategy because gread cannot bring them real benefical except honour.
If we give the children the real prize, they would probably realize good grade can give him or her really benefical, which is they would know in the future, people get good grade earn good pay.
So, if they know this point earlier, they can motivate by this and fight for good life which is absolute helpfull for their future.
For instance, my little brother used to be a naughty boy and never took his grade serious.
Then my parents told him if he could get good grades he would get prize.
Because of this, he started to study with great attitude and yaers later, he entered a great high school.
So, offering children money for good grades can motivate them to win.
Secondly, offering children money for high grade can teach them to be a honest and progressive person.
It is obvious that doing something great should have positive feedback and with the hard work people will have great result.
offering children money for great grade can help children to learn, if you work hard, you will gather what you really want.
With this way, children won't consider to get something in a impropriate way and instead, they would struggle for the goals.
It is the best way for parents to give the children the prize.

To put into a nutshell, parents offer their chool-age children money for each high grade they get in school is a good idea becuase children could learn the importance of success and the right way to earn what they want.
According the development of the civilazation and ecnomy,more and more parents want their child could go to a good college with good health.
So they will try their best to make children to do more homework or  to do some sports.
However, I don't think it is a good idea because children's always have their own interest.
So let them to do their choice is the best.
Doing something they are interested, it could make them get achievement more easily.
If childern do something they want, they will practice more and spend more time on it and get achievement more simple.
For example, I just don't like the lesson in the general school, But I have to do so many homework everyday because my parents want me to do this.
One day, I said I want to go to the art school, because I love art.
So I just go to the local art middle high school, and practice everyday.
Finally.
I got the offer of the best school in these place.
If I don't go to the art school ,I could never get this kind of achievement.
Doing something childern want, it could builde kid's own mind.
If childern want something, they will think about it carefully, and try their best to get this.
And it could make them have their own mind rather than just doing something their parents want them to do.
